defTh: หนึ่ง, อัน, ตัว
defEn: used before countable or singular nouns referring to people or things that have not already been mentioned
example: a man/horse/unit

defTh: ละทิ้ง, ทอดทิ้ง
defEn: to leave somebody, especially somebody you are responsible for, with no intention of returning
example: abandon somebody, The baby had been abandoned by its mother.

defTh: ความสามารถ, สมรรถภาพ
defEn: the fact that somebody/something is able to do something
example: People with the disease may lose their ability to communicate.

defTh: สามารถทำได้
defEn: to have the skill, intelligence, opportunity, etc. needed to do something
example: You must be able to speak French for this job.

defTh: ยกเลิก
defEn: to officially end a law, a system or an institution
example: This tax should be abolished.

defTh: การทำแท้ง
defEn: the deliberate ending of a pregnancy at an early stage
example: to support/oppose abortion

defTh: เกี่ยวกับ
defEn: a little more or less than; a little before or after
example: It costs about $10.

defTh: ข้างบน
defEn: at or to a higher place
example: Put it on the shelf above.

defTh: ต่างประเทศ, นอกประเทศ
defEn: in or to a foreign country
example: to go/travel/live/study abroad

defTh: การขาด, ไม่มี
defEn: the fact of somebody being away from a place where they are usually expected to be; the occasion or period of time when somebody is away
example: in somebody's absence, The decision was made in my absence (= while I was not there).

defTh: ขาด, ไม่อยู่
defEn: not in a place because of illness, etc.
example: He was absent from work for two weeks.

defTh: สมบูรณ์, เด็ดขาด
defEn: total and complete
example: I've joined a class for absolute beginners.

defTh: อย่างแน่นอน
defEn: used to emphasize that something is completely true
example: You're absolutely right.

defTh: ดูดซับ, ซึมซับ
defEn: to take in a liquid, gas or other substance from the surface or space around
example: absorb something, Plants absorb carbon dioxide from the air.

defTh: เชิงนามธรรม
defEn: based on general ideas and not on any particular real person, thing or situation
example: abstract knowledge/principles

defTh: ไร้สาระ
defEn: extremely silly; not logical and sensible
example: That uniform makes the guards look absurd.

defTh: ความอุดมสมบูรณ์
defEn: a large quantity that is more than enough
example: The brochure promised beautiful walks with an abundance of wildlife.

defTh: ทารุณกรรม, ข่มเหง
defEn: the use of something in a way that is wrong or harmful
example: alcohol/drug abuse

defTh: เชิงวิชาการ
defEn: connected with education, especially studying in schools and universities
example: high/low academic standards

defTh: สถาบันการศึกษา
defEn: a school or college for special training
example: She trained at the Royal Academy of Music.

defTh: เร่งความเร็ว
defEn: to happen faster or earlier; to make something happen faster or earlier
example: Inflation continues to accelerate.

defTh: สำเนียง, เน้น
defEn: a way of pronouncing the words of a language that shows which country, area or social class a person comes from; how well somebody pronounces a particular language
example: a northern/Dublin/Scottish accent

defTh: ยอมรับ (สิ่งของ, ข้อเสนอ), รับ
defEn: to take willingly something that is offered; to say ‘yes’ to an offer, invitation, etc.
example: He asked me to marry him and I accepted.

defTh: ยอมรับได้
defEn: agreed or approved of by most people in a society
example: Children must learn socially acceptable behaviour.

defTh: การยอมรับ
defEn: the act of accepting a gift, an invitation, an offer, etc.
example: Please confirm your acceptance of this offer in writing.

defTh: การเข้าถึง, เข้าถึง
defEn: the opportunity or right to use something or to see somebody/something
example: High-speed internet access has become a necessity.

defTh: เข้าถึงได้
defEn: that can be reached, entered, used, seen, etc.
example: The remote desert area is accessible only by helicopter.

defTh: อุบัติเหตุ, เหตุร้าย
defEn: an unpleasant event, especially in a vehicle, that happens unexpectedly and causes injury or damage
example: a car/road/traffic accident

defTh: โดยบังเอิญ
defEn: by chance; in a way that was not planned
example: As I turned around, I accidentally hit him in the face.

defTh: รองรับ
defEn: to provide somebody with a room or place to sleep, live or sit
example: The hotel can accommodate up to 500 guests.

defTh: ที่พัก, การปรับตัว
defEn: a place to live, work or stay in
example: rented/temporary accommodation

defTh: ไปกับ, ร่วม
defEn: to travel or go somewhere with somebody/something
example: accompany somebody/something + adv./prep., His wife accompanied him on the trip.

defTh: ทำให้สำเร็จ
defEn: to succeed in doing or completing something
example: The first part of the plan has been safely accomplished.

defTh: การบรรลุผล
defEn: an impressive thing that is done or achieved after a lot of work
example: It was one of the President's greatest accomplishments.

defTh: ตาม
defEn: according to a rule or the way that somebody says that something should be done
example: in accordance with legal requirements

defTh: ตามที่, อ้างอิง
defEn: as stated or reported by somebody/something
example: According to Mick, it's a great movie.

defTh: ตามนั้น
defEn: in a way that is appropriate to what has been done or said in a particular situation
example: We have to discover his plans and act accordingly.

defTh: บัญชี, เรื่องราว
defEn: an arrangement that somebody has with a bank, etc. to keep money there, take some out, etc.
example: I don't have a bank account.

defTh: ความรับผิดชอบตรวจสอบได้
defEn: the fact of being responsible for your decisions or actions and expected to explain them when you are asked
example: proposals for greater police accountability

defTh: ที่ต้องรับผิดชอบต่อการกระทำ
defEn: responsible for your decisions or actions and expected to explain them when you are asked
example: The state spends taxpayers’ money and should be held accountable.

defTh: นักบัญชี
defEn: a person whose job is to keep or check financial accounts
example: We talked to the company’s chief accountant.

defTh: สะสม
defEn: to gradually get more and more of something over a period of time
example: I seem to have accumulated a lot of books.

defTh: การสะสม
defEn: the process of gradually increasing or getting more and more of something over a period of time
example: the accumulation of wealth

defTh: ความถูกต้องแม่นยำ
defEn: the state of being exact or correct; the ability to do something with skill and without making mistakes
example: They questioned the accuracy of the information in the file.

defTh: ถูกต้อง, แม่นยำ
defEn: correct and true in every detail
example: an accurate description/picture of something

defTh: อย่างเที่ยงตรง
defEn: in a way that is correct and true in every detail
example: The article accurately reflects public opinion.

defTh: การกล่าวหา, ข้อหา
defEn: a statement saying that you think a person is guilty of doing something wrong or illegal; the fact of accusing somebody
example: I don't want to make an accusation until I have some proof.

defTh: กล่าวหา, ฟ้อง
defEn: to say that somebody has done something wrong or is guilty of something
example: accuse somebody of something, to accuse somebody of murder/a crime

defTh: ผู้ถูกกล่าวหา
defEn: a person who is on trial for committing a crime
example: The accused was found innocent.

defTh: สำเร็จ, บรรลุ
defEn: to succeed in reaching a particular goal, status or standard, especially by making an effort for a long time
example: He had finally achieved success.

defTh: ผลสัมฤทธิ์
defEn: a thing that somebody has done successfully, especially using their own effort and skill
example: the greatest scientific achievement of the decade

defTh: กรด, เปรี้ยว
defEn: that contains acid or has the essential characteristics of an acid; that has a pH of less than seven
example: Rye is tolerant of poor, acid soils.

defTh: รับทราบ, ยอมรับ
defEn: to accept that something is true
example: acknowledge something, She refuses to acknowledge the need for reform.

defTh: ได้รับ, ครอบครอง
defEn: to gain something by your own efforts, ability or behaviour
example: She has acquired a good knowledge of English.

defTh: การได้มา
defEn: the act of getting something, especially knowledge, a skill, etc.
example: theories of child language acquisition

defTh: เอเคอร์
defEn: a unit for measuring an area of land; 4840 square yards or about 4050 square metres
example: 3000 acres of parkland

defTh: ข้าม, ทั่ว
defEn: from one side to the other side
example: It's too wide. We can't swim across.

defTh: กระทำ, การกระทำ
defEn: a particular thing that somebody does
example: You have committed a serious criminal act.

defTh: การกระทำ
defEn: the process of doing something in order to make something happen or to deal with a situation
example: The time has come for action if these beautiful animals are to survive.

defTh: เปิดใช้งาน
defEn: to make something such as a device or chemical process start working
example: The burglar alarm is activated by movement.

defTh: การเปิดใช้งาน
defEn: the act of making something such as a device or chemical process start working
example: The activation of several target genes results in two major effects.

defTh: กระตือรือร้น, คล่องแคล่ว
defEn: always busy doing things, especially physical activities
example: Staying physically active in later years can also keep you feeling younger.

defTh: นักเคลื่อนไหว
defEn: a person who works to achieve political or social change, especially as a member of an organization with particular aims
example: human/civil/animal rights activists

defTh: กิจกรรม, การกระทำ
defEn: a thing that you do for interest or pleasure
example: leisure/outdoor/recreational activities

defTh: นักแสดงชาย
defEn: a person who performs on the stage, on television or in films, especially as a profession
example: Both lead actors (= the ones who play the main parts) are outstanding.

defTh: นักแสดงหญิง
defEn: a woman who performs on the stage, on television or in films, especially as a profession
example: The Oscar-winning actress has taken a break from acting.

defTh: แท้จริง, ที่เกิดขึ้นจริง
defEn: used to emphasize something that is real or exists in fact
example: James looks younger than his wife but in actual fact (= really) he is five years older.

defTh: จริงๆแล้ว, ที่จริง
defEn: used in speaking to emphasize a fact or a comment, or that something is really true
example: What did she actually say?

defTh: เฉียบพลัน
defEn: very serious or severe
example: There is an acute shortage of water.

defTh: โฆษณา (คำย่อ)
defEn: a notice, picture or film telling people about a product, job or service
example: The TV ads were first run last year.

defTh: ปรับตัว, ดัดแปลง
defEn: to change your behaviour in order to deal more successfully with a new situation
example: It's amazing how soon you adapt.

defTh: การดัดแปลง, การปรับตัวเข้ากับสภาพแวดล้อม
defEn: the action or process of changing something, or of being changed, to suit a new purpose or situation
example: the adaptation of buildings for military purposes

defTh: เพิ่ม, บวก
defEn: to put something together with something else so as to increase the size, number, amount, etc.
example: add something, Next add the flour.

defTh: ติดยาเสพติด
defEn: the condition of being unable to stop using or doing something as a habit, especially something harmful
example: cocaine addiction

defTh: การบวก, ส่วนเพิ่ม
defEn: a thing that is added to something else
example: All of these technologies are fairly recent additions.

defTh: เพิ่มเติม, เพิ่มเติม
defEn: more than was first mentioned or is usual
example: additional resources/funds/security/funding/costs

defTh: เพิ่มเติม
defEn: in a way that is more than was first mentioned or is usual
example: Additionally, the bus service will run on Sundays, every two hours.

defTh: ที่อยู่, กล่าว
defEn: details of where somebody lives or works and where letters, etc. can be sent
example: What's your name and address?

defTh: เพียงพอ, เหมาะสม
defEn: enough in quantity, or good enough in quality, for a particular purpose or need
example: They'll need an adequate supply of hot water.

defTh: อย่างพอเหมาะ
defEn: in a way that is enough in quantity, or good enough in quality, for a particular purpose or need
example: Are you adequately insured?

defTh: ยึดมั่น, ปฏิบัติตามหลักการ
defEn: to stick to something
example: Once in the bloodstream, the bacteria adhere to the surface of the red cells.

defTh: ที่อยู่ติดกัน
defEn: next to something
example: The planes landed on adjacent runways.

defTh: ปรับ, ปรับตัว
defEn: to change something slightly to make it more suitable for a new set of conditions or to make it work better
example: adjust something, Watch out for sharp bends and adjust your speed accordingly.

defTh: การปรับเปลี่ยนเล็กน้อย, การแก้ไข
defEn: a small change made to something in order to correct or improve it
example: I've made a few adjustments to the design.

defTh: บริหารจัดการ
defEn: to manage and organize the affairs of a company, an organization, a country, etc.
example: to administer a charity/fund/school

defTh: การปกครอง, คณะผู้บริหาร
defEn: the activities that are done in order to plan, organize and run a business, school or other institution
example: Administration costs are passed on to the customer.

defTh: ที่เกี่ยวกับการบริหาร
defEn: connected with organizing the work of a business or an institution
example: an administrative job/assistant/error

defTh: ผู้ดูแลระบบ
defEn: a person whose job is to manage and organize the public or business affairs of a company or an institution, or a person who works in an office dealing with records, accounts, etc.
example: Such organizational decisions are made by the hospital administrators.

defTh: ชื่นชม, ยกย่อง
defEn: to respect somebody for what they have done or to respect their qualities
example: admire somebody/something, I really admire your enthusiasm.

defTh: การรับเข้า
defEn: the act of accepting somebody into an institution, organization, etc.; the right to enter a place or to join an institution or organization
example: Hospital admission is not necessary in most cases.

defTh: ยอมรับ (ความจริง, ความผิด), รับเข้า
defEn: to agree, often unwillingly, that something is true
example: It was a stupid thing to do, I admit.

defTh: วัยรุ่น (ช่วงเปลี่ยนผ่าน)
defEn: a young person who is developing from a child into an adult
example: adolescents between the ages of 13 and 18 and the problems they face

defTh: รับเลี้ยง, นำมาใช้
defEn: to take somebody else’s child into your family and become its legal parent(s)
example: a campaign to encourage childless couples to adopt

defTh: การรับเลี้ยงบุตรบุญธรรม
defEn: the act of adopting a child; the fact of being adopted
example: She put the baby up for adoption.

defTh: ผู้ใหญ่, โตเต็มที่
defEn: fully grown or developed
example: preparing young people for adult life

defTh: ก้าวหน้า, ล่วงหน้า
defEn: done or given before something is going to happen
example: Please give us advance warning of any changes.

defTh: ขั้นสูง, ล้ำหน้า
defEn: having the most modern and recently developed ideas, methods, etc.
example: Scientists are working on highly advanced technology to replace fossil fuels.

defTh: ข้อได้เปรียบ
defEn: a thing that helps you to be better or more successful than other people
example: a distinct/significant/huge advantage

defTh: การผจญภัย
defEn: an unusual, exciting or dangerous experience, journey or series of events
example: her adventures travelling in Africa

defTh: ไม่พึงประสงค์
defEn: negative and unpleasant; not likely to produce a good result
example: adverse change/circumstances/weather conditions

defTh: โฆษณา, ประกาศ
defEn: to tell the public about a product or a service in order to encourage people to buy or to use it
example: If you want to attract customers you need to advertise.

defTh: การโฆษณา, คำโฆษณา
defEn: a notice, picture or film telling people about a product, job or service
example: a newspaper/television advertisement

defTh: การโฆษณา, ธุรกิจโฆษณา (แบบชำระเงิน)
defEn: the activity and industry of advertising things to people on television, in newspapers, on the internet, etc.
example: Cigarette advertising has been banned.

defTh: คำแนะนำ, ข้อเสนอแนะ
defEn: an opinion or a suggestion about what somebody should do in a particular situation
example: expert/practical/professional/medical advice

defTh: แนะนำ, ให้คำปรึกษา
defEn: to tell somebody what you think they should do in a particular situation
example: advise against doing something, I would strongly advise against going out on your own.

defTh: ผู้ให้การสนับสนุน
defEn: a person who supports or speaks in favour of somebody or of a public plan or action
example: advocate for something/somebody, an advocate for hospital workers

defTh: เกี่ยวกับความงาม
defEn: connected with beauty and art and the understanding of beautiful things
example: the aesthetic appeal of the songs

defTh: เรื่อง, ชู้
defEn: events that are of public interest or political importance
example: world/international affairs

defTh: มีผลกระทบ
defEn: to produce a change in somebody/something
example: How will these changes affect us?

defTh: ความรัก, ความชอบ
defEn: the feeling of liking or loving somebody/something very much and caring about them
example: Children need lots of love and affection.

defTh: สามารถซื้อได้
defEn: to have enough money to be able to buy or do something
example: afford something, Can we afford a new car?

defTh: ซื้อได้
defEn: cheap enough that people can afford to pay it or buy it
example: We offer quality products at affordable prices.

defTh: หวาดกลัว, เกรงกลัว
defEn: feeling fear; frightened because you think that you might be hurt or suffer
example: Don't be afraid.

defTh: หลัง, หลังจาก
defEn: later in time; afterwards
example: That was in 1996. Soon after, I heard that he'd died.

defTh: ควันหลง
defEn: the situation that exists as a result of an important (and usually unpleasant) event, especially a war, an accident, etc.
example: in the aftermath of something, A lot of rebuilding took place in the aftermath of the war.

defTh: บ่าย, ตอนบ่าย
defEn: the period of time from 12 o'clock in the middle of the day until about 6 o’clock in the evening
example: this/yesterday/tomorrow afternoon

defTh: ภายหลัง, หลังจากนั้น
defEn: at a later time; after an event that has already been mentioned
example: Afterwards she was sorry for what she'd said.

defTh: อีกครั้ง, ซ้ำ
defEn: one more time; on another occasion
example: This must never happen again.

defTh: ต่อต้าน, ขัด
defEn: opposing or disagreeing with somebody/something
example: the fight against terrorism

defTh: อายุ, วัย
defEn: the number of years that a person has lived or a thing has existed
example: You're the same age as my brother.

defTh: แก่, เก่า
defEn: of the age of
example: They have two children aged six and nine.

defTh: หน่วยงาน, ตัวแทน
defEn: a business or an organization that provides a particular service especially when representing other businesses or organizations
example: She works for an advertising agency.

defTh: กำหนดการ
defEn: a list of items to be discussed at a meeting
example: We have a very full agenda of issues to discuss.

defTh: ตัวแทน, นายหน้า
defEn: a person whose job is to act for, or manage the affairs of, other people in business, politics, etc.
example: Our agent in New York deals with all US sales.

defTh: ความก้าวร้าว
defEn: feelings of anger and hate that may result in threatening or violent behaviour
example: The research shows that computer games may cause aggression.

defTh: ก้าวร้าว, รุกราน
defEn: angry, and behaving in a threatening way; ready to attack
example: Seals have been known to exhibit aggressive behaviour towards swimmers.

defTh: ที่แล้ว, มาแล้ว
defEn: used in expressions of time with the simple past tense to show how far in the past something happened
example: two weeks/months/years ago

defTh: เห็นด้วย, ตกลง
defEn: to have the same opinion as somebody; to say that you have the same opinion
example: When he said that, I had to agree.

defTh: ข้อตกลง, ความเห็นพ้อง
defEn: an arrangement, a promise or a contract made with somebody
example: an international peace agreement

defTh: ทางเกษตรกรรม
defEn: connected with the science or practice of farming
example: agricultural policy/land/production/development

defTh: การเกษตร
defEn: the science or practice of farming
example: The number of people employed in agriculture has fallen in the last decade.

defTh: อา
defEn: used to express surprise, pleasure or sympathy, or when you disagree with somebody
example: Ah, there you are!

defTh: ข้างหน้า, ล่วงหน้า
defEn: further forward in space or time; in front
example: I'll run ahead and warn them.

defTh: การสงเคราะห์
defEn: money, food, etc. that is sent to help countries in difficult situations
example: humanitarian/food/medical aid

defTh: ผู้ช่วย
defEn: a person who helps another person, especially a politician, in their job
example: White House aides

defTh: เอดส์
defEn: a serious illness caused by a virus called HIV that attacks the body’s ability to resist infection (the abbreviation for ‘Acquired Immune Deficiency Syndrome’)
example: the AIDS epidemic

defTh: จุดมุ่งหมาย, วัตถุประสงค์
defEn: the purpose of doing something; what somebody is trying to achieve
example: the stated aims of the study

defTh: อากาศ, ลม
defEn: the mixture of gases that surrounds the earth and that we breathe
example: Let's go out for some fresh air.

defTh: อากาศยาน, เครื่องบิน
defEn: any vehicle that can fly and carry goods or passengers
example: fighter/transport/military aircraft

defTh: สายการบิน
defEn: a company that provides regular flights to take passengers and goods to different places
example: an airline pilot/passenger

defTh: สนามบิน
defEn: a place where planes land and take off and that has buildings for passengers to wait in
example: Gatwick Airport

defTh: เตือนภัย, สัญญาณเตือน
defEn: a loud noise or a signal that warns people of danger or of a problem
example: She decided to sound the alarm (= warn people that the situation was dangerous).

defTh: แม้ว่า
defEn: although
example: He finally agreed, albeit reluctantly, to help us.

defTh: อัลบั้ม
defEn: a book in which you keep photographs, stamps, etc.
example: a photo album

defTh: แอลกอฮอล์, เหล้า
defEn: drinks such as beer, wine, etc. that can make people drunk
example: He never drinks alcohol.

defTh: ติดเหล้า, นักดื่ม
defEn: connected with or containing alcohol
example: alcoholic drinks/beverages

defTh: เตือน
defEn: able to think quickly; quick to notice things
example: Suddenly he found himself awake and fully alert.

defTh: คนต่างด้าว
defEn: strange and frightening; different from what you are used to
example: an alien environment

defTh: จัดตำแหน่ง
defEn: to arrange something in the correct position, or to be in the correct position, in relation to something else, especially in a straight line
example: Make sure the shelf is aligned with the top of the cupboard.

defTh: การจัดตำแหน่ง
defEn: arrangement in a straight line
example: the alignment of the sun, moon and earth at a particular time

defTh: คล้ายคลึงกัน, เหมือนกันในลักษณะที่สำคัญ
defEn: very similar
example: My sister and I do not look alike.

defTh: มีชีวิต, รอด
defEn: living; not dead
example: Is your mother still alive?

defTh: ทั้งหมด, ทุก
defEn: completely
example: She was dressed all in white.

defTh: เรียบร้อยดี
defEn: acceptable; in an acceptable manner
example: Is the coffee all right?

defTh: การกล่าวอ้าง (ที่ยังไม่ได้รับการพิสูจน์)
defEn: a public statement that is made without giving proof, accusing somebody of doing something that is wrong or illegal
example: to investigate/deny/withdraw an allegation

defTh: กล่าวหา
defEn: to state something as a fact but without giving proof
example: allege (that)…, The prosecution alleges (that) she was driving carelessly.

defTh: ถูกกล่าวหาว่า
defEn: expressed as though something is a fact but without giving any proof
example: crimes allegedly committed during the war

defTh: พันธมิตร
defEn: an agreement between countries, political parties, etc. to work together in order to achieve something that they all want
example: to form/make an alliance

defTh: จัดสรร
defEn: to give something officially to somebody/something for a particular purpose
example: allocate something (for something), A large sum has been allocated for buying new books for the library.

defTh: การจัดสรร
defEn: an amount of money, space, etc. that is given to somebody for a particular purpose
example: We have spent our entire allocation for the year.

defTh: อนุญาต, ยอมให้
defEn: to let somebody/something do something; to let something happen or be done
example: allow somebody/something to do something, His parents won't allow him to stay out late.

defTh: เบี้ยเลี้ยง
defEn: an amount of money that is given to somebody regularly or for a particular purpose
example: an allowance of $20 a day

defTh: พันธมิตร, สนับสนุน
defEn: a country that has agreed to help and support another country, especially in case of a war
example: our European/NATO allies

defTh: เกือบจะ
defEn: not quite
example: I like almost all of them.

defTh: โดดเดี่ยว, คนเดียว
defEn: without any other people
example: not alone in, Tom is not alone in finding Rick hard to work with.

defTh: ตาม, พร้อม
defEn: forward
example: I was just walking along singing to myself.

defTh: ข้างๆ, เคียงข้าง
defEn: next to or at the side of something
example: A police car pulled up alongside us.

defTh: แล้ว, เสร็จแล้ว
defEn: before now or before a particular time in the past
example: ‘Lunch?’ ‘No thanks, I've already eaten.’

defTh: ด้วย, อีกด้วย
defEn: in addition; too
example: She's fluent in French and German. She also speaks a little Italian.

defTh: เปลี่ยนแปลง
defEn: to become different; to make somebody/something different
example: Prices did not alter significantly during 2019.

defTh: ทางเลือกอื่น
defEn: that can be used instead of something else
example: The road was closed so we had to find an alternative route.

defTh: ถึงแม้ว่า, แม้ว่า
defEn: used for introducing a statement that makes the main statement in a sentence seem surprising
example: Although the sun was shining, it wasn't very warm.

defTh: ทั้งหมด, โดยสิ้นเชิง
defEn: (used to emphasize something) completely; in every way
example: The train went slower and slower until it stopped altogether.

defTh: อลูมิเนียม
defEn: a chemical element. Aluminium is a light, silver-grey metal used for making pans, etc.
example: aluminium saucepans/window frames

defTh: เสมอ, ตลอดเวลา
defEn: at all times; on every occasion
example: There's almost always somebody at home in the evenings.

defTh: มือสมัครเล่น
defEn: doing something for pleasure or interest, not as a job
example: an amateur photographer

defTh: ประหลาดใจ, ทึ่ง
defEn: very surprised
example: an amazed look

defTh: น่าทึ่ง, มหัศจรรย์
defEn: very surprising, especially in a way that you like or admire
example: an amazing feat/story/experience

defTh: เอกอัครราชทูต
defEn: an official who lives in a foreign country as the senior representative there of their own country
example: the British Ambassador to Italy/in Rome

defTh: ความทะเยอทะยาน, ความมุ่งมั่น
defEn: something that you want to do or achieve very much
example: She had fulfilled her lifelong ambition.

defTh: ที่ทะเยอทะยาน
defEn: determined to be successful, rich, powerful, etc.
example: a fiercely ambitious young manager

defTh: รถพยาบาล
defEn: a vehicle with special equipment, used for taking sick or injured people to a hospital
example: Call an ambulance!

defTh: แก้ไข (กฎหมาย, ข้อผิดพลาดอย่างเป็นทางการ), ปรับปรุง
defEn: to change a law, document, statement, etc. slightly in order to correct a mistake or to improve it
example: He asked to see the amended version.

defTh: การแก้ไขเพิ่มเติม (กฎหมาย/เอกสาร)
defEn: a small change or improvement that is made to a document or proposed new law; the process of changing a document or proposed new law
example: to introduce/propose/table an amendment (= to suggest it)

defTh: ในหมู่
defEn: in the middle of or during something, especially something that causes excitement or fear
example: He finished his speech amid tremendous applause.

defTh: ในหมู่, ท่ามกลาง
defEn: surrounded by somebody/something; in the middle of somebody/something
example: a house among the trees

defTh: จำนวน, ปริมาณ
defEn: a quantity of something
example: I was amazed at the amount he could eat.

defTh: น่าขบขัน, สนุก
defEn: funny and giving pleasure
example: an amusing story/game/incident

defTh: การเปรียบเทียบเชิงอุปมาอุปไมย
defEn: a comparison of one thing with another thing that has similar features; a feature that is similar
example: analogy (between A and B), The teacher drew an analogy between the human heart and a pump.

defTh: วิเคราะห์, พิจารณา
defEn: to examine the nature or structure of something, especially by separating it into its parts, in order to understand or explain it
example: analyse something, The job involves collecting and analysing data.

defTh: การวิเคราะห์
defEn: the detailed study or examination of something in order to understand more about it; the result of the study
example: statistical/data analysis

defTh: นักวิเคราะห์
defEn: a person whose job involves examining facts or materials in order to give an opinion on them
example: a political/financial analyst

defTh: บรรพบุรุษ, โคตรเหง้า
defEn: a person in your family who lived a long time ago
example: His ancestors had come to America from Ireland.

defTh: สมอ
defEn: a heavy metal object that is attached to a rope or chain and dropped over the side of a ship or boat to keep it in one place
example: to drop anchor

defTh: โบราณ, เก่าแก่
defEn: belonging to a period of history that is thousands of years in the past
example: Archaeologists are excavating the ruined temples of this ancient civilization.

defTh: และ, กับ
defEn: also; in addition to
example: bread and butter

defTh: นางฟ้า
defEn: a spirit who is believed to be a servant of God, and is sent by God to deliver a message or perform a task. Angels are often shown dressed in white, with wings.
example: a host of angels

defTh: ความโกรธ, โกรธ
defEn: the strong feeling that you have when something has happened that you think is bad and unfair
example: She had to find a way to express her pent-up anger.

defTh: มุม, เหลี่ยม
defEn: the space between two lines or surfaces that join, measured in degrees
example: a 45° angle

defTh: โกรธ, โมโห
defEn: having strong feelings about something that you dislike very much or about an unfair situation
example: Her behaviour really made me angry.

defTh: สัตว์, เดรัจฉาน
defEn: a creature that is not a bird, a fish, a reptile, an insect or a human
example: the animals and birds of South America

defTh: แอนิเมชั่น
defEn: the process of making films, videos and computer games in which drawings, models or images of people and animals seem to move
example: computer/cartoon animation

defTh: ข้อเท้า
defEn: the joint connecting the foot to the leg; the narrow part of the leg just above the ankle joint
example: to sprain/break/twist your ankle

defTh: วันครบรอบ
defEn: a date that is an exact number of years after the date of an important or special event
example: on the anniversary of his wife’s death

defTh: ประกาศ, แจ้ง
defEn: to tell people something officially, especially about a decision, plans, etc.
example: announce something, He officially announced his intention to resign at today's press conference.

defTh: การประกาศ, แถลงการณ์
defEn: a spoken or written statement that informs people about something
example: to make an announcement

defTh: รบกวน, ทำให้รำคาญใจ
defEn: to make somebody slightly angry
example: annoy somebody, His constant joking was beginning to annoy her.

defTh: รำคาญ, หงุดหงิด
defEn: slightly angry
example: annoyed with somebody at/about something, He was beginning to get very annoyed with me about my carelessness.

defTh: น่ารำคาญ
defEn: making somebody feel slightly angry
example: This interruption is very annoying.

defTh: ประจำปี, รายปี
defEn: happening or done once every year
example: an annual meeting/event/report/conference

defTh: ทุกปี, รายปี
defEn: once a year
example: The exhibition is held annually.

defTh: ไม่ระบุชื่อ
defEn: with a name that is not known or that is not made public
example: an anonymous donor

defTh: อีกหนึ่ง, อื่นๆ
defEn: one more; an extra thing or person
example: Would you like another drink?

defTh: คำตอบ, ตอบ
defEn: something that you say, write or do to react to a question or situation
example: I rang the bell, but there was no answer.

defTh: คาดการณ์, ทำนาย
defEn: to expect something
example: anticipate something, We don't anticipate any major problems.

defTh: ความกังวล, ความวิตก
defEn: the state of feeling nervous or worried that something bad is going to happen
example: acute/intense/deep anxiety

defTh: ที่วิตกกังวล, ห่วงใย
defEn: feeling worried or nervous
example: The bus was late and Sue began to get anxious.

defTh: ใดๆ, บ้าง
defEn: used to emphasize an adjective or adverb in negative sentences or questions, meaning ‘at all’
example: He wasn't any good at French.

defTh: อีกต่อไป
defEn: often used at the end of negative sentences and at the end of questions, to mean ‘any longer’
example: She doesn't live here any more.

defTh: ใครก็ตาม, ใครคนใดคนหนึ่ง
defEn: used instead of somebody in negative sentences and in questions after if/whether, and after verbs such as prevent, forbid, avoid, etc.
example: Is there anybody who can help me?

defTh: ใครคนใดคนหนึ่ง (มักใช้ในบริบทที่เป็นทางการ)
defEn: used instead of someone in negative sentences and in questions after if/whether, and after verbs such as prevent, forbid, avoid, etc.
example: Is anyone there?

defTh: อะไรก็ได้
defEn: used instead of something in negative sentences and in questions; after if/whether; and after verbs such as prevent, ban, avoid, etc.
example: Would you like anything else?

defTh: ถึงอย่างไรก็ตาม
defEn: used when adding something to support an idea or argument
example: It's too expensive and anyway the colour doesn't suit you.

defTh: ที่ไหนก็ได้
defEn: used in negative sentences and in questions instead of somewhere
example: I can't see it anywhere.

defTh: แยก, ห่าง
defEn: separated by a distance, of space or time
example: The two houses stood 500 metres apart.

defTh: อพาร์ตเมนต์, ห้องชุด
defEn: a set of rooms for living in, usually on one floor of a building
example: an apartment building

defTh: ขอโทษ, ขออภัย
defEn: to say that you are sorry for doing something wrong or causing a problem
example: Why should I apologize?

defTh: ขอโทษ
defEn: a word or statement saying sorry for something that has been done wrong or that causes a problem
example: to offer/make/demand/accept an apology

defTh: แอป
defEn: a piece of software that you can download to a device such as a smartphone or tablet, for example to look up information or to play a game
example: You first need to install the app on your device.

defTh: อุปกรณ์เครื่องมือ (รวมชุด)
defEn: the tools or other pieces of equipment that are needed for a particular activity or task
example: a piece of laboratory apparatus

defTh: ชัดเจน, ประจักษ์
defEn: easy to see or understand
example: Their devotion was apparent.

defTh: อย่างที่เห็นได้โดยผิวเผิน
defEn: according to what you have heard or read; according to the way something appears
example: Apparently they are getting divorced soon.

defTh: ดึงดูด, อุทธรณ์
defEn: a deeply felt request for money, help or information that is needed immediately, especially one made by a charity or by the police
example: appeal for something, to launch a TV appeal for donations to the charity

defTh: ดึงดูด, เป็นที่ชื่นชอบ
defEn: attractive or interesting
example: Spending the holidays in Britain wasn't a prospect that I found particularly appealing.

defTh: ปรากฏ, ดูเหมือน
defEn: to start to be seen
example: Three days later a rash appeared.

defTh: รูปลักษณ์, การปรากฏ
defEn: the way that somebody/something looks on the outside; what somebody/something seems to be
example: the physical/outward/external appearance of something

defTh: ความอยากอาหาร
defEn: physical desire for food
example: He suffered from headaches and loss of appetite.

defTh: ปรบมือ
defEn: to show your approval of somebody/something by clapping your hands (= hitting your open hands together several times)
example: He started to applaud and the others joined in.

defTh: แอปเปิล, ผลไม้
defEn: a round fruit with shiny red or green skin that is fairly hard and white inside
example: Peel and core the apples.

defTh: ใช้ได้
defEn: that can be said to be true in the case of somebody/something
example: Give details of children where applicable (= if you have any).

defTh: ผู้สมัคร (งาน, ตำแหน่ง)
defEn: a person who makes a formal request for something (= applies for it), especially for a job, a place at a college or university, etc.
example: There were over 500 applicants for the job.

defTh: ใบสมัคร, การประยุกต์
defEn: a formal (often written) request for something, such as a job, permission to do something or a place at a college or university
example: a planning/patent/visa application

defTh: สมัคร, ใช้
defEn: to make a formal request, usually in writing, for something such as a job, a loan, permission for something, a place at a university, etc.
example: You should apply in person/by letter.

defTh: แต่งตั้ง, มอบหมาย
defEn: to choose somebody for a job or position of responsibility
example: appoint somebody, They have appointed a new head teacher at my son's school.

defTh: การนัดหมาย
defEn: a formal arrangement to meet or visit somebody at a particular time, especially for a reason connected with their work
example: I've got a dental appointment at 3 o'clock.

defTh: ซาบซึ้ง, เห็นคุณค่า
defEn: to recognize the good qualities of somebody/something
example: Over the years he came to appreciate the beauty and tranquillity of the river.

defTh: ความชื่นชม
defEn: pleasure that you have when you recognize and enjoy the good qualities of somebody/something
example: She shows little appreciation of good music.

defTh: เข้าใกล้, วิธี
defEn: a way of dealing with somebody/something; a way of doing or thinking about something such as a problem or a task
example: She took the wrong approach in her dealings with them.

defTh: เหมาะสม, สมควร
defEn: suitable, acceptable or correct for the particular circumstances
example: an appropriate response/measure/method

defTh: อย่างเหมาะควร
defEn: in a way that is suitable, acceptable or correct for the particular circumstances
example: The government has been accused of not responding appropriately to the needs of the homeless.

defTh: การอนุมัติ, ความเห็นชอบ
defEn: the feeling that somebody/something is good or acceptable; a positive opinion of somebody/something
example: She desperately wanted to win her father's approval.

defTh: อนุมัติ, เห็นชอบ
defEn: to think that somebody/something is good, acceptable or suitable
example: I told my mother I wanted to leave school but she didn't approve.

defTh: โดยประมาณ, โดยคร่าว
defEn: used to show that something is almost, but not completely, accurate or correct
example: The journey took approximately seven hours.

defTh: เมษายน
defEn: the fourth month of the year, between March and May
example: in April, She was born in April.

defTh: โดยพลการ
defEn: not seeming to be based on a reason, system or plan and sometimes seeming unfair
example: The choice of players for the team seemed completely arbitrary.

defTh: สถาปนิก
defEn: a person whose job is designing buildings
example: The house was designed by architect Louis Kahn.

defTh: ทางสถาปัตยกรรม
defEn: relating to architecture and buildings
example: architectural features

defTh: วิชาสถาปัตยกรรม
defEn: the art and study of designing buildings
example: to study architecture

defTh: คลังเก็บเอกสารสำคัญ
defEn: a collection of historical documents or records of a government, a family, a place or an organization; the place where these records are stored
example: the National Sound Archive

defTh: พื้นที่, บริเวณ
defEn: part of a place, town, etc., or a region of a country or the world
example: to improve access to services in rural areas

defTh: เวทีแข่งขัน
defEn: a place with a flat open area in the middle and seats around it where people can watch sports and entertainment
example: a concert at Wembley Arena

defTh: อย่างที่โต้แย้งได้ว่า
defEn: used (often before a comparative or superlative adjective) when you are stating an opinion that you believe you could give reasons to support
example: He is arguably the best actor of his generation.

defTh: โต้เถียง, ถกเถียง
defEn: to speak angrily to somebody because you disagree with them
example: My brothers are always arguing.

defTh: การโต้เถียง, เหตุผล
defEn: a conversation or discussion in which two or more people disagree, often angrily
example: to win/lose an argument

defTh: เกิดขึ้น, ลุกขึ้น
defEn: to happen; to start to exist
example: An opportunity arose to work in the United States.

defTh: แขน, อาวุธ
defEn: either of the two long parts that stick out from the top of the body and connect the shoulders to the hands
example: He escaped with only a broken arm.

defTh: ติดอาวุธ
defEn: involving the use of weapons
example: an armed robbery

defTh: อาวุธ, แขน
defEn: weapons, especially as used by the army, navy, etc.
example: arms and ammunition

defTh: กองทัพ
defEn: a large organized group of soldiers who are trained to fight on land
example: The two opposing armies faced each other across the battlefield.

defTh: รอบๆ, ประมาณ
defEn: approximately
example: He arrived around five o'clock.

defTh: จัด, จัดเรียง
defEn: to plan or organize something in advance
example: arrange something, The party was arranged quickly.

defTh: การจัด, การเตรียม
defEn: a plan or preparation that you make so that something can happen
example: Travel and accommodation arrangements have been finalized.

defTh: อาร์เรย์
defEn: a group or collection of things or people, often one that is large or impressive
example: a vast array of bottles of different shapes and sizes

defTh: จับกุม, การจับกุม
defEn: the act of arresting somebody
example: The police made several arrests.

defTh: การมาถึง
defEn: an act of coming or being brought to a place
example: We apologize for the late arrival of the train.

defTh: มาถึง, ถึง
defEn: to get to a place, especially at the end of a journey
example: I'll wait until they arrive.

defTh: ลูกศร, ธนู
defEn: a thin stick with a sharp point at one end, which is shot from a bow
example: a bow and arrow

defTh: ศิลปะ, งานศิลป์
defEn: the use of the imagination to express ideas or feelings, particularly in painting, drawing or sculpture
example: modern/contemporary art

defTh: บทความ, สิ่งของ
defEn: a piece of writing about a particular subject in a newspaper or magazine, on a website, etc.
example: to read/write/publish an article

defTh: พูดชัดแจ้ง
defEn: to express or explain your thoughts or feelings clearly in words
example: She struggled to articulate her thoughts.

defTh: ประดิษฐ์, ปลอม
defEn: made or produced to copy something natural; not real
example: an artificial limb/flower/sweetener/fertilizer

defTh: ศิลปิน, จิตรกร
defEn: a person who creates works of art, especially paintings or drawings
example: an exhibition of work by contemporary British artists

defTh: มีศิลปะ, เชิงศิลปะ
defEn: connected with art or artists
example: the artistic works of the period

defTh: งานศิลปะ
defEn: pictures and photographs prepared for books, magazines, etc.
example: Can you let me have the finished artwork for the poster by Friday?

defTh: เช่น, เหมือน, ขณะที่
defEn: used when you are comparing two people or things, or two situations
example: You're as tall as your father.

defTh: เถ้า
defEn: the grey or black powder that is left after something, especially tobacco, wood or coal, has burnt
example: cigarette ash

defTh: ละอายใจ
defEn: feeling shame or feeling embarrassed about somebody/something or because of something you have done
example: ashamed of something, She was deeply ashamed of her behaviour at the party.

defTh: ข้างๆ, นอกเรื่อง
defEn: to one side; out of the way
example: She pulled the curtain aside.

defTh: ถาม, ขอ, เชิญ
defEn: to say or write something in the form of a question, in order to get information
example: How old are you—if you don’t mind me/my asking?

defTh: หลับ, นอนหลับ
defEn: sleeping
example: I waited until they were all fast asleep (= sleeping deeply).

defTh: มุมมอง, ด้าน
defEn: a particular part or feature of a situation, an idea, a problem, etc.; a way in which it may be considered
example: aspect of something, The book aims to cover all aspects of city life.

defTh: ความปรารถนาสูง, แรงบันดาลใจ
defEn: a strong desire to have or do something
example: I didn't realize you had political aspirations.

defTh: มุ่งมั่นปรารถนา
defEn: to have a strong desire to achieve or to become something
example: aspire (to something), She aspired to a scientific career.

defTh: การลอบสังหาร
defEn: the murder of an important or famous person, especially for political reasons
example: The president survived a number of assassination attempts.

defTh: การโจมตี
defEn: the crime of attacking somebody physically
example: Both men were charged with assault.

defTh: ประกอบ
defEn: to come together as a group; to bring people or things together as a group
example: All the students were asked to assemble in the main hall.

defTh: การประกอบ
defEn: a group of people who have been elected to meet together regularly and make decisions or laws for a particular region or country
example: state/legislative/federal/local assemblies

defTh: ยืนยัน
defEn: to state clearly and definitely that something is true
example: assert that…, She continued to assert that she was innocent.

defTh: การกล่าวอ้าง, การยืนยันสิทธิ์
defEn: a statement saying that you strongly believe something to be true
example: He was correct in his assertion that the minister had been lying.

defTh: ประเมินค่า, ตีราคา, ประเมินภาษี
defEn: to make a judgement about the nature or quality of somebody/something
example: assess somebody/something, Accurately assessing environmental impacts is very complex.

defTh: การประเมินผล, การตีราคา
defEn: an opinion or a judgement about somebody/something that has been thought about very carefully
example: a detailed assessment of the risks involved

defTh: สินทรัพย์
defEn: a person or thing that is valuable or useful to somebody/something
example: In his job, patience is an invaluable asset.

defTh: มอบหมาย, จัดสรร (งาน/ตำแหน่ง)
defEn: to give somebody something that they can use, or some work or responsibility
example: assign something (to somebody), The teacher assigned a different task to each of the children.

defTh: งานที่มอบหมาย
defEn: a task or piece of work that somebody is given to do, usually as part of their job or studies
example: Students are required to complete all homework assignments.

defTh: ช่วยเหลือ, ช่วย
defEn: to help somebody to do something
example: Anyone willing to assist can contact this number.

defTh: ความช่วยเหลือ
defEn: help or support
example: technical/economic/military assistance

defTh: ผู้ช่วย, ผู้ช่วย
defEn: having a rank below that of a senior person and helping them in their work
example: the assistant manager/director/commissioner

defTh: เกี่ยวข้อง, สหาย
defEn: to make a connection between people or things in your mind
example: associate somebody/something with somebody/something, I always associate the smell of baking with my childhood.

defTh: ที่เกี่ยวข้อง (เชื่อมโยงกัน)
defEn: if one thing is associated with another, the two things are connected because they happen together or one thing causes the other
example: associated with doing something, the risks associated with taking drugs

defTh: สมาคม, การรวมกลุ่ม
defEn: an official group of people who have joined together for a particular purpose
example: Do you belong to any professional or trade associations?

defTh: สันนิษฐาน (โดยไม่มีหลักฐาน)
defEn: to think or accept that something is true but without having proof of it
example: assume (that)…, It is reasonable to assume (that) the economy will continue to improve.

defTh: ข้อสันนิษฐาน
defEn: a belief or feeling that something is true or that something will happen, although there is no proof
example: an underlying/implicit assumption

defTh: การรับรอง
defEn: a statement that something will certainly be true or will certainly happen, particularly when there has been doubt about it
example: They called for assurances that the government is committed to its education policy.

defTh: ให้ความมั่นใจ
defEn: to tell somebody that something is definitely true or is definitely going to happen, especially when they have doubts about it
example: assure somebody (that)…, You think I did it deliberately, but I assure you (that) I did not.

defTh: น่าอัศจรรย์ใจ
defEn: very surprising; difficult to believe
example: She ran 100m in an astonishing 10.6 seconds.

defTh: ลี้ภัย
defEn: protection that a government gives to people who have left their own country, usually because they were in danger for political reasons
example: to seek/apply for/be granted asylum

defTh: ที่, ณ, ใน
defEn: used to say where something/somebody is or where something happens
example: at the corner of the street

defTh: นักกีฬา
defEn: a person who competes in sports
example: Olympic athletes

defTh: บรรยากาศ, สภาพแวดล้อม
defEn: the mixture of gases that surrounds the earth
example: Wind power doesn't release carbon dioxide into the atmosphere.

defTh: ความโหดร้าย
defEn: a cruel and violent act, especially in a war
example: In the war, both sides committed atrocities.

defTh: ติด, แนบ
defEn: to fasten or join one thing to another
example: attach something, I attach a copy of my notes for your information.

defTh: สิ่งที่แนบมา
defEn: a document that you send to somebody using email
example: No attachment was included.

defTh: โจมตี, การโจมตี
defEn: an act of using violence to try to hurt or kill somebody
example: Five people were killed in the attacks that took place last night.

defTh: บรรลุ
defEn: to succeed in getting something, usually after a lot of effort
example: Most of our students attained five ‘A’ grades in their exams.

defTh: พยายาม, ความพยายาม
defEn: an act of trying to do something, especially something difficult, often with no success
example: I passed my driving test at the first attempt.

defTh: เข้าร่วม, ดูแล
defEn: to be present at an event
example: We'd like as many people as possible to attend.

defTh: การเข้าร่วม
defEn: the act of being present at a place, for example at school
example: Attendance at these lectures is not compulsory.

defTh: ความสนใจ, ใส่ใจ
defEn: used for asking people to listen to something that is being announced
example: Attention, please! Passengers for flight KL412 are requested to go to gate 21 immediately.

defTh: ทัศนคติ, เจตคติ
defEn: the way that you think and feel about somebody/something; the way that you behave towards somebody/something that shows how you think and feel
example: attitude towards somebody/something, These societies have to change their attitudes towards women.

defTh: ทนายความผู้รับมอบอำนาจ
defEn: a lawyer, especially one who can act for somebody in court
example: The prosecuting attorney began with a short opening statement.

defTh: ดึงดูด
defEn: if you are attracted by something, it interests you and makes you want it; if you are attracted by somebody, you like or admire them
example: be attracted by somebody/something, I had always been attracted by the idea of working abroad.

defTh: แรงดึงดูด
defEn: an interesting or lively place to go or thing to do
example: Buckingham Palace is a major tourist attraction.

defTh: ดึงดูดใจ, น่าสนใจ
defEn: pleasant to look at, especially in a sexual way
example: an attractive woman

defTh: คุณลักษณะ
defEn: a quality or feature of somebody/something
example: Patience is one of the most important attributes in a teacher.

defTh: ประมูล
defEn: a public sale in which things are sold to the person who offers the most money for them
example: an auction of paintings

defTh: ผู้ชม, ผู้ฟัง
defEn: the group of people who have gathered to watch or listen to something (a play, concert, somebody speaking, etc.)
example: The audience was/were clapping for 10 minutes.

defTh: เสียง
defEn: connected with sound that is recorded
example: audio and video recordings/files/clips

defTh: การตรวจสอบบัญชี, การสอบทาน
defEn: an official examination of business and financial records to see that they are true and correct
example: an annual audit

defTh: สิงหาคม
defEn: the 8th month of the year, between July and September
example: She was born in August.

defTh: ป้า, น้า
defEn: the sister of your father or mother; the wife of your uncle or aunt
example: Aunt Alice

defTh: แท้
defEn: known to be real and what somebody claims it is and not a copy
example: I don't know if the painting is authentic.

defTh: ผู้เขียน, นักประพันธ์
defEn: a person who writes books or the person who wrote a particular book
example: Who is your favourite author?

defTh: อำนาจ, สิทธิ
defEn: the power to give orders to people
example: in a position of authority

defTh: อนุญาต
defEn: to give official permission for something, or for somebody to do something
example: authorize something, I can authorize payments up to £5000.

defTh: อัตโนมัติ
defEn: a car
example: the auto industry

defTh: อัตโนมัติ, โดยอัตโนมัติ
defEn: having controls that work without needing a person to operate them
example: automatic doors

defTh: โดยอัตโนมัติ
defEn: without needing a person to operate controls
example: The heating switches off automatically.

defTh: เอกราช
defEn: the freedom for a country, a region or an organization to govern itself independently
example: a campaign in Wales for greater autonomy

defTh: ฤดูใบไม้ร่วง
defEn: the season of the year between summer and winter, when leaves change colour and the weather becomes colder
example: in the autumn of something, in the autumn of 2010

defTh: ความพร้อมใช้งาน
defEn: the fact that something is possible to get, buy or find
example: the availability of cheap flights

defTh: มีอยู่, ว่าง
defEn: that you can get, buy or find
example: available resources/data

defTh: โดยเฉลี่ย
defEn: calculated by adding several amounts together, finding a total, and dividing the total by the number of amounts
example: The average age of participants was 52 years.

defTh: หลีกเลี่ยง, เลี่ยง
defEn: to prevent something bad from happening
example: avoid something, to avoid conflict/confrontation

defTh: รอ
defEn: to wait for somebody/something
example: He is in custody awaiting trial.

defTh: รางวัล, มอบรางวัล
defEn: a prize such as money, etc. for something that somebody has done
example: He was nominated for the best actor award.

defTh: ตระหนัก, รู้
defEn: knowing or realizing something
example: As you're aware, this is not a new problem.

defTh: ความตระหนักรู้, การรับทราบ
defEn: knowing something; knowing that something exists and is important
example: awareness of something, an awareness of the importance of eating a healthy diet

defTh: ไป, ไกล, พ้น
defEn: to or at a distance from somebody/something in space or time
example: The beach is a mile away.

defTh: น่ากลัว, แย่มาก, ร้ายกาจ
defEn: very bad or unpleasant
example: That's an awful colour.

defTh: เคอะเขิน, งุ่มง่าม
defEn: making you feel embarrassed
example: There was an awkward silence.

defTh: ทารก, เด็ก
defEn: a very young child or animal
example: The baby's crying!

defTh: หลัง, กลับ, สนับสนุน
defEn: located behind or at the back of something
example: We were sitting in the back row

defTh: ฉากหลัง
defEn: everything that can be seen around an event or scene
example: The mountains provided a dramatic backdrop for our picnic.

defTh: พื้นหลัง, ภูมิหลัง
defEn: the details of a person’s family, education, experience, etc.
example: somebody's ethnic/genetic/cultural background

defTh: การหนุนหลัง, แรงสนับสนุน
defEn: help and support from somebody to do something; financial support for something
example: The police gave the proposals their full backing.

defTh: การสำรองข้อมูล
defEn: extra help or support that you can get if necessary
example: The police had backup from the army.

defTh: ถอยหลัง, ย้อนกลับ
defEn: towards a place or position that is behind
example: I lost my balance and fell backwards.

defTh: แบคทีเรีย, เชื้อโรค
defEn: the simplest and smallest forms of life. Bacteria exist in large numbers in air, water and soil, and also in living and dead creatures and plants, and are often a cause of disease.
example: Neither chilling nor freezing kills all bacteria.

defTh: แย่, ไม่ดี
defEn: unpleasant; full of problems
example: I have some bad news for you, I'm afraid.

defTh: ป้ายสถานะ
defEn: a small piece of metal or plastic, with a design or words on it, that a person wears or carries to show that they belong to an organization, support something, have achieved something, have a particular rank, etc.
example: She wore a badge saying ‘Vote for Coates’.

defTh: อย่างแย่, อย่างเลว
defEn: without skill or care
example: to play/sing badly

defTh: กระเป๋า, ถุง
defEn: a container made of cloth, leather, plastic or paper, used to carry things in, especially when shopping or travelling
example: He was carrying a heavy bag of groceries.

defTh: ประกันตัว
defEn: money that somebody agrees to pay if a person accused of a crime does not appear at their trial. When bail has been arranged, the accused person is allowed to go free until the trial.
example: Can anyone put up bail for you?

defTh: อบ, ปิ้ง
defEn: to cook food in an oven without extra fat or liquid; to be cooked in this way
example: bake (something), to bake bread/biscuits/cookies

defTh: สมดุล, ทรงตัว
defEn: a situation in which different things exist in equal, correct or good amounts
example: This newspaper maintains a good balance in its presentation of different opinions.

defTh: สมดุล
defEn: keeping or showing a balance so that different things or different parts of something exist in equal or correct amounts
example: The programme presented a balanced view of the two sides of the conflict.

defTh: ลูกบอล, งานเต้นรำ
defEn: a round object used for throwing, hitting or kicking in games and sports
example: a golf/tennis/bowling/soccer ball

defTh: บัลเล่ต์
defEn: a style of dancing that tells a dramatic story with music but no talking or singing
example: She wants to be a ballet dancer.

defTh: บอลลูน
defEn: a small bag made of very thin rubber that becomes larger and rounder when you fill it with air or gas. Balloons are brightly coloured and used as decorations or toys.
example: to blow up/burst/pop a balloon

defTh: บัตรลงคะแนน
defEn: the system of voting in writing and usually in secret; an occasion on which a vote is held
example: The chairperson is chosen by secret ballot.

defTh: ห้าม, สั่งห้าม
defEn: an official rule that says that something is not allowed
example: a smoking ban

defTh: กล้วย
defEn: a long curved fruit with a thick yellow skin and that is soft inside, which grows on trees in hot countries
example: a bunch of bananas

defTh: วงดนตรี, แถบ
defEn: a small group of musicians who play popular music together, often with a singer or singers
example: a rock/punk/jazz band

defTh: ธนาคาร, ฝั่ง
defEn: an organization that provides various financial services, for example keeping or lending money
example: I don't have much money in the bank at the end of the month.

defTh: แบนเนอร์
defEn: a long piece of cloth with a message on it that is carried between two poles or hung in a public place to show support for something
example: A huge banner over the street said ‘Welcome home’.

defTh: บาร์, กีดขวาง
defEn: a place where you can buy and drink alcoholic and other drinks
example: We arranged to meet in a bar called the Flamingo.

defTh: เปลือย
defEn: not covered by any clothes
example: She likes to walk around in bare feet.

defTh: แทบจะไม่พอ, เกือบจะไม่
defEn: in a way that is just possible but only with difficulty
example: He could barely read and write.

defTh: ต่อรอง, ราคาถูก
defEn: a thing bought for less than the usual price
example: I picked up a few good bargains in the sale.

defTh: บาร์เรล
defEn: a large round container, usually made of wood or metal, with flat ends and, usually, curved sides
example: a beer/wine barrel

defTh: อุปสรรค, สิ่งกีดขวาง
defEn: an object like a fence that prevents people from moving forward from one place to another
example: The crowd had to stand behind barriers.

defTh: ฐาน, รากฐาน
defEn: the lowest part of something, especially the part or surface on which it rests or stands
example: The lamp has a heavy base.

defTh: เบสบอล
defEn: a game played especially in the US by two teams of nine players, using a bat and ball. Each player tries to hit the ball and then run around four bases before the other team can return the ball.
example: a baseball bat/team/cap/fan/player/game

defTh: ตามจริง, จริงใจ
defEn: if one thing is based on another, it uses it or is developed from it
example: The movie is based on a real-life incident.

defTh: ชั้นใต้ดิน
defEn: a room or rooms in a building, partly or completely below the level of the ground
example: Kitchen goods are sold in the basement.

defTh: พื้นฐาน, เบื้องต้น
defEn: forming the part of something that is most necessary and from which other things develop
example: basic information/facts/ideas

defTh: โดยพื้นฐาน, เป็นหลัก
defEn: in the most important ways, without considering things that are less important
example: I think we are basically saying the same thing.

defTh: พื้นฐาน, หลัก
defEn: the way things are organized or arranged; how often something happens
example: We are in contact on a regular basis.

defTh: ตะกร้า
defEn: a container for holding or carrying things. Baskets are made of long thin pieces of material that bends and twists easily, for example plastic, wire or wicker.
example: a shopping basket

defTh: บาสเกตบอล
defEn: a game played by two teams of five players, using a large ball which players try to throw into a high net hanging from a ring
example: a basketball game/coach/team/player

defTh: เบส
defEn: the lowest tone or part in music, for instruments or voices
example: He always plays his stereo with the bass turned right up.

defTh: ค้างคาว
defEn: a piece of wood with a handle, made in various shapes and sizes, and used for hitting the ball in games such as baseball, cricket and table tennis
example: a baseball/cricket bat

defTh: อาบน้ำ, อ่างอาบน้ำ
defEn: a large, long container that you put water in and then get into to wash your whole body
example: I'm in the bath!

defTh: ห้องน้ำ
defEn: a room in which there is a bath, a washbasin and often a toilet
example: Go and wash your hands in the bathroom.

defTh: แบตเตอรี่, กองปืน
defEn: a device that is placed inside a car engine, clock, radio, etc. and that produces the electricity that makes it work
example: to replace the batteries

defTh: การต่อสู้, สงคราม
defEn: a fight between armies, ships or planes, especially during a war; a violent fight between groups of people
example: Napoleon was defeated at the Battle of Waterloo.

defTh: สนามรบ
defEn: a place where a battle is being fought or has been fought
example: heavy casualties on the battlefield

defTh: อ่าว, ช่อง
defEn: a part of the sea, or of a large lake, partly surrounded by a wide curve of the land
example: the Bay of Bengal

defTh: เป็น, คือ, อยู่
defEn: used when you are naming people or things, describing them or giving more information about them
example: + noun, Today is Monday.

defTh: ชายหาด, หาดทราย
defEn: an area of sand or small stones (called shingle), next to the sea or a lake
example: on the beach, tourists sunbathing on the beach

defTh: คาน
defEn: a line of light, electromagnetic waves or particles
example: narrow beams of light/sunlight

defTh: ถั่ว
defEn: a seed, or pod containing seeds, of a climbing plant, eaten as a vegetable. There are several types of bean and the plants that they grow on are also called beans.
example: green beans

defTh: หมี, ทน
defEn: a heavy wild animal with thick fur and sharp claws (= pointed parts on the ends of its feet). There are many types of bear.
example: a black bear

defTh: สัตว์ร้าย
defEn: an animal, especially one that is large or dangerous, or one that is unusual
example: wild/savage/ferocious beasts

defTh: ตี, ชนะ, จังหวะ
defEn: a single hit to something, such as a drum, or a movement of something, such as your heart; the sound that this makes
example: several loud beats on the drum

defTh: สวย, งาม
defEn: having beauty; giving pleasure to the senses or to the mind
example: a beautiful woman/girl

defTh: ความงาม, ความสวย
defEn: the quality of giving pleasure to the senses or to the mind
example: beauty of something, the beauty of the sunset/of poetry/of his singing

defTh: เพราะว่า, เนื่องจาก
defEn: for the reason that
example: I did it because he told me to.

defTh: กลายเป็น, เป็น
defEn: to start to be something
example: + adj., It soon became apparent that no one was going to come.

defTh: เตียง
defEn: a piece of furniture for sleeping on
example: a single/double bed

defTh: ห้องนอน
defEn: a room for sleeping in
example: the spare/guest bedroom

defTh: ผึ้ง
defEn: a black and yellow flying insect that can sting (= touch your skin and make you feel a sharp pain).Bees live in large groups and make honey (= a sweet sticky substance that is good to eat).
example: Bees were buzzing in the clover.

defTh: เนื้อวัว
defEn: meat that comes from a cow
example: roast beef

defTh: เบียร์, เหล้าเบียร์
defEn: an alcoholic drink made from malt with hops added to give it taste. There are many types of beer.
example: a pint/can/bottle of beer

defTh: ก่อน, ข้างหน้า
defEn: at an earlier time; in the past; already
example: You should have told me so before.

defTh: ขอ
defEn: to ask somebody for something especially in an anxious way because you want or need it very much
example: Now you have to beg and plead.

defTh: เริ่มต้น, เริ่มทำ
defEn: to start doing something; to do the first part of something
example: Shall I begin?

defTh: การเริ่มต้น, เริ่มต้น
defEn: the time when something starts; the first part of an event, a story, etc.
example: A story has to have a beginning, middle, and end.

defTh: ในนามของ
defEn: in order to help somebody
example: He began a petition in behalf of the farmers.

defTh: ประพฤติ, ปฏิบัติ
defEn: to do things in a particular way
example: The doctor behaved very unprofessionally.

defTh: พฤติกรรม, ความประพฤติ
defEn: the way that somebody behaves, especially towards other people
example: good/bad behaviour

defTh: ข้างหลัง, ล้าหลัง
defEn: at or towards the back of somebody/something; further back
example: She rode off down the road with the dog running behind.

defTh: สิ่งมีชีวิต
defEn: existence
example: The Irish Free State came into being in 1922.

defTh: ความเชื่อ, ศรัทธา
defEn: a strong feeling that something/somebody exists or is true; confidence that something/somebody is good or right
example: belief in something/somebody, I admire his passionate belief in what he is doing.

defTh: เชื่อ, ศรัทธา
defEn: to feel certain that something is true or that somebody is telling you the truth
example: believe somebody, I don't believe you!

defTh: ระฆัง, กริ่ง
defEn: a hollow metal object, often like a cup in shape, that makes a ringing sound when hit by a small piece of metal inside it; the sound that it makes
example: A peal of church bells rang out in the distance.

defTh: เป็นของ, สังกัด
defEn: to be in the right or suitable place
example: Where do these plates belong (= where are they kept)?

defTh: ที่รัก
defEn: loved very much
example: in memory of our dearly beloved son, John

defTh: ข้างล่าง, ใต้
defEn: at or to a lower level, position or place
example: They live on the floor below.

defTh: เข็มขัด, สาย
defEn: a long narrow piece of leather, cloth, etc. that you wear around the middle part of your body
example: to do up/fasten/tighten a belt

defTh: ม้านั่ง
defEn: a long seat for two or more people, usually made of wood
example: a park bench

defTh: เกณฑ์มาตรฐาน
defEn: something that can be measured and used as a standard that other things can be compared with
example: Tests at the age of seven provide a benchmark against which the child's progress at school can be measured.

defTh: การโค้งงอ, ทางโค้ง
defEn: a curve or turn, especially in a road or river
example: a sharp bend in the road

defTh: ข้างใต้, ภายใต้
defEn: in or to a lower position than somebody/something; under somebody/something
example: They found the body buried beneath a pile of leaves.

defTh: ที่เป็นประโยชน์, เป็นผลดี
defEn: improving a situation; having a helpful or useful effect
example: A good diet is beneficial to health.

defTh: ผู้รับผลประโยชน์
defEn: a person who gains as a result of something
example: Who will be the main beneficiary of the cuts in income tax?

defTh: ประโยชน์, ได้รับ
defEn: an advantage that something gives you; a helpful and useful effect that something has
example: Freedom of information brings great benefits.

defTh: งอ, โค้ง, คด
defEn: not straight
example: a piece of bent wire

defTh: ข้างๆ, ข้าง
defEn: next to or at the side of somebody/something
example: He sat beside her all night.

defTh: นอกจาก
defEn: used for making an extra comment that adds to what you have just said
example: I don't really want to go. Besides, it's too late now.

defTh: ดีที่สุด, เก่งสุด
defEn: of the most excellent type or quality
example: That's the best movie I've ever seen!

defTh: พนัน, เดิมพัน
defEn: an arrangement to risk money, etc. on the result of a particular event; the money that you risk in this way
example: to win/lose a bet

defTh: ทรยศ
defEn: to give information about somebody/something to an enemy
example: betray somebody/something, He was offered money to betray his colleagues.

defTh: ดีกว่า, ดีขึ้น
defEn: of a higher standard or less poor quality; not as bad as something else
example: We're hoping for better weather tomorrow.

defTh: ระหว่าง, ท่ามกลาง
defEn: in the space or period of time separating two or more points, objects, etc. or two dates, events, etc.
example: The house was near a park but there was a road in between.

defTh: เลย, เหนือกว่า
defEn: on the other side; further on
example: Snowdon and the mountains beyond were covered in snow.

defTh: อคติ (ความเอนเอียง)
defEn: a strong feeling in favour of or against one group of people, or one side in an argument, often not based on fair judgement
example: accusations of political bias in news programmes (= that reports are unfair and show favour to one political party)

defTh: รถจักรยานสองล้อ
defEn: a road vehicle with two wheels that you ride by pushing the pedals with your feet
example: He got on his bicycle and rode off.

defTh: เสนอราคา
defEn: an offer by a person or a company to pay a particular amount of money for something
example: bid for something, A German firm launched a takeover bid for the company.

defTh: ใหญ่, โต
defEn: large in size, degree, amount, etc.
example: a big man/house/increase

defTh: จักรยาน
defEn: a bicycle
example: I used to ride my bike around the neighbourhood for hours.

defTh: ใบแจ้งหนี้, ร่างกฎหมาย
defEn: a document that shows how much you owe somebody for goods or services
example: the phone/electricity/gas bill

defTh: พันล้าน
defEn: 1000000000; one thousand million
example: Worldwide sales reached 2.5 billion.

defTh: ถัง, กล่อง
defEn: a container that you put waste in
example: a rubbish bin

defTh: ผูก
defEn: to tie somebody/something with rope, string, etc. so that they/it cannot move or are held together strongly
example: bind somebody/something to something, She was bound to a chair.

defTh: ชีวประวัติ
defEn: the story of a person’s life written by somebody else; this type of writing
example: Boswell’s biography of Johnson

defTh: ทางชีวภาพ
defEn: connected with the science of biology
example: the biological sciences

defTh: ชีววิทยา
defEn: the scientific study of the life and structure of plants and animals
example: a degree in biology

defTh: นก, สัตว์ปีก
defEn: a creature that is covered with feathers and has two wings and two legs. Most birds can fly.
example: a bird’s nest with two eggs in it

defTh: การเกิด, กำเนิด
defEn: the time when a baby is born; the process of being born
example: at birth, The baby weighed three kilos at birth.

defTh: วันเกิด
defEn: the day in each year which is the same date as the one on which you were born
example: Happy Birthday!

defTh: ขนมปังกรอบ
defEn: a small flat dry cake for one person, usually sweet, and baked until hard
example: a packet/tin of chocolate biscuits

defTh: อธิการ
defEn: a senior priest in charge of the work of the Church in a city or district
example: the Bishop of Oxford

defTh: เล็กน้อย, บิต
defEn: rather; to some extent
example: These trousers are a bit tight.

defTh: กัด, การกัด
defEn: an act of biting
example: The dog gave me a playful bite.

defTh: ขม, ขื่น
defEn: having a strong, unpleasant taste; not sweet
example: Black coffee leaves a bitter taste in the mouth.

defTh: ประหลาดมาก, พิลึก
defEn: very strange or unusual
example: a bizarre situation/incident/story

defTh: สีดำ, มืด
defEn: having the very darkest colour, like coal or the sky at night
example: a shiny black car

defTh: ใบมีด, คม
defEn: the flat part of a knife, tool or machine, which has a sharp edge or edges for cutting
example: The machine comes with a plastic guard over the blade to protect the operator.

defTh: ตำหนิ, กล่าวโทษ
defEn: responsibility for doing something badly or wrongly; saying that somebody is responsible for something
example: Why do I always get the blame for everything that goes wrong?

defTh: ว่างเปล่า, ช่องว่าง
defEn: empty, with nothing written, printed or recorded on it
example: Sign your name in the blank space below.

defTh: ผ้าห่ม
defEn: a large cover, often made of wool, used especially on beds to keep people warm
example: It’s cold tonight—can I have another blanket?

defTh: การระเบิด, คลื่นระเบิด
defEn: an explosion or a powerful movement of air caused by an explosion
example: a bomb blast

defTh: มีเลือดออก
defEn: to lose blood, especially from a wound or an injury
example: My finger's bleeding.

defTh: ผสมผสาน
defEn: a mixture of different types of the same thing
example: a blend of tea

defTh: อวยพร
defEn: to ask God to protect somebody/something
example: They brought the children to Jesus and he blessed them.

defTh: พร
defEn: God’s help and protection, or a prayer asking for this
example: to pray for God’s blessing

defTh: ตาบอด, มืด
defEn: not able to see
example: Doctors think he will go blind.

defTh: กั้น, บล็อก
defEn: a large piece of a solid material that is square or rectangular in shape and usually has flat sides
example: The houses are made of concrete blocks with tin roofs.

defTh: บล็อก
defEn: a website where an individual person, or people representing an organization, write regularly about recent events or topics that interest them, usually with photos and links to other websites that they find interesting
example: This is a link to the museum's blog.

defTh: ผมสีทอง
defEn: pale gold in colour
example: She had long blonde hair.

defTh: เลือด, โลหิต
defEn: the red liquid that flows through the bodies of humans and animals
example: He lost a lot of blood in the accident.

defTh: เป่า, พัด
defEn: a hard hit with the hand, a weapon, etc.
example: She received a severe blow on the head.

defTh: สีน้ำเงิน, เศร้า
defEn: having the colour of a clear sky or the sea on a clear day
example: piercing blue eyes

defTh: กระดาน, คณะกรรมการ
defEn: a long thin piece of strong hard material, especially wood, used, for example, for making floors, building walls and roofs and making boats
example: He had ripped up the carpet, leaving only the bare boards.

defTh: โม้
defEn: to talk in a way that shows you are too proud of something that you have or can do
example: I don't want to boast, but I can actually speak six languages.

defTh: เรือ, เรือยนต์
defEn: a vehicle (smaller than a ship) that travels on water, moved by oars, sails or a motor
example: a rowing/sailing boat

defTh: ร่างกาย, ศพ
defEn: the whole physical structure of a human or an animal
example: The human body is a complex structure.

defTh: ต้ม, เดือด
defEn: when a liquid boils or when you boil it, it is heated to the point where it forms bubbles and turns to steam or vapour
example: The water was bubbling and boiling away.

defTh: ตัวหนา
defEn: brave and confident; not afraid to say what you feel or to take risks
example: It was a bold move on their part to open a business in France.

defTh: ระเบิด, ทิ้งระเบิด
defEn: a weapon designed to explode at a particular time or when it is dropped or thrown
example: a bomb goes off/explodes

defTh: การวางระเบิด
defEn: an occasion when a bomb is dropped or left somewhere; the act of doing this
example: recent bombings in major cities

defTh: พันธบัตร
defEn: something that forms a connection between people or groups, such as a feeling of friendship or shared ideas and experiences
example: the bond that links us

defTh: กระดูก
defEn: any of the hard parts that form the skeleton of the body of a human or an animal
example: He survived the accident with no broken bones.

defTh: โบนัส
defEn: an extra amount of money that is added to a payment, especially to somebody’s wages or salary as a reward
example: a £100 Christmas bonus

defTh: หนังสือ, จอง
defEn: a set of printed pages that are fastened inside a cover so that you can turn them and read them
example: His desk was covered with piles of books.

defTh: การจอง
defEn: an arrangement that you make in advance to buy a ticket to travel somewhere, go to the theatre, etc.
example: a booking form/hall/clerk

defTh: บูม
defEn: a sudden increase in trade and economic activity; a period of wealth and success
example: Living standards improved rapidly during the post-war boom.

defTh: เพิ่ม
defEn: something that helps or encourages somebody/something
example: a great/tremendous/welcome boost

defTh: รองเท้าบูท
defEn: a strong shoe that covers the foot and ankle and often the lower part of the leg
example: (British English), walking boots

defTh: ชายแดน, ขอบ
defEn: the line that divides two countries or areas; the land near this line
example: I live in a small town in the US, near the Canadian border.

defTh: เบื่อ, น่าเบื่อ
defEn: feeling tired and impatient because you have lost interest in somebody/something or because you have nothing to do
example: There was a bored expression on her face.

defTh: น่าเบื่อ, จืดชืด
defEn: not interesting; making you feel tired and impatient
example: He's such a boring man!

defTh: เกิด, กำเนิด
defEn: to come out of your mother’s body at the beginning of your life
example: I was born in 1976.

defTh: ยืม
defEn: to take and use something that belongs to somebody else, and return it to them at a later time
example: borrow something, Can I borrow your umbrella?

defTh: เจ้านาย, หัวหน้า
defEn: a person who is in charge of other people at work and tells them what to do
example: I'll ask my boss if I can have the day off.

defTh: ทั้งสอง
defEn: used with plural nouns to mean ‘the two’ or ‘the one as well as the other’
example: Both women were French.

defTh: รบกวน, ทำให้กังวล, ใส่ใจ
defEn: to spend time and/or energy doing something
example: ‘Shall I wait?’ ‘No, don't bother’.

defTh: ขวด
defEn: a glass or plastic container, usually round with straight sides and a narrow neck, used especially for storing liquids
example: a wine/beer/milk/water bottle

defTh: ก้น, ล่าง
defEn: in the lowest, last or furthest place or position
example: your bottom lip

defTh: ตีกลับ
defEn: if something bounces or you bounce it, it moves quickly away from a surface it has just hit or you make it do this
example: The ball bounced twice before he could reach it.

defTh: ผูกมัด, ขอบเขต
defEn: certain or likely to happen, or to do or be something
example: There are bound to be changes when the new system is introduced.

defTh: ขีดจำกัด, พรมแดน
