defEn: a real or imagined line that marks the limits or edges of something and separates it from other things or places; a dividing line
example: After the war the national boundaries were redrawn.

defTh: โค้งคำนับ
defEn: the act of bending your head or the upper part of your body forward in order to say hello or goodbye to somebody or to show respect
example: She gave a slight bow of her head in greeting.

defTh: ชาม, โยน
defEn: a deep round dish with a wide open top, used especially for holding food or liquid
example: a salad/fruit/sugar bowl

defTh: กล่อง, ชก
defEn: a container made of wood, thick card, metal, etc. with a flat stiff base and sides and often a lid (= cover), used especially for holding solid things
example: in a box, Everything we owned was neatly packed in cardboard boxes.

defTh: เด็กผู้ชาย
defEn: a male child or a young male person
example: a little/small/young boy

defTh: แฟนหนุ่ม
defEn: a man or boy that somebody has a romantic or sexual relationship with
example: She's got a new boyfriend.

defTh: สมอง, ความคิด
defEn: the organ inside the head that controls movement, thought, memory and feeling
example: The human brain is a complex organ.

defTh: กิ่งไม้, สาขา
defEn: a part of a tree that grows out from the main stem and on which leaves, flowers and fruit grow
example: She climbed the tree and hid in the branches.

defTh: ยี่ห้อ, ตรา
defEn: a type of product, service, etc. made or offered by a particular company under a particular name
example: a well-known brand of toothpaste

defTh: กล้าหาญ, ใจกล้า
defEn: willing to do things that are difficult, dangerous or painful; not afraid
example: brave men and women

defTh: ฝ่าฝืน
defEn: a failure to do something that must be done by law
example: a breach of contract/copyright/warranty

defTh: ขนมปัง
defEn: a type of food made from flour, water and usually yeast mixed together and baked
example: a loaf/slice/piece of bread

defTh: แตก, หยุดพัก
defEn: a short period of time when you stop what you are doing and rest, eat, etc.
example: She was on her lunch break.

defTh: พังทลาย
defEn: an occasion when a vehicle or machine stops working
example: a breakdown on the motorway

defTh: อาหารเช้า
defEn: the first meal of the day
example: They were having breakfast when I arrived.

defTh: ความก้าวหน้า
defEn: an important development that may lead to an agreement or achievement
example: to make/achieve a breakthrough

defTh: หน้าอก, เต้านม
defEn: either of the two round soft parts at the front of a woman’s body that produce milk when she has had a baby
example: She put the baby to her breast.

defTh: ลมหายใจ
defEn: the air that you take into your lungs and send out again
example: His breath smelt of garlic.

defTh: หายใจ, สูดลมหายใจ
defEn: to take air into your lungs and send it out again through your nose or mouth
example: He breathed deeply before speaking again.

defTh: การหายใจ
defEn: the action of taking air into the lungs and sending it out again
example: Her breathing became steady and she fell asleep.

defTh: พันธุ์, เพาะพันธุ์
defEn: a particular type of animal that has been developed by people in a certain way, especially a type of dog, cat or farm animal
example: Labradors and other large breeds of dog

defTh: อิฐ, ก่ออิฐ
defEn: baked clay used for building walls, houses and other buildings; an individual block of this
example: The school is built of brick.

defTh: เจ้าสาว
defEn: a woman on her wedding day, or just before or just after it
example: a toast to the bride and groom

defTh: สะพาน, เชื่อม
defEn: a structure that is built over a road, railway, river, etc. so that people, vehicles, etc. can cross from one side to the other
example: We crossed the bridge over the River Windrush.

defTh: สั้น, กระชับ
defEn: lasting only a short time; short
example: a brief visit/meeting/conversation

defTh: โดยสังเขป
defEn: for a short time
example: He had spoken to Emma only briefly.

defTh: สว่าง, สดใส
defEn: full of light; shining strongly
example: bright light/sunshine

defTh: ฉลาด, ยอดเยี่ยม
defEn: extremely clever or impressive
example: What a brilliant idea!

defTh: นำมา, พามา
defEn: to come to a place with somebody/something
example: bring somebody/something (with you), Don't forget to bring your books with you.

defTh: กว้าง, หลวม
defEn: wide
example: a broad street/avenue/river

defTh: บรอดแบนด์
defEn: a way of connecting to the internet that allows you to receive information, including pictures, etc., very quickly and that is always active (so that the user does not have to connect each time)
example: plans to provide rural areas with fast broadband

defTh: กระจายเสียง
defEn: a radio or television programme
example: (British English), a party political broadcast (= for example, before an election)

defTh: ผู้ประกาศข่าว
defEn: a person whose job is presenting or talking on television or radio programmes
example: She is a writer and broadcaster on environmental matters.

defTh: อย่างกว้างๆ
defEn: generally, without considering details
example: Broadly speaking, I agree with you.

defTh: แตก, เสีย, หัก
defEn: that has been damaged or injured; no longer whole or working correctly
example: a broken window/plate

defTh: พี่ชาย, น้องชาย
defEn: a boy or man who has the same parents as another person
example: We're brothers.

defTh: สีน้ำตาล
defEn: having the colour of earth or coffee
example: brown eyes/hair

defTh: เบราว์เซอร์
defEn: a computer program that lets you look at or read documents on the World Wide Web
example: What do you use as your default browser?

defTh: แปรง, ปัด
defEn: an object made of short stiff hairs (called bristles) or wires set in a block of wood or plastic, usually attached to a handle. Brushes are used for many different jobs, such as cleaning, painting and tidying your hair.
example: a paintbrush

defTh: โหดร้าย
defEn: violent and cruel
example: a brutal attack/murder/rape/killing

defTh: ฟอง, พอง
defEn: a ball of air or gas in a liquid, or a ball of air inside a solid substance such as glass
example: champagne bubbles

defTh: เจ้าชู้
defEn: a US, Australian or New Zealand dollar; a South African rand; an Indian rupee
example: They cost ten bucks.

defTh: เพื่อนสนิท, เกลอ
defEn: a friend
example: an old college buddy of mine

defTh: งบประมาณ
defEn: the money that is available to a person or an organization and a plan of how it will be spent over a period of time
example: an annual budget of £10 million

defTh: บัฟเฟอร์
defEn: a thing or person that reduces a shock or protects somebody/something against difficulties
example: buffer against something, Support from family and friends acts as a buffer against stress.

defTh: บั๊ก
defEn: any small insect
example: There's a bug crawling up your arm.

defTh: สร้าง (สิ่งปลูกสร้าง)
defEn: to make something, especially a building, by putting parts together
example: build (something), They have permission to build 200 new homes.

defTh: อาคาร, สิ่งก่อสร้าง
defEn: a structure such as a house or school that has a roof and walls
example: a tall/high-rise/ten-storey building

defTh: เป็นกลุ่ม
defEn: the main part of something; most of something
example: The bulk of the population lives in cities.

defTh: กระสุน, ลูกปืน
defEn: a small metal object that is fired from a gun
example: He was found to have a single bullet wound in his chest.

defTh: กลุ่ม, พวง, กอง
defEn: a number of things of the same type which are growing or fastened together
example: a bunch of bananas, grapes, etc.

defTh: ภาระ
defEn: a duty, responsibility, etc. that causes worry, difficulty or hard work
example: to bear/carry/ease/reduce/share the burden

defTh: ระบบราชการ
defEn: the system of official rules and ways of doing things that a government or an organization has, especially when these seem to be too complicated
example: unnecessary/excessive bureaucracy

defTh: งานศพ
defEn: the act or ceremony of burying a dead body
example: a burial place/mound/site

defTh: เผาไหม้, แผลไหม้
defEn: an injury or a mark caused by fire, heat or acid
example: to have minor/severe/third-degree burns

defTh: แตกออก, ปะทุ (อย่างฉับพลัน)
defEn: to break open or apart, especially because of pressure from inside; to make something break in this way
example: That balloon will burst if you blow it up any more.

defTh: ฝัง, กลบ
defEn: to place a dead body in the ground
example: bury somebody/something, They killed her and buried her body.

defTh: รถโดยสาร
defEn: a large road vehicle that carries passengers, especially one that travels along a fixed route and stops regularly to let people get on and off
example: by bus, Shall we walk or go by bus?

defTh: พุ่มไม้, ป่า
defEn: a plant that grows thickly with several hard stems coming up from the root
example: a rose/holly bush

defTh: ธุรกิจ, กิจการ
defEn: the activity of making, buying, selling or supplying goods or services for money
example: It's been a pleasure to do business with you.

defTh: นักธุรกิจชาย
defEn: a man who works in business, especially at a high level
example: a group of visiting Italian politicians and businessmen

defTh: ยุ่ง, ไม่ว่าง
defEn: having a lot to do; perhaps not free to do something else because you are working on something
example: Are you busy tonight?

defTh: แต่, ทว่า
defEn: used to introduce a word or phrase that contrasts with what was said before
example: I got it wrong. It wasn't the red one but the blue one.

defTh: เนย, ทาเนย
defEn: a soft yellow food made from cream, used in cooking and for spreading on bread
example: Fry the onions in butter.

defTh: กระดุม, ปุ่ม
defEn: a small round piece of metal, plastic, etc. that is sewn onto a piece of clothing and used for fastening two parts together
example: (British English), to do up/undo your buttons

defTh: ซื้อ, จัดซื้อ
defEn: to obtain something by paying money for it
example: buy (something), Where did you buy that dress?

defTh: โดย, ข้าง
defEn: past
example: Just drive by. Don't stop.

defTh: ลาก่อน, บ๊ายบาย
defEn: goodbye
example: Bye! See you next week.

defTh: ห้องโดยสาร
defEn: a small room on a ship in which you live or sleep
example: I lay in my cabin feeling miserably seasick.

defTh: ตู้, คณะรัฐมนตรี
defEn: a group of senior members of a government that is responsible for advising and deciding on government policy
example: a cabinet meeting

defTh: สายเคเบิล
defEn: a set of wires, covered in plastic or rubber, that carries electricity, phone signals, etc.
example: fibre-optic cable

defTh: คาเฟ่
defEn: a place where you can buy drinks and simple meals. Alcohol is not usually served in British or American cafes.
example: There are small shops and pavement cafes around every corner.

defTh: เค้ก, ขนมเค้ก
defEn: a sweet food made from a mixture of flour, eggs, butter, sugar, etc. that is baked in an oven. Cakes are made in various shapes and sizes and are often decorated, for example with cream or icing.
example: a piece/slice of cake

defTh: คำนวณ, คิด
defEn: to use numbers to find out a total number, amount, distance, etc.
example: calculate something, An independent valuer will calculate the value of your property.

defTh: การคำนวณ
defEn: the act or process of using numbers to find out an amount
example: Cathy did a rough calculation.

defTh: เรียก, โทร, การเรียก
defEn: the act of speaking to somebody on the phone
example: to get/receive a call from somebody

defTh: สงบ, เงียบสงบ
defEn: not excited, nervous or upset
example: It is important to keep calm in an emergency.

defTh: กล้องถ่ายรูป
defEn: a piece of equipment for taking photographs, moving pictures or television pictures. It can be a separate item or part of another device.
example: Just point the camera and press the button.

defTh: ค่าย, ตั้งค่าย
defEn: a place where people live temporarily in tents or temporary buildings
example: Let's return to camp.

defTh: การรณรงค์, โครงการ
defEn: a series of planned activities that are intended to achieve a particular social, commercial or political aim
example: an anti-smoking campaign

defTh: ตั้งแคมป์
defEn: living in a tent, etc. on holiday
example: Do you go camping?

defTh: วิทยาเขต
defEn: the buildings of a university or college and the land around them
example: university/college campuses

defTh: สามารถ
defEn: a metal container in which food and drink is sold
example: can of something, a can of beans/beer/soda

defTh: คลอง
defEn: a long straight passage dug in the ground and filled with water for boats and ships to travel along; a smaller passage used for carrying water to fields, crops, etc.
example: the Panama/Suez Canal

defTh: ยกเลิก, เพิกถอน
defEn: to decide that something that has been arranged will not now take place
example: All flights have been cancelled because of bad weather.

defTh: มะเร็ง
defEn: a serious disease in which growths of cells, also called cancers, form in the body and kill normal body cells. The disease often causes death.
example: breast/lung cancer

defTh: ผู้สมัครรับเลือกตั้ง, ผู้เข้าแข่งขัน
defEn: a person who is trying to be elected or is applying for a job
example: a presidential candidate

defTh: เทียน
defEn: a round stick of wax with a piece of string (called a wick) through the middle that is lit to give light as it burns
example: a flickering candle

defTh: ไม่สามารถ, ทำไม่ได้
defEn: the negative of can; can not
example: I cannot believe the price of the tickets!

defTh: ผ้าใบ
defEn: a strong heavy rough material used for making tents, sails, etc. and by artists for painting on
example: tents made from heavy canvas

defTh: หมวก, ครอบ
defEn: a type of soft flat hat with a peak (= a hard curved part sticking out in front). Caps are worn especially by men and boys, often as part of a uniform
example: to wear a cap.

defTh: ศักยภาพ
defEn: the ability or qualities necessary to do something
example: Age affects the range of a person's capabilities.

defTh: มีความสามารถ
defEn: having the ability or qualities necessary for doing something
example: capable of something, You are capable of better work than this.

defTh: ความจุ, ความสามารถ
defEn: the number of things or people that a container or space can hold
example: a fuel tank with a maximum capacity of 50 litres

defTh: เมืองหลวง, ทุน
defEn: having the form and size used at the beginning of a sentence or a name
example: English is written with a capital ‘E’.

defTh: ทุนนิยม
defEn: an economic system in which a country’s businesses and industry are controlled and run for profit by private owners rather than by the government
example: the growth of industrial capitalism in the West

defTh: นายทุน
defEn: based on the principles of capitalism
example: a capitalist society/system/economy

defTh: กัปตัน, หัวหน้า
defEn: the person in charge of a ship or commercial aircraft
example: Captain Cook

defTh: จับ, ยึด, บันทึก
defEn: the act of capturing somebody/something or of being captured
example: He evaded capture for three days.

defTh: รถยนต์, รถ
defEn: a road vehicle with an engine and four wheels that can carry a small number of passengers
example: Paula got into the car and drove off.

defTh: คาร์บอน
defEn: a chemical element. Carbon is found in all living things, existing in a pure state as diamond and graphite.
example: carbon fibre

defTh: บัตร, ไพ่
defEn: thick, stiff paper; a piece of this for writing on
example: a piece of card

defTh: ดูแล, ห่วงใย
defEn: the process of caring for somebody/something and providing what they need for their health or protection
example: Some people were badly injured and needed medical care.

defTh: อาชีพ, งาน
defEn: the series of jobs that a person has in a particular area of work, usually involving more responsibility as time passes
example: a teaching career

defTh: ระมัดระวัง, รอบคอบ
defEn: giving attention or thought to what you are doing so that you avoid hurting yourself, damaging something or doing something wrong
example: Be careful!

defTh: อย่างระมัดระวัง
defEn: with a lot of attention or thought, so that you avoid hurting yourself, damaging something or doing something wrong
example: Drive carefully.

defTh: ประมาท, ไม่ระวัง
defEn: not giving enough attention and thought to what you are doing, so that you make mistakes
example: careless driving

defTh: สินค้า
defEn: the goods carried in a ship, an aircraft or a motor vehicle
example: The tanker began to spill its cargo of oil.

defTh: พรม, สิ่งปูพื้น
defEn: a piece of thick woven material made of wool, etc., used to cover the floor of a room or stairs; the material used for carpets
example: He spent the morning laying the new carpet.

defTh: รถม้า
defEn: a separate section of a train for carrying passengers
example: a railway carriage

defTh: แครอท
defEn: a long pointed orange root vegetable
example: grated carrot

defTh: ถือ, แบก, ขน
defEn: to support the weight of somebody/something and take them or it from place to place; to take somebody/something from one place to another
example: carry somebody/something, He was carrying a large bag.

defTh: ภาพการ์ตูน, ภาพล้อเลียน
defEn: a humorous drawing in a newspaper or magazine, especially one about politics or events in the news
example: a political/satirical cartoon

defTh: แกะสลัก
defEn: to make objects, patterns, etc. by cutting away material from a piece of wood or stone, or another hard material
example: carve something, a carved doorway

defTh: กรณี, คดี, กล่อง
defEn: a particular situation or a situation of a particular type
example: in… cases, In some cases people have had to wait several weeks for an appointment.

defTh: เงินสด, เงิน
defEn: money in the form of coins or notes
example: How much cash do you have on you?

defTh: คาสิโน
defEn: a public building or room where people play gambling games for money
example: a new hotel and casino in Las Vegas

defTh: โยน, นักแสดง
defEn: all the people who act in a play or film
example: an all-star cast (= including many well-known actors)

defTh: ปราสาท, คฤหาสน์
defEn: a large strong building with thick, high walls and towers, built in the past by kings or queens, or other important people, to defend themselves against attack
example: a medieval castle

defTh: ลำลอง, ไม่เป็นทางการ (เน้นความสบาย)
defEn: not formal
example: casual clothes (= comfortable clothes that you choose to wear in your free time)

defTh: ผู้เสียชีวิต
defEn: a person who is killed or injured in war or in an accident
example: Our primary objective is reducing road casualties.

defTh: แมว, สัตว์เลี้ยง
defEn: a small animal with soft fur that people often keep as a pet. Cats catch and kill birds and mice.
example: a tin of cat food

defTh: แคตตาล็อก
defEn: a complete list of items, for example of things that people can look at or buy
example: a mail-order catalogue (= a book showing goods for sale to be sent to people’s homes)

defTh: จับ, คว้า, เข้าใจ
defEn: an act of catching something, for example a ball
example: Roger made some brilliant catches at today's game.

defTh: ประเภท, หมวดหมู่
defEn: a group of people or things with particular features in common
example: These are the nominees from each category.

defTh: ตอบสนอง
defEn: to provide food and drinks for a social event
example: (British English), cater for somebody/something, Most of our work now involves catering for weddings.

defTh: วัว
defEn: cows and bulls that are kept as farm animals for their milk or meat
example: a herd of cattle

defTh: เหตุ, สาเหตุ, ก่อให้เกิด
defEn: the person or thing that makes something happen
example: Unemployment is a major cause of poverty.

defTh: คำเตือน
defEn: care that you take in order to avoid danger or mistakes; the fact of not taking any risks
example: extreme/great caution

defTh: รอบคอบ, ระมัดระวังตัว (เนื่องจากความเสี่ยง)
defEn: being careful about what you say or do, especially to avoid danger or mistakes; not taking any risks
example: The government has been cautious in its response to the report.

defTh: ถ้ำ
defEn: a large hole in the side of a hill or cliff or under the ground
example: the mouth (= the entrance) of the cave

defTh: แผ่นซีดี
defEn: a small disc on which sound or information is recorded. CDs can be played or read on various types of machines, including CD players and computers. (the abbreviation for ‘compact disc’)
example: on CD, His albums are available on CD and online.

defTh: หยุด, ยุติ
defEn: to stop happening or existing; to stop something from happening or existing
example: Welfare payments cease as soon as an individual starts a job.

defTh: เพดาน, ฝ้า
defEn: the top inside surface of a room
example: a large room with a high ceiling

defTh: ฉลอง, เฉลิมฉลอง
defEn: to show that a day or an event is important by doing something special on it
example: Jake's passed his exams. We're going out to celebrate.

defTh: การเฉลิมฉลอง
defEn: a special event that people organize in order to celebrate something
example: The occasion was the 40th anniversary celebrations of the orchestra.

defTh: คนดัง
defEn: a famous person
example: a celebrity chef

defTh: เซลล์, ห้องขัง
defEn: the smallest unit of living matter that can exist on its own. All plants and animals are made up of cells.
example: red and white blood cells

defTh: สุสาน
defEn: an area of land used for burying dead people, especially one that is not next to a church
example: He was buried in a private cemetery.

defTh: เซ็นต์, สตางค์
defEn: a coin and unit of money worth 1% of the main unit of money in many countries, for example of the US dollar or of the euro
example: A one-minute phone call to the UK cost 10 cents.

defTh: ใจกลาง, ส่วนกลาง
defEn: in the centre of an area or object
example: central London

defTh: ศูนย์กลาง, ศูนย์
defEn: the middle point or part of something
example: He walked to the centre of the circle.

defTh: ศตวรรษ, ร้อยปี
defEn: a period of 100 years
example: A century ago, Valparaiso was the country's main port.

defTh: พิธี, งาน
defEn: a public or religious occasion that includes a series of formal or traditional actions
example: More than 1000 people attended the ceremony.

defTh: แน่นอน, บางอย่าง
defEn: strongly believing something; having no doubts
example: I think it was him, but I can't be certain.

defTh: อย่างแน่นอน, เป็นที่แน่ใจ
defEn: without doubt
example: Without treatment, she will almost certainly die.

defTh: ความแน่นอน
defEn: the state of being certain
example: There is no certainty that the president's removal would end the civil war.

defTh: ใบรับรอง, ประกาศนียบัตร
defEn: an official document that may be used to prove that the facts it states are true
example: a birth/marriage/death certificate

defTh: โซ่, ลูกโซ่
defEn: a series of connected metal rings, used for pulling or fastening things; a length of chain used for a particular purpose
example: She wore a heavy gold chain around her neck.

defTh: เก้าอี้
defEn: a piece of furniture for one person to sit on, with a back, a seat and four legs
example: a table and chairs

defTh: ประธาน
defEn: the person in charge of a meeting, who tells people when they can speak, etc.
example: Sir Herbert took it upon himself to act as chairman.

defTh: ท้าทาย, โจทย์
defEn: a new or difficult task that tests somebody’s ability and skill
example: a tough/major/significant challenge

defTh: ที่ท้าทาย
defEn: difficult in an interesting way that tests your ability
example: challenging work/questions/problems

defTh: ห้อง, สภา
defEn: a hall in a public building that is used for formal meetings
example: The members left the council chamber.

defTh: แชมป์
defEn: a person, team, etc. that has won a competition, especially in a sport
example: the world/European/national/Olympic champion

defTh: การแข่งขันชิงแชมป์
defEn: a competition to find the best player or team in a particular sport
example: the National Basketball Association Championship

defTh: โอกาส, โชค
defEn: a possibility of something happening, especially something that you want
example: chance of doing something, She only has a slim chance of passing the exam.

defTh: เปลี่ยนแปลง, เปลี่ยน
defEn: the act or result of something becoming different
example: change in something, We're hoping for a change in the weather.

defTh: ช่อง, ช่องทาง
defEn: a television station
example: a television/TV channel

defTh: ความวุ่นวาย
defEn: a complete lack of order
example: economic/political/domestic chaos

defTh: บท, ตอน
defEn: a separate section of a book, usually with a number or title
example: to read/write a chapter

defTh: ตัวละคร, ลักษณะ
defEn: a person or an animal in a book, play or film
example: the main character in the film

defTh: ลักษณะเฉพาะ
defEn: very typical of something or of somebody’s character
example: characteristic of something/somebody, Community support of families is characteristic of many societies.

defTh: บ่งบอกลักษณะเฉพาะ
defEn: to be typical of a person, place or thing
example: the rolling hills that characterize this part of England

defTh: ค่า, กล่าวหา, ประจุ
defEn: the amount of money that somebody asks for goods and services
example: admission charges

defTh: การกุศล, ใจบุญ
defEn: an organization for helping people in need
example: a registered charity

defTh: เสน่ห์
defEn: the power of pleasing or attracting people
example: He was a man of great charm.

defTh: มีเสน่ห์
defEn: very pleasant or attractive
example: The cottage is tiny, but it's charming.

defTh: แผนภูมิ, กราฟ
defEn: a diagram, lists of figures, etc. that shows information
example: Some shares have lost two-thirds of their value since being issued (see chart).

defTh: กฎบัตร
defEn: a written statement describing the rights that a particular group of people should have
example: the European Social Charter of workers’ rights

defTh: ไล่ตาม, การไล่
defEn: an act of running or driving after somebody/something in order to catch them or it
example: The thieves were caught by police after a short chase.

defTh: สนทนา, คุย
defEn: a friendly informal conversation
example: I just called in for a chat.

defTh: ราคาถูก, ขี้เหนียว
defEn: costing little money or less money than you expected
example: cheap imports/flights

defTh: โกง, ทุจริต
defEn: a person who cheats, especially in a game
example: You little cheat!

defTh: ตรวจสอบ, เช็ค
defEn: an act of making sure that something is safe, correct or in good condition by examining it
example: Could you give the tyres a check?

defTh: แก้ม
defEn: either side of the face below the eyes
example: chubby/rosy/pink cheeks

defTh: เชียร์
defEn: a shout of joy, support or praise
example: A great cheer went up from the crowd.

defTh: ร่าเริง
defEn: happy, and showing it by the way that you behave
example: You're not your usual cheerful self today.

defTh: เนยแข็ง, ชีส
defEn: a type of food made from milk that can be either soft or hard and is usually white or yellow in colour; a particular type of this food
example: Cheddar cheese

defTh: พ่อครัว
defEn: a person whose job is to cook, especially the most senior person in a restaurant, hotel, etc.
example: a new book by celebrity chef Jamie Oliver

defTh: สารเคมี
defEn: connected with chemistry
example: changes in the chemical composition of the atmosphere

defTh: เคมี, วิชาเคมี
defEn: the scientific study of the structure of substances, how they react when combined or in contact with one another, and how they behave under different conditions
example: a degree in chemistry

defTh: หน้าอก, หีบ
defEn: the top part of the front of the body, between the neck and the stomach
example: chest pains

defTh: ไก่, ขี้ขลาด
defEn: a large bird that is often kept for its eggs or meat
example: They keep chickens in the back yard.

defTh: หัวหน้า, ผู้นำ
defEn: most important
example: the chief cause/problem/reason

defTh: เด็ก, ลูก
defEn: a young human who is not yet an adult
example: a child of 3/a 3-year-old child

defTh: วัยเด็ก
defEn: the period of somebody’s life when they are a child
example: childhood, adolescence, and adulthood

defTh: แผ่นวงจร, มันฝรั่งทอด
defEn: a long thin piece of potato fried in oil or fat
example: He was eating a burger and chips.

defTh: ช็อกโกแลต
defEn: a hard brown sweet food made from cocoa beans, used in cooking to add taste to cakes, etc. or eaten as a sweet
example: a chocolate bar

defTh: ทางเลือก, การเลือก
defEn: an act of choosing between two or more possibilities; something that you can choose
example: We are faced with a difficult choice.

defTh: คณะนักร้องประสานเสียง
defEn: a group of people who sing together, for example in church services or public performances
example: She sings in the school choir.

defTh: เลือก, ตัดสินใจเลือก
defEn: to decide which thing or person you want out of the ones that are available
example: You choose—I can't decide.

defTh: สับ
defEn: to cut something into pieces with a sharp tool such as a knife
example: chop something, He was chopping logs for firewood.

defTh: เรื้อรัง
defEn: lasting for a long time; difficult to cure

defTh: ก้อน
defEn: a thick, solid piece that has been cut or broken off something

defTh: โบสถ์, ศาสนจักร
defEn: a building where Christians go to attend services, pray, etc.
example: The procession moved into the church.

defTh: บุหรี่, มวนบุหรี่
defEn: a thin tube of paper filled with tobacco, for smoking
example: to smoke/have a cigarette

defTh: โรงภาพยนตร์
defEn: a building in which films are shown
example: the local cinema

defTh: วงกลม, วงเวียน
defEn: a completely round flat shape
example: the centre/circumference/radius/diameter of a circle

defTh: วงจร
defEn: a line, route or journey around a place

defTh: หมุนเวียน

defTh: การไหลเวียน

defTh: สถานการณ์, เหตุการณ์
defEn: the conditions and facts that are connected with and affect a situation, an event or an action
example: Police said there were no suspicious circumstances surrounding the boy's death.

defTh: อ้างอิง
defEn: to mention something as a reason or an example, or in order to support what you are saying
example: cite something, She cited examples of companies the city has helped relocate or expand.

defTh: พลเมือง, ประชากร
defEn: a person who has the legal right to belong to a particular country

defTh: ความเป็นพลเมือง
defEn: the legal right to belong to a particular country

defTh: เมือง, นคร
defEn: a large and important town
example: Parking is difficult in the city centre.

defTh: พลเมือง
defEn: officially connected with a town or city
example: civic buildings/leaders

defTh: มีอารยธรรม, สุภาพ
defEn: connected with the people who live in a country
example: civil unrest (= that is caused by groups of people within a country)

defTh: พลเรือน
defEn: connected with people who are not members of the armed forces or the police

defTh: อารยธรรม
defEn: a state of human society that is very developed and organized
example: the technology of modern civilization

defTh: อ้าง, เรียกร้อง
defEn: a statement that something is true although it has not been proved and other people may not agree with or believe it
example: claim about somebody/something, The company had made false claims about its products.

defTh: ชี้แจง
defEn: to make something clearer or easier to understand
example: clarify something, to clarify a situation/problem/issue

defTh: ความชัดเจน
defEn: the quality of being expressed clearly
example: a lack of clarity in the law

defTh: การปะทะกัน
defEn: a short fight between two groups of people
example: Clashes broke out between police and demonstrators.

defTh: ชั้นเรียน, ชนชั้น
defEn: a group of students who are taught together
example: in the/your class, We were in the same class at school.

defTh: คลาสสิก, เก่าแก่
defEn: accepted or deserving to be accepted as one of the best or most important of its kind
example: a classic film/story/car/game

defTh: คลาสสิค
defEn: relating to classical music
example: a classical composer/musician/pianist

defTh: การจำแนกประเภท
defEn: the act or process of putting people or things into a group or class (= of classifying them)
example: a style of music that defies classification (= is like no other)

defTh: จำแนกประเภท
defEn: to arrange something in groups according to features that they have in common
example: The books in the library are classified according to subject.

defTh: ห้องเรียน
defEn: a room where a class of children or students is taught
example: classroom activities

defTh: ข้อ
defEn: a group of words that includes a subject and a verb, and forms a sentence or part of a sentence
example: in a clause, There are languages that require the subject to come before the object in a clause.

defTh: สะอาด, ล้าง, ทำให้สะอาด
defEn: not dirty
example: Are your hands clean?

defTh: ชัดเจน, เคลียร์
defEn: easy to understand and not confusing
example: She gave me clear and precise directions.

defTh: อย่างเข้าใจง่าย
defEn: in a way that is easy to see or hear
example: Please speak clearly after the tone.

defTh: พนักงาน, เสมียน
defEn: a person whose job is to serve customers in a shop
example: The clerk at the counter gave me too little change.

defTh: มีไหวพริบ
defEn: quick at learning and understanding things
example: a clever child

defTh: คลิก, กด
defEn: the act of pressing the button on a computer mouse or touchpad
example: a mouse click

defTh: ลูกค้า, ผู้รับบริการ
defEn: a person who uses the services or advice of a professional person or organization
example: She's a well-known lawyer with many famous clients.

defTh: หน้าผา
defEn: a high area of rock with a very steep side, often at the edge of the sea or ocean
example: the cliff edge/top

defTh: ภูมิอากาศ, สภาพอากาศ
defEn: the regular pattern of weather conditions of a particular place
example: a tropical/warm/mild/temperate/cold climate

defTh: ปีน, ไต่
defEn: an act of climbing up a mountain, rock or large number of steps; a period of time spent climbing
example: an exhausting climb

defTh: ยึดมั่น
defEn: to hold on tightly to somebody/something
example: cling to somebody/something, survivors clinging to a raft

defTh: คลินิก
defEn: a building or part of a hospital where people can go for special medical treatment or advice
example: Your local family planning clinic can give you advice about birth control.

defTh: ทางคลินิก
defEn: relating to the examination and treatment of patients and their illnesses
example: clinical research (= done on patients, not just considering theory)

defTh: คลิป
defEn: a short part of a film that is shown separately
example: Here is a clip from her latest movie.

defTh: นาฬิกา
defEn: an instrument for measuring and showing time, in a room, on the wall of a building or on a computer screen (not worn or carried like a watch)
example: The clock struck twelve/midnight.

defTh: ที่ถูกปิด, ใกล้ชิด
defEn: near in space or time
example: I had no idea the beach was so close.

defTh: ปิด, เสร็จสิ้น
defEn: shut
example: Keep the door closed.

defTh: อย่างใกล้ชิด
defEn: near in space or time
example: He walked into the room, closely followed by the rest of the family.

defTh: การปิด, การยุติ
defEn: the situation when a factory, school, hospital, etc. shuts permanently
example: factory closures

defTh: ผ้า, เสื้อผ้า
defEn: material made by weaving or knitting cotton, wool, silk, etc.
example: woollen/cotton/linen cloth

defTh: เสื้อผ้า
defEn: the things that you wear, such as trousers, dresses and jackets
example: I bought some new clothes for the trip.

defTh: เสื้อผ้า, เครื่องนุ่งห่ม
defEn: clothes, especially a particular type of clothes
example: Workers at the factory wear protective clothing.

defTh: เมฆ
defEn: a grey or white mass that floats in the sky, made of very small drops of water
example: Dark clouds were gathering in the west.

defTh: สโมสร, ไม้
defEn: an organization for people who share an interest or do a sport or activity together
example: a golf/tennis/chess/film club

defTh: เบาะแส
defEn: an object, a piece of evidence or some information that helps the police solve a crime
example: The burglar left no clues.

defTh: กลุ่ม
defEn: a group of things of the same type that grow or appear close together
example: The telescope is focused on a dense cluster of stars at the edge of the galaxy.

defTh: ผู้ฝึกสอน, โค้ช
defEn: a person who trains a person or team in sport
example: the head/assistant coach

defTh: ถ่านหิน
defEn: a hard black mineral that is found below the ground and burnt to produce heat
example: I put more coal on the fire.

defTh: แนวร่วม
defEn: a government formed by two or more political parties working together
example: The two parties have formed a coalition.

defTh: ชายฝั่ง
defEn: the land next to or near to the sea or ocean
example: a trip to the coast

defTh: ชายฝั่งทะเล
defEn: of or near a coast
example: coastal waters/resorts/scenery

defTh: เสื้อคลุม
defEn: a piece of outdoor clothing that is worn over other clothes to keep warm or dry. Coats have sleeves (= parts covering the arms) and may be long or short.
example: to wear a coat

defTh: ค็อกเทล
defEn: a drink usually made from a mixture of one or more spirits (= strong alcoholic drinks) and fruit juice. It can also be made without alcohol.
example: a cocktail bar/cabinet/lounge/shaker

defTh: รหัส, เข้ารหัส
defEn: a system of words, letters, numbers or symbols that represent a message or record information secretly or in a shorter form
example: to break/crack a code (= to understand and read the message)

defTh: กาแฟ
defEn: the roasted seeds (called coffee beans) of a tropical bush; a powder made from them
example: ground/real/instant coffee

defTh: ความรู้ความเข้าใจ
defEn: connected with mental processes of understanding
example: a child’s cognitive development

defTh: เหรียญ, เงิน
defEn: a small flat piece of metal used as money
example: gold coins

defTh: ตรงกัน
defEn: to take place at the same time
example: It's a pity our trips to New York don't coincide.

defTh: เหตุบังเอิญ
defEn: the fact of two things happening at the same time by chance, in a surprising way
example: a strange/an extraordinary/a remarkable coincidence

defTh: หนาว, เย็น
defEn: having a lower than usual temperature; having a temperature lower than the human body
example: I'm cold. Turn the heating up.

defTh: ร่วมมือ
defEn: to work together with somebody in order to produce or achieve something
example: Researchers around the world are collaborating to develop a new vaccine.

defTh: การทำงานร่วมกัน
defEn: the act of working with another person or group of people to create or produce something
example: It was a collaboration that produced extremely useful results.

defTh: ล้ม, พังทลาย
defEn: a sudden failure of something, such as an institution, a business or a course of action
example: the collapse of the Soviet Union

defTh: เพื่อนร่วมงาน
defEn: a person that you work with, especially in a profession or a business
example: work/senior/male colleagues

defTh: สะสม, รวบรวม
defEn: to bring things together from different people or places
example: collect something, to collect data/evidence/information

defTh: ชุดสะสม, การเก็บ
defEn: a group of objects, often of the same sort, that have been collected
example: He wanted to share his vast art collection with the world.

defTh: โดยรวม
defEn: done or shared by all members of a group of people; involving a whole group or society
example: collective leadership/decision-making/responsibility

defTh: นักสะสม
defEn: a person who collects things, either as a hobby or as a job
example: a stamp collector

defTh: วิทยาลัย, มหาวิทยาลัย
defEn: (in the UK) a place where students go to study or to receive training after they have left school
example: a secretarial college

defTh: การชนกัน
defEn: an accident in which two vehicles or people crash into each other
example: collision between A and B, a collision between two trains

defTh: ที่เกี่ยวกับอาณานิคม
defEn: connected with or belonging to a country that controls another country
example: a colonial power

defTh: ดินแดนอาณานิคม
defEn: a country or an area that is governed by people from another, more powerful, country
example: former British colonies

defTh: สี, สีสัน
defEn: the appearance that things have that results from the way in which they reflect light. Red, orange and green are colours.
example: What's your favourite colour?

defTh: ที่มีสี (ไม่ใช่ขาวดำ)
defEn: having a particular colour or different colours
example: brightly coloured balloons

defTh: มีสีสันสดใส, น่าตื่นตา
defEn: full of bright colours or having a lot of different colours
example: colourful shop windows

defTh: เสา, คอลัมน์
defEn: one of the straight sections from top to bottom into which text on a page or screen is divided
example: a dictionary with two columns per page

defTh: คอลัมนิสต์
defEn: a journalist who writes regular articles for a newspaper or magazine
example: a newspaper columnist

defTh: การสู้รบ, การต่อสู้ทางทหาร
defEn: fighting or a fight, especially during a time of war
example: in combat, He was killed in combat.

defTh: การรวมกัน
defEn: two or more things joined or mixed together to form a single unit
example: combination of something, The tragedy was due to a combination of factors.

defTh: รวมกัน, ผสม
defEn: to come together to form a single thing or group; to join two or more things or groups together to form a single one
example: combine to do something, Hydrogen and oxygen combine to form water.

defTh: มา, มาถึง
defEn: to move to or towards a person or place
example: + adv./prep., He left and said he was never coming back.

defTh: ตลก, เรื่องตลก
defEn: a play, film or TV show that is intended to be funny, usually with a happy ending; plays, films and TV shows of this type
example: a romantic comedy

defTh: ความสบาย, ปลอบใจ
defEn: the state of being physically relaxed and free from pain; the state of having a pleasant life, with everything that you need
example: The hotel offers a high standard of comfort and service.

defTh: สบาย, ผ่อนคลาย
defEn: making you feel physically relaxed; pleasant to wear, sit on, etc.
example: It's such a comfortable bed.

defTh: ที่ตลกขบขัน, หนังสือการ์ตูน
defEn: humorous and making you laugh
example: a comic monologue/story

defTh: คำสั่ง, บัญชา
defEn: an order given to a person or an animal
example: Begin when I give the command.

defTh: ผู้บัญชาการ
defEn: a person who is in charge of something, especially an officer in charge of a particular group of soldiers or a military operation
example: military/allied/field/flight commanders

defTh: เริ่ม (อย่างเป็นทางการ)
defEn: to begin to happen; to begin something
example: The meeting is scheduled to commence at noon.

defTh: ข้อคิดเห็น, แสดงความเห็น
defEn: something that you say or write that gives an opinion on or explains somebody/something
example: comment on something, She made helpful comments on my work.

defTh: ความเห็น
defEn: a spoken description of an event that is given while it is happening, especially on the radio or television
example: a sports commentary

defTh: ผู้วิจารณ์
defEn: a person who describes an event while it is happening, especially on television or radio
example: a television/sports commentator

defTh: การค้าขาย
defEn: trade, especially between countries; the buying and selling of goods and services
example: Leaders of industry and commerce met at the summit in Paris.

defTh: เชิงพาณิชย์, โฆษณา
defEn: connected with the buying and selling of goods and services
example: residential and commercial properties

defTh: ค่าคอมมิชชั่น, มอบหมาย
defEn: an official group of people who have been given responsibility to control something, or to find out about something, usually for the government
example: The commission is expected to report its findings next month.

defTh: กรรมาธิการ
defEn: a member of a commission (= an official group of people who are responsible for controlling something or finding out about something)
example: the Church Commissioners (= the group of people responsible for controlling the financial affairs of the Church of England)

defTh: กระทำ, ผูกมัด
defEn: to do something wrong or illegal
example: to commit a crime/an offence

defTh: ข้อผูกมัด, ความมุ่งมั่น
defEn: a promise to do something or to behave in a particular way; a promise to support somebody/something; the fact of committing yourself
example: I'm not ready to make a long-term commitment.

defTh: คณะกรรมการ
defEn: a group of people who are chosen, usually by a larger group, to make decisions or to deal with a particular subject
example: an executive/advisory/organizing committee

defTh: สินค้าโภคภัณฑ์
defEn: a product or a raw material that can be bought and sold
example: rice, flour and other basic commodities

defTh: ทั่วไป, ธรรมดา
defEn: happening often; existing in large numbers or in many places
example: a common problem/occurrence/practice

defTh: โดยทั่วไป, บ่อยๆ
defEn: usually; very often; by most people
example: Christopher is commonly known as Kit.

defTh: สื่อสาร, ติดต่อ
defEn: to share or exchange information, news, ideas, feelings, etc.
example: We only communicate by email.

defTh: การสื่อสาร
defEn: the activity or process of expressing ideas and feelings or of giving people information
example: communication between A and B, Good communication between team leaders and members is essential.

defTh: คอมมิวนิสต์
defEn: connected with communism
example: communist ideology

defTh: ชุมชน, สังคม
defEn: all the people who live in a particular area, country, etc. when talked about as a group
example: The local community supported us from the start.

defTh: สหาย
defEn: a person or an animal that travels with you or spends a lot of time with you
example: travelling companions

defTh: บริษัท, คณะ
defEn: a business organization that makes money by producing or selling goods or services
example: insurance/oil/tech/technology/pharmaceutical companies

defTh: เทียบเคียงได้
defEn: similar to somebody/something else and able to be compared
example: A comparable house in the south of the city would cost twice as much.

defTh: เกี่ยวกับการเปรียบเทียบ
defEn: measured or judged by how similar or different it is to something else
example: Then he was living in comparative comfort (= compared with others or with his own life at a previous time).

defTh: เปรียบเทียบ, เทียบเคียง
defEn: to examine people or things to see how they are similar and how they are different
example: compare A and B, It is interesting to compare their situation and ours.

defTh: การเทียบเคียง, การเปรียบเทียบ (ทั่วไป)
defEn: the process of comparing two or more people or things
example: For Durkheim, comparison was the most important method of analysis in sociology.

defTh: ความเมตตา
defEn: a strong feeling of sympathy for people or animals who are suffering and a desire to help them
example: to feel/show compassion

defTh: บีบบังคับ, ผลักดัน
defEn: to force somebody to do something; to make something necessary
example: compel somebody to do something, The law can compel fathers to make regular payments for their children.

defTh: น่าติดตาม, ชวนให้เชื่อ
defEn: that makes you pay attention to it because it is so interesting and exciting
example: Her latest book makes compelling reading.

defTh: ชดเชย
defEn: to provide something good to balance or reduce the bad effects of damage, loss, etc.
example: Nothing can compensate for the loss of a loved one.

defTh: ค่าตอบแทน
defEn: something, especially money, that somebody gives you because they have hurt you, or damaged something that you own; the act of giving this to somebody
example: to claim/award/receive compensation

defTh: แข่งขัน, ชิงชัย
defEn: to take part in a contest or game
example: The games were an outstanding success, with almost 2400 athletes competing.

defTh: ความชำนาญ
defEn: the ability to do something well
example: to gain a high level of competence in English

defTh: มีความสามารถ (ตามมาตรฐาน), มีคุณสมบัติเหมาะสม
defEn: having enough skill or knowledge to do something well or to the necessary standard
example: He's very competent in his work.

defTh: การแข่งขัน, คู่แข่ง
defEn: an event in which people compete with each other to find out who is the best at something
example: a design/an art/a talent competition

defTh: แข่งขัน, มีการแข่งขัน
defEn: used to describe a situation in which people or organizations compete against each other
example: competitive games/sports

defTh: ผู้เข้าแข่งขัน
defEn: a person who takes part in a competition
example: Over 200 competitors entered the race.

defTh: รวบรวม (ข้อมูล, หนังสือ), เรียบเรียง
defEn: to produce a book, list, report, etc. by bringing together different items, articles, songs, etc.; to collect information in order to produce a book, list, etc.
example: We are trying to compile a list of suitable people for the job.

defTh: บ่น, ร้องทุกข์
defEn: to say that you are annoyed, unhappy or not satisfied about somebody/something
example: She never complains, but she's obviously exhausted.

defTh: ข้อร้องเรียน
defEn: a reason for not being satisfied; a statement that somebody makes saying that they are not satisfied
example: a formal complaint

defTh: เสริมให้สมบูรณ์, เติมเต็ม
defEn: to add to something in a way that improves it or makes it more attractive
example: The excellent menu is complemented by a good wine list.

defTh: สมบูรณ์, เสร็จสิ้น
defEn: including all the parts, etc. that are necessary; whole
example: a complete list/sequence/picture/profile

defTh: อย่างทั้งหมด
defEn: in every way possible; in every part
example: It was completely different from how I had imagined it.

defTh: เสร็จสิ้น
defEn: the act or process of finishing something; the state of being finished and complete
example: the completion of the new hospital building

defTh: ซับซ้อน, สลับซับซ้อน
defEn: made of many different things or parts that are connected; difficult to understand
example: a complex problem/issue/process/system

defTh: ความซับซ้อน
defEn: the state of being formed of many parts; the state of being difficult to understand
example: the increasing complexity of modern telecommunication systems

defTh: การปฏิบัติตาม
defEn: the practice of obeying rules or requests made by people in authority
example: compliance (with something), procedures that must be followed to ensure full compliance with the law

defTh: ซับซ้อน, ยุ่งยาก
defEn: made of many different things or parts that are connected; difficult to understand
example: a complicated issue/process/system

defTh: ภาวะแทรกซ้อน
defEn: a thing that makes a situation more complicated or difficult
example: The bad weather added a further complication to our journey.

defTh: ปฏิบัติตามกฎ, ยินยอม
defEn: to obey a rule, an order, etc.; to meet particular standards
example: They refused to comply with the UN resolution.

defTh: ส่วนประกอบ
defEn: one of several parts of which something is made
example: the different organizations involved in the design of the various components

defTh: เขียน
defEn: to write music
example: Mozart composed his last opera shortly before he died.

defTh: นักแต่งเพลง
defEn: a person who writes music, especially classical music
example: Verdi was a prolific composer of operas.

defTh: องค์ประกอบ
defEn: the different parts that something is made of; the way in which the different parts are organized
example: the chemical composition of the soil

defTh: สารประกอบ
defEn: a thing consisting of two or more separate things combined together
example: compounds derived from rainforest plants

defTh: ครอบคลุม
defEn: including all, or almost all, the items, details, facts, information, etc., that may be involved
example: a comprehensive list of addresses

defTh: ประกอบด้วย, รวมอยู่ด้วย
defEn: to have somebody/something as parts or members
example: comprise something, The collection comprises 327 paintings.

defTh: ประนีประนอม
defEn: an agreement made between two people or groups in which each side gives up some of the things they want so that both sides are happy at the end
example: After lengthy talks the two sides finally reached a compromise.

defTh: ภาคบังคับ
defEn: that must be done because of a law or a rule
example: English is a compulsory subject at this level.

defTh: คำนวณ
defEn: to calculate something
example: The losses were computed at £5 million.

defTh: คอมพิวเตอร์
defEn: an electronic machine that can store, organize and find information, do processes with numbers and other data, and control other machines
example: a home computer

defTh: ปกปิด
defEn: to hide somebody/something
example: conceal somebody/something, The paintings were concealed beneath a thick layer of plaster.

defTh: ยอมรับ
defEn: to admit that something is true, logical, etc. after first denying it or resisting it
example: + speech, ‘Not bad,’ she conceded grudgingly.

defTh: ตั้งครรภ์
defEn: to form an idea, a plan, etc. in your mind
example: He conceived the idea of transforming the old power station into an arts centre.

defTh: จดจ่อ
defEn: to give all your attention to something and not think about anything else
example: I can't concentrate with all that noise going on.

defTh: ความเข้มข้น, สมาธิ
defEn: the ability to direct all your effort and attention on one thing, without thinking of other things
example: This book requires a great deal of concentration.

defTh: แนวคิด, มโนทัศน์
defEn: an idea or a principle that is connected with something abstract
example: concept of something, the concept of social class

defTh: แนวความคิด, การตั้งครรภ์
defEn: an understanding or a belief of what something/somebody is or what something/somebody should be
example: conception of something, Marx’s conception of social justice

defTh: ความกังวล, เรื่องที่เกี่ยวข้อง
defEn: a feeling of worry, especially one that is shared by many people
example: concern about something/somebody, Villagers expressed concern about the level of traffic.

defTh: กังวล
defEn: worried and feeling concern about something/somebody
example: Concerned citizens can have a huge impact.

defTh: คอนเสิร์ต, การแสดง
defEn: a public performance of music
example: to attend/go to a concert

defTh: สัมปทาน
defEn: something that you allow or do, or allow somebody to have, in order to end an argument or to make a situation less difficult
example: The firm will be forced to make concessions if it wants to avoid a strike.

defTh: สรุป, ลงเอย
defEn: to decide or believe something as a result of what you have heard or seen
example: conclude something, It is too early for us to conclude anything.

defTh: ข้อสรุป, บทสรุป
defEn: something that you decide when you have thought about all the information connected with the situation
example: We can safely draw some conclusions from our discussion.

defTh: คอนกรีต, ชัดเจน
defEn: made of concrete
example: a concrete floor

defTh: ประณาม, ตำหนิอย่างรุนแรง
defEn: to say very strongly that you think something is bad, usually for moral reasons
example: condemn somebody/something, The government issued a statement condemning the killings.

defTh: เงื่อนไข, สภาพ
defEn: the state that something is in
example: in… condition, to be in pristine/excellent/perfect condition

defTh: ความประพฤติ, จัด
defEn: a person’s behaviour in a particular place or in a particular situation
example: The sport has a strict code of conduct.

defTh: หารือ
defEn: to discuss something with somebody, in order to exchange opinions or get advice
example: He wanted to confer with his colleagues before reaching a decision.

defTh: การประชุม, สัมมนา
defEn: a large official meeting, usually lasting for a few days, at which people with the same work or interests come together to discuss their views
example: The hotel is used for exhibitions, conferences and social events.

defTh: สารภาพ
defEn: to admit, especially formally or to the police, that you have done something wrong or illegal
example: After hours of questioning, the suspect confessed.

defTh: คำสารภาพ
defEn: a statement that a person makes, admitting that they are guilty of a crime; the act of making such a statement
example: After hours of questioning by police, she made a full confession.

defTh: ความเชื่อมั่นในตนเอง
defEn: the feeling that you can trust, believe in and be sure about the abilities or good qualities of somebody/something
example: The president's actions hardly inspire confidence.

defTh: มั่นใจ, เชื่อมั่น
defEn: feeling sure about your own ability to do things and be successful
example: She was in a relaxed, confident mood.

defTh: การกำหนดค่า
defEn: an arrangement of the parts of something or a group of things; the form or shape that this arrangement produces
example: configuration of something, The design is based on four configurations of squares.

defTh: จำกัด, กักขัง
defEn: to keep somebody/something inside the limits of a particular activity, subject, area, etc.
example: be confined to (doing) something, The work will not be confined to the Glasgow area.

defTh: ยืนยัน, รับรอง
defEn: to state or show that something is definitely true or correct, especially by providing evidence
example: confirm something, His guilty expression confirmed my suspicions.

defTh: การรับรอง, การยืนยันความถูกต้อง
defEn: a statement, letter, etc. that shows that something is true, correct or definite
example: I'm still waiting for confirmation of the test results.

defTh: ความขัดแย้ง, การปะทะกัน (ระหว่างบุคคล/กลุ่ม)
defEn: a situation in which people, groups or countries disagree strongly or are involved in a serious argument
example: The violence was the result of political conflicts.

defTh: เผชิญหน้า, ต่อต้าน
defEn: to appear and need to be dealt with by somebody
example: What is to be done about the economic problems confronting the country?

defTh: การเผชิญหน้า
defEn: a situation in which there is anger between people or groups who disagree because they have different opinions
example: confrontation (with somebody), She wanted to avoid another confrontation with her father.

defTh: ทำให้สับสน
defEn: to make somebody unable to think clearly or understand something
example: confuse somebody, These two sets of statistics are guaranteed to confuse the public.

defTh: ที่รู้สึกสับสน
defEn: unable to think clearly or to understand what is happening or what somebody is saying
example: I'm confused—say all that again.

defTh: ที่ทำให้สับสน
defEn: difficult to understand; not clear
example: The instructions on the box are very confusing.

defTh: ความสับสน
defEn: a state of not being certain about what is happening, what you should do, what something means, etc.
example: The announcement caused a lot of confusion.

defTh: แสดงความยินดี
defEn: to tell somebody that you are pleased about their success or achievements
example: I congratulated them all on their results.

defTh: การรวมกลุ่ม (ทางศาสนา/ทางการ)
defEn: a group of people who are gathered together in a church for a religious service, not including the priest and choir
example: The congregation stood to sing the hymn.

defTh: เกี่ยวกับรัฐสภา (ของสหรัฐอเมริกา)
defEn: related to or belonging to a congress or the Congress in the US
example: a congressional committee/bill

defTh: เชื่อมต่อ, ต่อ
defEn: to join together two or more things; to be joined together
example: connect A and B, The towns are connected by train and bus services.

defTh: เชื่อมต่อ, เกี่ยวข้อง
defEn: (of two or more things or people) having a link between them
example: We do not believe that the incidents are connected.

defTh: การเชื่อมต่อ, ความสัมพันธ์
defEn: something that connects two facts, ideas, etc.
example: connection between A and B, Scientists have established a connection between cholesterol levels and heart disease.

defTh: พิชิต
defEn: to take control of a country or city and its people by force
example: The Normans conquered England in 1066.

defTh: มโนธรรม
defEn: the part of your mind that tells you whether your actions are right or wrong
example: to have a clear/guilty conscience (= to feel that you have done right/wrong)

defTh: มีสติ, รู้ตัว
defEn: aware of something; noticing something
example: conscious of something, She's very conscious of the problems involved.

defTh: จิตสำนึก
defEn: the state of being able to use your senses and mental powers to understand what is happening
example: I can't remember any more—I must have lost consciousness.

defTh: ติดต่อกัน
defEn: following one after another in a continuous series
example: She was absent for nine consecutive days.

defTh: ฉันทามติ
defEn: an opinion that all members of a group agree with
example: consensus (about/on something), She is skilled at achieving consensus on sensitive issues.

defTh: ยินยอม
defEn: permission to do something, especially given by somebody in authority
example: The written consent of a parent is required.

defTh: ผลที่ตามมา
defEn: a result of something that has happened, especially an unpleasant result
example: Remember that actions have consequences.

defTh: เพราะเหตุนี้
defEn: as a result; therefore
example: This poses a threat to agriculture and the food chain, and consequently to human health.

defTh: การอนุรักษ์
defEn: the protection of the natural environment
example: to be interested in wildlife conservation

defTh: อนุรักษ์นิยม, ระมัดระวัง
defEn: opposed to great or sudden social change; showing that you prefer traditional styles and values
example: the conservative views of his parents

defTh: อนุรักษ์
defEn: to protect something and prevent it from being changed or destroyed
example: new laws to conserve wildlife in the area

defTh: พิจารณา, คิด
defEn: to think about something carefully, especially in order to make a decision
example: I'd like some time to consider.

defTh: ค่อนข้างมาก, สำคัญมาก
defEn: great in amount, size, importance, etc.
example: The project wasted a considerable amount of time and money.

defTh: อย่างมาก, มากมาย
defEn: much; a lot
example: The need for sleep varies considerably from person to person.

defTh: การพิจารณา, ข้อควรพิจารณา
defEn: the act of thinking carefully about something
example: An employer is legally bound to give due consideration to the request.

defTh: ประกอบด้วย (เน้นส่วนย่อย), มีส่วนสำคัญคือ
ความสม่ำเสมอ
defEn: the quality of always behaving in the same way or of having the same opinions, standard, etc.; the quality of being consistent
example: She has played with great consistency all season.

defTh: สม่ำเสมอ
defEn: always behaving in the same way, or having the same opinions, standards, etc.
example: a consistent approach to the problem

defTh: อย่างคงเส้นคงวา
defEn: always the same
example: Her work has been of a consistently high standard.

defTh: รวบรวมให้เป็นปึกแผ่น, ทำให้มั่นคง
defEn: to make a position of power or success stronger so that it is more likely to continue
example: With this new movie he has consolidated his position as the country's leading director.

defTh: การสมรู้ร่วมคิด
defEn: a secret plan by a group of people to do something harmful or illegal
example: conspiracy (to do something), a conspiracy to overthrow the government

defTh: คงที่, สม่ำเสมอ
defEn: happening all the time or repeatedly
example: There were constant interruptions.

defTh: อย่างไม่หยุดหย่อน
defEn: all the time; repeatedly
example: Fashion is constantly changing.

defTh: เขตเลือกตั้ง
defEn: a district that elects its own representative to parliament
example: Unemployment is high in her constituency.

defTh: ก่อตั้ง, เป็นองค์ประกอบของ
defEn: to be considered to be something
example: Does such an activity constitute a criminal offence?

defTh: รัฐธรรมนูญ, องค์ประกอบ
defEn: the system of laws and basic principles that a state, a country or an organization is governed by
example: your right to vote under the constitution

defTh: ตามรัฐธรรมนูญ, ที่เป็นไปตามกฎหมาย
ข้อ จำกัด
defEn: a thing that limits something, or limits your freedom to do something
example: constraints of time/money/space

defTh: ก่อสร้าง (โดยใช้วัสดุ)
defEn: to build or make something such as a road, building or machine
example: construct something, The building was constructed in 1993.

defTh: การก่อสร้าง, สิ่งก่อสร้าง
defEn: the process or method of building or making something, especially roads, buildings, bridges, etc.
example: Construction began this year and will take approximately 18 months.

defTh: ปรึกษา, ขอคำแนะนำ
defEn: to go to somebody for information or advice
example: consult somebody, If the pain continues, consult your doctor.

defTh: ผู้ให้คำปรึกษา
defEn: a person who knows a lot about a particular subject and is employed to give advice about it to other people
example: a technology/design consultant

defTh: การขอคำแนะนำ, การปรึกษาหารือ (จากผู้เชี่ยวชาญ)
defEn: the act of discussing something with somebody or with a group of people before making a decision about it
example: a consultation document/paper/period/process

defTh: บริโภค
defEn: to use something, especially fuel, energy or time
example: The electricity industry consumes large amounts of fossil fuels.

defTh: ผู้บริโภค
defEn: a person who buys goods or uses services
example: consumer spending/demand

defTh: การใช้จนหมด, การบริโภค
defEn: the act of using energy, food or materials; the amount used
example: the production of fuel for domestic consumption (= to be used in the country where it is produced)

defTh: ติดต่อ, สัมผัส
defEn: the act of communicating with somebody, especially regularly
example: contact with somebody, I don't have much contact with my uncle.

defTh: บรรจุ, มี
defEn: if something contains something else, it has that thing inside it or as part of it
example: This drink doesn't contain any alcohol.

defTh: ภาชนะ, ตู้สินค้า
defEn: a box, bottle, etc. in which something can be stored or transported
example: a plastic container

defTh: ครุ่นคิด
defEn: to think about whether you should do something, or how you should do something
example: contemplate something, You're too young to be contemplating retirement.

defTh: ร่วมสมัย, ปัจจุบัน
defEn: belonging to the same time
example: We have no contemporary account of the battle (= written near the time that it happened).

defTh: ดูถูก
defEn: the feeling that somebody/something is without value and deserves no respect at all
example: with contempt, She looked at him with contempt.

defTh: โต้แย้ง
defEn: to say that something is true, especially in an argument
example: I would contend that the minister's thinking is flawed on this point.

defTh: ผู้ท้าชิง
defEn: a person or team with a chance of winning a competition
example: contender (for something), a contender for a gold medal in the Olympics

defTh: ที่พอใจในสิ่งที่ตนมี
defEn: happy and satisfied with what you have
example: He seemed more content, less bitter.

defTh: การโต้แย้ง
defEn: anger between people who disagree
example: One area of contention is the availability of nursery care.

defTh: การแข่งขัน, ประกวด
defEn: a competition in which people try to win something
example: to hold a singing/talent contest

defTh: บริบท, สภาพแวดล้อม
defEn: the situation in which something happens and that helps you to understand it
example: Such databases are being used in a wide range of contexts.

defTh: ทวีป
defEn: one of the large land masses of the earth such as Europe, Asia or Africa
example: the continent of Africa

defTh: อย่างบ่อยครั้ง
defEn: in a way that is repeated many times so that it is annoying
example: They argue continually about money.

defTh: ทำต่อไป, ต่อเนื่อง
defEn: to keep existing or happening without stopping
example: If the current trend continues, that number will increase 165 per cent by 2050.

defTh: ต่อเนื่อง, ไม่ขาดสาย
defEn: happening or existing for a period of time without being interrupted
example: Recovery after the accident will be a continuous process that may take several months.

defTh: สัญญา, หด
defEn: an official written agreement
example: All employees have a written contract of employment.

defTh: ผู้รับเหมา
defEn: a person or company that has a contract to do work or provide goods or services for another company
example: a building/roofing/electrical contractor

defTh: ข้อความขัดแย้ง, การไม่ลงรอยกัน (ทางแนวคิด/ตรรกะ)
defEn: a lack of agreement between facts, opinions, actions, etc.
example: contradiction (between A and B), There is a contradiction between the two sets of figures.

defTh: ตรงกันข้าม
ความแตกต่าง, เปรียบเทียบ
defEn: a difference between two or more people or things that you can see clearly when they are compared or put close together; the fact of comparing two or more things in order to show the differences between them
example: The two cities make an interesting contrast.

defTh: ช่วยเหลือ, สนับสนุน
defEn: to give something, especially money or goods, to help achieve or provide something
example: Do you wish to contribute?

defTh: การช่วยเหลือ, ส่วนร่วม
defEn: a gift or payment that is made to a person or an organization in order to help pay for something
example: All contributions will be gratefully received.

defTh: ผู้ร่วมให้ข้อมูล
defEn: a person who writes articles for a magazine, book or website, or who talks on a radio or television programme or at a meeting
example: a regular contributor to this magazine

defTh: ควบคุม, ควบคุม
defEn: the power to make decisions about how a country, an area, an organization, etc. is run
example: control of somebody/something, The party expects to gain control of the council in the next election.

defTh: เป็นที่ถกเถียง
defEn: causing a lot of angry public discussion and disagreement
example: a highly controversial topic

defTh: การโต้เถียง
defEn: public discussion and argument about something that many people strongly disagree about, think is bad, or are shocked by
example: to arouse/cause controversy

defTh: ความสะดวก
defEn: the quality of being useful, easy or suitable for somebody
example: We have provided seats for the convenience of our customers.

defTh: สะดวก
defEn: useful, easy or quick to do; not causing problems
example: Fruit is a convenient source of vitamins and energy.

defTh: การประชุม, ธรรมเนียม
defEn: the way in which something is done that most people in a society expect and consider to be polite or the right way to do it
example: the rigid social conventions of Victorian Britain

defTh: ตามธรรมเนียม
defEn: tending to follow what is done or considered acceptable by society in general; normal and ordinary, and perhaps not very interesting
example: conventional behaviour/morality

defTh: การพูดคุย, บทสนทนา (ไม่เป็นทางการ)
defEn: an informal talk involving a small group of people or only two; the activity of talking in this way
example: a phone conversation

defTh: การแปลง
defEn: the act or process of changing something from one form, use or system to another
example: Their main business is the conversion of farm buildings into family homes.

defTh: เปลี่ยน, แปลง
defEn: to change or make something change from one form, purpose, system, etc. to another
example: convert something, They took just nine months to convert the building.

defTh: ถ่ายทอด
defEn: to make ideas, feelings, etc. known to somebody
example: convey something, Colours like red convey a sense of energy and strength.

defTh: นักโทษ
defEn: to decide and state officially in court that somebody is guilty of a crime
example: be convicted (of something), He was convicted of fraud.

defTh: ความเชื่อมั่นในหลักการ
defEn: the act of finding somebody guilty of a crime in court; the fact of having been found guilty
example: He plans to appeal against his conviction.

defTh: โน้มน้าว, ชักจูง
defEn: to make somebody/yourself believe that something is true
example: convince somebody/yourself, Are the prime minister's assurances enough to convince the public?

defTh: ที่เชื่อมั่น, ที่แน่ใจ
defEn: completely sure about something
example: Sam nodded but he didn't look convinced.

defTh: น่าเชื่อ
defEn: that makes somebody believe that something is true
example: a convincing argument/explanation/case

defTh: ทำอาหาร, พ่อครัว
defEn: a person who cooks food or whose job is cooking
example: John is a very good cook (= he cooks well).

defTh: เตาหุงต้ม
defEn: a large piece of equipment for cooking food, containing an oven and gas or electric rings on top
example: a gas cooker

defTh: การทำอาหาร
defEn: the process of preparing food by heating it
example: My husband does all the cooking.

defTh: เย็น, เท่, สบาย
defEn: fairly cold; not hot or warm
example: cool air/water

defTh: ให้ความร่วมมือ
defEn: to work together with somebody else in order to achieve something
example: The two groups agreed to cooperate with each other.

defTh: สหกรณ์
defEn: involving doing something together or working together with others towards a shared aim
example: Cooperative activity is essential to effective community work.

defTh: ประสานงาน
defEn: to organize the different parts of an activity and the people involved in it so that it works well
example: coordinate something, They appointed a new manager to coordinate the work of the team.

defTh: การประสานงาน
defEn: the act of making parts of something, groups of people, etc. work together in an efficient and organized way
example: The aim was to improve the coordination of services.

defTh: ผู้ประสานงาน
defEn: a person who organizes the different parts of an activity and the people involved in it so that it works well
example: The campaign needs an effective coordinator.

defTh: ตำรวจ (คำแสลง)
defEn: a police officer
example: Somebody call the cops!

defTh: รับมือ, จัดการ
defEn: to deal successfully with something difficult
example: I got to the stage where I wasn't coping any more.

defTh: ทองแดง
defEn: a chemical element. Copper is a soft red-brown metal used for making electric wires, pipes and coins.
example: a copper mine

defTh: สำเนา, คัดลอก
defEn: a thing that is made to be the same as something else, especially a document or a work of art
example: The thieves replaced the original painting with a copy.

defTh: ลิขสิทธิ์
defEn: if a person or an organization holds the copyright on a piece of writing, music, etc., they are the only people who have the legal right to publish, broadcast, perform it, etc., and other people must ask their permission to use it or any part of it
example: Copyright expires seventy years after the death of the author.

defTh: แกน, ใจกลาง
defEn: most important; main or essential
example: core subjects (= subjects that all the students have to study) such as English and mathematics

defTh: มุม, หัวมุม
defEn: a part of something where two or more sides, lines or edges join
example: the four corners of a square

defTh: ที่เกี่ยวกับบริษัทใหญ่
defEn: connected with a large business company
example: corporate finance/profits/tax

defTh: บริษัท
defEn: a large business company
example: multinational corporations

defTh: ถูกต้อง, แก้ไข
defEn: accurate or true, without any mistakes
example: Do you have the correct time?

defTh: การแก้ไขความผิดพลาด, การปรับปรุง
defEn: a change that makes something more accurate than it was before
example: I've made a few small corrections to your report.

defTh: อย่างถูกต้อง
defEn: in a way that is accurate or true, without any mistakes
example: Have you spelled it correctly?

defTh: มีความสัมพันธ์กัน
defEn: if two or more facts, figures, etc. correlate or if a fact, figure, etc. correlates with another, the facts are closely connected and affect or depend on each other
example: The figures do not seem to correlate.

defTh: ความสัมพันธ์เชิงสถิติ
defEn: a connection between two things in which one thing changes as the other does
example: correlation between A and B, There is a direct correlation between exposure to sun and skin cancer.

defTh: สอดคล้อง
defEn: to be the same as or match something
example: Your account and hers do not correspond.

defTh: การโต้ตอบ
defEn: the letters, emails, etc. a person sends and receives
example: personal/private correspondence

defTh: ผู้สื่อข่าว
defEn: a person who reports news from a particular country or on a particular subject for a newspaper or a television or radio station
example: She's the BBC's political correspondent.

defTh: ที่สอดคล้องกัน
defEn: matching or connected with something that you have just mentioned
example: A change in the money supply brings a corresponding change in expenditure.

defTh: โถงทางเดิน
defEn: a long narrow passage in a building, with doors that open into rooms on either side
example: His room is along the corridor.

defTh: เสียหาย
defEn: willing to use their power to do dishonest or illegal things in return for money or to get an advantage
example: It was seen as the only way to overthrow a corrupt regime.

defTh: การทุจริต
defEn: dishonest or illegal behaviour, especially of people in authority
example: allegations of bribery and corruption

defTh: ราคา, ค่าใช้จ่าย
defEn: the amount of money that you need in order to buy, make or do something
example: cost of something, the high/low cost of housing

defTh: มีราคาแพง
defEn: costing a lot of money, especially more than you want to pay
example: Buying new furniture may prove too costly.

defTh: เครื่องแต่งกาย
defEn: the clothes worn by people from a particular place or during a particular historical period
example: an exhibition of Victorian costumes

defTh: กระท่อม, บ้านพัก
defEn: a small house, especially in the country
example: a thatched cottage

defTh: ฝ้าย, ผ้าฝ้าย
defEn: a plant grown in warm countries for the soft white hairs around its seeds that are used to make cloth and thread
example: From the age of six she worked in the fields, picking cotton.

defTh: สามารถ, อาจจะ
defEn: used as the past tense of ‘can’
example: She said that she couldn't come.

defTh: สภา, คณะกรรมการ
defEn: a group of people who are elected to govern an area such as a city or county
example: a town council

defTh: สมาชิกสภา
defEn: a member of a city or county council
example: Councillor Ann Jones

defTh: การให้คำปรึกษาทางจิตวิทยา, การแนะนำ
defEn: professional advice about a problem
example: The couple decided to go for relationship counselling.

defTh: ที่ปรึกษาด้านแนะแนว
defEn: a person who has been trained to advise people with problems, especially personal problems
example: I went to see a debt counsellor and she agreed to come to the bank with me.

defTh: นับ, จำนวน
defEn: an act of counting to find the total number of somebody/something
example: If the election result is close, there will be a second count.

defTh: เคาน์เตอร์, ต่อต้าน
defEn: a long flat surface over which goods are sold or business is done in a shop, bank, etc.
example: behind the counter, I asked the woman behind the counter if they had any postcards.

defTh: คู่กัน
defEn: a person or thing that has the same position or function as somebody/something else in a different place or situation
example: The Foreign Minister held talks with his Chinese counterpart.

defTh: นับไม่ถ้วน
defEn: very many; too many to be counted or mentioned
example: I've warned her countless times.

defTh: ประเทศ, ชนบท
defEn: an area of land that has or used to have its own government and laws
example: European countries

defTh: ชนบท
defEn: land outside towns and cities, with fields, woods, etc.
example: The surrounding countryside is windswept and rocky.

defTh: เทศมณฑล
defEn: one of a number of areas that some countries are divided into, each with its own local government
example: rural counties west of the Mississippi

defTh: รัฐประหาร
defEn: a sudden change of government that is illegal and often violent
example: He seized power in a military coup in 2008.

defTh: คู่, สอง
defEn: two people or things
example: I saw a couple of men get out.

defTh: ความกล้าหาญ
defEn: the ability to do something dangerous, or to face pain or opposition, without showing fear
example: He showed great courage and determination.

defTh: หลักสูตร, เส้นทาง
defEn: a series of lessons or lectures on a particular subject
example: a French/chemistry course

defTh: ศาล, สนาม
defEn: the place where legal trials take place and where crimes, etc. are judged
example: the civil/criminal courts

defTh: ความสุภาพ
defEn: polite behaviour that shows respect for other people
example: I was treated with the utmost courtesy by the staff.

defTh: ลูกพี่ลูกน้อง
defEn: a child of your aunt or uncle
example: She's my cousin.

defTh: ปกคลุม, ครอบ
defEn: a thing that is put over or on another thing, usually to protect it or to decorate it
example: Brighten up your room with some colourful cushion covers.

defTh: ความคุ้มครอง
defEn: the reporting of news and sport in the media
example: media/newspaper/press coverage

defTh: คลุม, ปกคลุม
defEn: having a layer or amount of something on it
example: His face was covered in blood.

defTh: วัว, แม่วัว
defEn: a large animal kept on farms to produce milk or beef
example: to milk a cow

defTh: รอยแตก, แตก
