defEn: a line on the surface of something where it has broken but not split into separate parts
example: This cup has a crack in it.

defTh: งานฝีมือ, สร้าง
defEn: an activity involving a special skill at making things with your hands
example: traditional crafts like basket-weaving

defTh: ชน, พัง, ล้มเหลว
defEn: an accident in which a vehicle hits something, for example another vehicle, usually causing damage and often injuring or killing the passengers
example: a car/plane crash

defTh: คลาน
defEn: to move forward on your hands and knees or with your body close to the ground
example: Our baby is just starting to crawl.

defTh: บ้า, เสียสติ
defEn: not sensible; stupid
example: Are you crazy? We could get killed doing that.

defTh: ครีม, เนื้อครีม
defEn: between yellow and white in colour
example: a cream linen suit

defTh: สร้าง, สร้างสรรค์
defEn: to make something happen or exist
example: Scientists disagree about how the universe was created.

defTh: การสร้าง
defEn: the act or process of making something that is new, or of causing something to exist that did not exist before
example: Job creation needs to be the top priority.

defTh: ที่มีความคิดสร้างสรรค์
defEn: involving the use of skill and the imagination to produce something new or a work of art
example: a course on creative writing (= writing stories, plays and poems)

defTh: ความสามารถในการสร้างสรรค์
defEn: the use of skill and imagination to produce something new or to produce art
example: Creativity and originality are more important than technical skill.

defTh: ผู้สร้าง
defEn: a person who has made or invented a particular thing
example: Walt Disney, the creator of Mickey Mouse

defTh: สัตว์, สิ่งมีชีวิต
defEn: a living thing, real or imaginary, that can move around, such as an animal
example: respect for all living creatures

defTh: ความน่าเชื่อถือ (ของบุคคล/แหล่งข้อมูล)
defEn: the quality that somebody/something has that makes people believe or trust them
example: to gain/lack/lose credibility

defTh: น่าเชื่อถือ
defEn: that can be believed or trusted
example: a credible explanation/witness

defTh: เครดิต, สินเชื่อ
defEn: an arrangement that you make, with a shop for example, to pay later for something you buy
example: to get credit

defTh: คืบคลาน
defEn: to move slowly, quietly and carefully, because you do not want to be seen or heard
example: I crept up the stairs, trying not to wake my parents.

defTh: ลูกทีม
defEn: all the people working on a ship, plane, etc.
example: crew members

defTh: อาชญากรรม
defEn: activities that involve breaking the law
example: This month's figures show an increase in violent crime.

defTh: อาชญากร, เกี่ยวกับอาชญากรรม
defEn: connected with or involving crime
example: criminal offences/activities

defTh: วิกฤต, ภาวะฉุกเฉิน
defEn: a time of great danger, difficulty or doubt when problems must be solved or important decisions must be made
example: an economic/a financial crisis

defTh: เกณฑ์, มาตรฐาน
defEn: a standard or principle by which something is judged, or with the help of which a decision is made
example: The main criterion is value for money.

defTh: นักวิจารณ์
defEn: a person who expresses opinions about the good and bad qualities of books, music, etc.
example: a film/an art/a music critic

defTh: วิกฤต, สำคัญ
defEn: saying what you think is bad about somebody/something
example: You should just ignore any critical comments.

defTh: วิกฤต
defEn: in a way that says what you think is bad about somebody/something
example: She spoke critically of her father.

defTh: การวิจารณ์
defEn: the act of expressing disapproval of somebody/something and opinions about their faults or bad qualities; a statement showing this disapproval
example: to draw/face/receive criticism

defTh: วิจารณ์, ติ
defEn: to say that you think somebody/something is bad; to say what you do not like or think is wrong about somebody/something
example: All you ever do is criticize!

defTh: คำวิจารณ์
defEn: a piece of written criticism of a set of ideas, a work of art, etc.
example: She wrote a feminist critique of Freud's theories.

defTh: พืชผล, เก็บเกี่ยว
defEn: a plant that is grown in large quantities, especially as food
example: Sugar is an important crop on the island.

defTh: กากบาท, การข้าม (ถนน)
defEn: a mark or an object formed by two lines crossing each other (X or +); the mark (X) is often used on paper to show something
example: I've put a cross on the map to show where the hotel is.

defTh: ฝูงชน, กลุ่มคน
defEn: a large number of people gathered together in a public place, for example in the streets or at a sports game
example: He pushed his way through the crowd.

defTh: แออัด, หนาแน่น
defEn: having a lot of people or too many people
example: We made our way through the crowded streets.

defTh: มงกุฎ, ครอง
defEn: an object in the shape of a circle, usually made of gold and precious stones, that a king or queen wears on his or her head on official occasions
example: The crown was placed upon the new monarch's head.

defTh: สำคัญยิ่ง
defEn: extremely important, because it will affect other things
example: The next few weeks are going to be crucial.

defTh: น้ำมันดิบ
defEn: in its natural state, before it has been processed or refined
example: crude oil/metal

defTh: โหดร้าย, ทารุณ
defEn: having a desire to cause physical or mental pain and make somebody suffer
example: He was known to be a cruel dictator.

defTh: ล่องเรือ
defEn: a journey by sea, visiting different places, especially as a holiday
example: I'd love to go on a round-the-world cruise.

defTh: หลงใหล, บดขยี้
defEn: to press something so hard that it is damaged or injured, or loses its shape
example: The car was completely crushed under the truck.

defTh: ร้องไห้, ร้อง
defEn: a loud sound without words that expresses a strong feeling
example: cry of something, to give a cry of anguish/despair/pain/joy/alarm, etc.

defTh: คริสตัล
defEn: a small piece of a substance with many even sides, that is formed naturally when the substance becomes solid
example: ice/salt crystals

defTh: สัญญาณ
defEn: an action or event that is a signal for somebody to do something
example: cue (for something), Jon's arrival was a cue for more champagne.

defTh: ลัทธิ
defEn: very popular with a particular group of people
example: a cult movie/book

defTh: ปลูกฝัง
defEn: to prepare and use land for growing plants or crops
example: The land around here has never been cultivated.

defTh: ทางวัฒนธรรม
defEn: connected with the culture of a particular society or group, its customs, beliefs, etc.
example: Teachers need to be aware of cultural differences.

defTh: วัฒนธรรม, สังคม
defEn: the customs and beliefs, art, way of life and social organization of a particular country or group
example: African/American/European/Islamic culture

defTh: ถ้วย, แก้ว
defEn: a small container that is like a bowl in shape, usually with a handle, used for drinking tea, coffee, etc.
example: He filled the cup with water.

defTh: ตู้เก็บของ
defEn: a piece of furniture with doors and shelves used for storing dishes, food, clothes, etc.
example: kitchen cupboards

defTh: รักษา, การรักษา
defEn: a medicine or medical treatment that cures an illness
example: cure for something, the search for a cure for cancer

defTh: ความอยากรู้
defEn: a strong desire to know about something
example: Children show curiosity about everything.

defTh: อยากรู้อยากเห็น
defEn: having a strong desire to know about something
example: He is such a curious boy, always asking questions.

defTh: หยิก, เป็นลอน
defEn: having a lot of curls or a curved shape
example: long curly hair

defTh: สกุลเงิน
defEn: the system of money that a country uses
example: trading in foreign currencies

defTh: ปัจจุบัน, กระแส
defEn: happening now; of the present time
example: The necklace would be worth over $5000 at current prices.

defTh: ปัจจุบัน, ในขณะนี้
defEn: at the present time
example: The hourly charge is currently £35.

defTh: หลักสูตร
defEn: the subjects that are included in a course of study or taught in a school, college, etc.
example: The school curriculum should be as broad as possible.

defTh: ม่าน, ผ้า
defEn: a piece of cloth that is hung to cover a window
example: to draw/pull/close the curtains (= to pull them across the window so they cover it)

defTh: โค้ง, ส่วนโค้ง
defEn: a line or surface that bends gradually; a smooth bend
example: curve of something, He admired the delicate curve of her ear.

defTh: ที่โค้งงอ, ที่เป็นรูปโค้ง
defEn: having a round shape
example: a curved edge/surface

defTh: การดูแล
defEn: the legal right or duty to take care of or keep somebody/something; the act of taking care of something/somebody
example: Who will have custody of the children?

defTh: ธรรมเนียมปฏิบัติ, ขนบธรรมเนียม
defEn: an accepted way of behaving or of doing things in a society or a community
example: It's a local custom.

defTh: ลูกค้า, ผู้ซื้อ
defEn: a person or an organization that buys goods or services from a shop or business
example: marketing strategies to target potential customers

defTh: ตัด, หั่น, บาด
defEn: a wound caused by something sharp
example: cuts and bruises on the face

defTh: น่ารักน่าเอ็นดู
defEn: pretty and attractive
example: a cute little baby

defTh: การตัด
defEn: an article or a story that you cut from a newspaper or magazine and keep
example: newspaper/press cuttings

defTh: วงจร, ปั่น
defEn: a bicycle or motorcycle
example: He was riding his cycle home when he was hit by a lorry.

defTh: เหยียดหยาม
defEn: believing that people only do things to help themselves rather than for good or honest reasons
example: a cynical view/smile

defTh: พ่อ, คุณพ่อ
defEn: father
example: That's my dad over there.

defTh: รายวัน, ทุกวัน
defEn: happening, done or produced every day
example: Many people still read a daily newspaper.

defTh: ผลิตภัณฑ์นม
defEn: made from milk
example: dairy products/produce

defTh: เขื่อน
defEn: a barrier that is built across a river in order to stop the water from flowing, used especially to make a reservoir (= a lake for storing water) or to produce electricity
example: the Narmada dam in India

defTh: ความเสียหาย, ทำลาย
defEn: physical harm caused to something which makes it less attractive, useful or valuable
example: serious/severe damage

defTh: สร้างความเสียหาย
defEn: causing damage; having a bad effect on somebody/something
example: damaging consequences/effects

defTh: เต้นรำ, การเต้น
defEn: a series of movements and steps that are usually performed to music; a particular example of these movements and steps
example: Do you know any other Latin American dances?

defTh: นักเต้น, ผู้เต้น
defEn: a person who dances or whose job is dancing
example: She's a fantastic dancer.

defTh: เต้นรำ
defEn: moving your body to music
example: There was music and dancing till two in the morning.

defTh: อันตราย, ภัย
defEn: the possibility of something happening that will injure, harm or kill somebody, or damage or destroy something
example: Danger! Keep Out!

defTh: อันตราย, เสี่ยง
defEn: likely to injure or harm somebody, or to damage or destroy something
example: The situation is extremely dangerous.

defTh: กล้า, ท้าทาย
defEn: to be brave enough to do something
example: She said it as loudly as she dared.

defTh: มืด, ดำ
defEn: with no or very little light, especially because it is night
example: a dark room/street/forest/night

defTh: ความมืด
defEn: the state of being dark, without any light
example: After a few minutes our eyes got used to the darkness.

defTh: ข้อมูลดิบ, สถิติ
defEn: facts or information, especially when examined and used to find out things or to make decisions
example: We collected publicly available data over a 10-day period.

defTh: ฐานข้อมูล
defEn: an organized set of data that is stored in a computer and can be looked at and used in various ways
example: The database is updated monthly.

defTh: วันที่, นัด
defEn: a particular day of the month, sometimes in a particular year, given in numbers and words
example: ‘What's the date today?’ ‘The 10th.’

defTh: ลูกสาว
defEn: a person’s female child
example: We have two sons and a daughter.

defTh: รุ่งอรุณ
defEn: the time of day when light first appears
example: at dawn, They start work at dawn.

defTh: วัน, กลางวัน
defEn: a period of 24 hours
example: ‘What day is it today?’ ‘Monday.’

defTh: ตาย, หมดสภาพ
defEn: no longer alive
example: My mother's dead; she died in 2017.

defTh: กำหนดเวลา
defEn: a point in time by which something must be done
example: I prefer to work to a deadline.

defTh: ที่เป็นอันตรายถึงชีวิต
defEn: causing or likely to cause death
example: a deadly weapon/disease

defTh: ข้อตกลง, จัดการ
defEn: an agreement, especially in business, on particular conditions for buying or doing something
example: to sign/strike/finalize/close a deal

defTh: ตัวแทนจำหน่าย
defEn: a person whose business is buying and selling a particular product
example: an art/antique dealer

defTh: ที่รัก, แพง
defEn: used at the beginning of a letter before the name or title of the person that you are writing to
example: Dear Sir or Madam

defTh: ความตาย, มรณะ
defEn: the fact of somebody dying or being killed
example: the anniversary of his wife’s death

defTh: อภิปราย, โต้แย้ง
defEn: a formal discussion of an issue at a public meeting or in a parliament. In a debate two or more speakers express opposite views and then there is often a vote on the issue.
example: the first ever televised presidential debate

defTh: เศษซาก
defEn: pieces of wood, metal, building materials, etc. that are left after something has been destroyed
example: Emergency teams are still clearing the debris from the plane crash.

defTh: หนี้สิน, หนี้
defEn: a sum of money that somebody owes
example: to pay/repay a debt

defTh: เปิดตัวครั้งแรก
defEn: the first public appearance of a performer or sports player
example: He will make his debut for the first team this week.

defTh: ทศวรรษ, สิบปี
defEn: a period of ten years, especially a continuous period, such as 1910–1919 or 2000–2009
example: the early decades of the nineteenth century

defTh: ธันวาคม
defEn: the 12th and last month of the year
example: She was born in December.

defTh: เหมาะสม
defEn: of a good enough standard or quality
example: a decent meal/place to live

defTh: ตัดสินใจ, ตกลง
defEn: to think carefully about the different possibilities that are available and choose one of them
example: It's up to you to decide.

defTh: คำตัดสิน, ข้อสรุป
defEn: a choice or judgement that you make after thinking and talking about what is the best thing to do
example: I think I've made the right decision.

defTh: กระบวนการตัดสินใจ
defEn: the process of deciding about something important, especially in a group of people or in an organization
example: responsibility for decision-making

defTh: เด็ดขาด
defEn: very important for the final result of a particular situation
example: a decisive factor/victory/battle

defTh: ดาดฟ้า
defEn: the top outside floor of a ship or boat
example: on deck, I was the only person on deck at that time of night.

defTh: คำประกาศ, การแถลงอย่างเป็นทางการ
defEn: an official or formal statement, especially about the plans of a government or an organization; the act of making such a statement
example: to issue/sign a declaration

defTh: แถลง, ประกาศอย่างเป็นทางการ
defEn: to say something officially or publicly
example: declare something, The government has declared a state of emergency.

defTh: ลดลง, ปฏิเสธ
defEn: a continuous decrease in the number, value, quality, etc. of something
example: decline in something, There has been a 5 per cent decline in student numbers.

defTh: ตกแต่ง, ประดับ
defEn: to make something look more attractive by putting things on it
example: decorate something with something, They decorated the room with flowers and balloons.

defTh: การตกแต่ง
defEn: a thing that makes something look more attractive on special occasions
example: Christmas/festive decorations

defTh: ลดลง, น้อยลง
defEn: the process of reducing something; the amount that something is reduced by
example: Sales for May show a decrease compared with the same month last year.

defTh: อุทิศ
defEn: working hard at something because it is very important to you
example: a dedicated teacher

defTh: การอุทิศตน
defEn: the hard work and effort that somebody puts into an activity or a purpose because they think it is important
example: hard work and dedication

defTh: โฉนด
defEn: a thing that somebody does that is usually very good or very bad
example: It's a stirring tale of heroic deeds.

defTh: ถือว่า
defEn: to have a particular opinion about somebody/something
example: deem somebody/something + noun, The evening was deemed a great success.

defTh: ลึก, ล้ำลึก
defEn: having a large distance from the top or surface to the bottom
example: a deep hole/well/river

defTh: อย่างลึกซึ้ง
defEn: very; very much
example: She is deeply religious.

defTh: ค่าเริ่มต้น
defEn: what happens or appears if you do not make any other choice or change, especially in a computer program
example: The default is fifty lines.

defTh: ความพ่ายแพ้, เอาชนะ
defEn: failure to win or to be successful
example: The party faces defeat in the election.

defTh: ความบกพร่อง (ทางกายภาพ/การผลิต)
defEn: a fault in something or in the way it has been made that means that it is not perfect
example: a defect in the glass

defTh: การป้องกัน, แนวป้องกัน
defEn: the act of protecting somebody/something from attack, criticism, etc.
example: in defence of somebody/something, soldiers who died in defence of their country

defTh: ป้องกัน, ปกป้อง
defEn: to protect somebody/something from attack
example: defend somebody/something, The role of the military is to defend the country.

defTh: ผู้พิทักษ์
defEn: a player who must stop the other team from scoring in games such as football (soccer), hockey, etc.
example: a passionate defender of human rights

defTh: ที่ใช้ป้องกัน, ในเชิงป้องกัน
defEn: protecting somebody/something against attack
example: As a defensive measure he built a series of coastal forts and watchtowers.

defTh: ขาด
defEn: the state of not having, or not having enough of, something that is essential
example: deficiency (in something), Vitamin deficiency in the diet can cause illness.

defTh: การขาดดุล
defEn: the amount by which money spent or owed is greater than money earned in a particular period of time
example: a budget/trade deficit

defTh: นิยาม, กำหนด
defEn: to say or explain what the meaning of a word or phrase is
example: define something, The term ‘normal’ is difficult to define.

defTh: แน่นอน, ชัดเจน
defEn: sure or certain; unlikely to change
example: Can you give me a definite answer by tomorrow?

defTh: อย่างเด็ดขาด, อย่างชัดเจน
defEn: a way of emphasizing that something is true and that there is no doubt about it
example: I definitely remember sending the letter.

defTh: คำนิยาม, ความหมาย
defEn: an explanation of the meaning of a word or phrase, especially in a dictionary
example: The dictionary provides clear, simple definitions.

defTh: ท้า
defEn: to refuse to obey or show respect for somebody in authority, a law, a rule, etc.
example: I wouldn't have dared to defy my teachers.

defTh: ระดับ, องศา
defEn: a unit for measuring temperature
example: at… degrees, Water freezes at 32 degrees Fahrenheit (32°F) or zero/nought degrees Celsius (0°C).

defTh: ชักช้า, ล่าช้า
defEn: a period of time when somebody/something has to wait because of a problem that makes something slow or late
example: Commuters will face long delays on the roads today.

defTh: ผู้รับมอบสิทธิ์
defEn: a person who is chosen or elected to represent the views of a group of people and vote and make decisions for them
example: Congress delegates rejected the proposals.

defTh: การมอบหมาย
defEn: a group of people who represent the views of an organization, a country, etc.
example: the Dutch delegation to the United Nations

defTh: ลบ
defEn: to remove something that has been written or printed, or that has been stored on a computer
example: Your name has been deleted from the list.

defTh: รอบคอบ, ตั้งใจ
defEn: done on purpose rather than by accident
example: a deliberate act of vandalism

defTh: อย่างตั้งใจ
defEn: done in a way that was planned, not by chance
example: She's been deliberately ignoring him all day.

defTh: บอบบาง, ละเอียดอ่อน
defEn: easily damaged or broken
example: delicate china teacups

defTh: อร่อย
defEn: having a very pleasant taste or smell
example: Who cooked this? It's absolutely delicious.

defTh: ความสุข, ยินดี
defEn: a feeling of great pleasure
example: a feeling of sheer/pure delight

defTh: ยินดีมาก
defEn: very pleased
example: a delighted smile

defTh: ส่ง, มอบ, นำส่ง
defEn: to take goods, letters, etc. to the person or people they have been sent to
example: deliver something, I get my food delivered from the supermarket to save time.

defTh: การส่ง, การจัดส่ง
defEn: the act of taking goods, letters, etc. to the people they have been sent to
example: Allow 28 days for delivery.

defTh: ต้องการ, ความต้องการ
defEn: a very strong request for something; something that somebody needs
example: demand for something, a demand for higher pay

defTh: ประชาธิปไตย, ระบอบประชาธิปไตย
defEn: a system of government in which the people of a country can vote to elect their representatives
example: parliamentary democracy

defTh: ที่เป็นประชาธิปไตย, เกี่ยวกับประชาชน
defEn: controlled by representatives who are elected by the people of a country; connected with this system
example: a democratic country

defTh: ปีศาจ, ภูตผี
defEn: an evil spirit
example: The people believed the girl was possessed by demons.

defTh: สาธิต, แสดงให้เห็น
defEn: to show something clearly by giving proof or evidence
example: demonstrate that…, New research convincingly demonstrates that age-related memory loss is not inevitable.

defTh: สาธิต
defEn: a public meeting or a march (= an organized walk by many people) at which people show that they are protesting against or supporting somebody/something
example: to take part in/go on a demonstration

defTh: การปฏิเสธความจริง, การไม่ยอมรับ
defEn: a statement that something is not true or does not exist; the action of denying something
example: denial (of something), the prisoner’s repeated denials of the charges against him

defTh: ประณามอย่างเปิดเผย, ติเตียน
defEn: to strongly criticize somebody/something that you think is wrong, illegal, etc.
example: denounce somebody/something, She publicly denounced the government's handling of the crisis.

defTh: หนาแน่น
defEn: containing a lot of people, things, plants, etc. with little space between them
example: a dense crowd/forest

defTh: ความหนาแน่น
defEn: the quality of being dense; the degree to which something is dense
example: The population density in this city is very high.

defTh: ทันตแพทย์
defEn: a person whose job is to take care of people’s teeth
example: to see/visit/consult your dentist

defTh: ปฏิเสธข้อกล่าวหา, ไม่ยอมรับความจริง
defEn: to say that something is not true
example: deny something, to deny an allegation/a charge/an accusation

defTh: ออกเดินทาง
defEn: to leave a place, especially to start a trip
example: depart (for…) (from…), Flights for Rome depart from Terminal 3.

defTh: แผนก, กรม
defEn: a section of a large organization such as a government, business, university, etc.
example: department of something, the Department of Health

defTh: การออกเดินทาง
defEn: an act of leaving a place
example: His sudden departure threw the office into chaos.

defTh: ขึ้นอยู่กับ, พึ่งพา
defEn: according to
example: Starting salary varies from £26000 to £30500, depending on experience.

defTh: การพึ่งพาอาศัยกัน
defEn: the state of needing the help and support of somebody/something in order to survive or be successful
example: Our relationship was based on mutual dependence.

defTh: ที่พึ่งพา, ซึ่งขึ้นอยู่กับ
defEn: needing somebody/something in order to survive or be successful
example: a woman with several dependent children

defTh: พรรณนา, วาดภาพให้เห็น
defEn: to show an image of somebody/something in a picture
example: depict somebody/something (as somebody/something), a painting depicting the Virgin and Child

defTh: ปรับใช้
defEn: to move soldiers or weapons into a position where they are ready for military action
example: 2000 troops were deployed in the area.

defTh: การนำไปใช้ทางยุทธวิธี, การติดตั้ง
defEn: the act of moving soldiers or weapons into a position where they are ready for military action
example: the deployment of peacekeeping forces

defTh: ฝาก, เงินฝาก
defEn: a sum of money that is given as the first part of a larger payment
example: They normally ask you to pay $100 (as a) deposit.

defTh: ที่มีอารมณ์หดหู่
defEn: very sad and without hope
example: You mustn't let yourself get depressed.

defTh: ที่น่าหดหู่
defEn: making you feel very sad and without enthusiasm
example: a depressing sight/thought/experience

defTh: ภาวะซึมเศร้า
defEn: a medical condition in which a person feels very sad, anxious and without hope and often has physical symptoms such as being unable to sleep, etc.
example: She was diagnosed as having clinical depression.

defTh: พรากไป, เอาออกไป (ซึ่งสิทธิ)
ความลึก
defEn: the distance from the top or surface to the bottom of something; a particular distance down from the surface of something
example: depth of something, What's the depth of the water here?

defTh: รอง (ผู้แทน), ผู้รักษาการแทน
defEn: a person who is the next most important person below a business manager, a head of a school, a political leader, etc. and who does that person’s job when they are away
example: I'm acting as deputy till the manager returns.

defTh: ได้มา, มาจาก
ลงมา
defEn: to come or go down from a higher to a lower level
example: The plane began to descend.

defTh: เชื้อสาย
defEn: an action of coming or going down
example: The plane began its descent to Heathrow.

defTh: อธิบาย, พรรณนา
defEn: to say what somebody/something is like
example: describe somebody/something, The next section describes our findings in detail.

defTh: คำอธิบาย, ลักษณะ
defEn: a piece of writing or speech that says what somebody/something is like; the act of writing or saying in words what somebody/something is like
example: Follow the link below for a more detailed description.

defTh: ทะเลทราย, ละทิ้ง
defEn: a large area of land that has very little water and very few plants growing on it. Many deserts are covered by sand.
example: the Sahara Desert

defTh: สมควรได้รับ
defEn: to do something or show qualities that mean a particular reaction, reward or punishment is appropriate
example: deserve something, You deserve a rest after all that hard work.

defTh: ออกแบบ, การออกแบบ
defEn: the general arrangement of the different parts of something that is made, such as a building, book, machine, etc.
example: The basic design of the car is very similar to that of earlier models.

defTh: ระบุ, แต่งตั้ง, กำหนดชื่อ
defEn: to say officially that somebody/something has a particular character or name; to describe somebody/something in a particular way
example: be designated (as) something, This area has been designated (as) a National Park.

defTh: นักออกแบบ
defEn: a person whose job is to decide how things such as clothes, furniture, tools, etc. will look or work by making drawings, plans or patterns
example: one of the country's top fashion designers

defTh: ที่พึงปรารถนา
defEn: that you would like to have or do; worth having or doing
example: She chatted for a few minutes about the qualities she considered desirable in a secretary.

defTh: ปรารถนา, ต้องการ
defEn: a strong wish to have or do something
example: He now had enough money to satisfy all his desires.

defTh: โต๊ะเขียนหนังสือ
defEn: a piece of furniture like a table, often with drawers (= parts like boxes in it with handles on the front for pulling them open), that you sit at to read, write, work, etc.
example: at a desk, I spend all day sitting at a desk.

defTh: เดสก์ท็อป
defEn: a screen on a computer that shows the icons of programs and files that can be used
example: desktop icons

defTh: สิ้นหวัง
defEn: feeling or showing that you have little hope and are ready to do anything without worrying about danger to yourself or others
example: The prisoners grew increasingly desperate.

defTh: อย่างสิ้นหวัง
defEn: in a way that shows you have little hope and are ready to do anything without worrying about danger to yourself or others
example: She looked desperately around for a weapon.

defTh: ทั้งๆ ที่
defEn: used to show that something happened or is true although something else might have happened to prevent it
example: Her voice was shaking despite all her efforts to control it.

defTh: ปลายทาง
defEn: a place to which somebody/something is going or being sent
example: popular tourist/holiday destinations like the Bahamas

defTh: ทำลาย, ล้างผลาญ
defEn: to damage something so badly that it no longer exists, works, etc.
example: The building was completely destroyed by fire.

defTh: การทำลาย
defEn: the act of destroying something; the process of being destroyed
example: the destruction of the rainforests

defTh: ที่ทำลายล้าง
defEn: causing destruction or damage
example: The war demonstrated the destructive power of modern weapons.

defTh: รายละเอียด, ปลีกย่อย
defEn: a small individual fact or item; a less important fact or item
example: an expedition planned down to the last detail

defTh: ละเอียด, โดยละเอียด
defEn: giving many details and a lot of information; paying great attention to details
example: a detailed description of the events

defTh: กักขัง
defEn: to keep somebody in an official place, such as a police station, a prison or a hospital, and prevent them from leaving
example: One man has been detained for questioning.

defTh: ตรวจจับ
defEn: to discover or notice something, especially something that is not easy to see, hear, etc.
example: The tests are designed to detect the disease early.

defTh: การตรวจจับ
defEn: the process of discovering or noticing something, especially something that is not easy to see, hear, etc.; the fact of being discovered or noticed
example: crime prevention and detection

defTh: นักสืบ
defEn: a person, especially a police officer, whose job is to investigate crimes and catch criminals
example: a police/homicide/undercover detective

defTh: การคุมขัง
defEn: the state of being kept in a place, especially a prison, and prevented from leaving
example: They were sentenced to 12 months' detention in a young offender institution.

defTh: เสื่อมโทรม
defEn: to become worse
example: Her health deteriorated rapidly, and she died shortly afterwards.

defTh: ความมุ่งมั่น, การตัดสินใจ
defEn: the quality that makes you continue trying to do something even when this is difficult
example: fierce/grim/dogged determination

defTh: ตัดสินใจ, กำหนด
defEn: to discover the facts about something; to calculate something exactly
example: determine something, An inquiry was set up to determine the cause of the accident.

defTh: มุ่งมั่น, แน่วแน่
defEn: having made a definite decision to do something and not letting anyone prevent you
example: The opposition to her plan made her more determined than ever.

defTh: ทำให้เสียหายย่อยยับ
defEn: to completely destroy a place or an area
example: The bomb devastated much of the old part of the city.

defTh: พัฒนา, เจริญ
defEn: to gradually grow or become bigger, more advanced, stronger, etc.; to make something do this
example: From birth to age 5, a child's brain develops rapidly.

defTh: การพัฒนา
defEn: the steady growth of something so that it becomes more advanced, stronger, etc.
example: a baby’s development in the womb

defTh: อุปกรณ์ขนาดเล็ก (อิเล็กทรอนิกส์)
defEn: an object or a piece of equipment that has been designed to do a particular job
example: a tracking/recording/listening device

defTh: ปีศาจ, ซาตาน
defEn: the most powerful evil being
example: belief in the Devil

defTh: ประดิษฐ์
defEn: to invent something new or a new way of doing something
example: A new system has been devised to control traffic in the city.

defTh: อุทิศ, ทุ่มเท
วินิจฉัย
defEn: to say exactly what an illness or the cause of a problem is
example: diagnose something, The test is used to diagnose a variety of diseases.

defTh: การวินิจฉัย
defEn: the act of discovering or identifying the exact cause of an illness or a problem
example: a diagnosis of lung cancer

defTh: แผนภาพ, ไดอะแกรม
defEn: a simple drawing using lines to explain where something is, how something works, etc.
example: The results are shown in diagram 2.

defTh: บทสนทนา
defEn: a conversation in a book, play or film or in language teaching materials
example: Learners are asked to listen to three short dialogues.

defTh: เพชร, รูปข้าวหลามตัด
defEn: a clear precious stone of pure carbon, the hardest substance known. Diamonds are used in jewellery and also in industry, especially for cutting glass.
example: a diamond ring/necklace

defTh: บันทึกประจำวัน
defEn: a book in which you can write down the experiences you have each day, your private thoughts, etc.
example: Do you keep a diary (= write one regularly)?

defTh: บัญชา, ออกคำสั่ง, กำหนด (อย่างเด็ดขาด)
defEn: to tell somebody what to do, especially in an annoying way
example: dictate something (to somebody), They are in no position to dictate terms (= tell other people what to do).

defTh: เผด็จการ
defEn: a political leader who has complete power over a country, especially one who has gained it using military force
example: The country suffered at the hands of a series of military dictators.

defTh: พจนานุกรม
defEn: a book or electronic resource that gives a list of the words of a language in alphabetical order and explains what they mean, or gives a word for them in a foreign language
example: a Spanish-English dictionary

defTh: ตาย, ลูกเต๋า
defEn: to stop living
example: My father died suddenly at the age of 48.

defTh: อาหาร, ควบคุมอาหาร
defEn: the food and drink that you eat and drink regularly
example: to eat a healthy, balanced diet

defTh: แตกต่างกัน, ไม่เหมือนกัน
defEn: to be different from somebody/something
example: They hold differing views.

defTh: ความแตกต่าง, ข้อแตกต่าง
defEn: the way in which two people or things are not like each other; the way in which somebody/something has changed
example: Americans and Brits speak the same language, but there are big cultural differences.

defTh: แตกต่าง, หลากหลาย
defEn: not the same as somebody/something; not like somebody/something else
example: different from somebody/something, American English is significantly different from British English.

defTh: แยกความแตกต่าง, จำแนก
defEn: to recognize or show that two things are not the same
example: differentiate (between) A and B, It's difficult to differentiate between the two varieties.

defTh: อย่างแตกต่าง
defEn: in a different way from somebody/something
example: Boys and girls may behave differently.

defTh: ยาก, ลำบาก
defEn: not easy; needing effort or skill to do or to understand
example: The competition judges were given a very difficult task.

defTh: ความยากลำบาก
defEn: a problem; a thing or situation that causes problems
example: the difficulties of English syntax

defTh: ขุด
defEn: to make a hole in the ground or to move soil from one place to another using your hands, a tool or a machine
example: I think I'll do some digging in the garden.

defTh: ดิจิทัล, เชิงดิจิทัล
defEn: using a system of receiving and sending information as a series of the numbers one and zero, showing that an electronic signal is there or is not there
example: a digital camera

defTh: ศักดิ์ศรี
defEn: a calm and serious manner that deserves respect
example: She accepted the criticism with quiet dignity.

defTh: ภาวะที่กลืนไม่เข้าคายไม่ออก
defEn: a situation that makes problems, often one in which you have to make a very difficult choice between things of equal importance
example: I could see no way of resolving this moral dilemma.

defTh: มิติ
defEn: a measurement in space, for example how high, wide or long something is
example: We measured the dimensions of the kitchen.

defTh: ลดน้อยลง
defEn: to become smaller, weaker, etc.; to make something become smaller, weaker, etc.
example: The world's resources are rapidly diminishing.

defTh: อาหารเย็น
defEn: the main meal of the day, eaten either in the middle of the day or in the evening
example: It's time for dinner.

defTh: จุ่ม
defEn: to put something quickly into a liquid and take it out again
example: dip something (into something), He dipped the brush into the paint.

defTh: ทูต
defEn: a person whose job is to represent his or her country in a foreign country, for example, in an embassy
example: Washington's top diplomat in Havana

defTh: การทูต
defEn: connected with managing relations between countries (= diplomacy)
example: a diplomatic crisis

defTh: โดยตรง, สั่ง
defEn: going in the straightest line between two places without stopping or changing direction
example: the most direct route

defTh: ทิศทาง, คำแนะนำ
defEn: the general position a person or thing moves or points towards
example: in the direction of something, They headed in the direction of the village.

defTh: โดยตรง, ทันที
defEn: without stopping or changing direction
example: The path leads directly to the river.

defTh: ผู้กำกับ
defEn: one of a group of senior managers who run a company
example: a non-executive director

defTh: ไดเรกทอรี
defEn: a book or electronic resource containing lists of information, usually in alphabetical order, for example people’s phone numbers or the names and addresses of businesses in a particular area
example: a telephone/trade directory

defTh: ขี้ดิน, สิ่งสกปรก
defEn: any substance that makes something dirty, for example dust, soil or mud
example: His clothes were covered in dirt.

defTh: สกปรก, เลอะเทอะ
defEn: not clean
example: dirty hands/clothes/dishes

defTh: ความพิการ
defEn: a physical or mental condition that makes it difficult for somebody to do some things that most other people can do
example: a physical/developmental/intellectual disability

defTh: พิการ, ทุพพลภาพ
defEn: having a condition that makes it difficult for you to do some things that most other people can do
example: physically/developmentally/intellectually disabled

defTh: ข้อเสียเปรียบ
defEn: something that causes problems and tends to stop somebody/something from succeeding or making progress
example: a serious/severe/significant disadvantage

defTh: ไม่เห็นด้วย
defEn: if two people disagree or one person disagrees with another about something, they have a different opinion about it
example: Even friends disagree sometimes.

defTh: ความไม่เห็นด้วย
defEn: a situation where people have different opinions about something and often argue
example: disagreement (about/on/over/as to something), Disagreement arose about exactly how to plan the show.

defTh: หายไป, สาบสูญ
defEn: to become impossible to see
example: With that, Matt promptly disappeared.

defTh: ผิดหวัง, ทำให้ผิดหวัง
defEn: to make somebody feel sad because something that they hope for or expect to happen does not happen or is not as good as they hoped
example: disappoint (somebody), Her decision to cancel the concert is bound to disappoint her fans.

defTh: ผิดหวัง, เสียใจ
defEn: upset because something you hoped for has not happened or been as good, successful, etc. as you expected
example: The singer has promised to refund any disappointed fans.

defTh: น่าผิดหวัง
defEn: not as good, successful, etc. as you had hoped; making you feel disappointed
example: a disappointing result/performance/defeat

defTh: ความผิดหวัง
defEn: the feeling of being sad because something has not happened or been as good, successful, etc. as you expected or hoped
example: Book early for the show to avoid disappointment.

defTh: ภัยพิบัติ, หายนะ
defEn: an unexpected event, such as a very bad accident, a flood or a fire, that kills a lot of people or causes a lot of damage
example: the world's worst humanitarian disaster

defTh: หายนะ
defEn: very bad, harmful or unsuccessful
example: a disastrous harvest/fire/result

defTh: แผ่นกลม, จานกลม (สะกดแบบอังกฤษ)
defEn: a thin flat round object
example: He wears an identity disc around his neck.

defTh: โยนทิ้ง
defEn: to get rid of something that you no longer want or need
example: discard somebody/something, The room was littered with discarded newspapers.

defTh: ปล่อย
defEn: to give somebody official permission to leave the police or the armed forces; to make somebody leave the police or the armed forces
example: be discharged from something, He was discharged from the army following his injury.

defTh: วินัย, การฝึกฝน
defEn: the practice of training people to obey rules and orders and punishing them if they do not; the controlled behaviour or situation that is the result of this training
example: The school has a reputation for high standards of discipline.

defTh: เปิดเผย (ข้อมูล/ความลับ)
defEn: to give somebody information about something, especially something that was previously secret
example: disclose something (to somebody), The spokesman refused to disclose details of the takeover to the press.

defTh: การเปิดเผยความลับ, การเผยแพร่ข้อมูล
defEn: the act of making something known or public that was previously secret or private
example: the newspaper’s disclosure of defence secrets

defTh: ส่วนลด, ลดราคา
defEn: an amount of money that is taken off the usual cost of something
example: to get/offer a discount

defTh: ทำให้ท้อแท้, กีดกันไม่ให้ทำ
defEn: to try to prevent something or to prevent somebody from doing something, especially by making it difficult to do or by showing that you do not approve of it
example: discourage (doing) something, a campaign to discourage smoking among teenagers

defTh: วาทกรรม
defEn: a long and serious treatment or discussion of a subject in speech or writing
example: discourse on something, a discourse on issues of gender and sexuality

defTh: ค้นพบ, พบ
defEn: to be the first person to become aware that a particular place or thing exists
example: Cook is credited with discovering Hawaii.

defTh: การค้นพบ
defEn: an act or the process of finding somebody/something, or learning about something that was not known about before
example: Researchers in this field have made some important new discoveries.

defTh: ดุลยพินิจ
defEn: the freedom or power to decide what should be done in a particular situation
example: I'll leave it up to you to use your discretion.

defTh: การเลือกปฏิบัติ
defEn: the practice of treating somebody or a particular group in society less fairly than others
example: age/racial/gender/sex discrimination (= because of somebody’s age, race or sex)

defTh: อภิปราย, สนทนา
defEn: to talk about something with somebody, especially in order to decide something
example: discuss something with somebody, Have you discussed the problem with anyone?

defTh: การอภิปราย, การถกเถียง (เป็นทางการ)
defEn: a conversation about somebody/something; the process of discussing somebody/something
example: I discovered something interesting during a family discussion.

defTh: โรค, ความเจ็บป่วย
defEn: an illness affecting humans, animals or plants, often caused by infection
example: heart/lung/liver disease

defTh: จาน, อาหาร
defEn: a flat shallow container for cooking food in or serving it from
example: a baking/serving dish

defTh: ไม่ซื่อสัตย์
defEn: not honest; intending to trick people
example: Beware of dishonest traders in the tourist areas.

defTh: แผ่นดิสก์, จาน (สะกดแบบอเมริกัน)
defEn: a thin flat round object
example: Red blood cells are roughly the shape of a disk.

defTh: ไม่ชอบ, เกลียด
defEn: a feeling of not liking somebody/something
example: dislike of somebody/something, He did not try to hide his dislike of his boss.

defTh: เลิก, ปฏิเสธ
defEn: to decide that somebody/something is not important and not worth thinking or talking about
example: dismiss somebody/something, to dismiss a suggestion/a claim/an idea

defTh: การเลิกจ้าง
defEn: the act of dismissing somebody from their job; an example of this
example: He still hopes to win his claim against unfair dismissal.

defTh: ความผิดปกติ
defEn: a condition or illness that causes problems with the way part of the body or brain works
example: a blood/bowel disorder

defTh: แทนที่
defEn: to take the place of somebody/something
example: be displaced (by somebody/something), Gradually factory workers have been displaced by machines.

defTh: แสดง, การแสดง
defEn: an arrangement of things in a public place to inform or entertain people or advertise something for sale
example: a beautiful floral display

defTh: การกำจัด
defEn: the act of getting rid of something
example: The council is responsible for waste disposal and street cleaning.

defTh: กำจัด
defEn: to arrange things or people in a particular way or position
example: The visitors disposed themselves in a circle round the statue.

defTh: ข้อพิพาท
defEn: an argument between two people, groups or countries; discussion about a subject on which people disagree
example: industrial/pay disputes

defTh: ทำให้หยุดชะงัก, ก่อกวน
defEn: to make it difficult for something to continue in the normal way
example: Demonstrators succeeded in disrupting the meeting.

defTh: การหยุดชะงัก
defEn: a situation in which it is difficult for something to continue in the normal way; the act of stopping something from continuing in the normal way
example: We aim to help you move house with minimum disruption to yourself.

defTh: ละลาย, สลาย
defEn: to mix with a liquid and become part of it
example: Salt dissolves in water.

defTh: ระยะทาง, ความห่าง
defEn: the amount of space between two places or things
example: a short/long distance

defTh: ห่างไกล
defEn: far away in space or time
example: the distant sound of music

defTh: แตกต่างอย่างชัดเจน, แยกจากกันได้
defEn: easily or clearly heard, seen, felt, etc.
example: There was a distinct smell of gas.

defTh: ความแตกต่าง
defEn: a clear difference or contrast especially between people or things that are similar or related
example: distinctions between traditional and modern societies

defTh: ที่มีลักษณะเฉพาะ, ที่โดดเด่นไม่เหมือนใคร
defEn: having a quality or characteristic that makes something different and easily noticed
example: clothes with a distinctive style

defTh: แยกแยะ, จำแนก
defEn: to recognize the difference between two people or things
example: distinguish between A and B, At what age are children able to distinguish between right and wrong?

defTh: บิดเบือน
defEn: to change the shape, appearance or sound of something so that it is strange or not clear
example: a fairground mirror that distorts your shape

defTh: กวนใจ
defEn: to take somebody’s attention away from what they are trying to do
example: You're distracting me from my work.

defTh: ความทุกข์
defEn: a feeling of great worry or unhappiness; great mental pain
example: The newspaper article caused the actor considerable distress.

defTh: แจกจ่าย, กระจาย
defEn: to give things to a large number of people; to share something between a number of people
example: distribute something, The leaflets have been widely distributed.

defTh: การแจกจ่าย, การกระจาย
defEn: the way that something is spread or exists over a particular area or among a particular group of people
example: distribution of something, They studied the geographical distribution of the disease.

defTh: เขต, อำเภอ
defEn: an area of a country or town, especially one that has particular features
example: the City of London’s financial district

defTh: รบกวน, ก่อกวน
defEn: to interrupt somebody when they are trying to work, sleep, etc.
example: I'm sorry to disturb you, but can I talk to you for a moment?

defTh: รบกวน, น่ารำคาญ
defEn: making you feel anxious and upset or shocked
example: a disturbing piece of news

defTh: ดำน้ำ
defEn: a jump into deep water with your head first and your arms in front of you
example: a spectacular high dive (= from high above the water)

defTh: หลากหลาย
defEn: very different from each other and of various kinds
example: People from diverse cultures were invited to the event.

defTh: ความหลากหลาย
defEn: a range of many people or things that are very different from each other
example: the biological diversity of the rainforests

defTh: เบี่ยงเบนความสนใจ
defEn: to make somebody/something change direction
example: be diverted, The course of the stream has now been diverted.

defTh: แบ่ง
defEn: a difference between two groups of people or two things that separates them from each other
example: He offered advice on bridging cultural divides.

defTh: ที่เกี่ยวกับเทพเจ้า
defEn: coming from or connected with God or a god
example: divine law/love/will

defTh: การหาร, ส่วน
defEn: the process or result of dividing into separate parts; the process or result of dividing something or sharing it out
example: The organism begins as a single cell and grows by cell division.

defTh: การหย่าร้าง
defEn: the legal ending of a marriage
example: The marriage ended in divorce in 1996.

defTh: หย่าร้าง, ที่หย่า
defEn: no longer married because your marriage has been legally ended
example: My parents are divorced.

defTh: ทำ
defEn: used to refer to actions that you do not mention by name or do not know about
example: What are you doing this evening?

defTh: หมอ, แพทย์
defEn: a person who has been trained in medical science, whose job is to treat people who are ill or injured
example: You'd better see a doctor about that cough.

defTh: หลักคำสอน
defEn: a belief or set of beliefs held and taught by a Church, a political party, etc.
example: the doctrine of parliamentary sovereignty

defTh: เอกสาร, บันทึก
defEn: an official paper, book or electronic file that gives information about something, or that can be used as evidence or proof of something
example: Please read and sign the attached document.

defTh: สารคดี
defEn: a film or a radio or television programme giving facts about something
example: There were some interesting interviews in the documentary.

defTh: เอกสารประกอบ
defEn: the documents that are required for something, or that give evidence or proof of something
example: I couldn't enter the country because I didn't have all the necessary documentation.

defTh: สุนัข, หมา
defEn: an animal with four legs and a tail, often kept as a pet or trained for work, for example hunting or guarding buildings. There are many types of dog, some of which are wild.
example: I took the dog for a walk.

defTh: ดอลลาร์, เงิน
defEn: the unit of money in the US, Canada, Australia and several other countries
example: You will be paid in American dollars.

defTh: โดเมน
defEn: an area of knowledge or activity; especially one that somebody is responsible for
example: Financial matters are her domain.

defTh: ในประเทศ, บ้าน
defEn: of or inside a particular country; not foreign or international
example: domestic affairs/politics

defTh: การปกครอง
defEn: the fact of being more important, powerful or easy to notice than somebody/something else
example: political/economic dominance

defTh: ที่เด่น
defEn: more important, powerful or easy to notice than other things
example: The firm has achieved a dominant position in the world market.

defTh: ครอบงำ, มีอำนาจ
defEn: to control or have a lot of influence over somebody/something, especially in an unpleasant way
example: She always says a lot in meetings, but she doesn't dominate.

defTh: บริจาค
defEn: to give money, food, clothes, etc. to somebody/something, especially a charity
example: donate something to somebody/something, He donated thousands of pounds to charity.

defTh: การบริจาค
defEn: something that is given to a person or an organization such as a charity, in order to help them; the act of giving something in this way
example: a generous/large/small donation

defTh: ผู้บริจาค
defEn: a person or an organization that makes a gift of money, clothes, food, etc. to a charity, etc.
example: international aid donors (= countries that give money, etc. to help other countries)

defTh: ประตู
defEn: a piece of wood, glass, etc. that is opened and closed so that people can get in and out of a room, building, car, etc.; a similar thing in a cupboard
example: Open the door!

defTh: ปริมาณ
defEn: an amount of a medicine or a drug that is taken once, or regularly over a period of time
example: a high/low/lethal dose

defTh: จุด, แต้ม
defEn: a small round mark, especially one that is printed
example: There are dots above the letters i and j.

defTh: สองเท่า, คู่
defEn: twice as much or as many as usual
example: a double helping

defTh: ความไม่แน่ใจ
defEn: a feeling of being uncertain about something or not believing something
example: a feeling of doubt and uncertainty

defTh: ลง, ต่ำ, เสีย
defEn: to or at a lower place or position
example: She jumped down off the chair.

defTh: ดาวน์โหลด
defEn: data that is downloaded from another computer system
example: A staggering 99.8 % of digital music downloads are to mobile handsets.

defTh: ชั้นล่าง
defEn: on a floor of a house or building lower than the one you are on, especially the one at ground level
example: a downstairs bathroom

defTh: ตัวเมือง
defEn: in, towards or typical of the centre of a city, especially its main business area
example: a downtown store

defTh: ลงล่าง, ลงไป
defEn: towards the ground; towards a lower place or position
example: She was lying face downwards on the grass.

defTh: โหล, สิบสอง
defEn: a group of twelve of the same thing
example: Give me a dozen, please.

defTh: ฉบับร่าง, เกณฑ์ทหาร
defEn: a rough written version of something that is not yet in its final form
example: This is only the first draft of my speech.

defTh: ลาก, ดึง, น่าเบื่อ
defEn: to pull somebody/something along with effort and difficulty
example: drag somebody/something, The sack is too heavy to lift—you’ll have to drag it.

defTh: ท่อระบายน้ำ
defEn: to make something empty or dry by removing the liquid from it; to become empty or dry in this way
example: Drain and rinse the pasta.

defTh: ละคร, เรื่องน่าทึ่ง
defEn: a play for the theatre, television or radio
example: a costume/period/courtroom/crime drama

defTh: น่าทึ่ง, เกินจริง
defEn: sudden, very great and often surprising
example: a dramatic increase/change/improvement/shift

defTh: อย่างมากและรวดเร็ว
defEn: very suddenly and to a very great and often surprising degree
example: Prices have fallen dramatically.

defTh: วาด, ดึง, จับสลาก
defEn: to make pictures, or a picture of something, with a pencil, pen or chalk (but not paint)
example: You draw beautifully.

defTh: การวาดภาพ
defEn: a picture made using a pencil or pen rather than paint
example: a pencil/pen-and-ink/charcoal drawing

defTh: ฝัน, ความฝัน
defEn: a series of images, events and feelings that happen in your mind while you are asleep
example: I had a really weird dream last night.

defTh: ชุด, แต่งตัว
defEn: a piece of clothing that is made in one piece and hangs down to cover the body as far as the legs, sometimes reaching to below the knees, or to the ankles
example: a long white dress

defTh: แต่งตัว
defEn: wearing clothes and not naked or wearing clothes for sleeping
example: Hurry up and get dressed.

defTh: ดริฟท์
defEn: to move along smoothly and slowly in water or air
example: Clouds drifted across the sky.

defTh: ดื่ม, เครื่องดื่ม
defEn: a liquid for drinking; an amount of a liquid that you drink
example: Can I have a drink?

defTh: ขับ, ผลักดัน
defEn: a journey in a car or other vehicle
example: Let's go for a drive.

defTh: คนขับ, ไดรเวอร์
defEn: a person who drives a vehicle
example: a bus/train/taxi driver

defTh: การขับรถ
defEn: strong and powerful; having a strong influence in making something happen
example: Who was the driving force (= the person with the strongest influence) in the band?

defTh: หยด, ทิ้ง
defEn: a very small amount of liquid that forms a round shape
example: The first drops of rain fell.

defTh: ความแห้งแล้ง
defEn: a long period of time when there is little or no rain
example: Farmers are facing ruin after two years of severe drought.

defTh: จมน้ำตาย
defEn: to die because you have been underwater too long and you cannot breathe; to kill somebody by holding them underwater
example: Two children drowned after falling into the river.

defTh: ยา, สารเสพติด
defEn: an illegal substance that some people smoke, inject, etc. for the physical and mental effects it has
example: He does not smoke or take drugs.

defTh: กลอง, ตีกลอง
defEn: a musical instrument made of a hollow round frame with plastic or skin stretched tightly across one or both ends. You play it by hitting it with sticks or with your hands.
example: to play the drum

defTh: เมา
defEn: having drunk so much alcohol that it is impossible to think or speak clearly
example: They were clearly too drunk to drive.

defTh: แห้ง, ทำให้แห้ง
defEn: not wet or sticky; without water or moisture
example: Is my shirt dry yet?

defEn: having two parts or aspects
example: his dual role as composer and conductor

defTh: พากย์
defEn: to give somebody/something a particular name, often in a humorous or critical way
example: The media dubbed anorexia ‘the slimming disease’.

defTh: ครบกำหนด, เนื่องจาก
defEn: caused by somebody/something; because of somebody/something
example: The team's success was largely due to her efforts.

defTh: น่าเบื่อ, ทื่อ
defEn: not interesting or exciting
example: Life in a small town could be deadly dull.

defTh: โง่
defEn: stupid
example: That was a pretty dumb thing to do.

defTh: ทิ้ง, กอง
defEn: to get rid of something you do not want, especially in a place that is not suitable
example: Too much toxic waste is being dumped at sea.

defTh: คู่หู
defEn: two people who perform together or are often seen or thought of together
example: the comedy duo Laurel and Hardy

defTh: ระยะเวลา
defEn: the length of time that something lasts or continues
example: The school was used as a hospital for the duration of the war.

defTh: ระหว่าง, ในระหว่าง
defEn: all through a period of time
example: during the 1990s

defTh: ฝุ่น, ผง
defEn: a fine powder that consists of very small pieces of sand, earth, etc.
example: A cloud of dust rose as the truck drove off.

defTh: หน้าที่, ภาระ
defEn: something that you feel you have to do because it is your moral or legal responsibility
example: duty to do something, It is my duty to report it to the police.

defTh: ดีวีดี
defEn: a disk on which large amounts of information, especially films, photographs and video, can be stored, for use on a DVD player or computer (the abbreviation for ‘digital versatile disc’ or ‘digital videodisc’)
example: Let's just stay in and watch a DVD.

defTh: พลวัต
defEn: having a lot of energy and a strong personality
example: a dynamic leader

defTh: แต่ละ, แต่ละคน
defEn: used to refer to every one of two or more people or things, when you are thinking about them separately
example: Each answer is worth 20 points.

defTh: กระหาย, กระตือรือร้น (อยากได้)
defEn: very interested and excited by something that is going to happen or about something that you want to do; showing this
example: eager crowds outside the stadium

defTh: หู, การได้ยิน
defEn: either of the organs on the sides of the head that you hear with
example: the left/right ear

defTh: เช้า, เร็ว, ก่อน
defEn: near the beginning of a period of time, an event etc.
example: the early morning

defTh: หา, ได้รับ
defEn: to get money for work that you do
example: earn (something), He earns about $40000 a year.

defTh: รายได้จากการทำงานหรือลงทุน
defEn: the money that you earn for the work that you do
example: a rise in average earnings

defTh: โลก, ดิน
defEn: the world; the planet that we live on
example: the planet Earth

defTh: แผ่นดินไหว
defEn: a sudden, violent shaking of the earth’s surface
example: a devastating/massive/powerful earthquake

defTh: ความสะดวก, บรรเทา
defEn: lack of difficulty
example: with ease, He passed the exam with ease.

defTh: อย่างง่ายดาย
defEn: without problems or difficulty
example: The museum is easily accessible by car.

defTh: ทิศตะวันออก
defEn: in or towards the east
example: East Africa

defTh: ตะวันออก, ทางทิศตะวันออก
defEn: located in the east or facing east
example: eastern Spain

defTh: ง่าย, สบาย
defEn: not difficult; done or obtained without a lot of effort or problems
example: an easy way to make bread

defTh: กิน, ทาน
defEn: to put food in your mouth, bite it and swallow it
example: I was too nervous to eat.

defTh: เสียงสะท้อน
defEn: the reflecting of sound off a wall or inside a particular space so that a noise appears to be repeated; a sound that is reflected back in this way
example: There was an echo on the phone and I couldn't hear clearly.

defTh: นิเวศวิทยา
defEn: connected with the relation of plants and living creatures to each other and to their environment
example: We risk upsetting the ecological balance of the area.

defTh: เศรษฐกิจ, เชิงเศรษฐกิจ
defEn: connected with the trade, industry and development of wealth of a country, an area or a society
example: They discussed social, economic and political issues.

defTh: เศรษฐศาสตร์
defEn: the study of how a society organizes its money, trade and industry
example: He studied politics and economics at Yale.

defTh: นักเศรษฐศาสตร์
defEn: a person who studies or writes about economics
example: the World Bank's chief economist

defTh: เศรษฐกิจ, การประหยัด
defEn: the relationship between production, trade and the supply of money in a particular country or region
example: The economy is in recession.

defTh: ขอบ, ริม
defEn: the outside limit of an object, a surface or an area; the part furthest from the centre
example: I gripped the edge of my desk to steady myself.

defTh: แก้ไข (งานเขียน), ตัดต่อ
defEn: to prepare a piece of writing, a book, etc. to be published by correcting the mistakes, making improvements to it, etc.
example: edit (something), This draft text will need to be edited.

defTh: ฉบับ, รุ่น
defEn: the form in which a book, newspaper, etc. is published
example: a paperback/hardback edition

defTh: บรรณาธิการ
defEn: a person who is in charge of a newspaper, magazine, etc., or part of one, and who decides what should be included
example: the editor of the Washington Post

defTh: บทบรรณาธิการ
defEn: connected with the task of preparing something such as a newspaper, a book or a television or radio programme, to be published or broadcast
example: the magazine’s editorial staff

defTh: ให้การศึกษา
defEn: to teach somebody over a period of time at a school, university, etc.
example: be educated, She was educated in the US.

defTh: มีการศึกษา, ได้รับการศึกษา
defEn: having had the kind of education mentioned; having been to the school, college or university mentioned
example: privately educated children

defTh: การศึกษา, ศึกษา
defEn: a process of teaching, training and learning, especially in schools, colleges or universities, to improve knowledge and develop skills
example: primary/elementary education

defTh: ทางการศึกษา
defEn: connected with education
example: children with special educational needs

defTh: นักการศึกษา
defEn: a person whose job is to teach or educate people
example: adult educators (= who teach adults)

defTh: ผล, ผลกระทบ
defEn: a change that somebody/something causes in somebody/something else; a result
example: the beneficial effects of exercise

defTh: มีผล, ได้ผล, มีประสิทธิผล
defEn: producing the result that is wanted or intended; producing a successful result
example: Aspirin is a simple but highly effective treatment.

defTh: อย่างได้ผล
defEn: in a way that produces the intended result or a successful result
example: The company must reduce costs to compete effectively.

defTh: ประสิทธิผล
defEn: the fact of producing the result that is wanted or intended; the fact of producing a successful result
example: to check the effectiveness of the security system

defTh: ประสิทธิภาพ
defEn: the quality of doing something well with no waste of time or money
example: improvements in efficiency at the factory

defTh: มีประสิทธิภาพ (ประหยัดเวลา/ทรัพยากร)
defEn: doing something in a good, careful and complete way with no waste of time, money or energy
example: a highly efficient worker

defTh: อย่างคุ้มค่า
defEn: in a good and careful way, with no waste of time, money or energy
example: a very efficiently organized event

defTh: ความพยายาม, ความมานะ
defEn: an attempt to do something especially when it is difficult to do
example: The project was a team effort.

defTh: ไข่, ฟองไข่
defEn: a small oval object with a thin hard shell produced by a female bird and containing a young bird; a similar object (without a hard shell) produced by a female fish, insect, etc.
example: The female sits on the eggs until they hatch.

defTh: อาตมา
defEn: your sense of your own value and importance
example: He has the biggest ego of anyone I've ever met.

defTh: แปด, เลขแปด
สิบแปด
แปดสิบ
อย่างใดอย่างหนึ่ง
defEn: used after negative phrases to state that a feeling or situation is similar to one already mentioned
example: Pete can't go and I can't either.

defTh: ขยายความ
defEn: very complicated and detailed; carefully prepared and organized
example: elaborate designs

defTh: ข้อศอก
defEn: the joint between the upper and lower parts of the arm where it bends in the middle
example: She jabbed him with her elbow.

defTh: สูงอายุ, ชรา
defEn: used as a polite word for ‘old’
example: an elderly man/woman/lady

defTh: เลือกตั้ง, คัดเลือก
defEn: to choose somebody to do a particular job by voting for them
example: elect somebody/something, Voters will elect a new president on 30 March next year.

defTh: การเลือกตั้ง
defEn: the process of choosing a person or a group of people for a position, especially a political position, by voting
example: presidential/parliamentary/local elections

defTh: ที่เกี่ยวกับการเลือกตั้ง
defEn: connected with elections
example: electoral systems/reforms

defTh: ไฟฟ้า, เกี่ยวกับไฟฟ้า
defEn: connected with electricity; using, produced by or producing electricity
example: an electric car/vehicle

defTh: เกี่ยวกับไฟฟ้า
defEn: connected with electricity; using or producing electricity
example: an electrical fault in the engine

defTh: ไฟฟ้า, กระแสไฟฟ้า
defEn: a form of energy from charged elementary particles, usually supplied as electric current through cables, wires, etc. for lighting, heating, driving machines, etc.
example: materials that conduct electricity

defTh: ที่เป็นอิเล็กทรอนิกส์
defEn: having or using many small parts, such as microchips, that control and direct a small electric current
example: Airline passengers no longer have to turn off all electronic devices while on the plane.

defTh: วิชาอิเล็กทรอนิกส์
defEn: the branch of science and technology that studies electric currents in electronic equipment
example: the electronics industry

defTh: สง่างาม, หรูหรา
defEn: attractive and showing a good sense of style
example: She was tall and elegant.

defTh: ธาตุ, องค์ประกอบ
defEn: a necessary or typical part of something; one of several parts that something contains
example: There are three important elements to consider.

defTh: ระดับประถมศึกษา
defEn: in or connected with the first stages of a course of study
example: an elementary English course

defTh: ช้าง
defEn: a very large animal with thick grey skin, large ears, two curved outer teeth called tusks and a long nose called a trunk. There are two types of elephant, the African and the Asian.
example: herds of elephants

defTh: ยกขึ้น, เลื่อนตำแหน่ง, ยกระดับให้สูงขึ้น
defEn: to give somebody/something a higher position or rank, often more important than they deserve
example: elevate somebody/something (to something), He elevated many of his friends to powerful positions within the government.

defTh: สิบเอ็ด
example: There are only eleven of these rare animals left.

defTh: มีสิทธิ์
defEn: a person who is eligible for something or to do something, is able to have or do it because they have the right qualifications, are the right age, etc.
example: eligible (for something), Only those over 70 are eligible for the special payment.

defTh: กำจัด
defEn: to remove or get rid of something
example: eliminate something, Credit cards eliminate the need to carry a lot of cash.

defTh: ผู้ลากมากดี
defEn: a small group of people in a society, etc. who are powerful and have a lot of influence, because they are rich, intelligent, etc.
example: a member of the ruling/intellectual elite

defTh: อื่น, มิฉะนั้น
defEn: in addition to something already mentioned
example: What else did he say?

defTh: ที่อื่น, แห่งอื่น
defEn: in, at or to another place or other places
example: Dissatisfied customers will look elsewhere.

defTh: อีเมล, จดหมายอิเล็กทรอนิกส์
defEn: a way of sending messages and data to other people by means of computers connected together in a network
example: I will be on vacation for a week in November, with no access to email.

defTh: เริ่มดำเนินการ
defEn: to get onto a ship or plane; to put somebody/something onto a ship or plane
example: We stood on the pier and watched as they embarked.

defTh: อับอาย, กระดาก
defEn: shy, uncomfortable or ashamed, especially in a social situation
example: I've never felt so embarrassed in my life!

defTh: น่าอาย, กระอาย
defEn: making you feel shy, uncomfortable or ashamed
example: an embarrassing moment/situation

defTh: ความอับอาย
defEn: shy, uncomfortable or guilty feelings; a feeling of being embarrassed
example: I nearly died of embarrassment when he said that.

defTh: สถานทูต
defEn: a group of officials led by an ambassador who represent their government in a foreign country
example: embassy officials

defTh: ฝัง
defEn: to fix something in a substance or solid object
example: be embedded in something, an operation to remove glass that was embedded in his leg

defTh: เป็นตัวแทนของ, รวบรวมคุณสมบัติไว้ใน
defEn: to express or represent an idea or a quality
example: embody something, a politician who embodied the hopes of black youth

defTh: โอบกอด
defEn: to put your arms around somebody as a sign of love or friendship
example: They embraced and promised to keep in touch.

defTh: ปรากฏ, โผล่
defEn: to move out of or away from something and become possible to see
example: The crabs emerge at low tide to look for food.

defTh: การเกิดขึ้น
defEn: the fact of somebody/something moving out of or away from something and becoming possible to see
example: the island’s emergence from the sea 3000 years ago

defTh: เหตุฉุกเฉิน
defEn: a sudden serious and dangerous event or situation that needs immediate action to deal with it
example: This is a medical emergency needing urgent treatment with antibiotics.

defTh: การปล่อยก๊าซเรือนกระจก
defEn: the production or sending out of light, heat, gas, etc.
example: the emission of carbon dioxide into the atmosphere

defTh: อารมณ์ความรู้สึก
defEn: a strong feeling such as love, fear or anger; the part of a person’s character that consists of feelings
example: to show/express your emotions

defTh: เกี่ยวกับอารมณ์
defEn: connected with people’s feelings (= with the emotions)
example: emotional problems/stress

defTh: ทางอารมณ์
defEn: in a way that is connected with people's feelings (= with the emotions)
example: emotionally disturbed children

defTh: เน้น, ความสำคัญ
defEn: special importance that is given to something
example: emphasis on/upon something, Since the elections there has been a greater emphasis on education.

defTh: เน้น, ย้ำ
defEn: to give special importance to something
example: emphasize something, His speech emphasized the importance of attracting industry to the town.

defTh: จักรวรรดิ, อาณาจักร
defEn: a group of countries or states that are controlled by one leader or government
example: These invasions almost led to the collapse of the Roman Empire.

defTh: เชิงประจักษ์
defEn: based on experiments or experience rather than ideas or theories
example: empirical evidence/knowledge/research

defTh: ว่าจ้าง
defEn: to give somebody a job to do for payment
example: employ somebody, How many people does the company employ?

defTh: ลูกจ้าง, พนักงาน
defEn: a person who is paid to work for somebody
example: The firm has over 500 employees.

defTh: นายจ้าง
defEn: a person or company that pays people to work for them
example: They're very good employers (= they treat the people that work for them well).

defTh: การจ้างงาน
defEn: work, especially when it is done to earn money; the state of being employed
example: full-time/part-time employment

defTh: ให้อำนาจ
defEn: to give somebody the power or authority to do something
example: be empowered (to do something), The courts were empowered to impose the death sentence for certain crimes.

defTh: ว่างเปล่า, ว่าง
defEn: with no people or things inside
example: an empty box/glass/bottle

defTh: ทำให้สามารถ
defEn: to make it possible for somebody/something to do something
example: This new programme will enable older people to study at college.

defTh: ออกกฎหมาย
defEn: to pass a law
example: (be) enacted (by somebody/something), legislation enacted by parliament

defTh: ห้อมล้อม
defEn: to include a large number or range of things
example: The job encompasses a wide range of responsibilities.

defTh: เผชิญหน้า, พบ
defEn: a meeting, especially one that is sudden, unexpected or violent
example: a chance encounter

defTh: ให้กำลังใจ, สนับสนุน
defEn: to give somebody support, courage or hope
example: encourage somebody, We were greatly encouraged by the positive response of the public.

defTh: กำลังใจ, สนับสนุน
defEn: the act of encouraging somebody to do something; something that encourages somebody
example: a few words of encouragement

defTh: ที่เป็นการให้กำลังใจ, ที่น่าสนับสนุน
defEn: that gives somebody support, courage or hope
example: This month's unemployment figures are not very encouraging.

defTh: จบ, สิ้นสุด
defEn: the final part of a period of time, an event, an activity or a story
example: It's the end of an era.

defTh: พยายาม
defEn: an attempt to do something, especially something new or difficult
example: There have been great advances in the field of scientific endeavour.

defTh: ตอนจบ, การสิ้นสุด
defEn: the last part of a story, film, etc.
example: His stories usually have a happy ending.

defTh: ไม่มีที่สิ้นสุด
defEn: very large in size or amount and seeming to have no end
example: endless patience

defTh: รับรอง
defEn: to say publicly that you support a person, statement or course of action
example: I wholeheartedly endorse his remarks.

defTh: การรับรอง
defEn: a public statement or action showing that you support somebody/something
example: The election victory is a clear endorsement of their policies.

defTh: อดทน
defEn: to experience and deal with something that is painful or unpleasant without giving up
example: endure something, They had to endure a long wait before the case came to trial.

defTh: ศัตรู, ข้าศึก
defEn: a person who hates somebody or who acts or speaks against somebody/something
example: She didn't have an enemy in the world.

defTh: พลังงาน, กำลัง
defEn: the strength, effort and enthusiasm required for physical or mental activity, work, etc.
example: It's a waste of time and energy.

defTh: บังคับใช้
defEn: to make sure that people obey a particular law or rule
example: enforce something, It's the job of the police to enforce the law.

defTh: การบังคับใช้
defEn: the act of making people obey a particular law or rule
example: strict enforcement of regulations

defTh: มีส่วนร่วม, ผูกมัด
defEn: to succeed in attracting and keeping somebody’s attention and interest
example: It is a movie that engages both the mind and the eye.

defTh: หมั้น, ยุ่ง
defEn: having agreed to marry somebody
example: When did you get engaged?

defTh: การว่าจ้าง
defEn: an agreement to marry somebody; the period during which two people are engaged
example: Their engagement was announced in the local paper.

defTh: มีส่วนร่วม
defEn: interesting or pleasant in a way that attracts your attention
example: an engaging smile

defTh: เครื่องยนต์, จักร
defEn: the part of a vehicle that produces power to make the vehicle move
example: a diesel/petrol engine

defTh: วิศวกร, ออกแบบ
defEn: a person whose job involves designing and building engines, machines, roads, bridges, etc.
example: We worked with a team of scientists and engineers.

defTh: วิศวกรรม
defEn: the activity of applying scientific knowledge to the design, building and control of machines, roads, bridges, electrical equipment, etc.
example: The bridge is a triumph of modern engineering.

defTh: เพิ่มพูน, ทำให้ดีขึ้น, เสริมสร้าง
defEn: to increase or further improve the good quality, value or status of somebody/something
example: This is an opportunity to enhance the reputation of the company.

defTh: สนุก, เพลิดเพลิน
defEn: to get pleasure from something
example: enjoy something, We thoroughly enjoyed our time in New York.

defTh: น่าสนุก, เพลิดเพลิน
defEn: giving pleasure
example: an enjoyable weekend/experience

defTh: มหึมา, ใหญ่โตมโหฬาร
defEn: extremely large
example: an enormous house/dog

defTh: พอ, เพียงพอ
defEn: to the necessary degree
example: I hadn't trained enough for the game.

defTh: สอบถาม
defEn: to ask somebody for some information
example: enquire about somebody/something, I called the station to enquire about train times.

defTh: การสอบถาม
defEn: an official process to find out the cause of something or to find out information about something
example: a murder enquiry

defTh: เสริมคุณค่า, ทำให้ร่ำรวยขึ้น
defEn: to improve the quality of something, often by adding something to it
example: The study of science has enriched all our lives.

defTh: ลงทะเบียนเรียน
defEn: to arrange for yourself or for somebody else to officially join a course, school, etc.
example: You need to enrol before the end of August.

defTh: ตามมา
defEn: to happen after or as a result of another event
example: An argument ensued.

defTh: ทำให้แน่ใจ
defEn: to make sure that something happens or is definite
example: ensure something, We are working to ensure the safety of people in the city.

defTh: เข้า, ใส่, เริ่ม
defEn: to come or go into something
example: Knock before you enter.

defTh: องค์กรธุรกิจ
defEn: a company or business
example: He is in charge of an enterprise with a turnover of $26 billion.

defTh: ให้ความบันเทิง
defEn: to interest somebody or make somebody laugh in order to please them
example: The aim of the series is both to entertain and inform.

defTh: สนุกสนาน, บันเทิง
defEn: that you enjoy watching, listening to, doing or experiencing
example: an entertaining speech/evening

defTh: ความบันเทิง
defEn: films, music, etc. used to entertain people; an example of this
example: radio, television and other forms of entertainment

defTh: ความกระตือรือร้น
defEn: a strong feeling of excitement and interest in something and a desire to become involved in it
example: Her voice was full of enthusiasm.

defTh: ผู้ที่กระตือรือร้น
defEn: a person who is very interested in something and spends a lot of time doing it
example: a football enthusiast

defTh: กระตือรือร้น, ที่แสดงความสนใจอย่างแรงกล้า
defEn: feeling or showing a lot of excitement and interest about somebody/something
example: an enthusiastic supporter

defTh: ทั้งหมด
defEn: including everything, everyone or every part
example: The entire village was destroyed.

defTh: อย่างสิ้นเชิง
defEn: in every way possible; completely
example: The experience was entirely new to me.

defTh: ให้สิทธิ์, ตั้งชื่อ
defEn: to give somebody the right to have or to do something
example: be entitled to something, You will be entitled to your pension when you reach 65.

defTh: เอนทิตี
defEn: something that exists separately from other things and has its own identity
example: The unit has become part of a larger department and no longer exists as a separate entity.

defTh: ทางเข้า
defEn: a door, gate, passage, etc. used for entering a room, building or place
example: the front/back/side entrance of the house

defTh: ผู้ประกอบการ
defEn: a person who makes money by starting or running businesses, especially when this involves taking financial risks
example: A creative entrepreneur, he was continually dreaming up new projects.

defTh: ทางเข้า, รายการ
defEn: an act of going into or getting into a place
example: She made her entry to the sound of thunderous applause.

defTh: ซองจดหมาย
