defEn: a flat paper container used for sending letters in, with a part that you stick down to close it
example: Writing paper and envelopes are provided in your room.

defTh: สิ่งแวดล้อม
defEn: the natural world in which people, animals and plants live
example: The government should do more to protect the environment.

defTh: ที่เกี่ยวกับสิ่งแวดล้อม
defEn: connected with the natural conditions in which people, animals and plants live; connected with the environment
example: the environmental impact of pollution

defTh: โรคระบาด, ภาวะระบาด
defEn: a large number of cases of a particular disease or medical condition happening at the same time in a particular community
example: the outbreak of a flu epidemic

defTh: ตอน
defEn: one part of a story that is broadcast on television or radio in several parts
example: The next episode has not yet been filmed.

defTh: เท่ากัน, เสมอ
defEn: the same in size, quantity, value, etc. as something else
example: There is an equal number of boys and girls in the class.

defTh: ความเท่าเทียมกัน
defEn: the fact of being equal in rights, status, advantages, etc.
example: racial/social/gender equality

defTh: อย่างเท่าเทียมกัน
defEn: to the same degree; in the same or in a similar way
example: Diet and exercise are equally important.

defTh: สมการ
defEn: a statement showing that two amounts or values are equal, for example 2x+y = 54
example: the numbers on the right-hand side of the equation

defTh: จัดเตรียมอุปกรณ์
defEn: to provide yourself/somebody/something with the things that are needed for a particular purpose or activity
example: equip something, to be fully/poorly equipped

defTh: เครื่องมือเครื่องใช้
defEn: the things that are needed for a particular purpose or activity
example: a useful piece of equipment for the kitchen

defTh: เทียบเท่า, เหมือนกัน
defEn: equal in value, amount, meaning, importance, etc.
example: 250 grams or an equivalent amount in ounces

defTh: ยุค
defEn: a period of time, usually in history, that is different from other periods because of particular characteristics or events
example: the Victorian/modern/post-war era

defTh: ตั้งตรง
defEn: to build something
example: The church was erected in 1582.

defTh: ความคลาดเคลื่อน, ข้อผิดพลาด (ทางเทคนิค/สถิติ)
defEn: a mistake, especially one that causes problems or affects the result of something
example: spelling/typographical/grammatical errors

defTh: ปะทุ
defEn: when a volcano erupts or burning rocks, smoke, etc. erupt or are erupted, the burning rocks, etc. are thrown out from the volcano
example: The volcano could erupt at any time.

defTh: บานปลาย
defEn: to become greater, worse, more serious, etc.; to make something greater, worse, more serious, etc.
example: the escalating costs of healthcare

defTh: หนี, หลบหนี
defEn: the act or a method of escaping from a place or an unpleasant or dangerous situation
example: I had a narrow escape (= I was lucky to have escaped).

defTh: โดยเฉพาะอย่างยิ่ง
defEn: more with one person, thing, etc. than with others, or more in particular circumstances than in others
example: Teenagers are very fashion conscious, especially girls.

defTh: เรียงความ, บทความ
defEn: a short piece of writing by a student as part of a course of study
example: I have to write an essay this weekend.

defTh: สาระสำคัญ
defEn: the most important quality or feature of something, that makes it what it is
example: His paintings capture the essence of France.

defTh: ที่ขาดไม่ได้
defEn: completely necessary; extremely important in a particular situation or for a particular activity
example: an essential part/feature of something

defTh: โดยเนื้อแท้, โดยสำคัญ
defEn: when you think about the true, important or basic nature of somebody/something
example: There are three essentially different ways of tackling the problem.

defTh: ก่อตั้ง, สร้าง
defEn: to start or create an organization, a system, etc. that is meant to last for a long time
example: The committee was established in 1912.

defTh: สถานประกอบการ
defEn: an organization, a large institution or a hotel
example: The visa is for foreign nationals wishing to study at a university, college or similar educational establishment.

defTh: ที่ดิน, มรดก
defEn: an area of land with a lot of houses or factories of the same type on it
example: on an estate, She lives in a tower block on an estate in London.

defTh: ประมาณ, ประเมิน
defEn: a judgement that you make without having the exact details or figures about the size, amount, cost, etc. of something
example: to provide/obtain an estimate

defTh: นิรันดร์
defEn: without an end; existing or continuing forever
example: the promise of eternal life in heaven

defTh: จริยธรรม
defEn: moral principles that control or influence a person’s behaviour
example: professional/business/medical ethics

defTh: มีจริยธรรม
defEn: connected with beliefs and principles about what is right and wrong
example: ethical issues/standards/questions/dilemmas

defTh: ชาติพันธุ์
defEn: connected with or belonging to a group of people that share a cultural tradition
example: ethnic background/origin

defTh: เงินยูโร
defEn: the unit of money of some countries of the European Union
example: I paid five euros for it.

defTh: อพยพ
defEn: to move people from a place of danger to a safer place
example: evacuate something, Police evacuated nearby buildings.

defTh: ประเมินผล, ประเมินคุณภาพ
defEn: to form an opinion of the amount, value or quality of something after thinking about it carefully
example: evaluate something, The trial will evaluate the effectiveness of the different drugs.

defTh: การประเมินค่า, การวัดผล
defEn: the act of forming an opinion of the amount, value or quality of something after thinking about it carefully
example: an evaluation of the healthcare system

defTh: คู่, แม้แต่, สม่ำเสมอ
defEn: that can be divided exactly by two
example: 4, 6, 8 and 10 are all even numbers.

defTh: ตอนเย็น
defEn: the part of the day between the afternoon and the time you go to bed
example: Remember to call me this evening.

defTh: เหตุการณ์, งาน
defEn: a thing that happens, especially something important
example: recent/current/world events

defTh: ในที่สุด (หลังจากใช้เวลานาน), ผลสุดท้าย
defEn: at the end of a period of time or a series of events
example: Our flight eventually left five hours late.

defTh: เคย, ตลอดไป
defEn: used in negative sentences and questions, or sentences with if to mean ‘at any time’
example: Nothing ever happens here.

defTh: ทุก, แต่ละ
defEn: used with singular nouns to refer to all the members of a group of things or people
example: She knows every student in the school.

defTh: ทุกๆ คน
defEn: every person; all people
example: Everybody knows Tom.

defTh: ทุกวัน
defEn: used or happening every day or regularly; ordinary
example: Change is a part of everyday life in business.

defTh: ทุกคน
defEn: every person; all people
example: Everyone cheered and clapped.

defTh: ทุกสิ่ง
defEn: all things
example: Everything had gone.

defTh: ทุกหนทุกแห่ง
defEn: in, to or at every place; all places
example: I've looked everywhere.

defTh: หลักฐาน, พยาน
defEn: the facts, signs or objects that make you believe that something is true
example: evidence (of something), Researchers have found clear scientific evidence of a link between exposure to sun and skin cancer.

defTh: เป็นที่ประจักษ์
defEn: clear; easily seen
example: The orchestra played with evident enjoyment.

defTh: ชั่วร้าย, เลว
defEn: enjoying harming others; morally bad and cruel
example: Police described the killer as ‘a desperate and evil man’.

defTh: ทำให้เกิด
defEn: to bring a feeling, a memory or an image into your mind
example: The music evoked memories of her youth.

defTh: วิวัฒนาการ (การเปลี่ยนแปลง)
defEn: the slow steady development of plants, animals, etc. during the history of the earth, as they adapt to changes in their environment
example: the evolution of the human species

defTh: ทางวิวัฒนาการ
defEn: connected with evolution; connected with slow steady development and change
example: evolutionary theory

defTh: พัฒนาขึ้นอย่างช้าๆ
defEn: to develop gradually, especially from a simple to a more complicated form; to develop something in this way
example: evolve (from something) (into something), The idea evolved from a drawing I discovered in the attic.

defTh: แน่นอน, แม่นยำ
defEn: correct in every detail
example: The new palace is an exact replica of the original building.

defTh: แน่นอน, อย่างแม่นยำ
defEn: used to emphasize that something is correct in every way or in every detail
example: It's exactly nine o'clock.

defTh: พูดเกินจริง
defEn: to make something seem larger, better, worse or more important than it really is
example: The hotel was really filthy and I'm not exaggerating.

defTh: การสอบ, ข้อสอบ
defEn: a formal written, spoken or practical test, especially at school or college, to see how much you know about a subject, or what you can do
example: to take an exam

defTh: การสอบ, การตรวจสอบ
defEn: a formal written, spoken or practical test, especially at school or college, to see how much you know about a subject, or what you can do
example: successful candidates in GCSE examinations

defTh: ตรวจสอบ, พิจารณา
defEn: to consider or study an idea, a subject, etc. very carefully
example: examine something, This study sets out to examine in detail the possible effects of climate change.

defTh: ตัวอย่าง, แบบอย่าง
defEn: something such as an object, a fact or a situation that shows, explains or supports what you say
example: Let me give you an example.

defTh: เกิน
defEn: to be greater than a particular number or amount
example: The price will not exceed £100.

defTh: ความเป็นเลิศ
defEn: the quality of being extremely good
example: a reputation for academic excellence

defTh: ดีเลิศ, ยอดเยี่ยม
defEn: extremely good
example: an excellent book/article

defTh: ยกเว้น, นอกจาก
defEn: used before you mention something that makes a statement not completely true
example: I didn't tell him anything except that I needed the money.

defTh: ข้อยกเว้น, ข้อแตกต่าง
defEn: a person or thing that is not included in a general statement
example: Most of the buildings in the town are modern, but the church is an exception.

defTh: ยอดเยี่ยม, โดดเด่นเป็นพิเศษ
defEn: unusually good
example: At the age of five he showed exceptional talent as a musician.

defTh: ที่เกินความจำเป็น
defEn: in addition to an amount that is necessary, usual or legal
example: Excess food is stored as fat.

defTh: มากเกินไป
defEn: greater than what seems reasonable or appropriate
example: They complained about the excessive noise coming from the upstairs flat.

defTh: แลกเปลี่ยน, แลก
defEn: an act of giving something to somebody or doing something for somebody and receiving something in return
example: The exchange of prisoners took place this morning.

defTh: ตื่นเต้น, ดีใจ
defEn: feeling or showing happiness and enthusiasm
example: Staff got excited when they heard they were getting a bonus.

defTh: ความตื่นเต้น
defEn: the state of feeling or showing happiness and enthusiasm
example: The news caused great excitement among her friends.

defTh: น่าตื่นเต้น
defEn: causing great interest or excitement
example: This is an exciting opportunity for me.

defTh: กีดกัน, ยกเว้น
defEn: to deliberately not include something in what you are doing or considering
example: The cost of borrowing has been excluded from the inflation figures.

defTh: การยกเว้น
defEn: the act of preventing somebody/something from entering a place or taking part in something
example: exclusion (of somebody/something) (from something), He was disappointed with his exclusion from the England squad.

defTh: เฉพาะบุคคลหรือกลุ่ม, ซึ่งกีดกันผู้อื่น
defEn: only to be used by one particular person or group; only given to one particular person or group
example: The hotel has exclusive access to the beach.

defTh: โดยเฉพาะเจาะจง, แต่เพียงผู้เดียว
defEn: for only one particular person, group or use
example: The resort caters almost exclusively for a high-society public.

defTh: ข้อแก้ตัว, ยกโทษ
defEn: a reason, either true or invented, that you give to explain or defend your behaviour
example: Late again! What's your excuse this time?

defTh: ปฏิบัติการ
defEn: to kill somebody, especially as a legal punishment
example: be executed (for something), He was executed for treason.

defTh: การประหารชีวิต, การบังคับใช้ (กฎหมาย)
defEn: the act of killing somebody, especially as a legal punishment
example: He faced execution by hanging for murder.

defTh: ผู้บริหาร, กรรมการ
defEn: connected with managing a business or an organization, and with making plans and decisions
example: She has an executive position in a finance company.

defTh: ออกกำลังกาย, ฝึกฝน
defEn: physical or mental activity that you do to stay healthy or become stronger
example: Swimming is good exercise.

defTh: ออกแรง
defEn: to use power or influence to affect somebody/something
example: He exerted all his authority to make them accept the plan.

defTh: แสดง, นิทรรศการ
defEn: an object or a collection of objects put in a public place, for example a museum, so that people can see it
example: The museum contains some interesting exhibits on Spanish rural life.

defTh: นิทรรศการ
defEn: a collection of things, for example works of art, that are shown to the public
example: Have you seen the Picasso exhibition?

defTh: เนรเทศ
defEn: the state of being sent to live in another country that is not your own, especially for political reasons or as a punishment
example: a place of exile

defTh: มีอยู่, ดำรงอยู่
defEn: to be real; to be present in a place or situation
example: Does life exist on other planets?

defTh: การดำรงอยู่
defEn: the state or fact of being real or living or of being present
example: I was unaware of his existence until today.

defTh: ทางออก, ออก
defEn: a way out of a public building or vehicle
example: Where's the exit?

defTh: แปลกใหม่
defEn: from or in another country, especially a tropical one; seeming exciting and unusual because it seems to be connected with foreign countries
example: brightly-coloured exotic flowers/plants/birds

defTh: ขยาย, แผ่
defEn: to become greater in size, number or importance; to make something greater in size, number or importance
example: Metals expand when they are heated.

defTh: การขยายตัว
defEn: an act of increasing or making something increase in size, amount or importance
example: a period of rapid economic expansion

defTh: คาดหวัง, หวัง
defEn: to think or believe that something will happen or that somebody will do something
example: expect something, The company is expecting record sales this year.

defTh: ความคาดหวัง
defEn: a belief that something will happen because it is likely
example: expectation of something, We are confident in our expectation of a full recovery.

defTh: คาดหวัง, ที่คาดไว้
defEn: that you think will happen
example: Double the expected number of people came to the meeting.

defTh: การเดินทางสำรวจ, คณะสำรวจ
defEn: an organized journey with a particular purpose, especially to find out about a place that is not well known
example: to plan/lead/go on an expedition

defTh: รายจ่าย
defEn: the act of spending or using money; an amount of money spent
example: a reduction in public/government/military expenditure

defTh: ค่าใช้จ่าย
defEn: the money that you spend on something
example: The garden was transformed at great expense.

defTh: แพง, ราคาแพง
defEn: costing a lot of money
example: an expensive car/restaurant/holiday

defTh: ประสบการณ์, พบเจอ
defEn: the knowledge and skill that you have gained through doing something for a period of time; the process of gaining this
example: My lack of practical experience was a disadvantage.

defTh: มีประสบการณ์
defEn: having knowledge or skill in a particular job or activity
example: an experienced player/teacher

defTh: การทดลอง, ทดลอง
defEn: a scientific test that is done in order to study what happens and to gain new knowledge
example: to do/perform/conduct an experiment

defTh: ทดลอง
defEn: based on new ideas, forms or methods that are used to find out what effect they have
example: The school's experimental teaching methods include letting the children decide what to study.

defTh: ที่เชี่ยวชาญ, ที่ชำนาญ
defEn: done with, having or involving great knowledge or skill
example: to seek expert advice

defTh: ความเชี่ยวชาญ
defEn: expert knowledge or skill in a particular subject, activity or job
example: professional/scientific/technical, etc. expertise

defTh: หมดอายุ
defEn: to be no longer legally acceptable because the period of time for which it could be used has ended
example: When does your driving licence expire?

defTh: อธิบาย, ชี้แจง
defEn: to tell somebody about something in a way that makes it easy to understand
example: explain (something), He was trying to explain the difference between hip hop and rap.

defTh: คำอธิบาย
defEn: a statement, fact, or situation that tells you why something happened; a reason given for something
example: The most likely explanation is that his plane was delayed.

defTh: ชัดแจ้ง
defEn: clear and easy to understand, so that you have no doubt what is meant
example: He gave me very explicit directions on how to get there.

defTh: อย่างโจ่งแจ้ง
defEn: clearly or directly, so that the meaning is easy to understand
example: The report states explicitly that the system was to blame.

defTh: ระเบิด, ปะทุ (ด้วยแรงดัน)
defEn: to burst (= break apart) or make something burst loudly and violently, causing damage
example: A second bomb exploded in a crowded market.

defTh: หาประโยชน์
defEn: to treat a person or situation as an opportunity to gain an advantage for yourself
example: He exploited his father's name to get himself a job.

defTh: การแสวงหาผลประโยชน์
defEn: a situation in which somebody treats somebody else in an unfair way, especially in order to make money from their work
example: the exploitation of children

defTh: การสำรวจ
defEn: the act of travelling through a place in order to find out about it or look for something in it
example: Budgets for space exploration have been cut back.

defTh: สำรวจ, ค้นหา
defEn: to travel to or around an area or a country in order to learn about it
example: As soon as we arrived on the island we were eager to explore.

defTh: การระเบิด, ระเบิด
defEn: the sudden violent bursting and loud noise of something such as a bomb exploding; the act of deliberately causing something to explode
example: a bomb/nuclear/gas explosion

defTh: ที่พร้อมจะระเบิด, รุนแรง
defEn: easily able or likely to explode
example: an explosive device (= a bomb)

defTh: ส่งออก, สินค้าออก
defEn: the selling and transporting of goods to another country
example: a ban on the export of live cattle

defTh: เปิดเผย, แฉ
defEn: to show something that is usually hidden
example: expose something, He smiled suddenly, exposing a set of amazingly white teeth.

defTh: การรับสัมผัสเชื้อ
defEn: the state of being in a place or situation where there is no protection from something harmful or unpleasant
example: prolonged exposure to harmful radiation

defTh: แสดง, ด่วน
defEn: to show or make known a feeling, an opinion, etc. by words, looks or actions
example: express something, Teachers have expressed concern about the changes.

defTh: การแสดงออก, นิพจน์
defEn: a word or phrase
example: What's the meaning of the expression ‘on cloud nine’?

defTh: ขยาย, ยืด
defEn: to make something longer or larger
example: to extend a fence/road/house

defTh: การขยาย, ส่วนต่อ
defEn: the act of increasing the area of activity, group of people, etc. that is affected by something
example: the extension of new technology into developing countries

defTh: กว้างขวาง, มากมาย
defEn: covering a large area; great in amount
example: The house has extensive grounds.

defTh: อย่างครอบคลุม
defEn: in a way that covers a large area
example: She has travelled extensively.

defTh: ขอบเขต, ขนาด
defEn: how large, important, serious, etc. something is
example: It is difficult to assess the full extent of the damage.

defTh: ภายนอก
defEn: connected with or located on the outside of something/somebody
example: the external walls of the building

defTh: พิเศษ, เพิ่มเติม
defEn: more than is usual, expected, or than exists already

defTh: สารสกัด

defTh: พิเศษ, วิสามัญ

defTh: อย่างยิ่ง, มาก

defTh: ตา, มอง

defTh: ผ้า

defTh: เลิศ

defTh: ใบหน้า, เผชิญหน้า

defTh: อำนวยความสะดวก
defEn: to make an action or a process possible or easier

defTh: สิ่งอำนวยความสะดวก

defTh: ข้อเท็จจริง, ความจริง

defTh: ฝ่าย

defTh: ปัจจัย, ตัวประกอบ
defEn: one of several things that cause or influence something

defTh: โรงงาน, โรงผลิต

defTh: คณะ

defTh: จางหายไป

defTh: ล้มเหลว

defTh: ความล้มเหลว

defTh: พอสมควร

defTh: ความเป็นธรรม

defTh: ศรัทธา, ความเชื่อ

defTh: ปลอม, ของเทียม
defEn: not what somebody claims it is; appearing to be something it is not

defTh: ฤดูใบไม้ร่วง, ตก

defTh: เท็จ, ไม่จริง
defEn: wrong; not correct or true

defTh: ชื่อเสียง, ความโด่งดัง

defTh: คุ้นเคย, สนิทสนม

defTh: ครอบครัว, ตระกูล
defEn: connected with the family or a particular family

defTh: มีชื่อเสียง, เป็นที่รู้จักโดยทั่วไป
defEn: known about by many people

defTh: พัดลม, แฟน
defEn: a person who admires somebody/something or enjoys watching or listening to somebody/something very much

defTh: หรูหรา, ชอบ

defTh: มหัศจรรย์
defEn: extremely good; excellent

defTh: ไกล, ห่างไกล

defTh: ค่าโดยสาร

defTh: การทำฟาร์ม, เกษตรกรรม

defTh: น่าหลงใหล
defEn: extremely interesting and attractive

defTh: แฟชั่น, สมัยนิยม

defTh: เร็ว, อดอาหาร

defTh: ผูก, ติด

defTh: อ้วน, ไขมัน

defTh: ที่ทำให้ถึงแก่กรรม

defTh: โชคชะตา
defEn: the things, especially bad things, that will happen or have happened to somebody/something

defTh: พ่อ, บิดา

defTh: ความโปรดปราน, ช่วย
defEn: a thing that you do to help somebody

defTh: ดี
defEn: making people have a good opinion of somebody/something

defTh: ที่ชื่นชอบ, โปรดปราน
defEn: liked more than others of the same kind

defTh: ความกลัว, กลัว

defTh: วีรกรรม
defEn: an action or a piece of work that needs skill, strength or courage

defTh: ขนนก, ขน

defTh: ลักษณะ, คุณสมบัติ
defEn: something important, interesting or typical of a place or thing

defTh: กุมภาพันธ์

defTh: สหพันธรัฐ, สหพันธ์

defTh: รู้สึก, สัมผัส

defTh: ความรู้สึก, อารมณ์

defTh: เพศหญิง, ผู้หญิง

defTh: สตรีนิยม

defTh: รั้ว, กั้น

defTh: เทศกาล, งานฉลอง

defTh: ดุร้าย

defTh: สิบห้า
example: He's in the first fifteen.

defTh: ห้าสิบ

defTh: รูปร่าง, ตัวเลข

defTh: ผู้สร้างภาพยนตร์
กรอง

defTh: สุดท้าย, จบ

defTh: การเงิน, จัดหาเงินทุน

defTh: เสร็จ, จบ

defTh: บิน, การบิน

defTh: ตาม, ติดตาม

defTh: อาหาร, ของกิน

defTh: คนโง่

defTh: เท้า, ฟุต

defTh: ภาพจากฟิล์ม, ภาพเหตุการณ์

defTh: ฟุตบอล, กีฬา

defTh: ห้าม (โดยเฉพาะบุคคล)
defEn: to order somebody not to do something; to order that something must not be done

defTh: กำลัง, บังคับ

defTh: ต่างประเทศ, ต่างชาติ
defEn: in or from a country that is not your own

defTh: ชาวต่างชาติ
defEn: a person who comes from a different country

defTh: ป่า, พงไพร
defEn: a large area of land that is thickly covered with trees

defTh: ตลอดไป, นิรันดร
defEn: used to say that a particular situation or state will always exist

defTh: ปลอมแปลง (ลายเซ็น, เอกสาร)
defEn: to put a lot of effort into making something successful or strong so that it will last

defTh: ลืม, หลงลืม
defEn: to not remember to do something that you ought to do, or to bring or buy something that you ought to bring or buy

defTh: ให้อภัย, ยกโทษ
defEn: to stop feeling angry with somebody who has done something to harm, annoy or upset you; to stop feeling angry with yourself

defTh: ส้อม, แยก
defEn: a tool with a handle and three or four sharp points (called prongs), used for picking up and eating food

defTh: รูปแบบ, สร้าง
defEn: a type or variety of something

defTh: เป็นทางการ, พิธีรีตอง
defEn: very correct and suitable for official or important occasions

defTh: รูปแบบ
defEn: the general arrangement, plan, design, etc. of something

defTh: การก่อตัว

defTh: ก่อนหน้า, อดีต

defTh: แต่ก่อน, ก่อนนี้
defEn: in the past

defTh: สูตร, หลักเกณฑ์
defEn: a series of letters, numbers or symbols that represent a rule or law
example: This formula is used to calculate the area of a circle.

defTh: สร้างสูตร, กำหนดหลักการ
defEn: to create or prepare something carefully, giving particular attention to the details

defTh: ออกไป
defEn: away from a place; out

defTh: ที่กำลังจะมาถึง
defEn: going to happen, be published, etc. very soon

defTh: ที่โชคดี, มีโชค
defEn: having or bringing an advantage, an opportunity, a piece of good luck, etc.

defTh: อย่างโชคดี, โชคดีที่
defEn: by good luck

defTh: โชค, ทรัพย์สิน
defEn: a large amount of money
example: He made a fortune in real estate.

defTh: สี่สิบ
ฟอรั่ม
defEn: an event or medium where people can exchange opinions and ideas on a particular issue; a meeting organized for this purpose
example: forum (on something), to hold an international forum on drug abuse

defTh: ไปข้างหน้า
defEn: directed or moving towards the front

defTh: ฟอสซิล

defTh: อุปถัมภ์
defEn: to encourage something to develop

defTh: พบ, ก่อตั้ง
defEn: to start something, such as an organization or an institution, especially by providing money

defTh: รากฐาน, มูลนิธิ
defEn: a principle, an idea or a fact that something is based on and that it grows from

defTh: ผู้ก่อตั้ง
defEn: a person who starts an organization, institution, etc. or causes something to be built

defTh: สี่, เลขสี่
สิบสี่
ที่สี่, หนึ่งในสี่
defEn: 4th

defTh: เศษส่วน
defEn: a small part or amount of something

defTh: เปราะบาง, แตกง่าย
defEn: easily broken or damaged

defTh: ชิ้นส่วนเล็กๆ ที่แตกออก
defEn: a small part of something that has broken off or comes from something larger
example: fragment (of something), Police found fragments of glass near the scene.

defTh: กรอบ, โครง
defEn: a strong border or structure of wood, metal, etc. that holds a picture, door, piece of glass, etc. in position

defTh: กรอบ
defEn: the parts of a building or an object that support its weight and give it shape
example: built on a wooden framework

defTh: แฟรนไชส์
defEn: formal permission given by a company to somebody who wants to sell its goods or services in a particular area; formal permission given by a government to somebody who wants to operate a public service as a business

defTh: อย่างเปิดเผย
defEn: in an honest and direct way that people might not like

defTh: การฉ้อโกง
defEn: the crime of cheating somebody in order to get money or goods illegally

defTh: อิสระ, ฟรี
defEn: without particular plans or arrangements; not busy

defTh: อิสรภาพ, เสรีภาพ
defEn: the power or right to do or say what you want without anyone stopping you

defTh: อย่างอิสระ, อย่างเสรี
defEn: without anyone trying to prevent or control something

defTh: แข็งตัว, แช่แข็ง

defTh: ความถี่
defEn: the rate at which something happens or is repeated

defTh: บ่อยครั้ง, เป็นประจำ

defTh: อย่างบ่อยครั้ง, อย่างถี่ถ้วน
defEn: often

defTh: สด, ใหม่
defEn: recently produced or picked and not frozen, dried or preserved in tins or cans

defTh: วันศุกร์
defEn: the day of the week after Thursday and before Saturday

defTh: ตู้เย็น
defEn: a piece of electrical equipment in which food is kept cold so that it stays fresh

defTh: เพื่อน, มิตร
defEn: a person you know well and like, and who is not usually a member of your family

defTh: เป็นมิตร, ใจดี
defEn: behaving in a kind and pleasant way because you like somebody or want to help them

defTh: มิตรภาพ, ความเป็นเพื่อน
defEn: a relationship between friends

defTh: ทำให้ตกใจกลัว
defEn: to make somebody suddenly feel afraid

defTh: ตกใจ, กลัว

defTh: น่ากลัว, น่าตกใจ
defEn: making you feel afraid

defTh: กบ

defTh: จาก, ตั้งแต่
defEn: used to show where somebody/something starts

defTh: ด้านหน้า, ส่วนหน้า
defEn: on or at the front of something

defTh: แช่แข็ง, เย็นจัด
defEn: kept at a very low temperature in order to preserve it

defTh: ผลไม้

defTh: คับข้องใจ

defTh: น่าหงุดหงิด

defTh: แห้ว
defEn: the feeling of being frustrated

defTh: ทอด, ของทอด

defTh: เชื้อเพลิง, เติมเชื้อเพลิง
defEn: any material that produces heat or power, usually when it is burnt

defTh: เติมเต็ม
defEn: to do or achieve what was hoped for or expected

defTh: เต็ม, อิ่ม

defTh: เต็มเวลา

defTh: อย่างครบถ้วน

defTh: ความสนุก, สนุก

defTh: หน้าที่, ฟังก์ชัน

defTh: ใช้งานได้

defTh: กองทุน, ให้ทุน

defTh: การระดมทุน

defTh: งานศพ, พิธีศพ

defTh: ตลกขบขัน

defTh: ขนสัตว์, ขน

defTh: กราดเกรี้ยว

defTh: เครื่องเรือน, เฟอร์นิเจอร์

defTh: แกลเลอรี่

defTh: การพนัน, พนัน

defTh: เกม, การแข่งขัน

defTh: การเล่นเกม

defTh: โรงรถ

defTh: เกย์

defTh: สุภาพบุรุษ

defTh: เหลือบ

defTh: โลกาภิวัตน์

defTh: ทอง, สีทอง
defEn: bright yellow in colour, like gold

defTh: ทอง
defEn: made of gold

defTh: ดี, เก่ง, เหมาะสม

defTh: ลาก่อน, สวัสดี
defEn: used when you are leaving somebody or when somebody else is leaving

defTh: ความดี
defEn: the quality of being good

defTh: สินค้า, ของ
defEn: things that are produced to be sold

defTh: สวยงามอร่ามตา
defEn: very beautiful and attractive; giving great pleasure

defTh: ปกครอง, ควบคุม

defTh: การปกครอง, ธรรมาภิบาล

defTh: รัฐบาล, การปกครอง
defEn: the group of people who are responsible for controlling a country or a state

defTh: ผู้ว่าราชการ

defTh: พระคุณ

defTh: ระดับ, เกรด

defTh: ค่อยเป็นค่อยไป

defTh: เรียนจบ

defTh: เมล็ด, ธัญพืช
defEn: the small hard seeds of food plants such as wheat, rice, etc.; a single seed of such a plant

defTh: ใหญ่โต, สง่า
defEn: impressive and large or important

defTh: ปู่, ตา

defTh: ยาย, ย่า
defEn: the mother of your father or mother

defTh: ปู่ย่าตายาย
defEn: the father or mother of your father or mother
example: The children are staying with their grandparents.

defTh: ให้, ยินยอม, เงินช่วยเหลือ
defEn: a sum of money that is given by the government or by another organization to be used for a particular purpose

defTh: เกี่ยวกับกราฟิก, เป็นภาพ
defEn: connected with drawings and design, especially in the production of books, magazines, websites, etc.

defTh: งานกราฟิก, ภาพที่สร้างขึ้น
defEn: designs, drawings or pictures that are used especially in the production of books, magazines, websites, etc.

defTh: เข้าใจ
defEn: a strong hold of somebody/something or control over somebody/something

defTh: หญ้า, สนามหญ้า

defTh: รู้สึกขอบคุณ

defTh: หลุมฝังศพ

defTh: แรงโน้มถ่วง
