defTh: ยิ่งใหญ่, ดีมาก
defEn: very good or pleasant
example: He's a great bloke.

defTh: อย่างมาก, อย่างยิ่ง
defEn: very much
example: People's reaction to the film has varied greatly.

defTh: สีเขียว
defEn: having the colour of grass or the leaves of most plants and trees
example: green grass/leaves/vegetables

defTh: เรือนกระจก
ทักทาย
defEn: to say hello to somebody or to welcome them
example: greet somebody, He greeted all the guests warmly as they arrived.

defTh: สีเทา, สีหม่น
defEn: having the colour of smoke or ashes
example: grey eyes/hair

defTh: ตาราง
defEn: a pattern of straight lines, usually crossing each other to form squares
example: New York’s grid of streets

defTh: ความเศร้าโศก
defEn: a very sad feeling, especially when somebody dies
example: She was overcome with grief when her husband died.

defTh: ยิ้ม
defEn: a wide smile
example: She gave a broad grin.

defTh: บด
defEn: to break or press something into very small pieces between two hard surfaces or using a special machine
example: to grind coffee/corn

defTh: ด้ามจับ
defEn: an act of holding somebody/something tightly; a particular way of doing this
example: Keep a tight grip on the rope.

defTh: ของชำ
defEn: a shop that sells food and other things used in the home. In American English ‘grocery store’ is often used to mean ‘supermarket’.
example: the corner grocery store

defTh: ทั้งหมดโดยรวม
defEn: being the total amount of something before anything is taken away
example: gross weight (= including the container or wrapping)

defTh: พื้น, ดิน, เหตุผล
defEn: the solid surface of the earth
example: on the ground, I found her lying on the ground.

defTh: กลุ่ม, หมู่
defEn: a number of people or things that are together in the same place or that are connected in some way
example: group of somebody/something, a group of people/students/friends

defTh: เติบโต, งอก
defEn: to increase in size, number, strength or quality
example: The sector is growing at a phenomenal rate.

defTh: การเติบโต, การเจริญ
defEn: the process in people, animals or plants of growing physically, mentally or emotionally
example: Lack of water will stunt the plant's growth.

defTh: รับประกัน, ค้ำประกัน
defEn: a formal promise that you will do something or that something will happen
example: They are demanding certain guarantees before they sign the treaty.

defTh: ผู้คุ้มกัน, เฝ้า
defEn: a person, such as a soldier, a police officer or a prison officer, who protects a place or people, or prevents prisoners from escaping
example: prison/border guards

defTh: กองโจร
defEn: a member of a small group of soldiers who are not part of an official army and who fight against official soldiers, usually to try to change the government
example: urban guerrillas (= those who fight in towns)

defTh: เดา, คาดเดา
defEn: an attempt to give an answer or an opinion when you cannot be certain if you are right
example: (British English), to have/make a guess

defTh: แขก, ผู้มาเยือน
defEn: a person that you have invited to your house or to a particular event that you are paying for
example: They only use the dining room when they have guests.

defTh: การชี้แนะ
defEn: help or advice that is given to somebody, especially by somebody older or with more experience
example: guidance for teachers on how to use video in the classroom

defTh: นำทาง, มัคคุเทศก์
defEn: a person who shows other people the way to a place, especially somebody employed to show tourists around interesting places
example: Our tour guide showed us around the old town.

defTh: แนวทาง
defEn: a set of rules or instructions that are given by an official organization telling you how to do something, especially something difficult
example: The government has drawn up guidelines for schools during the pandemic.

defTh: ความรู้สึกผิด
defEn: the unhappy feelings caused by knowing or thinking that you have done something wrong
example: She had feelings of guilt about leaving her children and going to work.

defTh: มีความผิด
defEn: feeling ashamed because you have done something that you know is wrong or have not done something that you should have done
example: Matt and Chrissy both looked equally guilty.

defTh: กีตาร์
defEn: a musical instrument that usually has six strings and that you play with your fingers or with a plectrum
example: an acoustic/electric guitar

defTh: ปืน, อาวุธปืน
defEn: a weapon that is used for firing bullets or shells
example: I have never fired a gun in my life.

defTh: ลำไส้
defEn: the tube in the body through which food passes when it leaves the stomach
example: It can take up to 72 hours for food to pass through the gut.

defTh: ผู้ชาย, หนุ่ม (คำไม่เป็นทางการ)
defEn: a man
example: a big/little guy

defTh: โรงยิม
defEn: a room or hall with equipment for doing physical exercise, for example in a school
example: The school has recently built a new gym.

defTh: นิสัย, ความเคยชิน
defEn: a thing that you do often and almost without thinking, especially something that is hard to stop doing
example: You need to change your eating habits.

defTh: ถิ่นที่อยู่
defEn: the place where a particular type of animal or plant is normally found
example: The panda's natural habitat is the bamboo forest.

defTh: ลูกเห็บ
defEn: to describe somebody/something as being very good or special, especially in newspapers, etc.
example: be hailed (as) something, The conference was hailed as a great success.

defTh: ผม, เส้นผม
defEn: the substance that looks like a mass of fine threads growing on a person's head
example: She has long dark hair.

defTh: ครึ่ง, กึ่ง
defEn: to the extent of half
example: The glass was half full.

defTh: ครึ่งทาง
defEn: at an equal distance between two points; in the middle of a period of time
example: It's about halfway between London and Bristol.

defTh: ห้องโถง, หอ
defEn: a space or passage inside the entrance or front door of a building
example: in a hall, Her brother was standing in the front hall.

defTh: หยุด
defEn: an act of stopping the movement or progress of somebody/something
example: Work came to a halt when the machine broke down.

defTh: มือ, ช่วยเหลือ
defEn: the part of the body at the end of the arm, including the fingers and thumb
example: Ian placed a hand on her shoulder.

defTh: กำมือ
defEn: the amount of something that can be held in one hand
example: a handful of rice

defTh: จัดการ, ที่จับ
defEn: the part of a door, window, etc. that you use to open it
example: She turned the handle and opened the door.

defTh: การจัดการ, การควบคุม
defEn: the way that somebody deals with or treats a situation, a person, an animal, etc.
example: I was impressed by his handling of the affair.

defTh: สะดวกใช้งาน, มีประโยชน์ในทางปฏิบัติ
defEn: easy to use or to do
example: a handy little tool

defTh: แขวน, ห้อย, ประหาร
defEn: to attach something, or to be attached, at the top so that the lower part is free or loose
example: hang something + adv./prep., Hang your coat on the hook.

defTh: เกิดขึ้น, เกิด
defEn: to take place, especially without being planned
example: You'll never guess what's happened!

defTh: อย่างมีความสุข
defEn: in a cheerful way; with feelings of pleasure
example: children playing happily on the beach

defTh: ความสุข, สุข
defEn: the state of feeling or showing pleasure
example: to find true happiness

defTh: สุข, มีความสุข
defEn: feeling or showing pleasure; pleased
example: a happy family

defTh: การล่วงละเมิด
defEn: the act of annoying or worrying somebody by putting pressure on them or saying or doing unpleasant things to them
example: sexual/racial harassment

defTh: ท่าเรือ
defEn: an area of water on the coast, protected from the open sea by strong walls, where ships can shelter
example: Several boats lay at anchor in the harbour.

defTh: ยาก, แข็ง
defEn: difficult to do, understand or answer
example: a hard choice/decision/question

defTh: แทบจะไม่, เกือบจะไม่ได้
defEn: almost no; almost not; almost none
example: There's hardly any tea left.

defTh: ฮาร์ดแวร์
defEn: the machines and electronic parts in a computer or other electronic system
example: We supply computer hardware to businesses.

defTh: อันตราย, ทำร้าย
defEn: damage or injury that is caused by a person or an event
example: He would never frighten anyone or cause them any harm.

defTh: เป็นอันตราย
defEn: causing damage or injury to somebody/something, especially to a person’s health or to the environment
example: the harmful effects of alcohol

defTh: ความปรองดอง
defEn: a state of peaceful existence and agreement
example: social/racial harmony

defTh: รุนแรง
defEn: cruel, severe and unkind
example: The punishment was harsh and unfair.

defTh: เก็บเกี่ยว
defEn: the time of year when the crops are gathered in on a farm, etc.; the act of cutting and gathering crops
example: harvest time

defTh: หมวก
defEn: a piece of clothing made to fit the head, often with a brim (= a flat edge that sticks out), usually worn out of doors
example: a straw/woolly hat

defTh: เกลียด, ชัง
defEn: a very strong feeling of dislike for somebody
example: She gave him a look of real hate.

defTh: ความชิงชัง
defEn: a very strong feeling of dislike for somebody/something
example: He looked at me with intense hatred.

defTh: หลอกหลอน
defEn: if the ghost of a dead person haunts a place, people say that they have seen it there
example: A headless rider haunts the country lanes.

defTh: มี
defEn: to own, hold or possess something
example: He had a new car and a boat.

defTh: ต้อง, จำเป็นต้อง
defEn: used to show that you must do something
example: Sorry, I've got to go.

defTh: อันตราย
defEn: something that can be dangerous or cause damage
example: a fire/safety hazard

defTh: เขา, ท่าน
defEn: a male person or animal that has already been mentioned or is easily identified
example: Everyone liked my father—he was the perfect gentleman.

defTh: หัว, ศีรษะ
defEn: the part of the body on top of the neck containing the eyes, nose, mouth and brain
example: She nodded her head in agreement.

defTh: ปวดหัว
defEn: a continuous pain in the head
example: He had a terrible headache.

defTh: พาดหัว
defEn: the title of a news article printed in large letters, especially at the top of the front page on a newspaper or the home page on a news website
example: a newspaper headline

defTh: สำนักงานใหญ่
defEn: a place from which an organization or a military operation is controlled; the people who work there
example: The firm’s headquarters is/are in London.

defTh: รักษา, หาย
defEn: to become healthy again; to make something healthy again
example: It took a long time for the wounds to heal.

defTh: สุขภาพ, อนามัย
defEn: the condition of a person’s body or mind
example: to be good/bad for your health

defTh: การดูแลสุขภาพ
defEn: the service of providing medical care
example: the costs of healthcare for the elderly

defTh: สุขภาพดี, แข็งแรง
defEn: having good health and not likely to become ill
example: a healthy child/baby/adult

defTh: ได้ยิน, ฟัง
defEn: to be aware of sounds with your ears
example: I can't hear very well.

defTh: การได้ยิน, การสดับ
defEn: the ability to hear
example: Her hearing is poor.

defTh: หัวใจ, จิตใจ
defEn: the organ in the chest that sends blood around the body, usually on the left in humans
example: The patient's heart stopped beating for a few seconds.

defTh: ความร้อน, อุ่น
defEn: the quality of being hot
example: Heat rises.

defTh: ความร้อน
defEn: the process of supplying heat to a room or building; a system used to do this
example: to put/turn the heating on

defTh: สวรรค์, ฟ้า
defEn: the place believed to be the home of God where good people go when they die, sometimes imagined to be in the sky
example: the kingdom of heaven

defTh: อย่างหนัก
defEn: to a great degree; in large amounts
example: It was raining heavily.

defTh: หนัก, มาก
defEn: weighing a lot; difficult to lift or move
example: a heavy weight/load

defTh: ส้นเท้า, ตาม
defEn: the back part of the foot below the ankle
example: Apply the cream to dry, cracked heels before bed.

defTh: ความสูง, ส่วนสูง
defEn: the measurement of how tall a person or thing is
example: Height: 210 mm. Width: 57 mm. Length: 170 mm.

defTh: เพิ่มความสูง
defEn: if a feeling or an effect heightens, or something heightens it, it becomes stronger or increases
example: Tension has heightened after the recent bomb attack.

defTh: เฮลิคอปเตอร์
defEn: an aircraft without wings that has large blades (= long flat parts) on top that go round. It can fly straight up from the ground and can also stay in one position in the air.
example: a police/rescue helicopter

defTh: นรก, สถานที่เลวร้าย
defEn: the place believed to be the home of devils and where bad people go after death
example: He was terrified of going to hell when he died.

defTh: สวัสดี
defEn: used as a greeting when you meet somebody, in an email, when you answer the phone or when you want to attract somebody’s attention
example: Hello John, how are you?

defTh: หมวกนิรภัย
defEn: a type of hard hat that protects the head, worn, for example, by a police officer, a soldier or a person riding a bike or motorbike or playing some sports
example: Police in riot helmets lined the streets.

defTh: ความช่วยเหลือ
defEn: the act of helping somebody to do something
example: Thank you for all your help.

defTh: เป็นประโยชน์, ช่วยเหลือ
defEn: able to improve a particular situation
example: helpful advice/information

defTh: ดังนั้น, ด้วยเหตุนี้
defEn: for this reason
example: We suspect they are trying to hide something, hence the need for an independent inquiry.

defTh: (คำนำหน้า) ของเธอ/หล่อน
defEn: of or belonging to a woman or girl who has already been mentioned or is easily identified
example: Meg loves her job.

defTh: สมุนไพร
defEn: a plant whose leaves, flowers or seeds are used to add taste to food, in medicines or for their pleasant smell. parsley, mint and oregano are all herbs.
example: a herb garden

defTh: ที่นี่, ตรงนี้
defEn: used after a verb or preposition to mean ‘in, at or to this position or place’
example: I live here.

defTh: มรดกทางวัฒนธรรม, สิ่งที่สืบทอด
defEn: the history, traditions, buildings and objects that a country or society has had for many years and that are considered an important part of its character
example: Spain’s rich cultural heritage

defTh: วีรบุรุษ, ผู้กล้า
defEn: a person who is admired by many people for doing something brave or good
example: a war hero (= somebody who was very brave during a war)

defTh: (สรรพนาม) สิ่งที่เป็นของเธอ/หล่อน
defEn: of or belonging to her
example: His eyes met hers.

defTh: ตัวเอง(ผู้หญิง)
defEn: used when the woman or girl who performs an action is also affected by it
example: She hurt herself.

defTh: ลังเล, รีรอ
defEn: to be slow to speak or act because you feel uncertain or nervous
example: She hesitated before replying.

defTh: เฮ้
defEn: used to attract somebody’s attention or to express interest, surprise or anger
example: Hey, can I just ask you something?

defTh: สวัสดี, ทักทาย
defEn: used to say hello
example: Hi guys!

defTh: ที่ซ่อนอยู่
defEn: something that is hidden is kept or located in a place where it cannot be seen
example: Hidden dangers lurk in the ocean depths.

defTh: ซ่อน, หนัง
defEn: to put or keep somebody/something in a place where they/it cannot be seen or found
example: hide somebody/something + adv./prep., He hid the letter in a drawer.

defTh: ลำดับชั้น
defEn: a system, especially in a society or an organization, in which people are organized into different levels of importance from highest to lowest
example: the social/political hierarchy

defTh: สูง, มาก, สุด
defEn: measuring a long distance from the bottom to the top
example: What's the highest mountain in the US?

defTh: โปรไฟล์สูง
defEn: receiving or involving a lot of attention and discussion in the media
example: a high-profile campaign

defTh: เน้น, จุดเด่น
defEn: the best, most interesting or most exciting part of something
example: One of the highlights of the trip was seeing the Taj Mahal.

defTh: อย่างสูง, มาก
defEn: very
example: It is highly unlikely that she'll be late.

defTh: ทางหลวง, ถนนใหญ่
defEn: a main road for travelling long distances, especially one connecting and going through cities and towns
example: Plans were being made for the construction of a new interstate highway system.

defTh: ตลกขบขัน
defEn: extremely funny
example: a hilarious joke/story

defTh: เนินเขา
defEn: an area of land that is higher than the land around it, but not as high as a mountain
example: a region of gently rolling hills

defTh: เขา (กรรม)
defEn: used as the object of a verb, after the verb be or after a preposition to refer to a male person or animal that has already been mentioned or is easily identified
example: When did you see him?

defTh: ตัวเขาเอง
defEn: used when the man or boy who performs an action is also affected by it
example: He introduced himself.

defTh: คำใบ้
defEn: something that you say or do in an indirect way in order to show somebody what you are thinking
example: He gave a broad hint (= one that was obvious) that he was thinking of retiring.

defTh: สะโพก, ทันสมัย
defEn: the area at either side of the body between the top of the leg and the middle part of the body; the joint at the top of the leg that connects it with the top part of the body
example: She stood with her hands on her hips.

defTh: การจ้างงาน
defEn: the act of paying to use something for a short time
example: a hire car

defTh: ของเขา
defEn: of or belonging to a man or boy who has already been mentioned or is easily identified
example: James has sold his car.

defTh: นักประวัติศาสตร์
defEn: a person who studies or writes about history; an expert in history
example: No serious historian today accepts this theory.

defTh: ทางประวัติศาสตร์, ที่สำคัญในอดีต
defEn: important in history; likely to be thought of as important at some time in the future
example: the restoration of historic buildings

defTh: ทางประวัติศาสตร์
defEn: connected with the past
example: You must place these events in their historical context.

defTh: ประวัติศาสตร์, วิชาประวัติ
defEn: all the events that happened in the past
example: in history, The battle was a turning point in human history.

defTh: ตี, ชน, โดน
defEn: an act of hitting somebody/something with your hand or with an object held in your hand
example: Give it a good hit.

defTh: งานอดิเรก
defEn: an activity that you do for pleasure when you are not working
example: Do you have any hobbies?

defTh: ฮอกกี้
defEn: a game played on a field by two teams of 11 players, with curved sticks and a small hard ball. Teams try to hit the ball into the other team’s goal.
example: to play hockey

defTh: ถือ, จับ, ยึด
defEn: the action of holding somebody/something; the way you are holding somebody/something
example: hold on somebody/something, His hold on her arm tightened.

defTh: รู, ช่อง
defEn: a hollow space in something solid or in the surface of something
example: He dug a deep hole in the garden.

defTh: วันหยุด, วันพักผ่อน
defEn: a period of time when you are not at work or school
example: the school/summer/Christmas holidays

defTh: กลวง, ว่างเปล่า
defEn: having a hole or empty space inside
example: a hollow ball/centre/tube/tree

defTh: ศักดิ์สิทธิ์, บริสุทธิ์
defEn: connected with God or a particular religion
example: the Holy Bible

defTh: บ้าน, ที่พัก
defEn: connected with the place where you live
example: home life (= with your family)

defTh: บ้านเกิด
defEn: the country where a person was born
example: Many refugees have been forced to flee their homeland.

defTh: คนไร้บ้าน
defEn: having no home, and therefore typically living on the streets
example: The scheme has been set up to help homeless people.

defTh: การบ้าน
defEn: work that is given by teachers for students to do at home
example: I always do my homework on the bus.

defTh: ซื่อสัตย์, ตรงไปตรงมา
defEn: always telling the truth, and never stealing or cheating
example: an honest man/woman

defTh: ความซื่อสัตย์สุจริต, ความจริงใจ
defEn: the quality of being honest
example: She answered all my questions with her usual honesty.

defTh: เกียรติ, ให้เกียรติ
defEn: great respect for somebody
example: the guest of honour (= the most important one)

defTh: ตะขอ, เกี่ยว
defEn: a curved piece of metal, plastic or wire for hanging things on, catching fish with, etc.
example: a picture/curtain/coat hook

defTh: ความหวัง, หวัง
defEn: a feeling of wanting and expecting a particular thing to happen; something that you wish for
example: Don't lose hope—we'll find her.

defTh: มีความหวัง
defEn: believing that something you want will happen
example: hopeful (that…), I feel hopeful that we'll find a suitable house very soon.

defTh: หวังว่า
defEn: used to express what you hope will happen
example: Hopefully, we'll arrive before dark.

defTh: ขอบฟ้า
defEn: the furthest that you can see, where the sky seems to meet the land or the sea
example: The sun sank below the horizon.

defTh: แตร, เขา
defEn: a hard pointed part that grows, usually in pairs, on the heads of some animals, such as sheep and cows. Horns are often curved.
example: a large bull with curved horns

defTh: น่าสะพรึงกลัว
defEn: very bad or unpleasant; used to describe something that you do not like
example: What horrible weather!

defTh: ความสยองขวัญ
defEn: a feeling of great shock or fear
example: The thought of being left alone filled her with horror.

defTh: ม้า, อาชา
defEn: a large animal with four legs, a mane (= long thick hair on its neck) and a tail. Horses are used for riding on, pulling carriages, etc.
example: to ride a horse

defTh: โรงพยาบาล
defEn: a large building where people who are ill or injured are given medical treatment and care
example: to/into (the) hospital, (British English), He had to go to/into hospital for treatment.

defTh: เจ้าภาพ, พิธีกร
defEn: a person who invites guests to a meal, a party, etc. or who has people staying at their house
example: Ian, our host, introduced us to the other guests.

defTh: ตัวประกัน
defEn: a person who is captured and held prisoner by a person or group, and who may be injured or killed if people do not do what the person or group is asking
example: Three children were taken hostage during the bank robbery.

defTh: ไม่เป็นมิตร
defEn: aggressive or unfriendly and ready to argue or fight
example: The speaker got a hostile reception from the audience.

defTh: ความเป็นปฏิปักษ์
defEn: aggressive or unfriendly feelings or behaviour
example: There was a barely veiled hostility in her tone.

defTh: ร้อน, เผ็ด, ฮิต
defEn: having a high temperature; producing heat
example: It's hot today, isn't it?

defTh: โรงแรม
defEn: a building where people stay, usually for a short time, paying for their rooms and meals
example: a two-star/five-star, etc. hotel

defTh: ชั่วโมง
defEn: 60 minutes; one of the 24 parts that a day is divided into
example: I spent an hour on the phone.

defTh: บ้าน, ที่อยู่อาศัย
defEn: a building for people to live in, usually for one family
example: in a house, We live in a two-bedroom house.

defTh: ครัวเรือน, บ้าน
defEn: all the people living together in a house or flat
example: Most households now own at least one car.

defTh: ที่พักอาศัย
defEn: houses, flats, etc. that people live in, especially when referring to their type, price or condition
example: rental/student housing

defTh: อย่างไร, เท่าไร
defEn: in what way or manner
example: How does it work?

defTh: ถึงกระนั้นก็ตาม
defEn: used to introduce a statement that contrasts with something that has just been said
example: He was feeling bad. He went to work, however, and tried to concentrate.

defTh: ใหญ่มาก, ใหญ่โต
defEn: extremely large in size or amount; great in degree
example: The sums of money involved are potentially huge.

defTh: มนุษย์, เกี่ยวกับมนุษย์
defEn: of or connected with people rather than animals, machines or gods
example: the human body/brain

defTh: ด้านมนุษยธรรม
defEn: connected with helping people who are suffering and improving the conditions that they are living in
example: to provide humanitarian aid to the war zone

defTh: มนุษยชาติ
defEn: people in general
example: He was found guilty of crimes against humanity.

defTh: ถ่อมตน
defEn: showing you do not think that you are as important as other people
example: Be humble enough to learn from your mistakes.

defTh: มีอารมณ์ขัน
defEn: funny; showing a sense of humour
example: He gave a humorous account of their trip to Spain.

defTh: อารมณ์ขัน
defEn: the quality in something that makes it funny; the ability to laugh at things that are funny
example: It was a story full of gentle humour.

defTh: หนึ่งร้อย
example: One hundred (of the children) have already been placed with foster families.

defTh: ความหิว
defEn: the state of not having enough food to eat, especially when this causes illness or death
example: Around fifty people die of hunger every day in the camp.

defTh: หิว, อยากกิน
defEn: feeling that you want to eat something
example: I'm really hungry.

defTh: ล่า, การล่า
defEn: an act of looking for somebody/something that is difficult to find
example: The hunt is on for a suitable candidate.

defTh: การล่าสัตว์
defEn: going after and killing wild animals as a sport or for food
example: He goes hunting every weekend.

defTh: พายุเฮอริเคน
defEn: a violent storm with very strong winds, especially in the western Atlantic Ocean
example: A powerful hurricane hit the Florida coast.

defTh: ความเร่งรีบ, ความรีบด่วน
defEn: the need or wish to get something done quickly
example: Take your time—there's no hurry.

defTh: เจ็บ, ทำร้าย
defEn: injured physically
example: None of the passengers were badly hurt.

defTh: สามี, ผัว
defEn: the man that somebody is married to; a married man
example: This is my husband, Steve.

defTh: ไฮโดรเจน
สมมติฐาน (เพื่อการทดลอง)
defEn: an idea or explanation of something that is based on a few known facts but that has not yet been proved to be true or correct
example: to formulate/confirm a hypothesis

defTh: ฉัน, ผม
defEn: used as the subject of a verb when the speaker or writer is referring to himself/herself
example: I think I'd better go now.

defTh: น้ำแข็ง
defEn: water that has frozen and become solid
example: There was ice on the windows.

defTh: ไอศกรีม
defEn: a type of sweet frozen food made from milk fat, tasting of fruit, chocolate, etc. and often eaten as a dessert; a small amount of this food intended for one person, often served in a container made of biscuit that is like a cone in shape
example: Desserts are served with cream or ice cream.

defTh: ไอคอน
defEn: a small symbol on a computer or smartphone screen that represents a program or a file
example: Click on the printer icon with the mouse.

defTh: บัตรประจำตัวประชาชน
defEn: an official way of showing who you are, for example a document with your name, date of birth and often a photograph on it (the abbreviation for ‘identity’ or ‘identification’)
example: You must carry ID at all times.

defTh: ความคิด, แนวคิด
defEn: a plan, thought or suggestion, especially about what to do in a particular situation
example: It would be a good idea to call before we leave.

defTh: อุดมคติ, ดีเลิศ
defEn: perfect; most suitable
example: an ideal location/place

defTh: เหมือนกันทุกประการ, ตรงกัน
defEn: similar in every detail
example: a row of identical houses

defTh: บัตรประจำตัว
defEn: the process of showing, proving or recognizing who or what somebody/something is
example: The identification of the crash victims was a long and difficult task.

defTh: ระบุ, ชี้ตัว
defEn: to recognize somebody/something and be able to say who or what they are
example: identify somebody/something, She was able to identify her attacker.

defTh: เอกลักษณ์, อัตลักษณ์
defEn: who or what somebody/something is
example: The police are trying to discover the identity of the killer.

defTh: ทางอุดมการณ์
defEn: based on or connected with an ideology
example: ideological differences

defTh: ชุดอุดมการณ์
defEn: a set of ideas that an economic or political system is based on
example: Marxist/capitalist ideology

defTh: งี่เง่า
defEn: a rude way to refer to somebody who you think is very stupid
example: When I lost my passport, I felt such an idiot.

defTh: ถ้า, หาก
defEn: used to say that one thing can, will or might happen or be true, depending on another thing happening or being true
example: If you see him, give him this note.

defTh: ความไม่รู้
defEn: a lack of knowledge or information about something
example: They fought a long battle against prejudice and ignorance.

defTh: เพิกเฉย, ไม่สนใจ
defEn: to pay no attention to something
example: He ignored all the ‘No Smoking’ signs and lit up a cigarette.

defTh: ป่วย, ไม่สบาย (มักใช้กับอาการรุนแรง)
defEn: suffering from an illness or disease; not feeling well
example: Her father is seriously ill in St Luke's hospital.

defTh: ผิดกฎหมาย
defEn: not allowed by the law
example: illegal drugs/firearms/substances

defTh: ความเจ็บป่วย, โรค
defEn: the state of being physically or mentally ill
example: The virus can cause illness in humans.

defTh: ภาพลวงตา
defEn: a false idea or belief, especially about somebody or about a situation
example: under the illusion that…, She's under the illusion that (= believes wrongly that) she'll get the job.

defTh: แสดง, อธิบาย
defEn: to use pictures, photographs, diagrams, etc. in a book, etc.
example: illustrate something, She illustrated her own books.

defTh: ภาพประกอบ
defEn: a drawing or picture in a book, magazine, for decoration or to explain something
example: 50 full-colour illustrations

defTh: รูปภาพ, ภาพลักษณ์
defEn: a picture, photograph or statue that represents somebody/something
example: Most simple leaflets will include text and images.

defTh: ภาพในความคิด, ภาพพจน์
defEn: language that produces pictures in the minds of people reading or listening
example: poetic imagery

defTh: จินตนาการ, สมมติ
defEn: existing only in your mind or imagination
example: The equator is an imaginary line around the middle of the earth.

defTh: จินตนาการ
defEn: the ability to create pictures in your mind; the part of your mind that does this
example: a vivid/fertile imagination

defTh: จินตนาการ, นึกภาพ
defEn: to form a picture in your mind of what something might be like
example: imagine something, The house was just as she had imagined it.

defTh: ฉับพลัน
defEn: happening or done without delay
example: an immediate reaction/response

defTh: ทันที, โดยทันที
defEn: without delay
example: She answered almost immediately.

defTh: ใหญ่โต
defEn: extremely large or great
example: There is still an immense amount of work to be done.

defTh: ผู้อพยพ
defEn: a person who has come to live permanently in a different country from the one they were born in
example: immigrant from…, immigrants from other European countries

defTh: การตรวจคนเข้าเมือง
defEn: the process of coming to live permanently in a different country from the one you were born in; the number of people who do this
example: legal/illegal immigration

defTh: ใกล้
defEn: likely to happen very soon
example: the imminent threat of invasion

defTh: มีภูมิคุ้มกัน
defEn: that cannot catch or be affected by a particular disease or illness
example: Adults are often immune to German measles.

defTh: ผลกระทบ, กระทบ
defEn: the powerful effect that something has on somebody/something
example: a positive/a negative/an adverse impact

defTh: ใจร้อน, กระวนกระวาย
defEn: annoyed by somebody/something, especially because you have to wait for a long time
example: I'd been waiting for twenty minutes and I was getting impatient.

defTh: นำไปใช้
defEn: to make something that has been officially decided start to happen or be used
example: to implement changes/decisions/policies/reforms

defTh: การทำให้เป็นจริง, การปฏิบัติการ
defEn: the act of making something that has been officially decided start to happen or be used
example: the implementation of the new system

defTh: ความหมายโดยนัย
defEn: a possible effect or result of an action or a decision
example: They failed to consider the wider implications of their actions.

defTh: บอกเป็นนัย
defEn: to suggest that something is true or that you feel or think something, without saying so directly
example: imply (that)…, Are you implying (that) I am wrong?

defTh: นำเข้า, สินค้านำเข้า
defEn: a product or service that is brought into one country from another
example: import from…, food imports from abroad

defTh: ความสำคัญ
defEn: the quality of being important
example: She stressed the importance of careful preparation.

defTh: สำคัญ, จำเป็น
defEn: having a great effect on people or things; of great value
example: an important issue/question/point/factor

defTh: บังคับ, กำหนด
defEn: to introduce a new law, rule, tax, etc.; to order that a rule, punishment, etc. be used
example: impose something, The UN Security Council imposed sanctions in 1992.

defTh: เป็นไปไม่ได้
defEn: that cannot exist or be done; not possible
example: almost/virtually/nearly impossible

defTh: ประทับใจ, สร้างความประทับใจ
defEn: if a person or thing impresses you, you admire them or it
example: impress (somebody), We interviewed a number of candidates but none of them impressed us.

defTh: ประทับใจ
defEn: admiring somebody/something because you think they are particularly good, interesting, etc.
example: I must admit I am impressed.

defTh: ความประทับใจ
defEn: an idea, a feeling or an opinion that you get about somebody/something, or that somebody/something gives you
example: My first impression of him was favourable.

defTh: น่าประทับใจ, ยอดเยี่ยม
defEn: making you admire them, because they are very large, good, skilful, etc.
example: an impressive performance

defTh: กักขัง
defEn: to put somebody in a prison or another place from which they cannot escape
example: be imprisoned (for something), They were imprisoned for possession of drugs.

defTh: การกักขัง
defEn: the act of putting somebody in a prison or another place from which they cannot escape; the state of being there
example: to be sentenced to life imprisonment for murder

defTh: พัฒนา, ปรับปรุง
defEn: to become better than before; to make something/somebody better than before
example: Overall the situation has improved dramatically.

defTh: การปรับปรุง
defEn: the act of making something better; the process of something becoming better
example: The economy has shown significant improvement over the past 9 months.

defTh: ใน, ข้างใน
defEn: into an object, an area or a substance
example: She opened the door and went in.

defTh: ความไม่สามารถ
defEn: the fact of not being able to do something
example: the government’s inability to provide basic services

defTh: ไม่เพียงพอ, ไม่เหมาะสม (ขาดคุณภาพหรือคุณสมบัติ)
defEn: not enough; not good enough
example: inadequate supplies

defTh: ไม่เหมาะสม
defEn: not suitable or appropriate in a particular situation
example: inappropriate behaviour/language

defTh: สิ่งจูงใจ, สิ่งกระตุ้น (รางวัล)
defEn: something that encourages you to do something
example: There is no incentive for people to save fuel.

defTh: นิ้ว, วัด
defEn: a unit for measuring length or height, equal to 2.54 centimetres. There are 12 inches in a foot.
example: She's a few inches taller than me.

defTh: อุบัติการณ์
defEn: the extent to which something happens or has an effect
example: an area with a high incidence of crime

defTh: เหตุการณ์, เรื่อง
defEn: something that happens, especially something unusual or unpleasant
example: His bad behaviour was just an isolated incident.

defTh: โน้มเอียง
defEn: wanting to do something
example: She was inclined to trust him.

defTh: รวมเข้าไว้, นับรวม
defEn: if one thing includes another, it has the second thing as one of its parts
example: include something, The tour included a visit to the Science Museum.

defTh: รวมอยู่ด้วย
defEn: contained as part of something
example: all of Europe (Britain included)

defTh: รวมถึง, ซึ่งรวมถึง
defEn: having something as part of a group or set
example: I've got three days' holiday including New Year's Day.

defTh: การรวมเข้าไว้ด้วย, การผนวก
defEn: the fact of including somebody/something; the fact of being included
example: His inclusion in the team is in doubt.

defTh: รายได้, เงินได้
defEn: the money that a person, a region, a country, etc. earns from work, from investing money, from business, etc.
example: Average household income fell slightly.

defTh: รวมเข้าด้วยกัน
defEn: to include something so that it forms a part of something
example: incorporate something, The new car design incorporates all the latest safety features.

defTh: ไม่ถูกต้อง
defEn: not accurate or true
example: incorrect information/spelling

defTh: เพิ่มขึ้น, มากขึ้น
defEn: a rise in the amount, number or value of something
example: price/tax/wage increases

defTh: มากขึ้นเรื่อยๆ
defEn: more and more all the time
example: Tourism is playing an increasingly important role in the region's economy

defTh: ที่ไม่น่าเชื่อ, มหัศจรรย์
defEn: impossible or very difficult to believe
example: an incredible story

defTh: อย่างไม่น่าเชื่อ, อย่างเหลือเชื่อ
defEn: extremely
example: It was all incredibly difficult.

defTh: ประสบ (กับสิ่งที่ไม่พึงประสงค์)
defEn: if you incur something unpleasant, you are in a situation in which you have to deal with it
example: She had incurred the wrath of her father by marrying without his consent.

defTh: แน่นอน, จริงๆ
defEn: used after very and an adjective or adverb to emphasize a statement, description, etc.
example: Thank you very much indeed!

defTh: อิสรภาพ, ความเป็นเอกราช
defEn: freedom from political control by other countries
example: Cuba gained independence from Spain in 1898.

defTh: เป็นอิสระ, ไม่อิง
defEn: having its own government
example: an independent state/nation/country

defTh: ดัชนี
defEn: a list of names or topics that are referred to in a book, etc., usually arranged at the end of a book in alphabetical order or listed in a separate file or book
example: Look it up in the index.

defTh: บ่งชี้, แสดง
defEn: to show that something is true or exists
example: indicate something, Initial tests indicate the presence of oxygen.

defTh: ข้อบ่งชี้, สัญญาณ
defEn: a remark or sign that shows that something is happening or what somebody is thinking or feeling
example: indication of something, They gave no indication of how the work should be done.

defTh: ตัวบ่งชี้
defEn: a sign that shows you what something is like or how a situation is changing
example: The economic indicators are better than expected.

defTh: คำฟ้อง
defEn: a sign that a system, society, etc. is very bad or very wrong
example: The poverty in our cities is a damning indictment of modern society.

defTh: เป็นของพื้นเมือง, ดั้งเดิม
defEn: coming from a particular place and having lived there for a long time before other people came there; relating to, belonging to or developed by these people
example: the indigenous peoples/languages of an area

defTh: โดยอ้อม, อ้อม
defEn: happening not as the main aim, cause or result of a particular action, but in addition to it
example: the indirect effects of the war

defTh: บุคคล, แต่ละคน
defEn: considered separately rather than as part of a group
example: We interviewed each individual member of the community.

defTh: ที่อยู่ในร่ม, ที่ทำภายในอาคาร
defEn: located, done or used inside a building
example: an indoor swimming pool

defTh: ภายในอาคาร, ในร่ม
defEn: inside or into a building
example: I prefer to stay indoors in this really hot weather.

defTh: ชักนำ
defEn: to persuade or influence somebody to do something
example: Nothing would induce me to take the job.

defTh: ตามใจ
defEn: to allow yourself to have or do something that you like, especially something that is considered bad for you
example: indulge in something, They went into town to indulge in some serious shopping.

defTh: อุตสาหกรรม, เชิงอุตสาหกรรม
defEn: connected with industry
example: an industrial dispute

defTh: อุตสาหกรรม
defEn: the production of goods from raw materials, especially in factories
example: the needs of British industry

defTh: ความไม่เท่าเทียมกัน
defEn: the unfair difference between groups of people in society, when some have more wealth, status or opportunities than others
example: We need to tackle inequality of opportunity wherever we find it.

defTh: หลีกเลี่ยงไม่ได้
defEn: that you cannot avoid or prevent
example: It was an inevitable consequence of the decision.

defTh: อย่างที่ต้องเกิดขึ้น
defEn: as is certain to happen
example: Inevitably, the press exaggerated the story.

defTh: น่าอับอาย
defEn: well known for being bad or evil
example: a general who was infamous for his brutality

defTh: ทารก
defEn: a baby or very young child
example: a nursery for infants under two

defTh: ติดเชื้อ, แพร่เชื้อ
defEn: to make a disease or an illness spread to a person, an animal or a plant
example: infect somebody/something (with something), It is not possible to infect another person through kissing.

defTh: การติดเชื้อ
defEn: the act or process of causing or getting a disease
example: to cause/prevent infection

defTh: อนุมาน
defEn: to reach an opinion or decide that something is true on the basis of information that is available
example: infer something (from something), Much of the meaning must be inferred from the context.

defTh: อัตราเงินเฟ้อ
defEn: a general rise in the prices of services and goods in a particular country, resulting in a fall in the value of money; the rate at which this happens
example: the fight against rising inflation

defTh: ทำดาเมจ
defEn: to make somebody/something suffer something unpleasant
example: inflict something on/upon somebody/something, They inflicted a humiliating defeat on the home team.

defTh: อิทธิพล, อำนาจ
defEn: the effect that somebody/something has on the way a person thinks or behaves or on the way that something works or develops
example: His early work shows the influence of Cézanne and Matisse.

defTh: ที่มีอิทธิพล, ทรงอิทธิพล
defEn: having a lot of influence on somebody/something
example: a highly influential book

defTh: ข้อมูลข่าวสาร (คำย่อ)
defEn: information
example: For more info, click here.

defTh: แจ้ง, บอก
defEn: to tell somebody about something, especially in an official way
example: inform somebody, The government took this decision without consulting Parliament or informing the public.

defTh: ไม่เป็นทางการ (เน้นรูปแบบ, ภาษา)
defEn: relaxed and friendly; not following strict rules of how to behave or do something
example: an informal atmosphere

defTh: ข้อมูล, สารสนเทศ
defEn: facts or details about somebody/something
example: a piece of information

defTh: โครงสร้างพื้นฐาน
ส่วนผสม
defEn: one of the things from which something is made, especially one of the foods that are used together to make a particular dish
example: Mix all the ingredients in a bowl.

defTh: ผู้อาศัย, พลเมือง
defEn: a person or an animal that lives in a particular place
example: the oldest inhabitant of the village

defTh: โดยธรรมชาติ, ที่มีมาแต่กำเนิด
defEn: that is a basic or permanent part of somebody/something and that cannot be removed
example: the difficulties inherent in a study of this type

defTh: สืบทอด
defEn: to receive money, property, etc. from somebody when they die
example: inherit something from somebody, She inherited a fortune from her father.

defTh: ยับยั้ง
defEn: to prevent something from happening or make it happen more slowly or less frequently than normal
example: A lack of oxygen may inhibit brain development in the unborn child.

defTh: เบื้องต้น, เริ่มแรก
defEn: happening at the beginning; first
example: There is an initial payment of £60 followed by ten instalments of £25.

defTh: ในขั้นต้น
defEn: at the beginning
example: Initially, the system worked well.

defTh: ริเริ่ม, เป็นผู้เริ่ม
defEn: to make something begin
example: to initiate legal proceedings against somebody

defTh: ความคิดริเริ่ม
defEn: a new plan for dealing with a particular problem or for achieving a particular purpose
example: a United Nations peace initiative

defTh: ฉีด
defEn: to put a drug or other substance into a person’s or an animal’s body using a syringe
example: inject something (into yourself/somebody/something), Adrenaline was injected into the muscle.

defTh: การฉีด
defEn: an act of injecting somebody with a drug or other substance
example: to give somebody an injection

defTh: ทำร้าย, บาดเจ็บ
defEn: to harm yourself or somebody else physically, especially in an accident
example: He injured his knee playing hockey.

defTh: บาดเจ็บ, ได้รับบาดเจ็บ
defEn: physically hurt; having an injury
example: His injured leg prevented him from walking.

defTh: บาดเจ็บ, การบาดเจ็บ
defEn: harm done to a person’s or an animal’s body, for example in an accident
example: Two people sustained minor injuries.

defTh: ความอยุติธรรม
defEn: the fact of a situation being unfair and of people not being treated equally; an unfair act or an example of unfair treatment
example: We are committed to fighting against poverty and injustice.

defTh: หมึก, ลงหมึก
defEn: coloured liquid for writing, drawing and printing
example: in ink, written in ink

defTh: ผู้ต้องขัง
defEn: one of the people living in an institution such as a prison or a psychiatric hospital
example: The jail has 500 inmates.

defTh: ภายใน (ทางอารมณ์หรือจิตวิญญาณ), ส่วนในสุด
defEn: inside; towards or close to the centre of a place
example: an inner courtyard

defTh: บริสุทธิ์, ไร้เดียงสา
defEn: not guilty of a crime, etc.; not having done something wrong
example: They have imprisoned an innocent man.

defTh: นวัตกรรม
defEn: the introduction of new things, ideas or ways of doing something
example: an age of technological innovation

defTh: ที่ริเริ่มสิ่งใหม่
defEn: introducing or using new ideas, ways of doing something, etc.
example: There will be a prize for the most innovative design.

defTh: ป้อนข้อมูล
defEn: time, knowledge, ideas, etc. that you put into work, a project, etc. in order to make it succeed; the act of putting something in
example: I'd appreciate your input on this.

defTh: สอบถามรายละเอียดเพิ่มเติม
defEn: an official process to find out the cause of something or to find out information about something
example: a murder inquiry

defTh: แมลง, ตัวแมลง
defEn: any small creature with six legs and a body divided into three parts. Insects usually also have wings. Ants, bees and flies are all insects.
example: Most birds spend most of the day eating insects.

defTh: ใส่, สอด
defEn: to put something into something else or between two things
example: insert something (in/into something), Insert coins into the slot and press for a ticket.

defTh: การแทรก
defEn: the act of putting something inside something else; a thing that is put inside something else
example: An examination is carried out before the insertion of the tube.

defTh: ข้างใน, ภายใน
defEn: forming the inner part of something; not on the outside
example: the inside pages of a newspaper

defTh: ภายใน
defEn: a person who knows a lot about a group or an organization, because they are part of it
example: The situation was described by one insider as ‘absolute chaos’.

defTh: ข้อมูลเชิงลึก
defEn: an understanding of what something is like
example: There are many valuable insights in her book.

defTh: ยืนกราน, ยืนยัน
defEn: to demand that something happen or that somebody agree to do something
example: I didn't really want to go but he insisted.

defTh: ตรวจดู
defEn: to look closely at something/somebody, especially to check that everything is as it should be
example: inspect something/somebody, The teacher walked around inspecting their work.

defTh: การตรวจการณ์, การตรวจสอบอย่างละเอียด
defEn: an official visit to a school, factory, etc. in order to check that rules are being obeyed and that standards are acceptable
example: Regular inspections are carried out at the prison.

defTh: สารวัตร
defEn: an officer of middle rank in the police force
example: Inspector Maggie Forbes

defTh: แรงบันดาลใจ
defEn: the process that takes place when somebody sees or hears something that causes them to have exciting new ideas or makes them want to create something, especially in art, music or literature
example: Dreams can be a rich source of inspiration for an artist.

defTh: สร้างแรงบันดาลใจ
defEn: to give somebody the desire, confidence or enthusiasm to do something well
example: inspire somebody, The actors' enthusiasm inspired the kids.

defTh: ติดตั้ง, สถาปนา
defEn: to fix equipment or furniture into position so that it can be used
example: They're planning to install a new drainage system.

defTh: การติดตั้ง
defEn: the act of fixing equipment or furniture in position so that it can be used
example: installation costs

defTh: ตัวอย่าง, กรณี
defEn: a particular example or case of something
example: instance of somebody/something, The report highlights a number of instances of injustice.

defTh: ในทันที
defEn: happening immediately
example: This account gives you instant access to your money.

defTh: โดยทันที
defEn: immediately
example: Her voice is instantly recognizable.

defTh: แทนที่, เสียแต่ว่า
defEn: in the place of somebody/something
example: Lee was ill so I went instead.

defTh: สัญชาตญาณ
defEn: a natural quality that makes people and animals tend to behave in a particular way using the knowledge and abilities that they were born with rather than thought or training
example: She did not seem to have any of the usual maternal instincts.

defTh: สถาบัน, จัดตั้ง
defEn: an organization that has a particular purpose, especially one that is connected with education or a particular profession; the building used by this organization
example: The report was compiled by Germany's five leading economic research institutes.

defTh: สถาบัน, องค์กร
defEn: a large important organization that has a particular purpose, for example a university or bank
example: The deal is backed by one of the country's largest financial institutions.

defTh: สถาบัน
defEn: connected with a large important organization, for example a university or bank
example: institutional investors

defTh: สั่งสอน (ให้ความรู้)
defEn: to tell somebody to do something, especially in a formal or official way
example: instruct somebody to do something, The letter instructed him to report to headquarters immediately.

defTh: คำสั่ง, การสอน
defEn: detailed information on how to do or use something
example: Follow the instructions on the packet carefully.

defTh: ผู้สอน
defEn: a person whose job is to teach somebody a practical skill or sport
example: a fitness/driving/ski instructor

defTh: เครื่องดนตรี, อุปกรณ์
defEn: an object used for producing musical sounds, for example a piano or a drum
example: to play an instrument

defTh: เครื่องมือ
defEn: important in making something happen
example: The Conservation Trust performs an instrumental role in the protection of rural environments.

defTh: ไม่พอเพียง, ขาดแคลน (เน้นปริมาณ)
defEn: not large, strong or important enough for a particular purpose
example: insufficient time

defTh: ดูถูก, สบประมาท
defEn: a remark or an action that is said or done in order to offend somebody
example: The crowd were shouting insults at the police.

defTh: ประกันภัย
defEn: an arrangement with a company in which you pay them regular amounts of money and they agree to pay the costs, for example, if you die or are ill, or if you lose or damage something
example: health/medical insurance

defTh: ไม่บุบสลาย
defEn: complete and not damaged
example: Most of the house remains intact even after two hundred years.

defTh: ปริมาณที่รับเข้า (อาหาร/อากาศ)
defEn: the amount of food, drink, etc. that you take into your body
example: high fluid intake

defTh: ที่เป็นส่วนประกอบสำคัญ
defEn: being an essential part of something
example: Music is an integral part of the school's curriculum.

defTh: ผสมผสาน, รวมเข้าเป็นหนึ่งเดียว
defEn: to combine two or more things so that they work together; to combine with something else in this way
example: integrate into/with something, These programs will integrate with your existing software.

defTh: ที่ถูกผสมผสาน, แบบบูรณาการ
defEn: in which many different parts are closely connected and work successfully together
example: an integrated programme of patient care

defTh: การรวมเข้าด้วยกัน, การบูรณาการ
defEn: the act or process of combining two or more things so that they work together
example: The aim is to promote closer economic integration.

defTh: ความซื่อตรง, ความมั่นคงทางศีลธรรม
defEn: the quality of being honest and having strong moral principles
example: personal/professional/artistic integrity

defTh: ทางปัญญา
defEn: connected with or using a person’s ability to think in a logical way and understand things
example: Gifted children typically show great intellectual curiosity and a wide range of interests.

defTh: สติปัญญา, เชาวน์
defEn: the ability to learn, understand and think in a logical way about things; the ability to do this well
example: a person of high/average/low intelligence

defTh: มีสติปัญญา
defEn: good at learning, understanding and thinking in a logical way about things; showing this ability
example: a highly intelligent child

defTh: ตั้งใจ, มุ่งหมาย
defEn: to have a plan, result or purpose in your mind when you do something
example: We finished later than we had intended.

defTh: ตั้งใจ, เจตนา
defEn: that you are trying to achieve or reach
example: the intended purpose

defTh: ที่รุนแรง
defEn: very great; very strong
example: We were all suffering in the intense heat.

defTh: กระชับ
defEn: to increase in degree or strength; to make something increase in degree or strength
example: Violence intensified during the night.

defTh: ความเข้ม
defEn: the state or quality of being intense
example: intensity of light/sound/colour

defTh: ที่ต้องใช้ความพยายามสูง
defEn: involving a lot of work or activity done in a short time
example: an intensive language course

defTh: เจตนา
defEn: what you intend to do
example: She denies possessing the drug with intent to supply.

defTh: เจตนา, ความตั้งใจ
defEn: what you intend or plan to do; your aim
example: intention of doing something, I have no intention of going to the wedding.

defTh: มีปฏิสัมพันธ์
defEn: to communicate with somebody, especially while you work, play or spend time with them
example: Teachers have a limited amount of time to interact with each child.

defTh: ปฏิสัมพันธ์
defEn: the act of communicating with somebody, especially while you work, play or spend time with them
example: the interaction between performers and their audience

defTh: โต้ตอบ
defEn: that allows information to be passed continuously and in both directions between a computer or other device and the person who uses it
example: interactive displays/video

defTh: ความสนใจ, ดอกเบี้ย
defEn: the feeling that you have when you want to know or learn more about somebody/something
example: Her research has generated interest around the world.

defTh: สนใจ, อยากรู้
defEn: giving your attention to something because you enjoy finding out about it or doing it; showing interest in something and finding it exciting
example: He sounded genuinely interested.

defTh: น่าสนใจ, น่าดึงดูด
defEn: attracting your attention because it is/they are special, exciting or unusual
example: The article raises several interesting questions.

defTh: อินเตอร์เฟซ
defEn: the way a computer program presents information to a user or receives information from a user, in particular the layout of the screen and the menus
example: the user interface

defTh: เข้าแทรกแซง, รบกวน (กิจกรรมของผู้อื่น)
defEn: to get involved in and try to influence a situation that should not really involve you, in a way that annoys other people
example: I wish my mother would stop interfering and let me make my own decisions.

defTh: การรบกวน
defEn: the act of getting involved in and trying to influence a situation that should not really involve you, in a way that annoys other people
example: interference (in something), They resent foreign interference in the internal affairs of their country.

defTh: ชั่วคราว
defEn: intended to last for only a short time until somebody/something more permanent is found
example: an interim government/measure/report

defTh: ภายใน, ส่วนใน
defEn: connected with the inside part of something
example: interior walls

defTh: ระดับกลาง
defEn: located between two places, things, states, etc.
example: an intermediate stage/step in a process

defTh: ภายใน, ภายในองค์กร
defEn: connected with the inside of something
example: the internal structure of a building

defTh: นานาชาติ, ระหว่างประเทศ
defEn: connected with or involving two or more countries
example: international trade/law

defTh: อินเทอร์เน็ต
defEn: an international computer network connecting other networks and computers that allows people to share information around the world
example: to surf/browse/access the internet

defTh: ตีความ, แปล
defEn: to explain the meaning of something
example: The students were asked to interpret the poem.

defTh: การตีความ
defEn: the particular way in which something is understood or explained
example: Her evidence suggests a different interpretation of the events.

defTh: ขัดจังหวะ, แทรก
defEn: to say or do something that makes somebody stop what they are saying or doing
example: Sorry to interrupt, but there's someone to see you.

defTh: ช่วงเวลา, ระยะห่าง
defEn: a period of time between two events
example: The interval between major earthquakes might be 200 years.

defTh: แทรกแซง
defEn: to become involved in a situation in order to improve or help it
example: She might have been killed if the neighbours hadn't intervened.

defTh: การแทรกแซง
defEn: action taken to improve or help a situation
example: calls for government intervention to save the steel industry

defTh: สัมภาษณ์
defEn: a formal meeting at which somebody is asked questions to see if they are suitable for a particular job, or for a course of study at a college, university, etc.
example: a job interview

defTh: สนิทสนม
defEn: having a close and friendly relationship
example: intimate friends

defTh: ใน, เข้าไปใน
defEn: to a position in or inside something
example: Come into the house.

defTh: น่าพิศวง, น่าค้นหา
defEn: very interesting because of being unusual or not having an obvious answer
example: These discoveries raise intriguing questions.

defTh: แนะนำ, แนะนำตัว
defEn: to tell two or more people who have not met before what each other’s names are; to tell somebody what your name is
example: introduce somebody, Allow me to introduce my mother.

defTh: บทนำ, การแนะนำ
defEn: the first part of a book or speech that gives a general idea of what is to follow
example: a book with an excellent introduction and notes

defTh: บุก
defEn: to enter a country, town, etc. using military force in order to take control of it
example: Troops invaded on August 9th that year.

defTh: การบุกรุก
defEn: the act of an army entering another country by force in order to take control of it
example: the German invasion of Poland in 1939

defTh: ประดิษฐ์, สร้าง
defEn: to produce or design something that has not existed before
example: Who invented the steam engine?

defTh: การประดิษฐ์, สิ่งประดิษฐ์
defEn: a thing or an idea that has been invented
example: Fax machines were a wonderful invention at the time.

defTh: ลงทุน, ทุ่มเท
defEn: to buy property, shares in a company, etc. in the hope of making a profit
example: Now is a good time to invest.

defTh: สอบสวน, ตรวจสอบ
defEn: to carefully examine the facts of a situation, an event, a crime, etc. to find out the truth about it or how it happened
example: The FBI has been called in to investigate.

defTh: การสืบสวน
defEn: an official examination of the facts about a situation, crime, etc.
example: a criminal/murder/police investigation

defTh: ผู้สอบสวน
defEn: a person who examines a situation such as an accident or a crime to find out the truth
example: air safety investigators

defTh: การลงทุน
defEn: the act of investing money in something
example: foreign/private investment

defTh: นักลงทุน
defEn: a person or an organization that invests money in something
example: small investors (= private people)

defTh: ล่องหน
defEn: that cannot be seen
example: a wizard who could make himself invisible

defTh: คำเชิญ, การเชื้อเชิญ
defEn: a spoken or written request to somebody to do something or to go somewhere
example: to issue/extend an invitation

defTh: เชิญ, ชวน
defEn: to ask somebody to come to a social event
example: invite somebody to something, Have you been invited to their party?

defTh: วิงวอน
defEn: to mention or use a law, rule, etc. as a reason for doing something
example: It is unlikely that libel laws will be invoked.

defTh: เกี่ยวข้อง, มีส่วนร่วม
defEn: if a situation, an event or an activity involves something, that thing is an important or necessary part or result of it
example: involve something, Any investment involves an element of risk.

defTh: เกี่ยวข้อง, ซับซ้อน
defEn: taking part in something; being part of something or connected with something
example: Some people tried to stop the fight but I didn't want to get involved.

defTh: การพัวพัน, ความเกี่ยวข้อง
defEn: the act of taking part in something or dealing with somebody
example: involvement in something, US involvement in European wars

defTh: เหล็ก, รีด
defEn: a chemical element. Iron is a hard strong metal that is used to make steel and is also found in small quantities in blood and food.
example: iron gates/bars/railings

defTh: ที่ประชดประชัน, ที่แสดงความขัดแย้ง
defEn: showing that you really mean the opposite of what you are saying; expressing irony
example: an ironic comment

defTh: อย่างประชดประชัน, อย่างแดกดัน
defEn: in a way that shows that you really mean the opposite of what you are saying; in a way that expresses irony
example: He smiled ironically.

defTh: ประชด
defEn: the funny or strange aspect of a situation that is very different from what you expect; a situation like this
example: It was one of life's little ironies.

defTh: ไม่เกี่ยวข้อง
defEn: not important to or connected with a situation
example: totally/completely/largely irrelevant

defTh: เกาะ, ดอน
defEn: a piece of land that is completely surrounded by water
example: a small/tiny island

defTh: แยกออกจากกัน
defEn: to separate somebody/something physically or socially from other people or things
example: isolate somebody/yourself/something, Patients with the disease should be isolated.

defTh: โดดเดี่ยว
defEn: far away from any others
example: isolated rural areas

defTh: การแยกตัว
defEn: the act of separating somebody/something; the state of being separate
example: geographical isolation

defTh: ประเด็น, ปัญหา
defEn: an important topic that people are discussing or arguing about
example: a key/major issue

defTh: มัน, ตัว
defEn: the study and use of electronic processes and equipment to store and send information of all kinds, including words, pictures and numbers (the abbreviation for ‘information technology’)
example: the increasing use of IT in all aspects of today's society

defTh: รายการ, สิ่งของ
defEn: one thing on a list of things to buy, do, talk about, etc.
example: What's the next item on the agenda?

defTh: ของมัน
defEn: belonging to or connected with a thing, an animal or a baby
example: Turn the box on its side.

defTh: ตัวมันเอง
defEn: used when the animal or thing that does an action is also affected by it
example: The cat was washing itself.

defTh: เสื้อแจ็กเก็ต
defEn: a piece of clothing worn on the top half of the body over a shirt, etc. that has arms and fastens down the front; a short, light coat
example: a leather/denim/tweed jacket

defTh: คุก
defEn: a prison
example: She spent a year in jail.

defTh: แยม, ติดขัด
defEn: a thick sweet substance made by boiling fruit with sugar, often sold in jars and spread on bread
example: strawberry jam

defTh: มกราคม
defEn: the 1st month of the year, between December and February
example: She was born in January.

defTh: แจ๊ส
defEn: a type of music with strong rhythms, in which the players often improvise (= make up the music as they are playing), originally created by African American musicians at the beginning of the 20th century
example: traditional/modern jazz

defTh: กางเกงยีนส์
defEn: trousers made of denim (= a type of strong cotton)
example: I always wear jeans.

defTh: เจ็ท
defEn: a plane driven by jet engines
example: a jet aircraft/fighter/airliner

defTh: เครื่องประดับ
defEn: objects such as rings and necklaces that people wear as decoration
example: silver/gold jewellery

defTh: งาน, อาชีพ
defEn: work for which you receive regular payment
example: I don't have a job at present.

defTh: เข้าร่วม, เชื่อมต่อ
defEn: to fix or connect two or more things together
example: join A to/onto B, Join one section of pipe to the next.

defTh: ข้อต่อ
defEn: involving two or more people together
example: a joint account (= a bank account in the name of more than one person, for example shared by a couple)

defTh: เรื่องตลก
defEn: something that you say or do to make people laugh, for example a funny story that you tell
example: I can't tell jokes.

defTh: วารสาร
defEn: a newspaper or magazine that deals with a particular subject or profession
example: a scientific/an academic journal

defTh: สื่อสารมวลชน
defEn: the work of collecting and writing news stories for newspapers, magazines, radio, television or online news sites; the news stories that are written
example: I'd like a career in journalism.

defTh: นักข่าว, ผู้สื่อข่าว
defEn: a person whose job is to collect and write news stories for newspapers, magazines, radio, television or online news sites
example: a freelance journalist

defTh: การเดินทาง, การท่องเที่ยว
defEn: an act of travelling from one place to another, especially when they are far apart
example: They went on a long train journey across India.

defTh: ความปิติยินดี
defEn: a feeling of great happiness
example: Her books have brought joy to millions.

defTh: ผู้พิพากษา, ตัดสิน
defEn: a person in a court who has the authority to decide how criminals should be punished or to make legal decisions
example: a High Court judge

defTh: การตัดสิน
defEn: the ability to make sensible decisions after carefully considering the best thing to do
example: good/poor/sound judgement

defTh: เกี่ยวกับศาล, ในทางตุลาการ
defEn: connected with a court, a judge or legal judgement
example: judicial powers

defTh: น้ำผลไม้
defEn: the liquid that comes from fruit or vegetables; a drink made from this
example: a glass of fruit juice

defTh: กรกฎาคม
defEn: the 7th month of the year, between June and August
example: in July, She was born in July.

defTh: กระโดด, การกระโดด
defEn: an act of jumping
example: to do a parachute jump

defTh: ทางแยก
defEn: the place where two or more roads or railway lines meet
example: It was near the junction of City Road and Old Street.

defTh: มิถุนายน
defEn: the 6th month of the year, between May and July
example: She was born in June.

defTh: ผู้น้อย, อ่อนกว่า
defEn: having a low rank in an organization or a profession
example: a junior partner/minister/officer

defTh: เขตอำนาจศาล
defEn: the authority that an official organization has to make legal decisions about somebody/something
example: jurisdiction over somebody/something, The English court had no jurisdiction over the defendants.

defTh: คณะลูกขุน
defEn: a group of members of the public who listen to the facts of a case in a court and decide whether or not somebody is guilty of a crime, or whether a claim has been proved
example: members of the jury

defTh: แค่, เพิ่ง, ยุติธรรม
defEn: that most people consider to be morally fair and reasonable
example: a just decision/law/society

defTh: ความยุติธรรม
defEn: the fair treatment of people
example: She spent her life fighting for social justice and equality for women.

defTh: เหตุผล
defEn: a good reason why something exists or is done
example: justification for doing something, I can see no possible justification for any further tax increases.

defTh: ให้เหตุผล, แก้ตัว
defEn: to show that somebody/something is right or reasonable
example: justify doing something, How can they justify paying such huge salaries?

defTh: กระตือรือร้น, หลักแหลม
defEn: wanting to do something or wanting something to happen very much
example: keen to do something, John was very keen to help.

defTh: เก็บ, รักษา
defEn: to continue to have something and not give it back or throw it away
example: He kept all her letters.

defTh: กุญแจ, สำคัญ
defEn: most important; essential
example: the key issue/factor/point

defTh: แป้นพิมพ์
defEn: the set of keys for operating a computer or typewriter, or the set of letters that you can touch to write on a smartphone or tablet
example: The program locks the keyboard until a password is given.

defTh: เตะ
defEn: a movement with the foot or the leg, usually to hit something with the foot
example: the first kick of the game

defTh: เด็ก, ล้อเล่น
defEn: a child or young person
example: Do you have any kids?

defTh: ลักพาตัว
defEn: to take somebody away illegally and keep them as a prisoner, especially in order to get money or something else for returning them
example: Two businessmen have been kidnapped by terrorists.

defTh: ไต
defEn: either of the two organs in the body that remove waste products from the blood and produce urine
example: a kidney infection

defTh: ฆ่า, สังหาร
defEn: to make somebody/something die
example: kill (somebody/something), Cancer kills thousands of people every year.

defTh: การฆ่า
defEn: an act of killing somebody deliberately
example: Their leader condemned the torture and killing of innocent civilians.

defTh: กิโลเมตร
defEn: a unit for measuring distance; 1000 metres
example: The industrial estate is 6 kilometres from the city centre.

defTh: ใจดี, ชนิด
defEn: caring about others; gentle, friendly and generous
example: a very kind and helpful person

defTh: กษัตริย์, ราชา
defEn: the male ruler of an independent state that has a royal family
example: the kings and queens of England

defTh: อาณาจักร (ที่มีกษัตริย์ปกครอง)
defEn: a country that has a king or queen as head of state (= official leader of the country)
example: the United Kingdom

defTh: จูบ, การจูบ
defEn: the act of kissing somebody/something
example: Come here and give me a kiss!

defTh: ชุด
defEn: a set of tools or equipment that you use for a particular purpose
example: a first-aid kit

defTh: ห้องครัว
defEn: a room in which meals are cooked or prepared
example: We ate at the kitchen table.

defTh: หัวเข่า
defEn: the joint between the top and bottom parts of the leg where it bends in the middle
example: a knee injury

defTh: มีด, อาวุธ
defEn: a sharp blade (= metal edge) with a handle, used for cutting or as a weapon
example: knives and forks

defTh: เคาะ, ตี
defEn: the sound of somebody hitting a door, window, etc. with their hand or with something hard to attract attention
example: knock on/at something, There was a knock at the door.

defTh: รู้, ทราบ
defEn: to have information in your mind as a result of experience or because you have learned or been told it
example: know something, No one knows the answer.

defTh: ความรู้, ภูมิรู้
defEn: the information, understanding and skills that you gain through education or experience

defTh: ห้องแล็บ
defEn: a laboratory
example: a computer/research lab

defTh: ป้าย, ติดป้าย
defEn: a piece of paper, etc. that is attached to something and that gives information about it

defTh: ห้องปฏิบัติการวิทยาศาสตร์
defEn: a room or building used for scientific research, experiments, testing, etc.

defTh: แรงงาน, งาน
defEn: work, especially physical work
example: manual labour (= work using your hands)

defTh: ขาด, ขาดแคลน
defEn: the state of not having something or not having enough of something

defTh: เด็กหนุ่ม
defEn: a boy or young man
example: Things have changed since I was a lad.

defTh: บันไดปีน
defEn: a piece of equipment for climbing up and down a wall, the side of a building, etc., consisting of two lengths of wood or metal that are joined together by steps or rungs

defTh: สุภาพสตรี, คุณผู้หญิง
defEn: a word used to mean ‘woman’ that some people, especially older people, consider is more polite

defTh: ทะเลสาบ, บึง

defTh: ตะเกียง, โคมไฟ
defEn: a device that uses electricity, oil or gas to produce light

defTh: ที่ดิน, ลงจอด
defEn: the surface of the earth that is not sea

defTh: ลงจอด
defEn: an act of bringing an aircraft or a spacecraft down to the ground after a journey

defTh: เจ้าของบ้าน

defTh: จุดสังเกต

defTh: ทิวทัศน์, ภูมิประเทศ
defEn: everything you can see when you look across a large area of land, especially in the country

defTh: ช่องทาง, เลน
defEn: a narrow road in the country

defTh: ภาษา, การใช้ภาษา
defEn: the system of communication in speech and writing that is used by people of a particular country or area

defTh: ตัก
defEn: the top part of your legs that forms a flat surface when you are sitting down

defTh: แล็ปท็อป
defEn: a small computer that can work with a battery and be easily carried

defTh: ใหญ่, มาก
defEn: big in size or quantity
example: a large group/city/area/crowd/family

defTh: ขนาดใหญ่

defTh: ส่วนใหญ่, อย่างมาก
defEn: to a great extent; mostly or mainly

defTh: เลเซอร์
defEn: a device that gives out light in which all the waves oscillate (= change direction and strength) together, typically producing a powerful beam of light that can be used for cutting metal, in medical operations, etc.

defTh: ล่าสุด
defEn: after anyone or anything else; at the end

defTh: สาย, ช้า
defEn: arriving, happening or done after the expected, arranged or usual time

defTh: เมื่อเร็วๆ นี้
defEn: recently; in the recent past

defTh: ภายหลัง, ต่อมา
defEn: coming after something else or at a time in the future

defTh: ล่าสุด, ใหม่สุด
defEn: the most recent or newest
example: the latest craze/fashion/trend

defTh: หลัง, ที่สอง
defEn: used to refer to the second of two things or people mentioned
example: He chose the latter option.

defTh: หัวเราะ, เสียงหัวเราะ
defEn: the sound you make when you think that something is funny or silly

defTh: เสียงหัวเราะ
defEn: the act or sound of laughing
example: to roar/howl with laughter

defTh: ปล่อย, เริ่มต้น
defEn: the action of launching something
example: a missile/rocket launch

defTh: กฎหมาย, ข้อบังคับ
defEn: a rule that deals with a particular crime, agreement, etc.

defTh: สนามหญ้า
defEn: an area of ground covered in short grass in a garden or park, or used for playing a game on

defTh: คดีความ
defEn: a claim or complaint against somebody that a person or an organization can make in court

defTh: นักกฎหมาย
defEn: a person who is trained and qualified to advise people about the law and to represent them in court, and to write legal documents

defTh: วาง, ปู, ออกไข่
defEn: to put somebody/something in a particular position, especially when it is done gently or carefully

defTh: ชั้น, ระดับ
defEn: a quantity or sheet of something that lies over a surface or between surfaces

defTh: เค้าโครง
defEn: the way in which the parts of something such as the page of a book, a website, a garden or a building are arranged

defTh: ขี้เกียจ, เกียจคร้าน
defEn: unwilling to work or be active; doing as little as possible

defTh: ตะกั่ว
ผู้นำ
defEn: a person who leads a group of people, especially the head of a country, an organization, etc.
example: party/world leaders

defTh: ความเป็นผู้นำ
defEn: the state or position of being a leader
example: a leadership role/position

defTh: ชั้นนำ
defEn: most important or most successful

defTh: ใบไม้
defEn: a flat green part of a plant, growing from a stem or branch or from the root

defTh: ใบปลิว
defEn: a printed sheet of paper or a few printed pages that are given free to advertise or give information about something
example: We picked up a few leaflets on local places of interest.

defTh: สันนิบาต, สมาคม
defEn: a group of sports teams who all play each other to earn points and find which team is best

defTh: รั่ว
defEn: a small hole that lets liquid or gas flow in or out of something by accident
example: a leak in the roof

defTh: เอน, พิง, ผอม
defEn: to bend or move from a straight position to a sloping position
example: I leaned back in my chair.

defTh: เผ่น
defEn: a long or high jump
example: a leap of six metres

defTh: เรียนรู้, ศึกษา
defEn: to gain knowledge or skill by studying, from experience, from being taught, etc.
example: learn something, to learn a language/skill/trade

defTh: การเรียนรู้
defEn: the process of learning something

defTh: อย่างน้อยที่สุด
defEn: to the smallest degree

defTh: หนัง, เครื่องหนัง
defEn: material made by removing the hair or fur from animal skins and preserving the skins using special processes

defTh: จากไป, ทิ้ง
defEn: a period of time when you are allowed to be away from work for a holiday or for a special reason

defTh: บรรยาย, การบรรยาย
defEn: a talk that is given to a group of people to teach them about a particular subject, often as part of a university or college course
example: to go to/attend a lecture

defTh: ซ้าย, ออกจาก, เหลือ

defTh: ขา
defEn: one of the long parts that connect the feet to the rest of the body
example: Sit on the floor, stretching your legs out in front of you.

defTh: มรดก, สิ่งที่ทิ้งไว้ให้
defEn: money or property that is given to you by somebody when they die

defTh: ถูกกฎหมาย
defEn: connected with the law

defTh: ตำนาน

defTh: ที่เป็นตำนาน
defEn: very famous and talked about a lot by people

defTh: กฎหมาย

defTh: ฝ่ายนิติบัญญัติ
defEn: connected with the act of making and passing laws

defTh: สภานิติบัญญัติ
defEn: a group of people who have the power to make and change laws

defTh: ถูกต้องตามกฎหมาย
defEn: for which there is a fair and acceptable reason

defTh: เวลาว่าง
defEn: time when you are not working or studying; free time

defTh: มะนาว

defTh: ให้ยืม
defEn: to give something to somebody or allow them to use something that belongs to you, which they have to return to you later

defTh: ความยาว, ระยะ

defTh: ยาว

defTh: เลนส์
defEn: a curved piece of glass or plastic that makes things look larger, smaller or clearer when you look through it

defTh: เลสเบี้ยน

defTh: น้อยกว่า, ลด
defEn: to a smaller degree; not so much

defTh: น้อยกว่า
defEn: not as great in size, amount or importance as something/somebody else

defTh: บทเรียน

defTh: อนุญาต, ปล่อย
defEn: used for making suggestions or as a polite way of telling people what you want them to do

defTh: จดหมาย, ตัวอักษร

example: to write/send (somebody) a letter

defTh: ระดับ, ชั้น
defEn: having a flat surface that does not slope

defTh: ต้องรับผิดชอบ

defTh: การปลดปล่อย
defEn: the act or process of freeing a country or a person from the control of somebody else

defTh: เสรีภาพ
defEn: freedom to live as you choose without too many limits from government or authority

defTh: ใบอนุญาต
defEn: an official document that shows that permission has been given to do, own or use something

defTh: ใบอนุญาต, อนุญาต

defEn: a statement made by somebody knowing that it is not true

defTh: แสง, เบา, สว่าง

defTh: แสงสว่าง
defEn: the arrangement or type of light in a place

defTh: แนวโน้มที่จะเกิดขึ้น, ความเป็นไปได้

defEn: having a good chance of happening or being something; probable or expected

defTh: เช่นเดียวกัน

defTh: แขนขา

defEn: the greatest or smallest amount of something that is allowed

defTh: ข้อจำกัด

defTh: จำกัด, จำกัดจำนวน
defEn: not very great in amount or extent

defTh: เส้น, แถว
defEn: a long, thin mark on a surface

defTh: เข้าแถว
defEn: the people who are going to take part in a particular event

defTh: เชิงเส้น

defTh: เชื่อมโยง, การเชื่อม
defEn: a connection between two or more people or things

defTh: ริมฝีปาก
defEn: either of the two soft edges at the opening to the mouth

defTh: ที่เป็นของเหลว, สภาพเหลว
defEn: in the form of a liquid; not a solid or a gas

defTh: รายการ, บัญชี
defEn: a series of names, items, figures, etc., especially when they are written or printed

defTh: ฟัง, สดับ
defEn: to pay attention to somebody/something that you can hear
example: Listen! What's that noise? Can you hear it?

defTh: ผู้ฟัง
defEn: a person who listens
example: a good listener (= somebody who you can rely on to listen with attention or sympathy)

defTh: รายการ
defEn: a list, especially an official or published list of people or things, often arranged in alphabetical order

defTh: การรู้หนังสือ
defEn: the ability to read and write

defTh: อย่างตรงตามตัวอักษร
defEn: in a literal way

defTh: วรรณกรรม
defEn: connected with literature
