defTh: วรรณกรรม, วรรณคดี
defEn: pieces of writing that are valued as works of art, especially novels, plays and poems (in contrast to technical books and newspapers, magazines, etc.)

defTh: ลิตร, หน่วยปริมาตร
defEn: a unit for measuring volume, equal to 1.76 British pints or 2.11 American pints

defTh: ขยะ
defEn: small pieces of rubbish such as paper, cans and bottles, that people have left lying in a public place

defTh: เล็กน้อย, จำนวนน้อย
defEn: not big; small; smaller than others

defTh: สด
defEn: living; not dead

defTh: มีชีวิตชีวา, ร่าเริง
defEn: full of life and energy; active and enthusiastic

defTh: ตับ

defTh: มีชีวิต, อาศัยอยู่
defEn: alive now

defTh: บรรทุก, ภาระ
defEn: something that is being carried (usually in large amounts) by a person, vehicle, etc.

defTh: เงินกู้, ให้กู้
defEn: money that an organization such as a bank lends and somebody borrows

defTh: ล็อบบี้
defEn: a large area inside the entrance of a public building where people can meet and wait

defTh: ท้องถิ่น, เฉพาะที่
defEn: belonging to or connected with the particular place or area that you are talking about or with the place where you live

defTh: ระบุตำแหน่ง
defEn: to find the exact position of somebody/something

defTh: ตั้งอยู่, ระบุ
defEn: if something is located in a particular place, it exists there or has been put there

defTh: ที่ตั้ง (ตำแหน่งที่แน่นอน)
defEn: a place where something happens or exists; the position of something

defTh: ล็อค, กุญแจ
defEn: a device that keeps a door, window, box, etc. shut, usually needing a key to open it

defTh: บันทึกเหตุการณ์ประจำวัน, ท่อนไม้
defEn: a thick piece of wood that is cut from or has fallen from a tree

defTh: ตรรกะ, เหตุผล
defEn: a way of thinking or explaining something

defTh: ที่เป็นไปตามหลักตรรกะ
defEn: seeming natural, reasonable or sensible

defTh: โลโก้

defTh: เหงา, เปล่าเปลี่ยว
defEn: unhappy because you have no friends or people to talk to

defTh: ยาว, นาน
defEn: measuring or covering a great length or distance, or a greater length or distance than usual

defTh: ยืนยาว
defEn: that has existed or lasted for a long time

defTh: ระยะยาว
defEn: lasting or having an effect over a long period of time
example: Our long-term goal is to lower operating costs by 10 per cent.

defTh: เป็นเวลานาน
defEn: having been the particular thing mentioned for a long time

defTh: มอง, ดู
defEn: an act of looking at somebody/something

defTh: เครื่องทอผ้า

defTh: วนซ้ำ
defEn: a shape like a curve or circle made by a line curving right round

defTh: หลวม, ไม่แน่น
defEn: not securely fixed where it should be; able to become separated from something

defTh: เจ้า, ผู้เป็นใหญ่
defEn: (in the UK) a man of high rank in the nobility (= people of high social class), or somebody who has been given the title ‘lord’ as an honour

defTh: รถบรรทุก (ภาษาอังกฤษแบบบริติช)

defTh: สูญเสีย, แพ้

defTh: การสูญเสีย
defEn: the state of no longer having something or as much of something; the process that leads to this

defTh: หาย, สูญเสีย
defEn: unable to find your way; not knowing where you are

defTh: จำนวนมาก, สลาก
defEn: used with verbs to mean ‘a great amount’

defTh: ลอตเตอรี

defTh: ดัง, เสียงดัง

defTh: รัก, ความรัก

defTh: สวยงามน่าพึงพอใจ
defEn: beautiful; attractive

defTh: ต่ำ, เตี้ย, น้อย
defEn: not high or tall; not far above the ground

defTh: ต่ำกว่า
defEn: to reduce something or to become less in value, quality, etc.
example: lower something, He lowered his voice to a whisper.

defTh: ซื่อสัตย์, ภักดี
defEn: remaining constant in your support of somebody/something
example: a loyal friend/supporter

defTh: ความภักดี
defEn: the quality of being constant in your support of somebody/something
example: Can I count on your loyalty?

defTh: โชค, ดวง
defEn: good things that happen to you by chance, not because of your own efforts or abilities
example: with (any) luck, With any luck, we'll be home before dark.

defTh: โชคดี, มีลาภ
defEn: having good luck
example: lucky to do something, His friend was killed and he knows he is lucky to be alive.

defTh: อาหารกลางวัน
defEn: a meal eaten in the middle of the day
example: She's gone to lunch.

defTh: ปอด
defEn: either of the two organs in the chest that you use for breathing
example: Her father died of lung cancer.

defTh: หรูหรา
defEn: expensive and of very high quality
example: a luxury hotel/car/apartment

defTh: เนื้อเพลง
defEn: the words of a popular song
example: music and lyrics by Rodgers and Hart

defTh: เครื่องจักร, กลไก
defEn: a piece of equipment with many parts that work together to do a particular task. The power used to work a machine may be electricity, steam, gas, etc. or human power.
example: Machines have replaced human labour in many industries.

defTh: เครื่องจักร
defEn: machines as a group, especially large ones
example: agricultural/industrial machinery

defTh: บ้า, โกรธ
defEn: very stupid; not at all sensible
example: You must be mad to risk it.

defTh: นิตยสาร
defEn: a type of large thin book with a paper cover that you can buy every week or month, containing articles, photographs, etc., often on a particular topic; a similar collection of articles, etc. that appears regularly online
example: a weekly/monthly magazine

defTh: เวทมนตร์, มหัศจรรย์
defEn: having or using special powers to make impossible things happen or seem to happen
example: a magic spell/charm/potion

defTh: ขลัง
defEn: containing magic; used in magic
example: magical powers

defTh: ผู้พิพากษา
defEn: an official who acts as a judge in the lowest courts of law
example: to come up before the magistrates

defTh: แม่เหล็ก
defEn: behaving like a magnet; that can be attracted by a magnet
example: magnetic materials

defTh: สง่างาม
defEn: extremely attractive and impressive; deserving praise
example: The Taj Mahal is a magnificent building.

defTh: ขนาด
defEn: the great size or importance of something; the degree to which something is large or important
example: We did not realize the magnitude of the problem.

defTh: จดหมาย, ส่ง
defEn: the official system used for sending and delivering letters, packages, etc.
example: a mail service/train/van

defTh: หลัก, สำคัญ
defEn: being the largest or most important of its kind
example: Be careful crossing the main road.

defTh: แผ่นดินใหญ่
defEn: the main area of land of a country or region, not including any islands near to it
example: to/from the mainland, a boat to/from the mainland

defTh: โดยส่วนใหญ่แล้ว
defEn: more than anything else; also used to talk about the most important reason for something
example: They eat mainly fruit and nuts.

defTh: กระแสหลัก
defEn: considered normal because it reflects what is done or accepted by most people
example: mainstream culture/politics

defTh: รักษา, บำรุง
defEn: to make something continue at the same level, standard, etc.
example: to maintain law and order/standards/a balance/control

defTh: การซ่อมบำรุง
defEn: the act of keeping something in good condition by checking or repairing it regularly
example: The school pays for heating and the maintenance of the buildings.

defTh: สำคัญ, หลัก
defEn: very large or important
example: a major road

defTh: ส่วนใหญ่, ข้างมาก
defEn: the largest part of a group of people or things
example: majority (of somebody/something), The majority of people interviewed prefer TV to radio.

defTh: ทำ, สร้าง, ทำให้
defEn: the name or type of a machine, piece of equipment, etc. that is made by a particular company
example: make of something, What make of car does he drive?

defTh: เครื่องสำอาง
defEn: coloured substances used on the skin to make yourself look more attractive or to change your appearance
example: eye make-up

defTh: การทำ
defEn: the act or process of making or producing something
example: strategic decision-making

defTh: ผู้ชาย, เพศชาย
defEn: being a man or boy
example: a male friend/colleague/partner

defTh: ห้างสรรพสินค้า
defEn: a large building or covered area that has many shops, restaurants, etc. inside it
example: Let's go to the mall.

defTh: ผู้ชาย, มนุษย์เพศชาย
defEn: an adult male human
example: a good-looking young man

defTh: บริหารจัดการ
defEn: to control or be in charge of a business, a team, an organization, land, etc.
example: to manage a business/factory/bank/hotel/soccer team

defTh: การจัดการ, บริหาร
defEn: the activity of running and controlling a business or similar organization
example: a career in management

defTh: ผู้จัดการ, นาย
defEn: a person who is in charge of running a business, a shop or a similar organization or part of one
example: a bank/hotel manager

defTh: อาณัติ
defEn: the authority to do something, given to a government or other organization by the people who vote for it in an election
example: It is undemocratic to govern an area without an electoral mandate.

defTh: เป็นข้อบังคับ, ที่ต้องทำ
defEn: required by law
example: The offence carries a mandatory life sentence.

defTh: ประจักษ์
defEn: to show something clearly, especially a feeling, an attitude or a quality
example: Social tensions were manifested in the recent political crisis.

defTh: ควบคุมบงการ
defEn: to control or influence somebody/something, often in a dishonest way so that they do not realize it
example: manipulate somebody/something, She uses her charm to manipulate people.

defTh: การบิดเบือน, การจัดการอย่างมีเล่ห์เหลี่ยม
defEn: behaviour that controls or influences somebody/something, often in a dishonest way so that they do not realize it
example: Advertising like this is a cynical manipulation of the elderly.

defTh: ท่าทาง, วิธี
defEn: behaviour that is considered to be polite in a particular society or culture
example: to have good/bad manners

defTh: ผลิต, การผลิต
defEn: to make goods in large quantities, using machines
example: manufactured goods

defTh: การผลิต, อุตสาหกรรม
defEn: the business or industry of producing goods in large quantities in factories, etc.
example: Many jobs in manufacturing were lost during the recession.

defTh: ต้นฉบับ
defEn: a copy of a book, piece of music, etc. before it has been printed
example: an unpublished/original manuscript

defTh: มากมาย, เยอะ
defEn: used with plural nouns and verbs, especially in negative sentences or in more formal English, to mean ‘a large number of’. Also used in questions to ask about the size of a number, and with ‘as’, ‘so’ and ‘too’.
example: We don't have very many copies left.

defTh: แผนที่, ทำแผนที่
defEn: a drawing or plan of the earth’s surface or part of it, showing countries, towns, rivers, etc.
example: a map of France

defTh: มาราธอน
defEn: a long running race of about 42 kilometres or 26 miles
example: the London marathon

defTh: เดินแถว, มีนาคม
defEn: the 3rd month of the year, between February and April
example: She was born in March.

defTh: ระยะขอบ
defEn: the empty space at the side of a written or printed page
example: the left-hand/right-hand margin

defTh: ชายขอบ
defEn: small and not important
example: a marginal improvement in weather conditions

defTh: มารีน
defEn: connected with the sea and the creatures and plants that live there
example: marine life

defTh: รอย, คะแนน, ทำเครื่องหมาย
defEn: a written or printed symbol that is used as a sign of something, for example the quality of something or who made or owns it
example: punctuation marks

defTh: เครื่องหมาย
defEn: an object or a sign that shows the position of something
example: a boundary marker

defTh: ตลาด, การตลาด
defEn: an occasion when people buy and sell goods; the open area or building where they meet to do this
example: a fruit/flower/fish market

defTh: การตลาด
defEn: the activity of presenting, advertising and selling a company’s products or services in the best possible way
example: a marketing campaign/strategy

defTh: ตลาด
defEn: the activity of competing with other companies to buy and sell goods, services, etc.
example: Companies must be able to survive in the marketplace.

defTh: การแต่งงาน
defEn: the legal relationship between two people who are married to each other
example: a happy/an unhappy marriage

defTh: แต่งงานแล้ว
defEn: having a husband or wife
example: a married man/woman

defTh: แต่งงาน, สมรส
defEn: to become the husband or wife of somebody; to get married to somebody
example: marry (somebody), She married a German.

defTh: เกี่ยวกับศิลปะการต่อสู้, ทางการทหาร
หน้ากาก
defEn: something that you wear over your face to hide it, or to frighten or entertain other people
example: The robbers wore stocking masks.

defTh: มวล, จำนวนมาก
defEn: affecting or involving a large number of people or things
example: The world faces the tremendous problem of mass unemployment.

defTh: การสังหารหมู่
defEn: the killing of a large number of people especially in a cruel way
example: the bloody massacre of innocent civilians

defTh: ใหญ่โต, มหาศาล
defEn: very large, heavy and solid
example: a massive rock

defTh: นาย, ผู้เชี่ยวชาญ, ควบคุม
defEn: a man who has people working for him, often as servants in his home
example: They lived in fear of their master.

defTh: ไม้ขีด, เข้ากัน
defEn: a sports event where people or teams compete against each other
example: (British English), a football match

defTh: เข้าชุด, เหมาะสม
defEn: having the same colour, pattern, style, etc. and therefore looking attractive together
example: The two sisters wore matching outfits.

defTh: เพื่อน, คู่
defEn: a friend
example: They've been best mates since school.

defTh: วัสดุ, เนื้อหา
defEn: connected with money, possessions, etc. rather than with the needs of the mind or spirit
example: material possessions/wealth

defTh: ทางคณิตศาสตร์
defEn: connected with or involving mathematics
example: mathematical calculations/problems/models

defTh: คณิตศาสตร์ (วิชา)
defEn: the science of numbers and shapes. Branches of mathematics include arithmetic, algebra, geometry and trigonometry.
example: the school mathematics curriculum

defTh: วิชาคณิตศาสตร์ (คำย่อ)
defEn: mathematics, especially as a subject in school
example: The core subjects are English, maths and science.

defTh: สสาร, เรื่อง
defEn: used (to ask) if somebody is upset, unhappy, etc. or if there is a problem
example: What's the matter? Is there something wrong?

defTh: เป็นผู้ใหญ่
defEn: behaving in a sensible way, like an adult
example: Jane is very mature for her age.

defTh: ขยายใหญ่สุด
defEn: to increase something as much as possible
example: to maximize efficiency/fitness/profits

defTh: สูงสุด, มากสุด
defEn: as large, fast, etc. as is possible, or the most that is possible or allowed
example: the maximum amount/number of something

defTh: อาจจะ, พฤษภาคม
defEn: the fifth month of the year, between April and June
example: She was born in May.

defTh: อาจจะ, บางที
defEn: used when you are not certain that something will happen or that something is true or is a correct number
example: Maybe he'll come, maybe he won't.

defTh: นายกเทศมนตรี
defEn: the head of the government of a town or city, etc., elected by the public
example: the Mayor of New York

defTh: ฉัน, ผม, ดิฉัน
defEn: the form of I that is used when the speaker or writer is the object of a verb or preposition, or after the verb be
example: Don't hit me.

defTh: อาหาร, มื้ออาหาร
defEn: an occasion when people eat food, especially breakfast, lunch or dinner
example: Try not to eat between meals.

defTh: หมายถึง, ใจร้าย, ค่าเฉลี่ย
defEn: to have something as a meaning in the same or another language
example: mean something, What does this sentence mean?

defTh: ความหมาย, นัย
defEn: the thing or idea that a sound, word, sign, etc. represents
example: What's the meaning of this word?

defTh: มีความหมาย
defEn: serious and important
example: a meaningful relationship/discussion/experience

defTh: หมายถึง, วิธี
defEn: an action, an object or a system by which a result is achieved; a way of achieving or doing something
example: means of something, Email is a highly effective means of communication.

defTh: ระหว่างนี้
defEn: for a short period of time but not permanently
example: I'm changing my email address but for the meantime you can use the old one.

defTh: ในระหว่างนั้น
defEn: while something else is happening
example: Leave the cake to cool completely. Meanwhile, make the topping.

defTh: วัด, มาตรการ
defEn: an official action that is done in order to achieve a particular aim
example: safety/austerity measures

defTh: การวัด, ขนาด
defEn: the act or the process of finding the size, quantity or degree of something
example: the metric system of measurement

defTh: เนื้อ, อาหาร
defEn: the soft part of an animal or a bird that can be eaten as food; a particular type of this
example: a piece/slice of meat

defTh: ช่างเครื่อง
defEn: a person whose job is repairing machines, especially the engines of vehicles
example: a car/motor mechanic

defTh: เครื่องกล
defEn: operated by power from an engine
example: a mechanical device/toy/clock

defTh: กลไก
defEn: a set of moving parts in a machine that performs a task
example: a delicate watch mechanism

defTh: เหรียญ
defEn: a flat piece of metal, usually like a coin in shape, that is given to the winner of a competition or to somebody who has been brave, for example in war
example: to win a gold medal in the Olympics

defTh: สื่อ
defEn: the main ways that large numbers of people receive information and entertainment, that is television, radio, newspapers and the internet
example: the national/international media

defTh: ทางการแพทย์
defEn: connected with illness and injury and their treatment
example: medical care/treatment

defTh: ยา
defEn: a drug or another form of medicine that you take to prevent or to treat an illness; treatment involving drugs
example: Are you currently taking any medication?

defTh: ยา, เวชศาสตร์
defEn: the study and treatment of diseases and injuries
example: advances in modern medicine

defTh: ยุคกลาง
defEn: connected with the Middle Ages (about AD1000 to AD1450)
example: medieval architecture/castles/manuscripts

defTh: การทำสมาธิ
defEn: the practice of focusing your mind in silence, especially for religious reasons or in order to make your mind calm
example: She found peace through yoga and meditation.

defTh: กลาง, ปานกลาง
defEn: in the middle between a larger and smaller size, amount, length, temperature, etc.
example: There are three sizes—small, medium and large.

defTh: พบ, ประชุม
defEn: to be in the same place as somebody by chance and talk to them
example: Maybe we'll meet again some time.

defTh: การประชุม, พบปะ
defEn: an occasion when people come together to discuss or decide something
example: A hundred people attended the public meeting.

defTh: ทำนอง
defEn: a tune, especially the main tune in a piece of music written for several instruments or voices
example: a haunting melody

defTh: ละลาย, หลอม
defEn: to become or make something become liquid as a result of heating
example: The snow showed no sign of melting.

defTh: สมาชิก, องค์
defEn: a person, an animal or a plant that belongs to a particular group
example: member of something, a member of the family/community

defTh: สมาชิกภาพ
defEn: the state of being a member of a group, a club, an organization, etc.
example: membership of something, (British English), Who is eligible to apply for membership of the association?

defTh: บันทึกข้อความสั้นๆ
defEn: an official note from one person to another in the same organization
example: to write/send a memo

defTh: ความทรงจำ
defEn: an account written by somebody, especially somebody famous, about their life and experiences
example: O'Connor published a childhood memoir.

defTh: น่าจดจำ
defEn: worth remembering or easy to remember, especially because of being special or unusual
example: The holiday provided many memorable moments.

defTh: อนุสรณ์สถาน
defEn: a statue, stone, etc. that is built in order to remind people of an important past event or of a famous person who has died
example: a war memorial (= in memory of soldiers who died in a war)

defTh: ความทรงจำ, หน่วยความจำ
defEn: your ability to remember things
example: memory for something, I have a bad memory for names.

defTh: ทางจิตใจ, เกี่ยวกับจิต
defEn: connected with or happening in the mind; involving the process of thinking
example: the mental process of remembering

defTh: กล่าวถึง, เอ่ย
defEn: an act of referring to somebody/something in speech or writing
example: He made no mention of her work.

defTh: พี่เลี้ยงผู้ให้คำแนะนำ
defEn: an experienced person who advises and helps somebody with less experience over a period of time
example: She was a friend and mentor to many young actors.

defTh: รายการอาหาร
defEn: a list of the food that is available at a restaurant or to be served at a meal
example: May we have the menu?

defTh: พ่อค้า
defEn: a person who buys and sells goods in large quantities, especially one who imports and exports goods
example: a coal/wine merchant

defTh: ความเมตตา
defEn: a kind or forgiving attitude towards somebody that you have the power to harm or right to punish
example: to ask/beg/plead for mercy

defTh: เพียงแค่ (เน้นความเล็กน้อย)
defEn: used when you want to emphasize how small, unimportant, etc. somebody/something is
example: It took her a mere 20 minutes to win.

defTh: เป็นเพียง
defEn: used meaning ‘only’ or ‘simply’ to emphasize a fact or something that you are saying
example: It is not merely a job, but a way of life.

defTh: ผสาน
defEn: to combine or make two or more things combine to form a single thing
example: The banks are set to merge next year.

defTh: การควบรวมกิจการ
defEn: the act of joining two or more organizations or businesses into one
example: If the merger goes through, thousands of jobs will be lost.

defTh: บุญ
defEn: the quality of being good and of deserving praise or reward
example: a work of outstanding artistic merit

defTh: ความยุ่งเหยิง, สกปรก
defEn: a dirty or untidy state
example: in a mess, The room was in a mess.

defTh: ข้อความ, สาร
defEn: a written or spoken piece of information, etc. that you send to somebody or leave for somebody when you cannot speak to them yourself
example: There were no messages for me at the hotel.

defTh: โลหะ, เหล็ก
defEn: a type of solid mineral substance that is usually hard and shiny and that heat and electricity can travel through, for example tin, iron and gold
example: a piece/sheet of metal

defTh: อุปมา
defEn: a word or phrase used to describe somebody/something else, in a way that is different from its normal use, in order to show that the two things have the same qualities and to make the description more powerful, for example She has a heart of stone; the use of such words and phrases
example: a game of football used as a metaphor for the competitive struggle of life

defTh: วิธี, ระเบียบ
defEn: a particular way of doing something
example: Which method is the most effective?

defTh: วิธีการ
defEn: a set of methods and principles used to perform a particular activity
example: recent changes in the methodology of language teaching

defTh: เมตร, จังหวะ
defEn: a unit for measuring length; a hundred centimetres
example: a 50-metre swimming pool

defTh: กลาง, ตรงกลาง
defEn: in a position in the middle of an object, group of objects, people, etc.; between the beginning and the end of something
example: Pens are kept in the middle drawer.

defTh: เที่ยงคืน
defEn: 12 o’clock at night
example: She heard the clock strike midnight.

defTh: ใจกลาง
defEn: the middle part of something
example: in the midst of something, Such beauty was unexpected in the midst of the city.

defTh: อาจ, พลัง
defEn: used when showing that something is or was possible
example: He might get there in time, but I can't be sure.

defTh: การโยกย้าย
defEn: the movement every year of large numbers of birds or animals from one place to another
example: the seasonal migration of blue whales

defTh: อ่อน, เบา
defEn: not severe or strong
example: a mild form of the disease

defTh: ไมล์, ระยะทาง
defEn: a unit for measuring distance equal to 1609 metres or 1760 yards
example: a 20-mile drive to work

defTh: ที่นิยมการใช้กำลังรุนแรง
defEn: using, or willing to use, force or strong pressure to achieve your aims, especially to achieve social or political change
example: militant groups/leaders

defTh: ทหาร, การทหาร
defEn: connected with soldiers or the armed forces
example: We may have to take military action.

defTh: กองกำลังอาสาสมัคร
defEn: a group of people who are not professional soldiers but who have had military training and can act as an army
example: He said he would call out the state militia if the rebels did not surrender.

defTh: นม
defEn: the white liquid produced by cows, goats and some other animals as food for their young and used as a drink by humans
example: a pint/litre of milk

defTh: โรงสี
defEn: a building fitted with equipment for grinding grain into flour; a machine for grinding grain
example: The old mill has been converted into apartments.

defTh: ล้าน
example: a population of half a million

defTh: จิตใจ, ความคิด
defEn: the part of a person that makes them able to be aware of things, to think and to feel
example: the conscious/subconscious mind

defTh: ของฉัน, เหมือง
defEn: a deep hole or holes under the ground where minerals such as coal, gold, etc. are dug
example: a copper/diamond mine

defTh: คนขุดแร่
defEn: a person who works in a mine taking out coal, gold, diamonds, etc.
example: Rescuers are trying to save miners trapped underground after a gas explosion.

defTh: แร่, สินแร่
defEn: a substance that is naturally present in the earth and is not formed from animal or vegetable matter, for example gold and salt. Some minerals are also present in food and drink and in the human body and are essential for good health.
example: a country rich in mineral resources

defTh: ที่มีขนาดหรือปริมาณน้อยมาก
defEn: very small in size or amount; as small as possible
example: The work was carried out at minimal cost.

defTh: ย่อเล็กสุด
defEn: to reduce something, especially something bad, to the lowest possible level
example: Good hygiene helps to minimize the risk of infection.

defTh: ขั้นต่ำสุดตามที่กำหนด
defEn: the smallest that is possible or allowed; extremely small
example: a minimum charge/price

defTh: การทำเหมืองแร่
defEn: the process of getting coal and other minerals from under the ground; the industry involved in this
example: coal/diamond/gold/tin mining

defTh: รัฐมนตรี, บาทหลวง
defEn: a senior member of the government who is in charge of a government department or a branch of one
example: the Minister of Education

defTh: กระทรวง
defEn: a government department that has a particular area of responsibility
example: The Ministry of Defence has issued the following statement.

defTh: ผู้เยาว์, เล็กน้อย
defEn: not very large, important or serious
example: The new plan involves widening a minor road through the valley.

defTh: ชนกลุ่มน้อย
defEn: the smaller part of a group; less than half of the people or things in a large group
example: Only a small minority of students is/are interested in politics these days.

defTh: นาที
defEn: extremely small
example: minute amounts of chemicals in the water

defTh: ความมหัศจรรย์
defEn: an act or event that does not follow the laws of nature and is believed to be caused by God
example: the miracle of rising from the grave

defTh: กระจก, สะท้อน
defEn: a piece of special flat glass that reflects images, so that you can see yourself when you look in it
example: in the mirror, He looked at himself in the mirror.

defTh: น่าเวทนา
defEn: very unhappy or uncomfortable
example: We were cold, wet and thoroughly miserable.

defTh: ความทุกข์ยาก
defEn: great physical or mental pain
example: Fame brought her nothing but misery.

defTh: ทำให้เข้าใจผิด
defEn: giving the wrong idea or impression and making you believe something that is not true
example: misleading information/advertisements

defTh: พลาด, คิดถึง
defEn: to be or arrive too late for something
example: If I don't leave now I'll miss my plane.

defTh: ขีปนาวุธ
defEn: a weapon that is sent through the air and that explodes when it hits the thing that it is aimed at
example: nuclear missiles

defTh: หายไป, ขาดหาย
defEn: that cannot be found or that is not in its usual place; that has been removed, lost or destroyed
example: I never found the missing piece.

defTh: ภารกิจ
defEn: that cannot exist or be done; not possible
example: almost/virtually/nearly impossible

defTh: ข้อผิดพลาด, ทำผิด
defEn: an action or an opinion that is not correct, or that produces a result that you did not want
example: It's easy to make a mistake.

defTh: การผสม, ส่วนผสม
defEn: a combination of different people or things
example: It's a school with a good social and ethnic mix of children.

defTh: ที่ผสมกัน, คละกัน
defEn: consisting of different qualities or elements

defTh: ส่วนผสม, การผสม
defEn: a combination of different things
example: She was a curious mixture, part grand lady, part wild child.

defTh: ม็อบ
defEn: a large crowd of people, especially one that may become violent or cause trouble
example: an angry/unruly mob

defTh: เคลื่อนที่, มือถือ
defEn: connected with mobile phones, tablets, etc.
example: What's your mobile number?

defTh: ความคล่องตัว
defEn: the ability to move easily from one place, social class or job to another
example: social/geographical/career mobility

defTh: ระดมพล
defEn: to work together in order to achieve a particular aim; to organize a group of people to do this

defTh: โหมด
defEn: a particular way of doing something; a particular type of something

defTh: แบบ, ตัวอย่าง, นางแบบ
defEn: a copy of something, usually smaller than the original object

defTh: ปานกลาง
defEn: that is neither very good, large, hot, etc. nor very bad, small, cold, etc.

defTh: ทันสมัย, สมัยใหม่
defEn: of the present time or recent times

defTh: เจียมเนื้อเจียมตัว
defEn: not very large, expensive, important, etc.

defTh: การปรับเปลี่ยน
defEn: the act or process of changing something in order to improve it or make it more acceptable; a change that is made

defTh: ปรับเปลี่ยน, ดัดแปลงเล็กน้อย
defEn: to change something slightly, especially in order to make it more suitable for a particular purpose

defTh: ขณะ, ชั่วครู่
defEn: a very short period of time
example: Could you wait a moment, please?

defTh: โมเมนตัม
defEn: the ability to keep increasing or developing

defTh: วันจันทร์
defEn: the day of the week after Sunday and before Tuesday, the first day of the working week

defTh: เงิน, ทรัพย์สิน
defEn: what you earn by working or selling things, and use to buy things
example: to borrow/save/spend/earn money

defTh: เฝ้าสังเกต, จอภาพ
defEn: a screen that shows information from a computer; a television screen used to show particular kinds of information
example: The details of today's flights are displayed on the monitor.

defTh: พระภิกษุ
defEn: a member of a religious group of men who often live apart from other people in a monastery and who do not marry or have personal possessions
example: Benedictine/Buddhist monks

defTh: ลิง
defEn: an animal with a long tail, that climbs trees and lives in hot countries. There are several types of monkey and they are related to apes and humans.
example: Like humans, apes and monkeys live in complex social groupings.

defTh: การผูกขาด
defEn: the complete control of trade in particular goods or the supply of a particular service; a type of goods or a service that is controlled in this way

defTh: สัตว์ประหลาด
defEn: (in stories) an imaginary creature that is very large, ugly and frightening
example: a monster with three heads

defTh: เดือน, รายเดือน
defEn: any of the twelve periods of time into which the year is divided, for example May or June

defTh: รายเดือน
defEn: happening once a month or every month
example: a monthly meeting/visit/magazine

defTh: อนุสาวรีย์
defEn: a building, column, statue, etc. built to remind people of a famous person or event

defTh: อารมณ์ชั่วขณะ
defEn: the way you are feeling at a particular time
example: in a … mood, She's in a good mood today (= happy and friendly).

defTh: พระจันทร์, เดือน
defEn: the round object that moves around the earth once every 27½ days and shines at night by light reflected from the sun

defTh: ศีลธรรม, คุณธรรม
defEn: connected with principles of right and wrong behaviour
example: a moral issue/dilemma

defTh: ศีลธรรม
defEn: principles relating to right and wrong or good and bad behaviour
example: matters of public/private morality

defTh: มากกว่า, เพิ่มเติม
defEn: used to form the comparative of most adjectives and adverbs with two or more syllables
example: She was far more intelligent than her sister.

defTh: ยิ่งไปกว่านั้น
defEn: used to introduce some new information that adds to or supports what you have said previously
example: A talented artist, he was, moreover, a writer of some note.

defTh: เช้า, ตอนเช้า
defEn: the early part of the day from the time when people wake up until 12 o'clock in the middle of the day or before lunch
example: They left for Spain early this morning.

defTh: จำนอง
defEn: a legal agreement by which a bank or similar organization lends you money to buy a house, etc., and you pay the money back over a particular number of years; the sum of money that you borrow
example: to apply for/take out/pay off a mortgage

defTh: มัสยิด
defEn: a building where Muslims go to worship (= praise God)
example: I used to pray at the local mosque with my father and grandfather.

defTh: ส่วนใหญ่, ที่สุด
defEn: used to form the superlative of most adjectives and adverbs of two or more syllables
example: the most boring/beautiful part

defTh: ส่วนใหญ่, โดยมาก
defEn: mainly; generally
example: The sauce is mostly cream.

defTh: แม่, มารดา
defEn: a female parent of a child or animal; a person who is acting as a mother to a child
example: I want to buy a present for my mother and father.

defTh: การเคลื่อนที่
defEn: the act or process of moving or the way something moves
example: What was Newton's first law of motion?

defTh: สร้างแรงจูงใจ, กระตุ้นให้ทำ
defEn: to be the reason why somebody does something or behaves in a particular way
example: motivate somebody (to do something), What motivates people to carry out such attacks?

defTh: แรงจูงใจ, การจูงใจ (กระบวนการทางจิตวิทยา)
defEn: the reason why somebody does something or behaves in a particular way
example: motivation (behind something), What is the motivation behind this sudden change?

defTh: มูลเหตุ, แรงผลักดัน
defEn: a reason for doing something
example: There seemed to be no motive for the murder.

defTh: เครื่องยนต์, มอเตอร์
defEn: having an engine; using the power of an engine
example: The street is closed to motor vehicles.

defTh: รถจักรยานยนต์
defEn: a road vehicle with two wheels, driven by an engine, with one seat for the driver and often a seat for a passenger behind the driver
example: He never learned to ride a motorcycle or to drive a car.

defTh: ผู้ขับขี่รถยนต์
defEn: a person driving a car

defTh: ภูเขา, ขึ้น
defEn: to organize and begin something
example: Residents mounted a campaign to fight the plans.

defTh: ภูเขา, เทือกเขา
defEn: a very high hill, often with rocks near the top

defTh: หนู, เมาส์
defEn: a small animal that is covered in fur and has a long thin tail. Mice live in fields, in people’s houses or where food is stored.

defTh: ปาก, ทางเข้า
defEn: the opening in the face used for speaking, eating, etc.; the area inside the head behind this opening

defTh: เคลื่อน, ย้าย
defEn: a change of place or position
example: Don't make a move!

defTh: การเคลื่อนไหว
defEn: an act of moving the body or part of the body
example: hand/eye movements

defTh: ภาพยนตร์
defEn: a series of moving pictures recorded with sound that tells a story, watched at a movie theater or on a television or other device
example: You'll love this movie.

defTh: เคลื่อนไหว, ซาบซึ้ง
defEn: causing strong, often sad, feelings about somebody/something

defTh: มาก, เยอะ
defEn: to a great degree

defTh: โคลน, เลน
defEn: wet earth that is soft and sticky
example: The car wheels got stuck in the mud.

defTh: หลายรายการ
defEn: many in number; involving many different people or things
example: The shape appears multiple times within each painting.

defTh: คูณ, เพิ่ม
defEn: to add a number to itself a particular number of times
example: The children are already learning to multiply and divide.

defTh: แม่, คุณแม่
defEn: a mother
example: Call your mum.

defTh: เทศบาล
defEn: connected with or belonging to a town, city or district that has its own local government

defTh: ฆาตกรรม, สังหาร

example: He was found guilty of murder.

defTh: กล้ามเนื้อ
defEn: a piece of body tissue that you make tight and relax in order to move a particular part of the body; the tissue that forms the muscles of the body
example: a calf/neck/thigh muscle

defTh: พิพิธภัณฑ์
defEn: a building in which objects of artistic, cultural, historical or scientific interest are kept and shown to the public
example: a museum of modern art

defTh: ดนตรี, เพลง
defEn: sounds that are arranged in a way that is pleasant or exciting to listen to. People sing music or play it on instruments.

defTh: เกี่ยวกับดนตรี
defEn: connected with music; containing music

defTh: นักดนตรี
defEn: a person who plays a musical instrument or writes music, especially as a job

defTh: ต้อง, จำเป็น
defEn: used to say that something is necessary or very important (sometimes involving a rule or a law)

defTh: ซึ่งกันและกัน
defEn: used to describe feelings that two or more people have for each other equally, or actions that affect two or more people equally

defTh: ของฉัน
defEn: of or belonging to the speaker or writer

defTh: ตัวฉันเอง
defEn: used when the speaker or writer is also the person affected by an action
example: I cut myself on a knife.

defTh: ลึกลับ, น่าสงสัย
defEn: difficult to understand or explain; strange
example: He died in mysterious circumstances.

defTh: ความลึกลับ, ปริศนา
defEn: something that is difficult to understand or to explain
example: It is one of the great unsolved mysteries of this century.

defTh: เทพนิยาย
defEn: a story from ancient times, especially one that was told to explain natural events or to describe the early history of a people; this type of story

defTh: ตะปู, เล็บ
defEn: the thin hard layer covering the outer tip of the fingers or toes

defTh: เปลือยเปล่า, ล่อนจ้อน

defTh: ชื่อ, ตั้งชื่อ
defEn: a word or words that a particular person, animal, place or thing is known by

defTh: กล่าวคือ

defTh: เรื่องเล่า

defTh: แคบ, จำกัด

defTh: น่าขยะแขยง
defEn: very bad or unpleasant

defTh: ชาติ, ประเทศ
defEn: a country considered as a group of people with the same language, culture and history, who live in a particular area under one government

defTh: ระดับชาติ, ของชาติ
defEn: connected with a particular nation; shared by a whole nation

defTh: ทั่วประเทศ
defEn: happening or existing in all parts of a particular country

defTh: พื้นเมือง, โดยกำเนิด
defEn: connected with the place where you were born and lived for the first years of your life

defTh: ธรรมชาติ, โดยธรรมชาติ
defEn: existing in nature; not made or caused by humans

defTh: โดยธรรมชาติ, อย่างเป็นธรรมชาติ
defEn: in a way that you would expect

defTh: ธรรมชาติ, สภาพ
defEn: all the plants, animals and things that exist in the universe that are not made by people

defTh: เกี่ยวกับทหารเรือ, ทางเรือ

defTh: การนำทาง

defTh: ใกล้, เกือบ

defTh: ที่อยู่ใกล้, ในบริเวณใกล้เคียง
defEn: near in position; not far away

defTh: แทบจะ
defEn: almost; not quite; not completely

defTh: เรียบร้อย, สะอาด
defEn: tidy and in order; carefully done or arranged

defTh: อย่างจำเป็น
defEn: used to say that something cannot be avoided

defTh: ที่จำเป็น
defEn: that is needed for a purpose or a reason

defTh: ความจำเป็น
defEn: the fact that something must happen or be done; the need for something

defTh: คอ, ต้นคอ
defEn: the part of the body between the head and the shoulders

defTh: ต้องการ, จำเป็น
defEn: a situation when something is necessary or must be done
example: to satisfy/meet/fulfil a need

defTh: เข็ม, แทง

defTh: เชิงลบ, ปฏิเสธ
defEn: bad or harmful

defTh: ละเลย
defEn: the fact of not giving enough care or attention to something/somebody; the state of not receiving enough care or attention
example: The buildings are crumbling from years of neglect.

defTh: ต่อรอง

defTh: การเจรจาต่อรอง
defEn: formal discussion between people who are trying to reach an agreement

defTh: เพื่อนบ้าน
defEn: a person who lives next to you or near you

defTh: ละแวกบ้าน
defEn: a district or an area of a town; the people who live there

defTh: ที่อยู่ใกล้เคียง, ที่มีอาณาเขตติดต่อกัน

defTh: ไม่ทั้งสอง

defTh: เส้นประสาท, ความกล้า
defEn: any of the long fibres that carry messages between the brain and parts of the body, enabling you to move, feel pain, etc.

defTh: ประหม่า, กังวล
defEn: anxious about something or afraid of something

defTh: รัง, ที่พักพิง
defEn: a hollow place or structure that a bird makes or chooses for laying its eggs in and sheltering its young

defTh: ตาข่าย, สุทธิ

defTh: เครือข่าย

defTh: เป็นกลาง

defTh: ไม่เคย, ไม่

defTh: อย่างไรก็ตาม, ถึงกระนั้น
defEn: despite something that you have just mentioned

defTh: ใหม่, สด
defEn: not existing before; recently made, invented, introduced, etc.

defTh: อย่างเพิ่งเกิดขึ้น, ใหม่ๆ
defEn: recently

defTh: ข่าว

defTh: จดหมายข่าว

example: Our sailing club produces a monthly newsletter.

defTh: หนังสือพิมพ์
defEn: a set of large printed sheets of paper, or a website, containing news, articles, advertisements, etc. and published every day or every week; the organization responsible for producing this

defTh: ถัดไป, หน้า
defEn: coming straight after somebody/something in time, order or space

defTh: ข้างๆ, ถัดไป
defEn: in or into a position right by somebody/something

defTh: ดี, น่ารัก
defEn: pleasant or attractive
example: a nice day/smile/place

defTh: ซอก
defEn: a comfortable or suitable role, job, way of life, etc.

defTh: กลางคืน, ราตรี

defTh: ฝันร้าย
defEn: a dream that is very frightening or unpleasant

defTh: เก้า
example: There are only nine of these rare animals left.

defTh: สิบเก้า
เก้าสิบ
example: The temperature must be in the nineties today.

defTh: ไม่, ไม่มี
defEn: not one; not any; not a
example: No student is to leave the room.

defTh: ไม่มีใครเลย (เป็นทางการ)
defEn: not anyone; no person
example: No one was at home.

defTh: มีเกียรติ
defEn: having or showing fine personal qualities that people admire, such as courage, honesty and care for others
example: a noble leader

defTh: ไม่มีใครเลย (ทั่วไป)
defEn: not anyone; no person
example: Nobody knew what to say.

defTh: พยักหน้า
defEn: if you nod, nod your head or your head nods, you move your head up and down to show agreement, understanding, etc.
example: I asked him if he would help me and he nodded.

defTh: เสียงดัง, เสียงรบกวน
defEn: a sound, especially when it is loud, unpleasant or frightening
example: There was a rattling noise coming from the back of the car.

defTh: ดัง, อึกทึก
defEn: making a lot of noise
example: noisy children/traffic/crowds

defTh: เสนอชื่อ
defEn: to formally suggest that somebody/something should be chosen for an important role, prize, position, etc.
example: nominate somebody/something (for something), She has been nominated for the presidency.

defTh: การเสนอชื่อ
defEn: the act of suggesting or choosing somebody as a candidate in an election, or for a job or an award; the fact of being suggested for this
example: Membership of the club is by nomination only.

defTh: ผู้ได้รับการเสนอชื่อ

example: He was chosen as the party's presidential nominee.

defTh: ไม่แสวงหาผลกำไร
defEn: without the aim of making a profit
example: an independent non-profit organization

defTh: ไม่มี, ไม่เลย
defEn: not one of a group of people or things; not any

defTh: ถึงอย่างนั้น
defEn: despite this fact
example: The book is too long but, nonetheless, informative and entertaining.

defTh: เรื่องไร้สาระ
defEn: ideas, statements or beliefs that you think are silly or not true
example: Reports that he has resigned are nonsense.

defTh: กลางวัน
defEn: 12 o’clock in the middle of the day
example: We should be there by noon.

defTh: และไม่
defEn: and not
example: She seemed neither surprised nor worried.

defTh: บรรทัดฐาน
defEn: a situation or a pattern of behaviour that is usual or expected
example: The new design is a departure from the norm.

defTh: เป็นปรกติ, ตามมาตรฐาน
defEn: typical, usual or ordinary; what you would expect
example: quite/perfectly (= completely) normal

defTh: โดยปกติ, ตามปกติ
defEn: usually; in normal circumstances
example: I would never normally discuss this.

defTh: ทิศเหนือ
defEn: in or towards the north
example: North London

defTh: ทางเหนือ
defEn: located in the north or facing north; connected with or typical of the north part of the world or a region
example: the northern slopes of the mountains

defTh: จมูก
defEn: the part of the face that sticks out above the mouth, used for breathing and smelling things
example: She had dark eyes and a long narrow nose.

defTh: ไม่, มิใช่
defEn: used with be, do or have to form the negative of verbs; used to form the negative of modal verbs like can or must
example: She did not/didn’t see him.

defTh: ที่น่าสังเกต
defEn: deserving to be noticed or to receive attention; important
example: a notable success/achievement/example

defTh: สะดุดตา
defEn: used for giving a good or the most important example of something
example: The house had many drawbacks, most notably its price.

defTh: บันทึก, โน้ต
defEn: a short piece of writing to help you remember something
example: Please make a note of the dates.

defTh: สมุดบันทึก
defEn: a small book of plain paper for writing notes in
example: The police officer wrote the details down in his notebook.

defTh: ไม่มีอะไร
defEn: not anything; no single thing
example: There was nothing in her bag.

defTh: สังเกต, แจ้ง
defEn: a sheet of paper giving written or printed information, usually put in a public place
example: There was a notice on the board saying the class had been cancelled.

defTh: แจ้ง
defEn: to formally or officially tell somebody about something
example: notify somebody, Competition winners will be notified by post.

defTh: ความคิดเห็น, ความเชื่อ
defEn: an idea, a belief or an understanding of something

defTh: ฉาวโฉ่
defEn: well known for being bad
example: a notorious criminal

defTh: นวนิยาย, แปลกใหม่
defEn: different from anything known before; new, interesting and often seeming slightly strange
example: a novel feature

defTh: นักประพันธ์
defEn: a person who writes novels
example: a romantic/historical novelist

defTh: พฤศจิกายน
defEn: the 11th month of the year, between October and December
example: She was born in November.

defTh: ตอนนี้, เดี๋ยวนี้
defEn: (at) the present time
example: Where are you living now?

defTh: ทุกวันนี้
defEn: at the present time, in contrast with the past
example: Nowadays most kids prefer going online to reading books.

defTh: ที่ไหนเลย
defEn: not in or to any place
example: I had nowhere to live, so I was sleeping on my sister's couch.

defTh: นิวเคลียร์, เกี่ยวกับนิวเคลียร์
defEn: using, producing or resulting from nuclear energy
example: a nuclear power plant/station

defTh: จำนวน, ตัวเลข
defEn: a word or symbol that represents an amount or a quantity
example: Think of a number and multiply it by two.

defTh: มากมาย
defEn: existing in large numbers
example: He has been late on numerous occasions.

defTh: พยาบาล, ดูแล
defEn: a person whose job is to take care of sick or injured people, usually in a hospital

defTh: สถานรับเลี้ยงเด็ก
defEn: a place where young children are cared for while their parents are at work; a day nursery or nursery school
example: at nursery, Her youngest child is at nursery now.

defTh: การพยาบาล
defEn: the job or skill of caring for people who are sick or injured

defTh: ถั่ว, บ้า
defEn: a small hard fruit with a very hard shell that grows on some trees

defTh: โภชนาการ
defEn: the process by which living things receive the food necessary for them to grow and be healthy

defTh: โมง

defTh: โรคอ้วน

defTh: เชื่อฟัง, ทำตาม

defTh: วัตถุ, คัดค้าน
defEn: a thing that can be seen and touched, but is not alive

defTh: การคัดค้าน
defEn: a reason why you do not like or are opposed to something; a statement about this

defTh: วัตถุประสงค์, เป็นกลาง
defEn: not influenced by personal feelings or opinions; considering only facts

defTh: ภาระผูกพัน
defEn: the state of being forced to do something because it is your duty, or because of a law, etc.

defTh: ผูกมัดด้วยหน้าที่, ทำให้มีภาระ
defEn: to force somebody to do something, by law, because it is a duty, etc.

defTh: การสังเกต
defEn: the act of watching somebody/something carefully for a period of time, especially to learn something

defTh: สังเกต, เฝ้าดู
defEn: to see or notice somebody/something
example: observe somebody/something, Have you observed any changes lately?

defTh: ผู้สังเกตการณ์
defEn: a person who watches somebody/something

defTh: ครอบงำ

defTh: ความหมกมุ่น

example: Her fear of flying is bordering on obsession.

defTh: อุปสรรค
defEn: a situation, an event, etc. that makes it difficult for you to do or achieve something

defTh: ได้รับ, ได้มา
defEn: to get something, especially by making an effort

defTh: ชัดเจน, เห็นได้ชัด
defEn: easy to see or understand

defTh: อย่างชัดแจ้ง
defEn: used when giving information that you expect other people to know already or agree with

defTh: โอกาส, เหตุการณ์
defEn: a particular time when something happens

defTh: เป็นครั้งคราว
defEn: happening or done sometimes but not often

defTh: บางครั้ง, เป็นครั้งคราว

defTh: อาชีพ
defEn: a job or profession

defTh: ยึดครอง, อาศัย
defEn: to fill or use a space, an area or an amount of time

defTh: เกิดขึ้น, ปรากฏ
defEn: to happen

defTh: การเกิดขึ้น
defEn: something that happens or exists
example: a common/everyday/frequent/regular occurrence

defTh: มหาสมุทร
defEn: the mass of salt water that covers most of the earth’s surface
example: The ship was dredged from the depths of the ocean.

defTh: ตุลาคม
defEn: the 10th month of the year, between September and November
example: She was born in October.

defTh: คี่, แปลก
defEn: strange or unusual
example: They're very odd people.

defTh: อัตราต่อรอง
defEn: the degree to which something is likely to happen

defTh: ของ, แห่ง
defEn: belonging to somebody; relating to somebody

defTh: ปิด, ออก, จาก
defEn: used to say that something has been removed or become separated

defTh: การกระทำผิด
defEn: an illegal act

defTh: ทำให้ขุ่นเคือง

defTh: ผู้กระทำความผิด

defTh: ที่ก่อให้เกิดความขุ่นเคือง

defTh: เสนอ, ข้อเสนอ

defTh: การเสนอขาย

defTh: สำนักงาน, ที่ทำงาน

defTh: เจ้าหน้าที่, นาย

defTh: ทางการ, เจ้าหน้าที่
defEn: agreed to, said, done, etc. by somebody who is in a position of authority

defTh: ลูกหลาน

defTh: บ่อยๆ, หลายครั้ง
defEn: many times

defTh: โอ้, อ๋อ, เหรอ
defEn: used when you are reacting to something that has been said, especially if you did not know it before

defTh: น้ำมัน

defTh: ตกลง
defEn: safe and well; in a calm or happy state

defTh: แก่, เก่า, โบราณ
defEn: of a particular age

defTh: ล้าสมัย
defEn: not modern; no longer fashionable

defTh: บน, เกี่ยวกับ
defEn: on somebody’s body; being worn

defTh: ครั้งหนึ่ง, เมื่อก่อน
defEn: on one occasion only; one time

defTh: หนึ่ง, อันเดียว
defEn: the number 1
example: Do you want one or two?

defTh: ที่ดำเนินอยู่
defEn: continuing to exist or develop
example: an ongoing debate/discussion/process

defTh: หัวหอม
defEn: a round vegetable with many layers inside each other and a brown, red or white skin. Onions have a strong smell and taste.
example: Chop the onions finely.

defTh: ออนไลน์, บนเครือข่าย
defEn: available on or done using the internet or other computer network
example: Online shopping is both cheap and convenient.

defTh: เท่านั้น, เพียงแต่
defEn: used to say that no other or others of the same group exist or are there

defTh: บน, ไปบน
defEn: used with verbs to express movement on or to a particular place or position
example: Move the books onto the second shelf.

defTh: เปิด, อ้า, กว้าง
defEn: allowing things or people to go through; not closed or blocked
example: A wasp flew in the open window.

defTh: การเปิด, ช่อง
defEn: a space or hole that somebody/something can pass through

defTh: อย่างเปิดเผย
defEn: without hiding any feelings, opinions or information
example: Can you talk openly about sex with your parents?

defTh: โอเปร่า
defEn: a dramatic work in which all or most of the words are sung to music; works of this type as an art form or entertainment

defTh: ดำเนินการ, ผ่าตัด
defEn: to work in a particular way

defTh: การผ่าตัด, ปฏิบัติการ

defTh: การดำเนินงาน
defEn: connected with the way in which a business, machine, system, etc. works

defTh: ตัวดำเนินการ
defEn: a person who operates equipment or a machine

defTh: ความเห็น, ความคิดเห็น
defEn: your feelings or thoughts about somebody/something, rather than a fact

defTh: คู่ต่อสู้, ฝ่ายตรงข้าม
defEn: a person that you are playing or fighting against in a game, competition, argument, etc.

defTh: โอกาส, ช่องทาง
defEn: a time when a particular situation makes it possible to do or achieve something

defTh: คัดค้าน, ต่อต้าน

defTh: ตรงข้าม

defTh: มองโลกในแง่ดี

defTh: ส้ม, สีส้ม

defTh: อวัยวะ, เครื่องมือ

defTh: อินทรีย์

defTh: องค์กร, การจัด

defTh: จัดระเบียบ

defTh: ออแกไนเซอร์

defTh: ปฐมนิเทศ
defEn: a person’s basic beliefs or feelings about a particular subject

defTh: ต้นกำเนิด, ที่มา
defEn: the point from which something starts; the cause of something

defTh: ดั้งเดิม, ต้นฉบับ

defTh: ดั้งเดิม, แต่เดิม
defEn: used to describe the situation that existed at the beginning of a particular period or activity, especially before something was changed

defTh: กำเนิด
defEn: to happen or appear for the first time in a particular place or situation

defTh: อื่น, อื่นๆ, อีก
defEn: used to refer to people or things that are additional or different to people or things that have been mentioned or are known about

defEn: used to state what the result would be if something did not happen or if the situation were different

defTh: (คำนำหน้า) ของเรา

defTh: (สรรพนาม) สิ่งที่เป็นของเรา
defEn: the one or ones that belong to us

defTh: ตัวเราเอง

defTh: ข้างนอก, หมด

defTh: การปะทุ, การระบาดเริ่มต้น

defTh: ผลลัพธ์

defTh: กลางแจ้ง

defTh: ภายนอก, ด้านนอก

defTh: ชุดเสื้อผ้า

defTh: ออกนอกบ้าน

defTh: ทางออก

defTh: โครงร่าง, สรุป
defEn: a description of the main facts or points involved in something

defTh: แนวโน้ม

defTh: ผลผลิต, ส่งออก

defTh: ความชั่วร้าย

defTh: ภายนอก, ข้างนอก

defTh: โดดเด่น, ยอดเยี่ยม

defTh: เหนือ, เกิน, จบ

defTh: โดยรวม, ทั้งหมด

defTh: มองข้าม

defTh: สุดเหวี่ยง

defTh: ค้างคืน

defTh: ในต่างประเทศ

defTh: ดูแลการทำงาน, ควบคุมทั่วไป
defEn: to watch somebody/something and make sure that a job or an activity is done correctly

defTh: คว่ำ

defTh: ประเด
defEn: to have such a strong emotional effect on somebody that it is difficult for them to resist or know how to react

defTh: ล้นหลาม
defEn: very great or very strong; so powerful that you cannot resist it or decide how to react

defTh: เป็นหนี้

defTh: เป็นเจ้าของ, ของตนเอง
defEn: used to emphasize that something belongs to or is connected with somebody

defTh: เจ้าของ
defEn: a person who owns something

defTh: ความเป็นเจ้าของ
defEn: the fact of owning something

defTh: ออกซิเจน

defTh: ก้าว
defEn: the speed at which somebody/something walks, runs or moves

defTh: หีบห่อ (ของที่จัดรวมกัน)

defTh: บรรจุภัณฑ์

defTh: หีบห่อ, ซอง
defEn: a small container made of paper or card in which goods are packed for selling

defTh: เบาะ
