defTh: หน้า, พลิกหน้า
defEn: one side or both sides of a sheet of paper in a book, magazine, etc.
example: Turn to page 64.

defTh: ความเจ็บปวด
defEn: the feelings that you have in your body when you have been hurt or when you are ill
example: a cry of pain

defTh: เจ็บปวด, น่าปวด
defEn: causing you pain
example: Is your back still painful?

defTh: ทาสี, สี
defEn: a liquid that is put on surfaces to give them a particular colour; a layer of this liquid when it has dried on a surface
example: white paint

defTh: จิตรกร, ช่างทาสี
defEn: a person whose job is painting buildings, walls, etc.
example: He works as a painter and decorator.

defTh: ภาพวาด, การวาด
defEn: a picture that has been painted
example: a watercolour/crylic painting

defTh: คู่, จับคู่
defEn: two things of the same type, especially when they are used or worn together
example: a pair of shoes/boots

defTh: พระราชวัง
defEn: the official home of a king, queen, president, etc.
example: Buckingham Palace

defTh: ซีด, จาง
defEn: having skin that is very light in colour; having skin that has less colour than usual because of illness, a strong emotion, etc.
example: a pale complexion

defTh: ปาล์ม
defEn: a straight tree with a mass of long leaves at the top, growing in tropical countries. There are several types of palm tree, some of which produce fruit.
example: a date palm

defTh: กระทะ
แผง, คณะ
defEn: a square or rectangular piece of wood, glass or metal that forms part of a larger surface such as a door or wall
example: One of the glass panels in the front door was cracked.

defTh: ตื่นตกใจ
defEn: a sudden feeling of great fear that cannot be controlled and prevents you from thinking clearly
example: a moment of panic

defTh: กางเกง
defEn: underpants or knickers
example: a pair of pants

defTh: กระดาษ, เอกสาร
defEn: the thin material that you write and draw on and that is also used for wrapping and packing things
example: a piece/sheet of paper

defTh: ขบวนพาเหรด
defEn: a public celebration of a special day or event, usually with bands in the streets and decorated vehicles
example: the Lord Mayor’s parade

defTh: ย่อหน้า
defEn: a section of a piece of writing, usually consisting of several sentences dealing with a single subject. The first sentence of a paragraph starts on a new line.
example: an opening/introductory paragraph

defTh: ขนาน, คู่ขนาน
defEn: two or more lines that are parallel to each other are the same distance apart at every point
example: parallel lines

defTh: พารามิเตอร์
defEn: something that decides or limits the way in which something can be done
example: to set/define the parameters

defTh: ผู้ปกครอง, พ่อแม่
defEn: a person’s father or mother
example: He's still living with his parents.

defTh: ผู้ปกครอง
defEn: connected with a parent or parents
example: parental responsibility/rights

defTh: ตำบล
defEn: an area that has its own church and that a priest is responsible for
example: a parish church/priest

defTh: สวนสาธารณะ, จอด
defEn: an area of public land in a town or a city where people go to walk, play and relax
example: Hyde Park

defTh: ที่จอดรถ
defEn: the act of stopping a vehicle at a place and leaving it there for a period of time
example: There is no parking here between 9 a.m. and 6 p.m.

defTh: รัฐสภา, สภา
defEn: the group of people who are elected to make and change the laws of a country
example: The German parliament is called the ‘Bundestag’.

defTh: เกี่ยวกับรัฐสภา (ทั่วไป)
defEn: connected with a parliament; having a parliament
example: parliamentary elections

defTh: ส่วนประกอบ
defEn: some but not all of a thing
example: We spent part of the time in the museum.

defTh: นอกเวลา
defEn: for part of the day or week in which people work
example: She's looking for a part-time job.

defTh: เป็นบางส่วน, ไม่ทั้งหมด
defEn: not complete or whole
example: It was only a partial solution to the problem.

defTh: โดยบางส่วน, อย่างไม่สมบูรณ์
defEn: partly; not completely
example: The road was partially blocked by a fallen tree.

defTh: ผู้เข้าร่วม
defEn: a person who is taking part in an activity or event
example: The average age of study participants was 48 years.

defTh: เข้าร่วม
defEn: to take part in or become involved in an activity
example: Anyone who wishes to participate is welcome.

defTh: การเข้าร่วม, การมีบทบาท
defEn: the act of taking part in an activity or event
example: a show with lots of audience participation

defTh: โดยเฉพาะ, เจาะจง
defEn: used to emphasize that you are referring to one individual person, thing or type of thing and not others
example: There is one particular patient I'd like you to see.

defTh: โดยเฉพาะอย่างยิ่ง, เป็นพิเศษ
defEn: especially; more than usual or more than others
example: particularly useful/important/interesting

defTh: บางส่วน, ส่วนหนึ่ง
defEn: to some extent; not completely
example: Some people are unwilling to attend the classes partly because of the cost involved.

defTh: คู่หู, หุ้นส่วน
defEn: a person that you are doing an activity with, such as dancing or playing a game
example: a dance/tennis partner

defTh: หุ้นส่วน, ความร่วมมือ
defEn: the state of being a partner in business
example: to be in/to go into partnership

defTh: งานเลี้ยง, พรรค
defEn: a social occasion, often in a person’s home, at which people eat, drink, talk, dance and enjoy themselves
example: a dinner/tea/cocktail party

defTh: ผ่าน, ส่ง, บัตร
defEn: an official document or ticket that shows that you have the right to enter or leave a place, to travel on a bus or train, etc.
example: a boarding pass (= for a plane)

defTh: ทางเดิน, ข้อความ
defEn: a long narrow area with walls on either side that connects one room or place with another
example: A dark narrow passage led to the main hall.

defTh: ผู้โดยสาร
defEn: a person who is travelling in a car, bus, train, plane or ship and who is not driving it or working on it
example: airline/cruise/rail/bus passengers

defTh: การผ่าน, ชั่วคราว
defEn: the process of time going by
example: The colour of the wood darkens with the passing of time.

defTh: ความกระตือรือร้นอย่างแรงกล้า
defEn: a very strong feeling of love, hate, anger, enthusiasm, etc.
example: I admire the passion and commitment shown by the players.

defTh: หลงใหล
defEn: having or showing strong feelings of sexual love or of anger, etc.
example: to have a passionate nature

defTh: เฉยๆ
defEn: accepting what happens or what people do without trying to change anything or oppose them
example: He played a passive role in the relationship.

defTh: หนังสือเดินทาง
defEn: an official document that identifies you as a citizen of a particular country, and that you may have to show when you enter or leave a country
example: a valid passport

defTh: รหัสผ่าน
defEn: a series of letters, numbers, etc. that you must type into a computer or computer system in order to be able to use it
example: Enter a username and password to get into the system.

defTh: อดีต, ที่ผ่านมา
defEn: gone by in time
example: in past years/centuries

defTh: บาทหลวง
defEn: a minister in charge of a Christian church or group, especially in some Nonconformist churches
example: He was ordained a pastor in the Lutheran Church.

defTh: แพทช์
defEn: a small area of something, especially one which is different from the area around it
example: a black dog with a white patch on its back

defTh: สิทธิบัตร
defEn: an official right to be the only person to make, use or sell a product or an invention; a document that proves this
example: patent on something, to apply for/obtain/take out a patent on an invention

defTh: เส้นทาง, วิถี
defEn: a way or track that is built or is made by the action of people walking
example: a dirt/gravel/concrete path

defTh: เส้นทางเดิน
defEn: a track that serves as a path
example: They came out of the woods and onto a pathway.

defTh: ความอดกลั้น
defEn: the ability to stay calm and accept a delay or something annoying without complaining
example: She has little patience with (= will not accept or consider) such views.

defTh: อดทน, ผู้ป่วย
defEn: able to wait for a long time or accept annoying behaviour or difficulties without becoming angry
example: You'll just have to be patient and wait till I'm finished.

defTh: ลาดตระเวน
defEn: the act of going to different parts of a building, an area, etc. to make sure that there is no trouble or crime
example: Security guards make regular patrols at night.

defTh: ผู้อุปถัมภ์
defEn: a person who gives money and support to artists and writers
example: Frederick the Great was the patron of many artists.

defTh: แบบแผน, ลวดลาย
defEn: the regular way in which something happens or is done
example: changing patterns of urban life

defTh: หยุดชั่วคราว
defEn: a period of time during which somebody stops talking or stops what they are doing
example: There was a long pause before she answered.

defTh: จ่าย, ค่าจ้าง
defEn: the money that somebody gets for doing regular work
example: Her job is hard work, but the pay is good.

defTh: การชำระเงิน
defEn: the act of paying somebody/something or of being paid
example: What method of payment do you prefer?

defTh: สันติภาพ, ความสงบ
defEn: a situation or a period of time in which there is no war or violence in a country or an area
example: world peace

defTh: สงบ, สันติ
defEn: not involving a war, violence or argument
example: a peaceful protest/demonstration

defTh: จุดสูงสุด, ยอด
defEn: the point when somebody/something is best, most successful, strongest, etc.
example: Traffic reaches its peak between 8 and 9 in the morning.

defTh: ชาวนา
defEn: (especially in the past, or in poorer countries) a farmer who owns or rents a small piece of land
example: peasant farmers

defTh: แปลก, ผิดปกติ, มีลักษณะเฉพาะตัว
defEn: strange or unusual, especially in a way that is unpleasant or makes you worried
example: a peculiar smell/taste

defTh: เพื่อนร่วมรุ่น, ผู้ที่อยู่ในระดับเดียวกัน
defEn: a person who is the same age or who has the same social status as you
example: She enjoys the respect of her peers.

defTh: ปากกา
defEn: an instrument made of plastic or metal used for writing with ink (= coloured liquid for writing, etc.)
example: an ink pen

defTh: บทลงโทษ, ค่าปรับ (เฉพาะเจาะจง)
defEn: a punishment for breaking a law, rule or contract
example: to impose a penalty

defTh: ดินสอ
defEn: a narrow piece of wood, or a metal or plastic case, containing a black or coloured substance, used for drawing or writing
example: I'll get a pencil and paper.

defTh: เหรียญเพนนี
defEn: a small British coin and unit of money. There are 100 pence in one pound (£1).
example: He had a few pennies in his pocket.

defTh: เงินบำนาญ
ผู้คน, ประชาชน
defEn: human beings; men, women and children
example: At least ten people were killed in the crash.

defTh: พริกไทย, โรย
defEn: a powder made from dried berries (called peppercorns), used to give a hot, spicy taste to food
example: Season with salt and pepper

defTh: ต่อ, แต่ละ
defEn: used to express the cost or amount of something for each person, number used, distance travelled, etc.
example: Rooms cost £50 per person, per night.

defTh: เปอร์เซ็นต์, ร้อยละ
defEn: by, in or for every hundred
example: a 15 per cent rise in price

defTh: รับรู้
defEn: to understand or think of somebody/something in a particular way
example: perceive somebody/something/yourself (as something), This discovery was perceived as a major breakthrough.

defTh: เปอร์เซ็นต์
defEn: the number, amount or rate of something, expressed as if it is part of a total that is 100; a part or share of a whole
example: percentage of something/somebody, What percentage of the population is/are overweight?

defTh: การรับรู้ทางประสาทสัมผัส, ทัศนคติ
defEn: an idea, a belief or an image you have as a result of how you see or understand something
example: a campaign to change public perception of the police

defTh: สมบูรณ์แบบ, ดีเลิศ
defEn: having everything that is necessary; complete and without faults or weaknesses
example: in perfect condition

defTh: อย่างไร้ที่ติ
defEn: completely
example: It's perfectly normal to feel like this.

defTh: แสดง, กระทำ
defEn: to entertain an audience by playing a piece of music, acting in a play, etc.
example: to perform a song/dance/play

defTh: การแสดง, สมรรถนะ
defEn: the act of performing a play, concert or some other form of entertainment
example: The performance starts at seven.

defTh: บางที, อาจจะ
defEn: possibly
example: ‘Are you going to come?’ ‘Perhaps. I'll see how I feel.’

defTh: ช่วงเวลา, ประจำเดือน
defEn: a particular length of time
example: a long/an extended period

defTh: ถาวร, คงทน
defEn: lasting for a long time or for all time in the future; existing all the time
example: She was unable to find a permanent job.

defTh: อย่างถาวร, ตลอดไป
defEn: in a way that lasts for a long time or for all time in the future; in a way that exists all the time
example: The stroke left his right side permanently damaged.

defTh: การอนุญาต
defEn: the act of allowing somebody to do something, especially when this is done by somebody in a position of authority
example: permission for something, You must ask permission for all major expenditure.

defTh: อนุญาต, ใบอนุญาต
defEn: an official document that gives somebody the right to do something, especially for a limited period of time
example: a parking/building permit

defTh: ยังคงอยู่
defEn: to continue to do something despite difficulties or opposition, in a way that can seem unreasonable
example: persist in doing something, Why do you persist in blaming yourself for what happened?

defTh: ดื้อดึง
defEn: determined to do something despite difficulties, especially when other people are against you and think that you are being annoying or unreasonable
example: How do you deal with persistent salesmen who won't take no for an answer?

defTh: คน, บุคคล
defEn: a human as an individual
example: What sort of person would do a thing like that?

defTh: ส่วนตัว, เฉพาะบุคคล
defEn: your own; not belonging to or connected with anyone else
example: The novel is written from personal experience.

defTh: บุคลิกภาพ, ลักษณะ
defEn: the various aspects of a person’s character that combine to make them different from other people
example: His wife has a strong personality.

defTh: โดยส่วนตัว
defEn: used to show that you are giving your own opinion about something
example: Personally, I prefer the second option.

defTh: บุคลากร
defEn: the people who work for an organization or one of the armed forces
example: There is a severe shortage of skilled personnel.

defTh: ทัศนคติ
defEn: a particular attitude towards something; a way of thinking about something
example: a global perspective

defTh: ชักชวน, โน้มน้าว
defEn: to make somebody do something by giving them good reasons for doing it
example: persuade somebody to do something, Try to persuade him to come.

defTh: สัตว์เลี้ยง
defEn: an animal, a bird, etc. that you have at home for pleasure, rather than one that is kept for work or food
example: Do you have any pets?

defTh: คำร้อง
defEn: a written document signed by a large number of people that asks somebody in a position of authority to do or change something
example: petition against something, Would you like to sign our petition against experiments on animals?

defTh: น้ำมันเบนซิน
defEn: a liquid obtained from petroleum, used as fuel in car engines, etc.
example: to fill a car up with petrol

defTh: ระยะ, ช่วง
defEn: a stage in a process of change or development
example: during the initial/final phase

defTh: ปรากฏการณ์, สิ่งที่น่าอัศจรรย์
defEn: a fact or an event in nature or society, especially one that is not fully understood
example: cultural/natural phenomena

defTh: นักปรัชญา
defEn: a person who studies or writes about philosophy
example: We studied the writings of the Greek philosopher Aristotle.

defTh: เชิงปรัชญา
defEn: connected with philosophy
example: the philosophical writings of Kant

defTh: ปรัชญา, หลักปรัชญา
defEn: the study of the nature and meaning of the universe and of human life
example: philosophy of something, the philosophy of science

defTh: โทรศัพท์ (คำเรียกทั่วไป)
defEn: a piece of equipment for talking to people who are not in the same place as you
example: I have to make a phone call.

defTh: รูปภาพ, ภาพถ่าย
defEn: a picture that is made by using a camera that stores images in digital form or that has a film sensitive to light inside it
example: a colour/black-and-white photo

defTh: รูปถ่าย, ถ่ายรูป
defEn: a picture that is made by using a camera that stores images in digital form or that has a film sensitive to light inside it
example: aerial photographs of the crash site

defTh: ช่างภาพ
defEn: a person who takes photographs, especially as a job
example: a wedding/wildlife/fashion photographer

defTh: การถ่ายภาพ
defEn: the art, process or job of taking photographs or filming something
example: Her hobbies include hiking and photography.

defTh: วลี, กลุ่มคำ
defEn: a group of words that have a particular meaning when used together
example: a memorable/catchy phrase

defTh: ทางกายภาพ, กาย
defEn: connected with a person’s body rather than their mind
example: physical activity/fitness

defTh: แพทย์
defEn: a doctor, especially one who is a specialist in general medicine and not surgery
example: Dr Dennett is a practicing family physician in Atlanta.

defTh: ฟิสิกส์, กลศาสตร์
defEn: the scientific study of matter and energy and the relationships between them, including the study of forces, heat, light, sound, electricity and the structure of atoms
example: a degree in physics

defTh: เปียโน, เครื่องดนตรี
defEn: a large musical instrument played by pressing the black and white keys on the keyboard. The sound is produced by small hammers hitting the metal strings inside the piano.
example: to play the piano

defTh: เลือก, เก็บ
defEn: an act of choosing something
example: Take your pick (= choose).

defTh: รูปภาพ, ภาพ
defEn: a painting or drawing, etc. that shows a scene, a person or thing
example: He likes books with lots of pictures in them.

defTh: ชิ้น, ส่วน
defEn: an amount of something that has been cut or separated from the rest of it; a standard amount of something
example: piece of something, She wrote something on a small piece of paper.

defTh: หมู, คนตะกละ
defEn: an animal with pink, black or brown skin, short legs, a broad nose and a short curly tail. Pigs are kept on farms for their meat (called pork) or live in the wild.
example: a pig farmer

defTh: กอง, สุม
defEn: a number of things that have been placed on top of each other
example: pile of something, a pile of clothes/paper

defTh: ยาเม็ด
defEn: a small flat round piece of medicine that you swallow whole, without biting it
example: a vitamin pill

defTh: นักบิน, นำร่อง
defEn: a person who operates the controls of an aircraft, especially as a job
example: an airline pilot

defTh: เข็ม, หมุด
defEn: a short thin piece of stiff wire with a sharp point at one end and a round head at the other, used especially for fastening together pieces of cloth when sewing
example: Use pins to keep the patch in place while you sew it on.

defTh: สีชมพู
defEn: pale red in colour
example: pale pink roses

defTh: ผู้บุกเบิก
defEn: a person who is the first to study and develop a particular area of knowledge, culture, etc. that other people then continue to develop
example: a pioneer in the field of microsurgery

defTh: ท่อ, สูบ
defEn: a tube through which liquids and gases can flow
example: Both hot and cold water pipes should be properly insulated.

defTh: ไปป์ไลน์
defEn: a series of pipes that are usually underground and are used for carrying oil, gas, etc. over long distances
example: There are plans to lay a gas pipeline through the region.

defTh: โจรสลัด
defEn: (especially in the past) a person on a ship who attacks other ships at sea in order to steal from them
example: There were reports that a pirate ship had come looking for treasure in the cove.

defTh: หลุม
defEn: a large deep hole in the ground
example: We dug a deep pit in the yard.

defTh: ระดับเสียง, ขว้าง
defEn: an area of ground specially prepared and marked for playing a sports game
example: a football pitch

defTh: ความสงสาร, เวทนา
defEn: used to show that you are disappointed about something
example: a pity (that…), It's a pity that you can't stay longer.

defTh: สถานที่
defEn: a particular position, point or area
example: in a place, Keep your purse in a safe place.

defTh: ตำแหน่ง
defEn: the act of finding somebody a suitable job or place to live
example: a job placement service

defTh: ธรรมดา, เรียบง่าย
defEn: not decorated or complicated; simple
example: a plain but elegant dress

defTh: แผน, วางแผน
defEn: something that you intend to do or achieve
example: plan for something, Do you have any plans for the summer?

defTh: เครื่องบิน, ระนาบ
defEn: a flying vehicle with wings and one or more engines
example: a passenger/fighter/military/private plane

defTh: ดาวเคราะห์
defEn: a large round object in space that moves around a star (such as the sun) and receives light from it
example: the planets of our solar system

defTh: การวางแผน
defEn: the act or process of making plans for something
example: The department is responsible for all financial planning.

defTh: พืช, ปลูก
defEn: a living thing that grows in the earth and usually has a stem, leaves and roots, especially one that is smaller than a tree or bush
example: All plants need light and water.

defTh: พลาสติก, ปลอม
defEn: made of plastic
example: a plastic bag/bottle/cup

defTh: จาน, แผ่น
defEn: a flat, usually round, dish that you put food on
example: sandwiches on a plate

defTh: ชานชาลา, เวที
defEn: the raised flat area next to the track at a train station where you get on or off the train
example: (British English), What platform does it go from?

defTh: เล่น, การเล่น
defEn: a piece of writing performed by actors in a theatre or on television or radio
example: a stage/radio play

defTh: ผู้เล่น, นักกีฬา
defEn: a person who takes part in a game or sport
example: a football/tennis/chess player

defTh: คำร้องขอ, ข้ออ้าง
defEn: a serious emotional request, especially for something needing action now
example: plea for something, She made an impassioned plea for help.

defTh: อ้อนวอน, ร้องขอ
defEn: to ask somebody for something in a very strong and serious way
example: plead (with somebody) (to do something), She pleaded with him not to go.

defTh: น่าพอใจ, สบาย
defEn: fun, attractive, or giving pleasure
example: a pleasant evening/atmosphere/walk

defTh: กรุณา, โปรด
defEn: used as a polite way of asking for something or telling somebody to do something
example: Please sit down.

defTh: ยินดี, พอใจ
defEn: feeling happy about something
example: You're coming? I'm so pleased.

defTh: ความพึงพอใจ
defEn: a state of feeling or being happy or satisfied
example: His eyes lit up with pleasure.

defTh: จำนำ
defEn: a serious promise
example: pledge (of something), a pledge of support

defTh: มากมาย, เพียงพอ
defEn: a large amount; as much or as many as you need
example: plenty of eggs/money/time

defTh: โครงเรื่อง, วางแผน
defEn: the series of events that form the story of a novel, play, film, etc.
example: It's hard to follow the plot of the film.

defTh: ปลั๊ก, อุด
defEn: a small plastic object with two or three metal pins that connects a piece of electrical equipment to the main supply of electricity
example: The iron is fitted with a three-pin plug.

defTh: กระโดด
defEn: to move or make somebody/something move suddenly forwards and/or downwards
example: + adv./prep., She lost her balance and plunged 100 feet to her death.

defTh: บวก
defEn: used after a number to show that the real number or amount is more than the one mentioned
example: The work will cost £10000 plus.

defTh: กระเป๋าเสื้อ
defEn: a small piece of material like a small bag sewn into or onto a piece of clothing so that you can carry things in it
example: a jacket/coat/shirt/trouser pocket

defTh: บทกวี, โคลง
defEn: a piece of writing in which the words are chosen for their sound and the images they suggest, not just for their obvious meanings. The words are arranged in separate lines, usually with a repeated rhythm, and often the lines rhyme at the end.
example: His collected poems were published after the war.

defTh: กวี
defEn: a person who writes poems
example: an internationally renowned poet

defTh: บทกวี, กวีนิพนธ์
defEn: poems in general; poems as a genre of literature
example: lyric/epic poetry

defTh: จุด, ประเด็น, ชี้
defEn: a thing that somebody says or writes giving their opinion or stating a fact
example: She made several interesting points in the article.

defTh: แหลม, ชี้
defEn: having a sharp end
example: a pointed chin

defTh: ยาพิษ, วางยา
defEn: a substance that causes death or harm if it gets into the body
example: Some mushrooms contain a deadly poison.

defTh: เป็นพิษ, มีพิษ
defEn: causing death or illness if swallowed or taken into the body
example: poisonous chemicals/fumes/plants

defTh: เสา, ขั้ว
defEn: a long thin straight piece of wood or metal, especially one with the end placed in the ground, used as a support
example: a tent pole

defTh: ตำรวจ, กองตำรวจ
defEn: an official organization whose job is to make people obey the law and to prevent and solve crime; the people who work for this organization
example: Get out of the house or I'll call the police.

defTh: เจ้าหน้าที่ตำรวจ
defEn: a male police officer
example: a plain-clothes/uniformed policeman

defTh: นโยบาย, แผน
defEn: a plan of action agreed or chosen by a political party, a business, etc.
example: policy on something, the present government’s policy on education

defTh: สุภาพ, มีมารยาท
defEn: having or showing good manners and respect for the feelings of others
example: polite to somebody, Please be polite to our guests.

defTh: ทางการเมือง
defEn: connected with the state, government or public affairs
example: a monarch without political power

defTh: นักการเมือง
defEn: a person whose job involves politics, especially as an elected member of parliament, etc.
example: democratically elected politicians

defTh: การเมือง, การปกครอง
defEn: the activities involved in getting and using power in public life, and being able to influence decisions that affect a country or a society
example: world/international politics

defTh: แบบสำรวจความคิดเห็น
defEn: the process of questioning people who are representative of a larger group in order to get information about the general opinion
example: to carry out/conduct a poll

defTh: มลพิษ, ภาวะมลพิษ
defEn: the process of making air, water, soil, etc. dirty; the state of being dirty
example: air/water pollution

defTh: บ่อน้ำ
defEn: a small area of still water, especially one that is artificial
example: a fish pond

defTh: สระว่ายน้ำ, กอง
defEn: an area of water that has been created for people to swim in
example: an indoor/outdoor pool

defTh: ยากจน, น่าสงสาร
defEn: having very little money; not having enough money for basic needs
example: They were too poor to buy shoes for the kids.

defTh: ดัง, ระเบิด, เพลง
defEn: connected with modern popular music
example: a pop song

defTh: เป็นที่นิยม
defEn: liked or enjoyed by a large number of people
example: Andalucia is a popular tourist destination.

defTh: ความนิยม
defEn: the state of being liked, enjoyed or supported by a large number of people
example: the increasing popularity of cycling

defTh: ประชากร, จำนวน
defEn: all the people who live in a particular area, city or country; the total number of people who live there
example: One third of the world’s population consumes/consume two thirds of the world’s resources.

defTh: ท่าเรือ, พอร์ต
defEn: a town or city with a harbour, especially one where ships load and unload goods
example: a container/fishing ports

defTh: ผลงาน
defEn: a thin flat case used for carrying documents, drawings, etc.
example: I left my portfolio on the train.

defTh: ส่วนแบ่ง
defEn: one part of something larger
example: a substantial/significant portion of the population

defTh: ภาพเหมือน
defEn: a painting, drawing or photograph of a person, especially of the head and shoulders
example: portrait of somebody, a portrait of his wife

defTh: พรรณนาภาพลักษณ์, แสดงบทบาท
defEn: to show somebody/something in a picture; to describe somebody/something in a piece of writing
example: The painting portrays the duke’s third wife.

defTh: ท่า, วางท่า
defEn: to create a threat, problem, etc. that has to be dealt with
example: to pose a threat/risk/challenge/danger

defTh: ตำแหน่ง, สถานะ
defEn: the place where somebody/something is located
example: Where would be the best position for the lights?

defTh: เชิงบวก, ดี
defEn: good or useful
example: The tests have so far yielded positive results.

defTh: เป็นเจ้าของ
defEn: to have or own something
example: He was charged with possessing a shotgun without a licence.

defTh: การครอบครอง
defEn: something that you own or have with you at a particular time
example: Prisoners were allowed no personal possessions.

defTh: ความเป็นไปได้
defEn: a thing that may happen or be true; the fact that something might happen or be true, but is not certain
example: Bankruptcy is a real possibility if sales don't improve.

defTh: ที่เป็นไปได้, ที่สามารถเกิดขึ้นได้
defEn: that can be done or achieved
example: possible to do something, New technology has made it possible to communicate more easily.

defTh: อาจเป็นไปได้
defEn: used to say that something might exist, happen or be true, but you are not certain
example: It was possibly their worst performance ever.

defTh: เสา, ส่ง, ตำแหน่ง
defEn: the official system used for sending and delivering letters, packages, etc.
example: by post, I'll send the original to you by post.

defTh: หลังสงคราม
defEn: existing, happening or made in the period after a war, especially the Second World War
example: the post-war years

defTh: โปสเตอร์
defEn: a large notice, often with a picture on it, that is put in a public place to advertise something
example: campaign/election posters

defTh: เลื่อน
defEn: to arrange for an event, etc. to take place at a later time or date than originally planned
example: postpone something, The game has already been postponed three times.

defTh: หม้อ, กระถาง
defEn: a deep round container used for cooking things in
example: pots and pans

defTh: มันฝรั่ง
defEn: a round white vegetable with a brown or red skin that grows underground as part of a plant also called a potato
example: Will you peel the potatoes for me?

defTh: ศักยภาพ, ที่อาจเป็น
defEn: that can develop into something or be developed in the future
example: potential customers/buyers/investors/clients

defTh: อาจเกิดขึ้นได้
defEn: used to say that something may develop into something
example: a potentially dangerous situation

defTh: ปอนด์, ทุบ
defEn: the unit of money in the UK, worth 100 pence
example: a ten-pound note

defTh: เท, ริน
defEn: to make a liquid or other substance flow from a container in a continuous stream, especially by holding the container at an angle
example: pour something + adv./prep., Pour the sauce over the pasta.

defTh: ความยากจน
defEn: the state of being poor
example: conditions of extreme/abject poverty

defTh: ผง, แป้ง
defEn: a dry mass of very small fine pieces or grains
example: milk/chilli/cocoa powder

defTh: อำนาจ, พลัง
defEn: the ability to control people or things
example: power to do something, He has the power to make things very unpleasant for us.

defTh: มีพลัง, ทรงพลัง
defEn: being able to control and influence people and events
example: an incredibly powerful organization

defTh: ใช้ได้จริง, ปฏิบัติ
defEn: connected with real situations rather than with ideas or theories
example: to have gained practical experience of the work

defTh: ฝึกฝน, การฝึก
defEn: doing an activity or training regularly so that you can improve your skill; the time you spend doing this
example: conversation practice

defTh: ฝึกฝน, ปฏิบัติ
defEn: to do an activity or train regularly so that you can improve your skill
example: You need to practise every day.

defTh: ผู้ประกอบวิชาชีพ
defEn: a person who works in a profession, especially medicine or law
example: dental practitioners

defTh: สรรเสริญ
defEn: words that show that you approve of and admire somebody/something
example: The team coach singled out two players for special praise.

defTh: อธิษฐาน, สวดมนต์
defEn: to speak to God, especially to give thanks or ask for help
example: They knelt down and prayed.

defTh: คำอธิษฐาน
defEn: words that you say to God giving thanks or asking for help
example: to say your prayers

defTh: เทศนา (สั่งสอนทางศีลธรรม)
defEn: to give a religious talk in a public place, especially in a church during a service
example: She preached to the congregation about forgiveness.

defTh: นำหน้า
defEn: to happen before something or come before something/somebody in order
example: the years preceding the war

defTh: แบบอย่าง
defEn: an official action or decision that has happened in the past and that is seen as an example or a rule to be followed in a similar situation later
example: The ruling set a precedent for future libel cases.

defTh: ล้ำค่า
defEn: rare and worth a lot of money
example: a precious vase

defTh: แม่นยำ, ถูกต้อง
defEn: clear and accurate
example: precise details/instructions/measurements

defTh: อย่างเจาะจง
defEn: exactly
example: They look precisely the same to me.

defTh: ความละเอียดถี่ถ้วน
defEn: the quality of being exact, accurate and careful
example: Her writing is imaginative but lacks precision.

defTh: นักล่า
defEn: an animal that kills and eats other animals
example: Some animals have no natural predators.

defTh: ผู้มาก่อน, ผู้ดำรงตำแหน่งก่อนหน้า
defEn: a person who did a job before somebody else
example: The new president reversed many of the policies of his predecessor.

defTh: ทำนาย, คาดการณ์
defEn: to say that something will happen in the future
example: predict something, a reliable method of predicting earthquakes

defTh: คาดเดาได้
defEn: if something is predictable, you know in advance that it will happen or what it will be like
example: a predictable result

defTh: การทำนาย
defEn: a statement that says what you think will happen; the act of making such a statement
example: The results of the experiment confirmed our predictions.

defTh: โดยส่วนใหญ่เป็น
defEn: mostly; mainly
example: She works in a predominantly male environment.

defTh: ชอบมากกว่า
defEn: to like one thing or person better than another; to choose one thing rather than something else because you like it better
example: prefer something, ‘Coffee or tea?’ ‘I'd prefer tea, thanks.’

defTh: ความชอบ, การเลือก
defEn: a greater interest in or desire for somebody/something than somebody/something else
example: It's a matter of personal preference.

defTh: การตั้งครรภ์
defEn: the state of being pregnant
example: a pregnancy test

defTh: ตั้งครรภ์, มีท้อง
defEn: having a baby or young animal developing inside her/its body
example: My wife is pregnant.

defTh: ความลำเอียง (ตัดสินจากมุมมอง)
defEn: an unreasonable dislike of or preference for a person, group, custom, etc., especially when it is based on their race, religion, sex, etc.
example: a victim of racial prejudice

defTh: เบื้องต้น
defEn: happening before a more important action or event
example: After a few preliminary remarks he announced the winners.

defTh: นายกรัฐมนตรี
defEn: most important, famous or successful
example: one of the country’s premier chefs

defTh: สถานที่ตั้ง
defEn: a statement or an idea that forms the basis for a reasonable line of argument
example: the basic premise of her argument

defTh: เบี้ยประกันภัย
defEn: an amount of money that you pay once or regularly for an insurance policy
example: a monthly premium of £6.25

defTh: การเตรียม, การจัด
defEn: the act or process of getting ready for something or making something ready
example: food preparation

defTh: เตรียม, จัดเตรียม
defEn: to make something or somebody ready to be used or to do something
example: prepare something/somebody, to prepare a report

defTh: ที่ถูกจัดเตรียมไว้
defEn: ready and able to deal with something
example: We'll be better prepared next time.

defTh: สั่งยา, กำหนดเงื่อนไข
defEn: to tell somebody to take a particular medicine or have a particular treatment; to write a prescription for a particular medicine, etc.
example: prescribe something, Valium is usually prescribed to treat anxiety.

defTh: ใบสั่งยา
defEn: an official piece of paper on which a doctor writes the type of medicine you should have, and which enables you to get it from a chemist's
example: prescription for something, The doctor gave me a prescription for antibiotics.

defTh: การมีอยู่
defEn: the fact of being in a particular place
example: He hardly seemed to notice my presence.

defTh: ของขวัญ, ปัจจุบัน, แสดง
defEn: existing or happening now
example: I am not satisfied with the present situation.

defTh: การนำเสนอ, การแสดง
defEn: a meeting at which something, especially a new product or idea, or piece of work, is shown to a group of people
example: presentation on/about somebody/something, The sales manager will give a presentation on the new products.

defTh: ปัจจุบัน
defEn: at the time you are speaking or writing; now
example: The crime is presently being investigated by the police.

defTh: การเก็บรักษา
defEn: the act of keeping something in its original state or in good condition
example: building/environmental/food preservation

defTh: สงวน, รักษา
defEn: to keep a particular quality, feature, etc.; to make sure that something is kept
example: He was anxious to preserve his reputation.

defTh: เป็นประธาน
defEn: to lead or be in charge of a meeting, ceremony, etc.
example: the presiding judge

defTh: ตำแหน่งประธานาธิบดี
defEn: the job of being president of a country or an organization; the period of time somebody holds this job
example: the current holder of the EU presidency

defTh: ประธานาธิบดี, ประธาน
defEn: the leader of a republic, for example the US
example: Several presidents attended the funeral.

defTh: เกี่ยวกับตำแหน่งประธานาธิบดี
defEn: connected with the position or activities of a president
example: a presidential campaign/candidate/election

defTh: กด, สื่อ
defEn: newspapers and magazines
example: the local/national/foreign press

defTh: ความดัน, แรงกด
defEn: the act of trying to persuade or to force somebody to do something
example: pressure for something, The pressure for change continued to mount.

defTh: อันทรงเกียรติ
defEn: respected and admired as very important or of very high quality
example: a prestigious award

defTh: โดยสันนิษฐาน
defEn: used to say that you think that something is probably true
example: Presumably this is where the accident happened.

defTh: ทึกทักเอา
defEn: to suppose that something is true, although you do not have actual proof
example: They are very expensive, I presume?

defTh: แกล้งทำ
defEn: to behave in a particular way, in order to make other people believe something that is not true
example: I'm tired of having to pretend all the time.

defTh: น่ารัก, สวย
defEn: attractive without being very beautiful
example: a pretty face

defTh: เหนือกว่า
defEn: to exist or be very common at a particular time or in a particular place
example: prevail in something, We were horrified at the conditions prevailing in local prisons.

defTh: ความชุก
defEn: the fact of existing or being very common at a particular time or in a particular place
example: an increase in the prevalence of smoking among young people

defTh: ป้องกัน, ขัดขวาง
defEn: to stop somebody from doing something; to stop something from happening
example: prevent something/somebody, The accident could have been prevented.

defTh: การขัดขวาง, การยับยั้ง (ก่อนเกิดเหตุ)
defEn: the act of stopping something bad from happening
example: accident/crime prevention

defTh: ก่อนหน้า, ที่แล้ว
defEn: happening or existing before the event or object that you are talking about
example: No previous experience is necessary for this job.

defTh: ก่อนหน้านี้, แต่ก่อน
defEn: at a time before the time that you are talking about
example: The building had previously been used as a hotel.

defTh: เหยื่อ
defEn: an animal, a bird, etc. that is hunted, killed and eaten by another
example: The lion will often stalk its prey for hours.

defTh: ราคา, มูลค่า
defEn: the amount of money that you have to pay for something
example: Boat for sale, price £8000

defTh: ความภูมิใจ, ทิฐิ
defEn: a feeling of being pleased or satisfied that you get when you or people who are connected with you have done something well or own something that other people admire
example: The sight of her son graduating filled her with pride.

defTh: นักบวช, บาทหลวง
defEn: a person who is qualified to perform religious duties and ceremonies in the Roman Catholic, Anglican and Orthodox Churches
example: a parish priest

defTh: เป็นหลัก
defEn: mainly
example: a course designed primarily for specialists

defTh: เบื้องต้น, หลัก
defEn: connected with the education of children between the ages of about five and eleven
example: primary teachers

defTh: สำคัญ
defEn: main; most important; basic
example: My prime concern is to protect my property.

defTh: เจ้าชาย
defEn: a male member of a royal family who is not king, especially the son or grandson of the king or queen
example: the royal princes

defTh: เจ้าหญิง
defEn: a female member of a royal family who is not a queen, especially the daughter or granddaughter of the king or queen
example: the royal princesses

defTh: อาจารย์ใหญ่
defEn: most important; main
example: The principal reason for this omission is lack of time.

defTh: หลักการ, กฎ
defEn: a moral rule or a strong belief that influences your actions
example: He has high moral principles.

defTh: พิมพ์, สิ่งพิมพ์
defEn: letters, words, numbers, etc. that have been printed onto paper
example: The tiny print was hard to read without my glasses.

defTh: เครื่องพิมพ์
defEn: a machine for printing text on paper, especially one connected to a computer
example: a colour printer

defTh: การพิมพ์, การตีพิมพ์
defEn: the act of producing letters, pictures, patterns, etc. on something by pressing a surface covered with ink (= coloured liquid for printing, drawing, etc.) against it
example: the invention of printing

defTh: ก่อนหน้า, ลำดับแรก
defEn: happening or existing before something else or before a particular time
example: Although not essential, some prior knowledge of statistics is desirable.

defTh: ความสำคัญลำดับแรก
defEn: something that you think is more important than other things and should be dealt with first
example: a high/low priority

defTh: คุก, เรือนจำ
defEn: a building where people are kept as a punishment for a crime they have committed, or while they are waiting for trial
example: She went to prison for tax evasion.

defTh: นักโทษ, เชลย
defEn: a person who is kept in prison as a punishment, or while they are waiting for trial
example: The number of prisoners serving life sentences has fallen.

defTh: ความเป็นส่วนตัว
defEn: the state of being alone and not watched or interrupted by other people
example: She was longing for some peace and privacy.

defTh: ส่วนตัว, เอกชน
defEn: belonging to or for the use of a particular person or group; not for public use
example: The sign said, ‘Private property. Keep out.’

defTh: การแปรรูป
defEn: the act of selling a business or an industry so that it is no longer owned by the government
example: There were fears that privatization would lead to job losses.

defTh: สิทธิพิเศษ
defEn: a special right or advantage that a particular person or group of people has
example: Education should be a universal right and not a privilege.

defTh: รางวัล, ของรางวัล
defEn: an award that is given to a person who wins a competition, race, etc. or who does very good work
example: She was awarded the Nobel Peace Prize.

defTh: ค่าความน่าจะเป็น (ทางสถิติ), โอกาส
defEn: how likely something is to happen
example: The probability is that prices will rise rapidly.

defTh: ที่น่าจะเป็นไปได้สูง, ที่มีแนวโน้ม
defEn: likely to happen, to exist or to be true
example: the probable cause/explanation/outcome

defTh: อาจจะ, น่าจะ
defEn: used to say that something is likely to happen or to be true
example: You're probably right.

defTh: สอบสวน
defEn: a complete and careful investigation of something
example: a police probe into the financial affairs of the company

defTh: ปัญหา, โจทย์
defEn: a thing that is difficult to deal with or to understand
example: big/serious/major problems

defTh: ที่เป็นปัญหา, ยุ่งยาก
defEn: difficult to deal with or to understand; full of problems; not certain to be successful
example: The situation is more problematic than we first thought.

defTh: กระบวนการ, ขั้นตอน
defEn: a way of doing something, especially the usual or correct way
example: emergency/safety/disciplinary procedures

defTh: ดำเนินการ, ดำเนินต่อไป
defEn: to continue doing something that has already been started; to continue being done
example: We're not sure whether we still want to proceed with the sale.

defTh: ดำเนินการต่อ
defEn: the process of using a court to settle an argument or to deal with a complaint
example: court/legal/judicial proceedings

defTh: เงินรายได้
defEn: the money that you receive when you sell something or organize a performance, etc.; profits
example: She sold her car and bought a piano with the proceeds.

defTh: กระบวนการ
defEn: a series of things that are done in order to achieve a particular result
example: the consultation/planning process

defTh: กำลังประมวลผล
defEn: the treatment of raw material, food, etc. in order to change it, preserve it, etc.
example: the food processing industry

defTh: โปรเซสเซอร์
defEn: a machine, person or company that processes things
example: The company is Ireland's largest dairy processor.

defTh: ประกาศ (ก้อง), สถาปนา
defEn: to publicly and officially tell people about something important
example: proclaim something, The president proclaimed a state of emergency.

defTh: ผลิต, ผลิตภัณฑ์
defEn: things that have been made or grown, especially things connected with farming
example: The market is full of farm produce.

defTh: ผู้ผลิต
defEn: a person, a company or a country that grows or makes food, goods or materials
example: French wine producers

defTh: ผลิตภัณฑ์, ผลิตผล
defEn: a thing that is grown, produced or created, usually for sale
example: food/agricultural/software products

defTh: การผลิต, ผลิตกรรม
defEn: the process of growing or making food, goods or materials, especially large quantities
example: food/oil production

defTh: มีประสิทธิผล
defEn: making goods or growing crops, especially in large quantities
example: highly productive farming land

defTh: ผลิตภาพ, ประสิทธิภาพในการผลิต
defEn: the rate at which a worker, a company or a country produces goods, and the amount produced, compared with how much time, work and money is needed to produce them
example: high/improved/increased productivity

defTh: อาชีพ, วิชาชีพ

defEn: what you do, say or think as a result of something that has happened

defTh: จริงๆ, อย่างแท้จริง
defEn: used to emphasize an adjective or adverb

defEn: fair, practical, and sensible

example: The instructions are reasonably straightforward.

defTh: การใช้เหตุผล
defEn: the process of thinking about things in a logical way; opinions and ideas that are based on logical thinking
example: What is the reasoning behind this decision?

defTh: ให้ความมั่นใจ, ทำให้คลายกังวล
defEn: to say or do something that makes somebody less frightened or worried
example: reassure somebody (about something), They tried to reassure her, but she still felt anxious.

defTh: ผู้ก่อกบฏ, กบฏ (บุคคล)
defEn: a person who fights against the government of their country
example: rebel forces

defTh: การกบฏ, การก่อจลาจล
defEn: an attempt by some of the people in a country to change their government, using violence
example: in rebellion (against somebody/something), The north of the country rose in rebellion against the government.

defTh: สร้างใหม่
defEn: to build or put something together again
example: After the earthquake, the people set about rebuilding their homes.

defTh: ระลึก, เรียกคืน
defEn: to remember something
example: recall something, She could not recall his name.

defTh: ใบเสร็จ
defEn: a piece of paper or an electronic document that shows that goods or services have been paid for
example: Can I have a receipt, please?

defTh: ได้รับ, รับ
defEn: to get or accept something that is sent or given to you
example: receive something

defTh: ผู้รับ (สิ่งของ, สัญญาณ), เครื่องรับ
defEn: the part of a phone that you hold close to your mouth and ear
example: to pick up/lift/put down/replace the receiver

defTh: ล่าสุด, เมื่อไม่นานมานี้
defEn: that happened or began only a short time ago
example: a recent study/report/survey

defTh: เมื่อไม่นานมานี้, ไม่ช้าไม่นานมานี้
defEn: not long ago
example: a recently published book

defTh: การต้อนรับ, การรับ
defEn: the area inside the entrance of a hotel, an office building, etc. where guests or visitors go first when they arrive
example: Please report to reception on arrival.

defTh: ภาวะถดถอย
defEn: a difficult time for the economy of a country, when there is less trade and industrial activity than usual and more people are unemployed
example: How do you assess the impact of the current recession on manufacturing?

defTh: สูตรอาหาร
defEn: a set of instructions that tells you how to cook something and the ingredients (= items of food) you need for it
example: recipe for something, a recipe for chicken soup

defTh: ผู้รับ (รางวัล, ทุน, สิ่งมอบให้)
defEn: a person who receives something
example: recipients of awards

defTh: คิด, คาดคะเน
defEn: to think something or have an opinion about something
example: I reckon (that) I’m going to get that job.

defTh: การจำได้, การรับรู้
defEn: the act of remembering who somebody is when you see them, or of identifying what something is
example: He glanced briefly towards her but there was no sign of recognition.

defTh: จำได้, รู้จัก
defEn: to know who somebody is or what something is when you see or hear them or it, because you have seen or heard them or it before
example: recognize somebody/something, I recognized him as soon as he came in the room.

defTh: แนะนำ, รับรอง (ว่าดี)
defEn: to tell somebody that something is good or useful, or that somebody would be suitable for a particular job, etc.
example: recommend somebody/something, The hotel's new restaurant comes highly recommended (= a lot of people have praised it).

defTh: ข้อเสนอแนะ
defEn: an official suggestion about the best thing to do
example: to accept/reject a recommendation

defTh: การสร้างขึ้นใหม่, การบูรณะ
defEn: the process of changing or improving the condition of something or the way it works; the process of putting something back into the state it was in before
example: the reconstruction of the educational system

defTh: บันทึก, สถิติ
defEn: a written account of something that is kept so that it can be looked at and used in the future
example: You should keep a record of your expenses.

defTh: การบันทึก
defEn: sound or pictures that have been recorded on computer files or on CD, DVD, video, etc.
example: an audio recording

defTh: เล่าขาน
defEn: sound or pictures that have been recorded on computer files or on CD, DVD, video, etc.
example: an audio recording

defTh: ฟื้นตัว, กู้คืน
defEn: to get well again after being ill, hurt, etc.
example: recover from something, He's still recovering from his operation.

defTh: การกู้คืน
defEn: the process of becoming well again after an illness or injury
example: My father has made a full recovery from the operation.

defTh: สรรหาคน
defEn: a person who has recently joined the armed forces or the police
example: the training of new recruits

defTh: การสรรหาบุคลากร
defEn: the act or process of finding new people to join a company, an organization, the armed forces, etc.
example: the recruitment of new members

defTh: รีไซเคิล
defEn: to treat things that have already been used so that they can be used again
example: to recycle waste/rubbish

defTh: สีแดง
defEn: having the colour of blood or fire
example: bright/light/dark red lipstick

defTh: ลด, ทำให้เล็กลง
defEn: to make something less or smaller in size, quantity, price, etc.; to become less or smaller in size, quantity, etc.
example: reduce something, Reduce speed now (= on a sign).

defTh: การลด, การทอน
defEn: an act of making something less or smaller; the state of being made less or smaller
example: Some staff received wage rises, while others experienced a reduction.

defTh: อ้างอิง, อ้างถึง
defEn: to send somebody/something to somebody/something for help, advice or a decision
example: refer somebody/something to somebody/something, My doctor referred me to a specialist.

defTh: ผู้ตัดสิน
defEn: the official who controls the game in some sports
example: He was sent off for arguing with the referee.

defTh: อ้างอิง, อ้าง
defEn: a thing you say or write that mentions somebody/something else; the act of mentioning somebody/something
example: reference to somebody/something, She made no reference to her illness but only to her future plans.

defTh: ประชามติ
defEn: an occasion when all the people of a country can vote on an important issue
example: referendum on something, Switzerland decided to hold a referendum on joining the EU.

defTh: สะท้อน, ไตร่ตรอง
defEn: to show the image of somebody/something on the surface of something such as a mirror, water or glass
example: be reflected (in something), His face was reflected in the mirror.

defTh: การสะท้อนกลับ
defEn: an image in a mirror, on a shiny surface, on water, etc.
example: He admired his reflection in the mirror.

defTh: ปฏิรูป, แก้ไข
defEn: change that is made to a social system, an organization, etc. in order to improve or correct it
example: a government committed to reform

defTh: ที่หลบภัย
defEn: shelter or protection from danger, trouble, etc.
example: A further 300 people have taken refuge in the US embassy.

defTh: ผู้ลี้ภัย
defEn: a person who has been forced to leave their country or home, because there is a war or for political, religious or social reasons
example: There has been a steady flow of refugees from the war zone.

defTh: การปฏิเสธคำขอ
defEn: an act of saying or showing that you will not do, give or accept something
example: the refusal of a request/an invitation/an offer

defTh: ปฏิเสธ
defEn: to say or show that you will not do something that somebody has asked you to do
example: Go on, ask her; she can hardly refuse.

defTh: ฟื้น
defEn: to get back something you no longer have, especially an ability or a quality
example: I struggled to regain some dignity.

defTh: พิจารณา, เคารพ
defEn: attention to or thought and care for somebody/something
example: regard for somebody/something, to have scant/little/no regard for somebody/something

defTh: โดยไม่คำนึงถึง
defEn: paying no attention, even if the situation is bad or there are difficulties
example: The weather was terrible but we carried on regardless.

defTh: ระบอบการปกครอง
defEn: a method or system of government, especially one that has not been elected in a fair way
example: a fascist/totalitarian/military, etc. regime

defTh: ภูมิภาค, เขต
defEn: a large area of land, usually without exact limits or borders
example: mountainous/coastal regions

defTh: ภูมิภาค, ส่วนภูมิภาค
defEn: of or relating to a region
example: services available at a local and regional level

defTh: ลงทะเบียน, บันทึก
defEn: an official list or record of names, items, etc.; a book that contains such a list
example: The bride and groom signed the register.

defTh: การลงทะเบียน
defEn: the act of making an official record of something/somebody
example: the registration of letters and parcels

defTh: เสียใจ, เสียดาย
defEn: a sad feeling because of something that has happened or something that you have done or not done
example: a feeling/pang/twinge of regret

defTh: ปกติ, สม่ำเสมอ
defEn: following a pattern, especially with the same time or space in between each thing and the next
example: regular breathing

defTh: อย่างเป็นประจำ
defEn: at regular intervals or times
example: We meet regularly to discuss the progress of the project.

defTh: ควบคุม
defEn: to control something by means of rules
example: The department is responsible for regulating the insurance industry.

defTh: ข้อบังคับ, กฎ
defEn: an official rule made by a government or some other authority
example: too many rules and regulations

defTh: หน่วยงานกำกับดูแล
defEn: a person or an organization that officially controls an area of business or industry and makes sure that it is operating fairly
example: Ofgas, the gas industry regulator

defTh: กฎระเบียบ
defEn: having the power to control an area of business or industry and make sure that it is operating fairly
example: regulatory bodies/authorities/agencies

defTh: การฟื้นฟูสมรรถภาพ
defEn: the process of helping somebody to return to a normal, healthy life after they have been in prison or very ill
example: a drug rehabilitation centre

defTh: รัชกาล
defEn: the period during which a king, queen, emperor, etc. rules
example: By the end of his reign, the vast empire was in decline.

defTh: เสริมกำลัง, ตอกย้ำ
defEn: to make a feeling, an idea, etc. stronger
example: The experience reinforced my sense of loss.

defTh: ปฏิเสธข้อเสนอ, ไม่รับ
defEn: to refuse to accept or consider something
example: to reject an argument/a hypothesis/a notion/a plan

defTh: การบอกปัด, การไม่ยอมรับ (บุคคล/ข้อเสนอ)
defEn: the act of refusing to accept or consider something
example: Her proposal met with unanimous rejection.

defTh: เชื่อมโยง
defEn: show or make a connection between two or more things
example: relate something, I found it difficult to relate the two ideas in my mind.

defTh: ที่มีความสัมพันธ์กัน
defEn: connected with something/somebody in some way
example: related to something/somebody, The amount of protein you need is directly related to your lifestyle.

defTh: ความเกี่ยวข้อง
defEn: the way in which two people, groups or countries behave towards each other or deal with each other
example: diplomatic/international/foreign relations

defTh: ความสัมพันธ์, ความเกี่ยวข้อง
defEn: the way in which two people, groups or countries behave towards each other or deal with each other
example: a personal/working relationship

defTh: ญาติ, สัมพัทธ์
defEn: considered and judged by being compared with something else
example: You must consider the relative merits of the two plans.

defTh: ค่อนข้าง, โดยเปรียบเทียบ
defEn: to a fairly large degree, especially in comparison to something else
example: relatively large/small/high/low

defTh: ผ่อนคลาย, พักผ่อน
defEn: to rest while you are doing something that you enjoy, especially after work or effort
example: Just relax and enjoy the movie.

defTh: รู้สึกผ่อนคลาย, สบายใจ
defEn: calm and not anxious or worried
example: He appeared relaxed and confident before the match.

defTh: ที่ทำให้ผ่อนคลาย, น่าพักผ่อน
defEn: helping you to rest and become less anxious
example: a relaxing evening with friends

defTh: ปล่อย, ออก, การปล่อย
defEn: the act of setting a person or an animal free; the state of being set free
example: release of somebody/something, The government has been working to secure the release of the hostages.

defTh: ความเกี่ยวข้อง
defEn: a close connection with the subject you are discussing or the situation you are in
example: I don't see the relevance of your question.

defTh: ที่เข้าประเด็น
defEn: closely connected with the subject you are discussing or the situation you are in
example: relevant information/facts/documents/factors

defTh: ความน่าเชื่อถือ (ในด้านการทำงาน/ผลลัพธ์), ความไว้วางใจได้
defEn: the quality of being able to be trusted to do what somebody wants or needs
example: The incident cast doubt on her motives and reliability.

defTh: เชื่อถือได้
defEn: that can be trusted to do something well; that you can rely on
example: We are looking for someone who is reliable and hard-working.

defTh: การบรรเทา
defEn: the feeling of happiness that you have when something unpleasant stops or does not happen
example: I felt a huge sense of relief when I heard they were all OK.

defTh: บรรเทา
defEn: to remove or reduce an unpleasant feeling or pain
example: to relieve the symptoms of a cold

defTh: โล่งใจ
defEn: feeling happy because something unpleasant has stopped or has not happened; showing this
example: She sounded relieved.

defTh: ศาสนา, ความเชื่อ
defEn: the belief in the existence of a god or gods, and the activities that are connected with the worship of them, or in the teachings of a spiritual leader
example: Is there always a conflict between science and religion?

defTh: เคร่งศาสนา
defEn: connected with religion or with a particular religion
example: religious beliefs/convictions/faith

defTh: ไม่เต็มใจ
defEn: hesitating before doing something because you do not want to do it or because you are not sure that it is the right thing to do
example: He finally gave a reluctant smile.

defTh: พึ่งพา, ไว้ใจ
คงอยู่, เหลือ
defEn: to continue to be something; to be still in the same state or condition
example: remain + adj., to remain silent

defTh: ส่วนที่เหลือ
defEn: the people, things or time that remain
example: I kept some of his books and gave away the remainder.

defTh: ซาก, สิ่งที่เหลือ
defEn: the parts of something that are left after the other parts have been used, eaten, removed, etc.
example: She fed the remains of her lunch to the dog.

defTh: ข้อสังเกต, กล่าว
defEn: something that you say or write which expresses an opinion, a thought, etc. about somebody/something
example: to make a remark

defTh: น่าทึ่ง, โดดเด่น
defEn: unusual or surprising in a way that causes people to take notice
example: a remarkable achievement/career/talent

defTh: อย่างน่าประหลาดใจ
defEn: in a way that is unusual or surprising and causes people to take notice
example: The car is in remarkably good condition for its age.

defTh: วิธีการรักษา
defEn: a way of dealing with or improving an unpleasant or difficult situation
example: When the reservoir becomes blocked, the only remedy lies in cleaning the entire system.

defTh: จำ, ระลึก
defEn: to have or keep an image in your memory of an event, a person, a place, etc. from the past
example: remember somebody/something, This is Carla. Do you remember her?

defTh: เตือน, ทำให้ระลึก
defEn: to help somebody remember something, especially something important that they must do
example: remind somebody/yourself, I'm sorry, I've forgotten your name. Can you remind me?

defTh: เตือนความจำ
defEn: something that makes you think about or remember somebody/something, that you have forgotten or would like to forget
example: reminder of something, The sheer size of the cathedral is a constant reminder of the power of religion.

defTh: ห่างไกล, รีโมท
defEn: far away from places where other people live
example: a remote village/island/location/region

defTh: การกำจัด, การถอด
defEn: the act of taking somebody/something away from a particular place
example: Clearance of the site required the removal of a number of trees.

defTh: เอาออก, ถอด
defEn: to take somebody/something away from a place
example: remove somebody/something, Illegally parked vehicles will be removed.

defTh: แสดงผล
defEn: to cause somebody/something to be in a particular state or condition
example: to render something harmless/useless/ineffective

defTh: ต่ออายุ
defEn: to begin something again after it stopped or was interrupted
example: The army renewed its assault on the capital.

defTh: มีชื่อเสียงเลื่องลือ, เป็นที่ยอมรับ
defEn: famous and respected
example: a renowned author

defTh: เช่า, ค่าเช่า
defEn: an amount of money that you regularly pay so that you can use a house, room, etc.
example: I earn just about enough to pay the rent.

defTh: เช่า
defEn: the amount of money that you pay to use something for a particular period of time
example: Telephone charges include line rental.

defTh: ซ่อมแซม, แก้ไข
defEn: an act of repairing something
example: They agreed to pay the costs of any repairs.

defTh: ทำซ้ำ, ย้ำ
defEn: an event that is very similar to something that happened before
example: repeat of something, She didn't want a repeat performance of what had happened the night before.

defTh: ซ้ำ, เกิดขึ้นอีก
defEn: happening, said or done many times
example: repeated absences from work

defTh: แทนที่, สับเปลี่ยน
defEn: to be used instead of somebody/something else; to do something instead of somebody/something else
example: The new design will eventually replace all existing models.

defTh: ทดแทน
defEn: the act of replacing one thing with another, especially something that is newer or better
example: the replacement of worn car parts

defTh: ตอบ, การตอบ
defEn: an act of replying to something/somebody in speech, writing or by some action
example: I asked her what her name was but she made no reply.

defTh: รายงาน, แจ้ง
defEn: a written or spoken account of an event, especially one that is published or broadcast
example: Are these news reports true?

defTh: มีรายงานว่า
defEn: according to what some people say
example: The band have reportedly decided to split up.

defTh: นักข่าว
defEn: a person who collects and reports news for newspapers, radio or television
example: He leaked the story to a news reporter.

defTh: การรายงาน
defEn: the presenting of and writing about news on television and radio, and in newspapers
example: accurate/balanced/objective reporting

defTh: เป็นตัวแทน
defEn: to be a member of a group of people and act or speak for them at an event, a meeting, etc.
example: The competition attracted over 500 contestants representing eight different countries.

defTh: การเป็นตัวแทน
defEn: the act of presenting somebody/something in a particular way; something that shows or describes something
example: the negative representation of single mothers in the media

defTh: ตัวแทน, ผู้แทน
defEn: typical of a particular group of people; that is a typical example of something
example: Is a questionnaire answered by 500 people truly representative of the population as a whole?

defTh: ผลิตซ้ำ, สืบพันธุ์
defEn: to make a copy of a picture, piece of text, etc.
example: It is illegal to reproduce these worksheets without permission from the publisher.

defTh: การสืบพันธุ์
defEn: the act or process of producing babies, young animals or plants
example: sexual reproduction

defTh: สาธารณรัฐ
defEn: a country that is governed by a president and politicians elected by the people and where there is no king or queen
example: newly independent republics

defTh: ชื่อเสียง, เกียรติ
defEn: the opinion that people have about what somebody/something is like, based on what has happened in the past
example: to have a good/bad reputation

defTh: ขอ, คำขอ
defEn: the action of asking for something formally and politely; a thing that you formally ask for
example: request for something, a request for information

defTh: ต้องการ, กำหนด
defEn: to need something; to depend on somebody/something
example: require something, These pets require a lot of care and attention.

defTh: ความต้องการ, ข้อกำหนด
defEn: something that you need or want
example: the basic requirements of life

defTh: ช่วยเหลือ, ช่วยชีวิต
defEn: the act of saving somebody/something from a dangerous or difficult situation; the fact of being saved
example: We had given up hope of rescue.

defTh: วิจัย, ค้นคว้า
defEn: a careful study of a subject, especially in order to discover new facts or information about it
example: scientific/medical/academic research

defTh: นักวิจัย
defEn: a person who studies something carefully and tries to discover new facts about it
example: European researchers say olive oil could help prevent cancer.

defTh: มีลักษณะคล้ายกัน
defEn: to look like or be similar to another person or thing
example: She closely resembles her sister.

defTh: การจอง, ข้อสงวน
defEn: an arrangement for a seat on a plane or train, a room in a hotel, etc. to be kept for you
example: I'll call the restaurant and make a reservation.

defTh: สำรอง, จอง
defEn: a supply of something that is available to be used in the future or when it is needed
example: cash/foreign currency reserves

defTh: อาศัยอยู่
defEn: to live in a particular place
example: He returned to Britain in 1939, having resided abroad for many years.

defTh: ถิ่นที่อยู่
defEn: a house, especially a large or impressive one
example: a desirable family residence for sale (= for example, in an advertisement)

defTh: ที่เกี่ยวข้องกับผู้อยู่อาศัย
defEn: living in a particular place
example: the town’s resident population (= not tourists or visitors)

defTh: เกี่ยวกับที่อยู่อาศัย
defEn: suitable for living in; consisting of houses rather than factories or offices
example: a quiet residential area

defTh: สารตกค้าง
defEn: a small amount of something that remains at the end of a process
example: pesticide residues in fruit and vegetables

defTh: ลาออกจากตำแหน่ง
defEn: to officially tell somebody that you are leaving your job, an organization, etc.
example: She was forced to resign due to ill health.

defTh: การลาออก
defEn: the act of giving up your job or position; the occasion when you do this
example: a letter of resignation

defTh: ต่อต้าน, ขัดขืน
defEn: to refuse to accept something and try to stop it from happening
example: resist something, They are determined to resist pressure to change the law.

defTh: แรงต้านทาน, การขัดขืน
defEn: dislike of or opposition to a plan, an idea, etc.; the act of refusing to obey
example: As with all new ideas it met with resistance.

defTh: ปณิธาน
defEn: a definite decision to do or not to do something
example: Have you made any New Year's resolutions (= for example, to give up smoking from 1 January)?

defTh: แก้ไข, ตัดสินใจ
defEn: to find an acceptable solution to a problem or difficulty
example: resolve something, to resolve an issue/a dispute/a conflict/a crisis

defTh: ที่พักตากอากาศ
defEn: a place where a lot of people go on holiday
example: seaside/mountain resorts

defTh: ทรัพยากร, แหล่งข้อมูล
defEn: a supply of something that a country, an organization or a person has and can use, especially to increase their wealth
example: the exploitation of minerals and other natural resources

defTh: เคารพ, นับถือ
defEn: a strong feeling of approval of somebody/something because of their good qualities or achievements
example: I have the utmost respect for her and her work.

defTh: ของแต่ละคน
defEn: belonging or relating separately to each of the people or things already mentioned
example: They are each recognized specialists in their respective fields.

defTh: โดยลำดับ
defEn: in the same order as the people or things already mentioned
example: Julie and Mark, aged 17 and 19 respectively

defTh: ตอบ, ตอบสนอง
defEn: to give a spoken or written answer to somebody/something
example: I asked him his name, but he didn't respond.

defTh: การตอบสนอง
defEn: a spoken or written answer
example: She made no response.

defTh: หน้าที่ความรับผิดชอบ
defEn: a duty to deal with or take care of somebody/something, so that you may be blamed if something goes wrong
example: to be in a position of responsibility

defTh: ที่มีความรับผิดชอบ
defEn: having the job or duty of doing something or taking care of somebody/something, so that you may be blamed if something goes wrong
example: responsible for doing something, Mike is responsible for designing the entire project.

defTh: พักผ่อน, ที่เหลือ
defEn: the part of something that remains
example: Take what you want and throw the rest away.

defTh: ร้านอาหาร
defEn: a place where you can buy and eat a meal
example: We're going to try this Italian restaurant that just opened.

defTh: การบูรณะ
defEn: the work of repairing and cleaning an old building, a painting, etc. so that its condition is as good as it originally was
example: restoration work

defTh: ฟื้นฟู, ซ่อมแซม
defEn: to bring back a situation or feeling that existed before
example: restore something, The measures are intended to restore public confidence in the economy.

defTh: ความยับยั้งชั่งใจ
defEn: a rule, a fact, an idea, etc. that limits or controls what people can do
example: The government has imposed export restraints on some products.

defTh: จำกัด, จำกัดขอบเขต
defEn: to limit the size, amount or range of something
example: restrict something to something, Speed is restricted to 30 mph in towns.

defTh: ข้อจำกัด, การจำกัด
defEn: a rule or law that limits what you can do or what can happen
example: import/speed/travel restrictions

defTh: ผลลัพธ์, ผล
defEn: a thing that is caused or produced because of something else
example: And did your intervention produce the desired result?

defTh: ประวัติย่อ
defEn: if you resume an activity, or if it resumes, it begins again or continues after being interrupted
example: resume (something), to resume talks/negotiations

defTh: ขายปลีก
defEn: the selling of goods to the public, usually through shops
example: The recommended retail price is £9.99.

defTh: รักษาไว้, คงไว้
defEn: to keep something; to continue to have something
example: to retain your independence

defTh: เกษียณ, ถอนตัว
defEn: to leave your job and stop working, especially because you have reached a particular age or because you are ill; to tell somebody they must stop doing their job
example: He is retiring next year after 30 years with the company.

defTh: เกษียณ, ปลดเกษียณ
defEn: having retired from work
example: a retired doctor/teacher/officer/general

defTh: การเกษียณอายุ
defEn: the fact of leaving your job and stopping work, usually because you have reached a particular age; the time when you do this
example: At 60, he was now approaching retirement.

defTh: ล่าถอย
defEn: a movement away from a place or an enemy because of danger or defeat
example: Napoleon’s retreat from Moscow

defTh: เรียกคืน
defEn: to bring or get something back, especially from a place where it should not be
example: retrieve something from somebody/something, She bent to retrieve her comb from the floor.

defTh: กลับ, คืน, ตอบ
defEn: the action of arriving in or coming back to a place that you were in before
example: return of somebody to…, A week had passed since their return to Geneva.

defTh: เปิดเผย, แสดง
defEn: to make something known to somebody
example: reveal something, to reveal a secret

defTh: การเปิดโปง, สิ่งที่ถูกเปิดเผยอย่างน่าประหลาดใจ
defEn: a fact that people are made aware of, especially one that has been secret and is surprising
example: revelation about/concerning something, startling/sensational revelations about her private life

defTh: แก้แค้น
defEn: something that you do in order to make somebody suffer because they have made you suffer
example: revenge for something, She is seeking revenge for the murder of her husband.

defTh: รายได้รวม (ของธุรกิจ)
defEn: the money that a government receives from taxes or that an organization, etc. receives from its business
example: The government is currently facing a shortfall in tax revenue.

defTh: ย้อนกลับ, กลับด้าน
defEn: opposite to what has been mentioned
example: to travel in the reverse direction

defTh: ทบทวน, วิจารณ์
defEn: a report in a newspaper or magazine, or on the internet, television or radio, in which somebody gives their opinion of a book, play, film, product, etc.; the act of writing this kind of report
example: a book review

defTh: แก้ไข, ทบทวน
defEn: to change your opinions or plans, for example because of something you have learned
example: I can see I will have to revise my opinions of his abilities now.

defTh: การแก้ไข, ทบทวน
defEn: a change or set of changes to something
example: He made some minor revisions to the report before printing it out.

defTh: การฟื้นคืนชีพ, การทำให้กลับมาเป็นที่นิยม
defEn: an improvement in the condition or strength of something
example: the revival of trade

defTh: ฟื้นขึ้นมา
defEn: to become, or to make somebody/something become, conscious or healthy and strong again
example: The flowers soon revived in water.

defTh: การปฏิวัติ, การเปลี่ยนแปลง
defEn: an attempt, by a large number of people, to change the government of a country, especially by violent action
example: a socialist revolution

defTh: ปฏิวัติ
defEn: connected with political revolution
example: a revolutionary leader

defTh: รางวัล, ตอบแทน
defEn: a thing that you are given because you have done something good, worked hard, etc.
example: a financial reward

defTh: วาทศาสตร์
defEn: speech or writing that is intended to influence people, but that is not completely honest or sincere
example: the rhetoric of political slogans

defTh: จังหวะ, ท่วงทำนอง
defEn: a strong regular repeated pattern of sounds or movements
example: to dance to the rhythm of the music

defTh: ข้าว
defEn: short, narrow white or brown grain grown on wet land in hot countries as food; the plant that produces this grain
example: a grain of rice

defTh: รวย, มั่งคั่ง
defEn: having a lot of money or property
example: She's one of the richest women in the world.

defTh: กำจัด, ปลด
defEn: to be free of somebody/something that has been annoying you or that you do not want
example: She wanted to be rid of her parents and their authority.

defTh: ขี่, การขี่
defEn: a short journey in a vehicle, on a bicycle, etc.
example: a train ride through beautiful countryside

defTh: น่าขัน, เหลวไหล
defEn: very silly or unreasonable
example: I look ridiculous in this hat.

defTh: ปืนไรเฟิล
defEn: a gun with a long barrel which you hold to your shoulder to fire
example: a hunting rifle

defTh: ขวา
defEn: true or correct as a fact
example: Did you get the answer right?

defTh: แหวน
defEn: a piece of jewellery that you wear on your finger, consisting of a round band of gold, silver, etc., sometimes decorated with precious stones
example: a gold ring

defTh: จลาจล
defEn: a situation in which a group of people behave in a violent way in a public place, often as a protest
example: One prison guard was killed when a riot broke out in the jail.

defTh: ฉีก
defEn: to tear something or to become torn, often suddenly or violently
example: rip (something), I ripped my jeans on the fence.

defTh: ขึ้น, เพิ่มขึ้น
defEn: an increase in an amount, a number or a level
example: The industry is feeling the effects of recent price rises.

defTh: ความเสี่ยง, เสี่ยง
defEn: the possibility of something bad happening at some time in the future; a situation that could be dangerous or have a bad result
example: The health risks are very low.

defTh: เสี่ยง
defEn: involving the possibility of something bad happening
example: Life as an aid worker can be a risky business (= dangerous).

defTh: พิธีกรรม
defEn: a series of actions that are always performed in the same way, especially as part of a religious ceremony
example: religious rituals

defTh: คู่แข่ง, แข่งขัน
defEn: competing with another person, company, thing, etc.
example: a rival bid/claim/offer

defTh: แม่น้ำ
defEn: a natural flow of water that continues in a long line across land to the sea
example: Eventually we came to the mouth of the River Thames.

defTh: ถนน, เส้นทาง
defEn: a hard surface built for vehicles to travel on
example: a main/major/minor road

defTh: ปล้น, ขโมย
defEn: to steal money or property from a person or place
example: to rob a bank

defTh: การปล้น
defEn: the crime of stealing money or goods from a bank, shop, person, etc., especially using violence or threats
example: armed robbery (= using a gun, knife, etc.)

defTh: หุ่นยนต์
defEn: a machine that can perform a complicated series of tasks by itself
example: These cars are built by robots.

defTh: แข็งแกร่ง
defEn: strong and healthy
example: She was almost 90, but still very robust.

defTh: หิน, โยก
defEn: the hard solid material that forms part of the surface of the earth and some other planets
example: They drilled through several layers of rock to reach the oil.

defTh: จรวด
defEn: a spacecraft in the shape of a tube that is driven by a stream of gases let out behind it when fuel is burned inside
example: a space rocket

defTh: คัน
defEn: a long straight piece of wood, metal or glass
example: The concrete is reinforced with steel rods.

defTh: บทบาท, หน้าที่
defEn: an actor’s part in a play, film, etc.
example: She has landed the lead role (= the most important one) in a new play.

defTh: ม้วน, กลิ้ง
defEn: a small loaf of bread for one person
