example: Soup and a roll: £3.50

defTh: โรแมนติก
defEn: an exciting, usually short, relationship between two people who are in love with each other
example: a holiday romance

defTh: โรแมนติก, ชวนฝัน
defEn: connected with or about love or a sexual relationship
example: a romantic candlelit dinner

defTh: หลังคา
defEn: the structure that covers or forms the top of a building or vehicle
example: a flat/sloping/pitched roof

defTh: ห้อง, ที่ว่าง
defEn: a part of a building that has its own walls, floor and ceiling and is usually used for a particular purpose
example: I heard him enter the room.

defTh: ราก, ต้นกำเนิด
defEn: the part of a plant that grows under the ground and takes in water and minerals that it sends to the rest of the plant
example: deep spreading roots

defTh: เชือก, ผูก
defEn: very strong thick string made by twisting thinner strings, wires, etc. together
example: The rope broke and she fell 50 metres onto the rocks.

defTh: ดอกกุหลาบ
defEn: a flower with a sweet smell that grows on a bush with thorns (= sharp points) on its stems
example: a bunch of red roses

defTh: หมุน
defEn: to move or turn around a central fixed point; to make something do this
example: Stay well away from the helicopter when its blades start to rotate.

defTh: การหมุน
defEn: the action of an object moving in a circle around a central fixed point
example: the daily rotation of the earth on its axis

defTh: หยาบ, ขรุขระ
defEn: having a surface that is not even or regular
example: rough ground

defTh: อย่างคร่าวๆ, โดยประมาณ (อย่างไม่ละเอียด)
defEn: approximately but not exactly
example: Sales are up by roughly 10 per cent.

defTh: กลม, รอบ, วง
defEn: having a shape like a circle or a ball
example: a round plate

defTh: เส้นทาง, ทาง
defEn: a way that you follow to get from one place to another
example: Which is the best route to take?

defTh: กิจวัตร, ประจำ
defEn: done or happening as a normal part of a particular job, situation or process
example: routine enquiries/questions/tests/screening

defTh: แถว
หลวง, เกี่ยวกับกษัตริย์
defEn: connected with or belonging to the king or queen of a country
example: the royal family

defTh: ถู, ขัด
defEn: to move your hand, a cloth, etc., backwards and forwards over a surface while pressing it
example: rub something, He sat up on the hard bunk and rubbed his eyes.

defTh: ยาง, ยางลบ
defEn: made of rubber
example: a rubber ball

defTh: ขยะ, ไร้สาระ
defEn: things that you throw away because you no longer want or need them
example: a rubbish bag/bin

defTh: หยาบคาย, ไม่สุภาพ
defEn: having or showing a lack of respect for other people and their feelings
example: a rude comment/remark

defTh: รักบี้
defEn: a game played by two teams of 13 or 15 players, using an oval ball which may be kicked or carried. Teams try to put the ball over the other team’s line.
example: to play a game of rugby

defTh: ซากปรักหักพัง, ทำลาย
defEn: the state or process of being destroyed or severely damaged
example: A large number of churches fell into ruin after the revolution.

defTh: กฎ, ปกครอง
defEn: a statement of what may, must or must not be done in a particular situation or when playing a game
example: She laid down strict rules for her tenants, including prompt payment of rent.

defTh: คำตัดสิน, การออกคำสั่งของศาล
defEn: an official decision made by somebody in a position of authority, especially a judge
example: The court will make its ruling on the case next week.

defTh: ข่าวลือ, ข่าวโคมลอย
defEn: a piece of information, or a story, that people talk about, but that may not be true
example: to start/spread a rumour

defTh: วิ่ง, ดำเนิน, จัดการ
defEn: an act of running; a period of time spent running or the distance that somebody runs
example: I go for a run every morning.

defTh: นักวิ่ง, ผู้ดำเนินการ
defEn: a person or an animal that runs, especially one taking part in a race
example: a long-distance/cross-country/marathon runner

defTh: วิ่ง, กำลังวิ่ง
defEn: the action or sport of running
example: to go running

defTh: แห่งชนบท
defEn: connected with or like the countryside
example: rural areas

defTh: การรีบเร่งอย่างรวดเร็ว, ช่วงเวลาเร่งด่วน
defEn: a sudden strong movement or action
example: rush for something, Shoppers made a rush for the exits.

defTh: กระสอบ, ไล่ออก
defEn: to dismiss somebody from a job
example: She was sacked for refusing to work on Sundays.

defTh: ที่เป็นที่เคารพบูชา
defEn: connected with God or a god; considered to be holy
example: a sacred image/shrine/temple

defTh: เสียสละ
defEn: the fact of giving up something important or valuable to you in order to get or do something that seems more important; something that you give up in this way
example: The makers of the product assured us that there had been no sacrifice of quality.

defTh: เศร้า, เสียใจ
defEn: unhappy or showing unhappiness
example: sad to do something, We are very sad to hear that you are leaving.

defTh: อย่างเศร้า
defEn: in a sad way
example: ‘I'm so sorry,’ she said sadly.

defTh: ปลอดภัย, ไม่มีอันตราย
defEn: protected from any danger, harm or loss
example: The children are quite safe here.

defTh: ความปลอดภัย
defEn: the state of being safe and protected from danger or harm
example: in safety, a place where children can play in safety

defTh: แล่นเรือ, ใบเรือ
defEn: a sheet of strong cloth which the wind blows against to make a boat or ship travel through the water
example: As the boat moved down the river the wind began to fill the sails.

defTh: การแล่นเรือ
defEn: the sport or activity of travelling in a boat with sails
example: to go sailing

defTh: กะลาสี, ลูกเรือ
defEn: a person who works on a ship as a member of the crew
example: a crew of two officers and 13 sailors

defTh: นักบุญ
defEn: a person that the Christian Church recognizes as being very holy, because of the way they have lived or died
example: St John

defTh: สาเก
สลัด, ยำ
defEn: a mixture of raw vegetables such as lettuce, tomato and cucumber, usually served with other food as part of a meal
example: All main courses come with salad or vegetables.

defTh: เงินเดือน
defEn: money that employees receive for doing their job, especially professional employees or people working in an office, usually paid every month
example: an annual salary of $40000

defTh: ลดราคา, การขาย
defEn: an act or the process of selling something
example: regulations governing the sale of alcoholic beverages

defTh: เกลือ, เค็ม
defEn: a white substance that is added to food to make it taste better or to preserve it. Salt is obtained from mines and is also found in seawater. It is sometimes called common salt to show that it is different from other chemical salts. Its chemical name is sodium chloride.
example: Pass the salt, please.

defTh: เหมือนกัน, เดียวกัน
defEn: exactly the one or ones referred to or mentioned; not different
example: We have lived in the same house for twenty years.

defTh: ตัวอย่าง, ชิม
defEn: a number of people or things taken from a larger group and used in tests to provide information about the group
example: The interviews were given to a random sample of students.

defTh: การคว่ำบาตร, บทลงโทษทางเศรษฐกิจ
defEn: an official order that limits trade, contact, etc. with a particular country, in order to make it do something, such as obeying international law
example: Trade sanctions were imposed against any country that refused to sign the agreement.

defTh: ทราย, หาดทราย
defEn: a substance that consists of very small fine grains of rock. Sand is found on beaches, in deserts, etc.
example: a grain of sand

defTh: แซนด์วิช
defEn: two slices of bread, often spread with butter, with a layer of meat, cheese, etc. between them
example: a ham/tuna/egg sandwich

defTh: ดาวเทียม
defEn: an electronic device that is sent into space and moves around the earth or another planet. It is used for communicating by radio, television, etc. and for gathering information.
example: a weather/communications/spy satellite

defTh: ความพึงพอใจ
defEn: the good feeling that you have when you have achieved something or when something that you wanted to happen does happen; something that gives you this feeling
example: to gain/get/derive satisfaction from something

defTh: พอใจ, อิ่มใจ
defEn: pleased because you have achieved something or because something that you wanted to happen has happened
example: a satisfied customer

defTh: ทำให้พอใจ
defEn: to make somebody pleased by doing or giving them what they want
example: Nothing satisfies him—he's always complaining.

defTh: วันเสาร์
defEn: the day of the week after Friday and before Sunday
example: It's Saturday today, isn't it?

defTh: ซอส, น้ำจิ้ม
defEn: a thick liquid that is eaten with food to add taste to it
example: tomato/cranberry/chilli sauce

defTh: ประหยัด, ช่วยชีวิต, บันทึก
defEn: to keep somebody/something safe from death, harm, loss, etc.
example: save somebody/something, to save somebody’s life

defTh: การออม, การประหยัด
defEn: an amount of something such as time or money that you do not need to use or spend
example: saving of something, Buy three and make a saving of 55p.

defTh: พูด, บอก, กล่าว
defEn: the right to influence something by giving your opinion before a decision is made
example: say (in something), We had no say in the decision to sell the company.

defTh: ระดับ, ตาชั่ง, เกล็ด
defEn: the size or extent of something, especially when compared with something else
example: on a … scale, They entertain on a large scale (= they hold expensive parties with a lot of guests).

defTh: สแกน
defEn: to look quickly but not very carefully at a document, etc.
example: scan something for something, I scanned the list quickly for my name.

defTh: เรื่องอื้อฉาว
defEn: behaviour or an event that people think is morally or legally wrong and causes public feelings of shock or anger
example: a series of sex scandals

defTh: ความตื่นตระหนก
defEn: a situation in which a lot of people are anxious or frightened about something
example: a health scare

defTh: ตกใจกลัว, ผวา
defEn: frightened of something or afraid that something bad might happen
example: The thieves got scared and ran away.

defTh: น่าหวาดกลัว
defEn: frightening
example: It was a really scary moment.

defTh: กระจัดกระจาย
defEn: spread far apart over a wide area or over a long period of time
example: a few scattered settlements

defTh: สถานการณ์
defEn: a description of how things might happen in the future
example: Let me suggest a possible scenario.

defTh: ฉาก, เหตุการณ์
defEn: the place where something happens, especially something unpleasant
example: the scene of the accident/crime/crash

defTh: ไม่เชื่อ
defEn: having doubts that a claim or statement is true or that something will happen
example: She looked highly sceptical.

defTh: ตารางเวลา, กำหนด
defEn: a plan that lists all the work that you have to do and when you must do each thing
example: I have a hectic schedule for the next few days.

defTh: แผนการ, กลอุบาย
defEn: a plan or system for doing or organizing something
example: a training scheme

defTh: นักวิชาการ
defEn: a person who knows a lot about a particular subject because they have studied it in detail
example: a classical scholar

defTh: ทุนการศึกษา
defEn: an amount of money given to somebody by an organization to help pay for their education
example: She won a scholarship to study at Stanford.

defTh: โรงเรียน, การศึกษา
defEn: a place where children go to be educated
example: My brother and I went to the same school.

defTh: วิทยาศาสตร์
defEn: knowledge about the structure and behaviour of the natural and physical world, based on facts that you can prove, for example by experiments
example: new developments in science and technology

defTh: ทางวิทยาศาสตร์
defEn: involving science; connected with science
example: a scientific discovery/theory/fact

defTh: นักวิทยาศาสตร์
defEn: a person who studies one or more of the natural sciences (= for example, physics, chemistry or biology)
example: a research scientist

defTh: ขอบเขตของเนื้อหา, วิสัย
defEn: the opportunity or ability to do or achieve something
example: scope for something, There's still plenty of scope for improvement.

defTh: คะแนน, ทำคะแนน
defEn: the number of points, goals, etc. scored by each player or team in a game or competition
example: a high/low score

defTh: ขีดข่วน, เกา
defEn: a mark, a cut or an injury made by scratching somebody’s skin or the surface of something
example: Her hands were covered in scratches from the brambles.

defTh: กรีดร้อง, เสียงกรีดร้อง
defEn: a loud high shout made by somebody who is hurt, frightened, excited, etc.; a loud high noise
example: scream of something, She let out a scream of pain.

defTh: จอ, ฉาก, กรอง
defEn: the flat surface at the front of a television, computer, or other electronic device, on which you see pictures or information
example: a computer screen

defTh: การคัดกรอง
defEn: the act of showing a film or television programme
example: This will be the movie's first screening in this country.

defTh: สกรู, ขัน
defEn: a thin pointed piece of metal like a nail with a raised spiral line (called a thread) along it and a line or cross cut into its head. Screws are turned and pressed into wood, metal, etc. with a screwdriver in order to fasten two things together.
example: One of the screws is loose.

defTh: สคริปต์
defEn: a written text of a play, film, broadcast, talk, etc.
example: That line isn't in the original script.

defTh: การตรวจสอบข้อเท็จจริง
defEn: careful and complete examination
example: Her argument doesn't really stand up to scrutiny.

defTh: ประติมากรรม
defEn: a work of art that is a solid figure or object made by carving or shaping wood, stone, clay, metal, etc.
example: a marble sculpture of Venus

defTh: ทะเล, มหาสมุทร
defEn: the salt water that covers most of the earth’s surface and surrounds its continents and islands
example: The waste was dumped in the sea.

defTh: แมวน้ำ, ผนึก
defEn: an official design or mark, stamped on a document to show that it is real and carries the authority of a particular person or organization
example: The letter bore the president's seal.

defTh: ค้นหา, ค้น
defEn: an attempt to find somebody/something, especially by looking carefully for them/it
example: search for somebody/something, a long search for the murder weapon

defTh: ฤดู, ฤดูกาล
defEn: any of the four main periods of the year: spring, summer, autumn and winter
example: the changing seasons

defTh: ที่นั่ง, นั่ง
defEn: a place where you can sit, for example a chair
example: She sat back in her seat.

defTh: ที่สอง
defEn: after one other person or thing in order or importance
example: She came second in the marathon.

defTh: ทุติยภูมิ, รอง
defEn: connected with teaching children of 11–18 years
example: secondary teachers

defTh: ประการที่สอง
defEn: used to introduce the second of a list of points you want to make in a speech or piece of writing
example: Firstly, it's expensive, and secondly, it's too slow.

defTh: ความลับ, ลับ
defEn: known about by only a few people; kept hidden from others
example: secret information/meetings/talks

defTh: เลขานุการ
defEn: a person who works in an office, working for another person, dealing with mail and phone calls, keeping records, arranging meetings with people, etc.
example: a legal/medical secretary

defTh: ส่วนย่อย (ที่ถูกแบ่ง)
defEn: any of the parts into which something is divided
example: section of something, That section of the road is still closed.

defTh: ภาค, ส่วน
defEn: a part of an area of activity, especially of a country’s economy
example: the service/banking/manufacturing/financial sector

defTh: ฆราวาส
defEn: not connected with spiritual or religious matters
example: secular music

defTh: มั่นคง, ปลอดภัยจากการคุกคาม
defEn: likely to continue or be successful for a long time
example: a secure job/income

defTh: ความปลอดภัย, ความมั่นคง
defEn: the activities involved in protecting a country, building or person against attack, danger, etc.
example: national/homeland security (= the defence of a country)

defTh: เห็น, มอง
defEn: to become aware of somebody/something by using your eyes
example: see somebody/something, She looked for him but couldn't see him in the crowd.

defTh: เมล็ด, หว่าน
defEn: the small hard part produced by a plant, from which a new plant can grow
example: a packet of wild flower seeds

defTh: แสวงหา, ค้นหา
defEn: to look for something/somebody
example: seek something/somebody, Drivers are advised to seek alternative routes.

defTh: ผู้แสวงหา
defEn: a person who is trying to find or get the thing mentioned
example: an attention/a publicity seeker

defTh: ดูเหมือน, ปรากฏ
defEn: to give the impression of being or doing something
example: + adj., You seem happy.

defTh: ดูเหมือน
defEn: in a way that appears to be true but may in fact not be
example: a seemingly stupid question

defTh: ส่วนย่อย (ตามเรขาคณิต)
defEn: a part of something that is separate from the other parts or can be considered separately
example: She cleaned a small segment of the painting.

defTh: ยึด
defEn: to take somebody/something in your hand suddenly and using force
example: seize something from somebody, She tried to seize the gun from him.

defTh: ไม่ค่อย
defEn: not often
example: He had seldom seen a child with so much talent.

defTh: คัดเลือก, สรรหา (อย่างพิถีพิถัน)
defEn: to choose somebody/something from a group of people or things, usually according to a system
example: select somebody/something for something, He hasn't been selected for the team.

defTh: การเลือก, ตัวเลือก
defEn: the process of choosing somebody/something from a group of people or things, usually according to a system
example: She took a long time to make her selection.

defTh: เลือกสรร
defEn: affecting or involving only a small number of people or things from a larger group
example: the selective breeding of cattle

defTh: ตนเอง, ตัวเอง
defEn: the type of person you are, especially the way you normally behave, look or feel
example: You'll soon be feeling your old self again (= feeling well or happy again).

defTh: ขาย, จำหน่าย
defEn: to give something to somebody in exchange for money
example: sell (something), I recently sold my bike.

defTh: สัมมนา
defEn: a class at a university or college when a small group of students and a teacher discuss or study a particular topic
example: Teaching is by lectures and seminars.

defTh: สมาชิกวุฒิสภา
defEn: a member of a senate
example: Senator McCarthy

defTh: ส่ง, จัดส่ง
defEn: to make something go or be taken to a place, especially by post, email, radio, etc.
example: send something, She sent a letter of support.

defTh: อาวุโส, ผู้สูงอายุ
defEn: high in rank or status; higher in rank or status than others
example: a senior official/officer/manager/executive

defTh: ความรู้สึก
defEn: a feeling that you get when something affects your body
example: a tingling/burning sensation

defTh: ความรู้สึก, สัมผัส
defEn: an understanding about something; an ability to judge something
example: One of the most important things in a partner is a sense of humour (= the ability to find things funny or make people laugh).

defTh: ที่ใช้สติปัญญา
defEn: able to make good judgements based on reason and experience rather than emotion; practical
example: She's a sensible sort of person.

defTh: ไวต่อความรู้สึก
defEn: aware of and able to understand other people and their feelings
example: a sensitive and caring man

defTh: ความไว
defEn: the ability to understand other people’s feelings
example: sensitivity to the needs of children

defTh: ประโยค, ตัดสิน
defEn: a set of words expressing a statement, a question or an order, usually containing a subject and a verb. In written English sentences begin with a capital letter and end with a full stop/period (.), a question mark (?) or an exclamation mark (!).
example: Does the sentence contain an adverb?

defTh: ทัศนคติ
defEn: a feeling or an opinion, especially one based on emotions
example: the spread of nationalist sentiments

defTh: แยก, แบ่ง
defEn: forming a unit by itself; not joined to something else
example: They have begun to sleep in separate rooms.

defTh: การแยก, การแบ่ง
defEn: the act of separating people or things; the state of being separate
example: separation from somebody/something, the state’s eventual separation from the federation

defTh: กันยายน
defEn: the 9th month of the year, between August and October
example: She was born in September.

defTh: ลำดับ
defEn: a set of events, actions, numbers, etc. which have a particular order and which lead to a particular result
example: He described the sequence of events leading up to the robbery.

defTh: อนุกรม
defEn: doing the same thing in the same way several times; done in the same way several times
example: a serial rapist

defTh: ชุด, อนุกรม
defEn: a set of television or radio programmes or podcasts that deal with the same subject or that have the same characters
example: The first episode of the new series is on Saturday.

defTh: จริงจัง, ร้ายแรง
defEn: bad or dangerous
example: a serious illness/offence/crime

defTh: อย่างจริงจัง
defEn: in a serious way
example: to be seriously ill/injured/wounded/hurt

defTh: คนรับใช้, ข้า
defEn: a person who works in another person’s house, and cooks, cleans, etc. for them
example: a domestic servant

defTh: บริการ, เสิร์ฟ
defEn: to give somebody food or drink, for example at a restaurant or during a meal
example: serve (something), Breakfast is served between 7 and 10 a.m.

defTh: บริการ, การบริการ
defEn: a system that provides something that the public needs, organized by the government or a private company
example: the ambulance/bus/postal service

defTh: ช่วงเวลา, การประชุม
defEn: a period of time that is spent doing a particular activity
example: a training/practice session

defTh: ชุด, ตั้ง, จัด
defEn: a group of similar things that belong together in some way
example: a set of six chairs

defTh: การจัดเตรียม, การติดตั้ง
defEn: a way of organizing something; a system
example: I've only been here a couple of weeks and I don't really know the set-up.

defTh: การกำหนดค่า, บริบท
defEn: an environment where something is located; the place at which something happens
example: a rural/an ideal/a beautiful/an idyllic setting

defTh: ตกลง, จัดการ
defEn: to put an end to an argument or a disagreement
example: settle something, to settle a dispute/a matter/an issue

defTh: การตั้งถิ่นฐาน
defEn: an official agreement that ends an argument between two people or groups
example: to negotiate a peace settlement

defTh: ไม้ตาย
defEn: a person who goes to live in a new country or region
example: Most of the settlers came from England.

defTh: เจ็ด
example: There are seven cookies left.

defTh: สิบเจ็ด
เจ็ดสิบ
หลาย, จำนวนหนึ่ง
defEn: more than two but not very many
example: Several letters arrived this morning.

defTh: รุนแรง, สาหัส
defEn: extremely bad or serious
example: His injuries are severe.

defTh: อย่างรุนแรง
defEn: very badly or seriously
example: severely injured

defTh: เพศ, เซ็กส์
defEn: the state of being male or female
example: How can you tell what sex a fish is?

defTh: ทางเพศ, เกี่ยวกับเพศ
defEn: connected with the physical activity of sex
example: sexual behaviour/activity/desire

defTh: เรื่องเพศ
defEn: the feelings and activities connected with a person’s sexual desires
example: He was confused about his sexuality.

defTh: เซ็กซี่
defEn: sexually attractive
example: the sexy lead singer

defTh: ร่มเงา, เฉดสี
defEn: an area that is dark and cool under or behind something, for example a tree or building, because the sun’s light does not get to it
example: shade of something, The shade of the pine tree provided some protection from the sun.

defTh: เงา, ร่มเงา
defEn: the dark shape that somebody/something’s form makes on a surface, for example on the ground, when they are between the light and the surface
example: The children were having fun, chasing each other's shadows.

defTh: เขย่า, สั่น
defEn: an act of shaking somebody/something
example: She gave him a shake to wake him.

defTh: จะ, ควร
defEn: used with I and we for talking about or predicting the future
example: This time next week I shall be in Scotland.

defTh: ตื้น, ไม่ลึก
defEn: not having much distance between the top or surface and the bottom
example: a shallow dish/pan/bowl

defTh: ความอับอาย, น่าเสียดาย
defEn: used to say that something is a cause for feeling sad or disappointed
example: She's retiring because of ill health, which is a great shame.

defTh: รูปร่าง, แบบ
defEn: the form of the outer edges or surfaces of something; an example of something that has a particular form
example: a rectangular/spherical/cylindrical shape

defTh: มีรูปร่าง
defEn: having the type of shape mentioned
example: a huge balloon shaped like a giant cow

defTh: แบ่งปัน, ส่วน
defEn: one part of something that is divided between two or more people
example: share of something, Next year we hope to have a greater share of the market.

defTh: ผู้ถือหุ้น
defEn: an owner of shares in a company or business
example: the major shareholders in the company

defTh: คม, แหลม, ฉลาด
defEn: having a fine edge or point, especially of something that can cut or make a hole in something
example: a sharp knife

defTh: ป่นปี้
defEn: to suddenly break into small pieces; to make something suddenly break into small pieces
example: shatter (into something), He dropped the vase and it shattered into pieces on the floor.

defTh: เธอ, หล่อน
defEn: a female person or animal that has already been mentioned or is easily identified
example: ‘What does your sister do?’ ‘She's a dentist.’

defTh: หลั่งน้ำตา
defEn: to get rid of something that is no longer wanted
example: The factory is shedding a large number of jobs.

defTh: แกะ, แพะ
defEn: an animal with a thick coat, kept on farms for its meat (called mutton or lamb) or its wool
example: a flock of sheep

defTh: เลี่ยง
defEn: used to emphasize the size, degree or amount of something
example: The area is under threat from the sheer number of tourists using it.

defTh: แผ่น, ผ้าปู
defEn: a large piece of thin cloth used on a bed to lie on or lie under
example: Have you changed the sheets (= put clean sheets on the bed)?

defTh: ชั้นวางของ
defEn: a flat board, made of wood, metal, glass, etc., fixed to the wall or forming part of a cupboard, bookcase, etc., for things to be placed on
example: I helped him put up some shelves in his bedroom.

defTh: เปลือก, หอย
defEn: the hard outer part of eggs, nuts, some seeds, and some animals
example: We collected shells on the beach.

defTh: ที่พัก, หลบภัย
defEn: the fact of having a place to live or stay, considered as a basic human need
example: Human beings need food, clothing and shelter.

defTh: เปลี่ยน, กะ
defEn: a period of time worked by a group of workers who start work as another group finishes
example: to work a shift

defTh: ส่องแสง, เปล่งประกาย
defEn: to produce or reflect light; to be bright
example: The sun shone brightly in a cloudless sky.

defTh: เป็นประกาย, ส่องแสง
defEn: smooth and bright; reflecting the light
example: shiny black hair

defTh: เรือ, ส่ง
defEn: a large boat that carries people or goods by sea
example: The yard builds ships for the Navy.

defTh: การส่งสินค้า
defEn: ships in general or considered as a group
example: The canal is open to shipping.

defTh: เสื้อเชิ้ต
defEn: a piece of clothing worn on the upper part of the body, made of light cloth, with sleeves and usually with a collar and buttons down the front
example: to wear a shirt

defTh: ช็อก, ตกใจ
defEn: a strong feeling of surprise as a result of something happening, especially something unpleasant; the event that causes this feeling
example: I got a terrible shock the other day.

defTh: ตกใจ, ช็อก
defEn: surprised and upset; showing that somebody feels surprised and upset
example: I was quite shocked when I found out what he'd done.

defTh: น่าตกใจ, สะเทือนใจ
defEn: that offends or upsets people; that is morally wrong
example: shocking behaviour

defTh: รองเท้า
defEn: one of a pair of objects usually made of leather or plastic that you wear on your feet
example: a pair of shoes

defTh: ยิง, ถ่าย
defEn: the part that grows up from the ground when a plant starts to grow; a new part that grows on plants or trees
example: new green shoots

defTh: การยิง, ถ่ายทำ
defEn: a situation in which a person is shot with a gun
example: Terrorist groups claimed responsibility for the shootings and bomb attacks.

defTh: ร้าน, ซื้อของ
defEn: a building or part of a building where you can buy goods or services
example: to open/close/run a shop

defTh: การซื้อของ
defEn: the activity of going to shops and buying things or ordering them online
example: to go shopping

defTh: ฝั่ง
defEn: the land along the edge of the sea, the ocean or a lake
example: a rocky/sandy shore

defTh: สั้น, เตี้ย, ขาด
defEn: measuring or covering a small length or distance, or a smaller length or distance than usual
example: He had short curly hair.

defTh: ระยะสั้น
defEn: lasting a short time; designed only for a short period of time in the future
example: a short-term loan

defTh: การขาดแคลน
defEn: a situation when there is not enough of the people or things that are needed
example: food/housing/water shortages

defTh: ในไม่ช้า
defEn: a short time; not long
example: She arrived shortly after us.

defTh: ยิง, นัด, ภาพ
defEn: the act of firing a gun; the sound this makes
example: We heard some shots in the distance.

defTh: ควร, น่าจะ
defEn: used to show what is right, appropriate, etc., especially when criticizing somebody’s actions
example: You shouldn't drink and drive.

defTh: ไหล่, บ่า
defEn: either of the two parts of the body between the top of each arm and the neck
example: your left/right shoulder

defTh: ตะโกน, ร้อง
defEn: a loud cry of anger, fear, excitement, etc.
example: angry shouts

defTh: แสดง, โชว์
defEn: a programme on television or the radio
example: Millions of people watch the show.

defTh: ฝักบัว, อาบน้ำ
defEn: a piece of equipment producing a flow of water that you stand under to wash yourself; the small room or part of a room that contains a shower
example: in the shower, He's in the shower.

defTh: หด
defEn: to become smaller, especially when washed in water that is too hot; to make clothes, cloth, etc. smaller in this way
example: My sweater shrank in the wash.

defTh: ยัก
defEn: to raise your shoulders and then drop them to show that you do not know or care about something
example: Sam shrugged and said nothing.

defTh: ปิด, หุบ, เงียบ
defEn: not open
example: The door was shut.

defTh: ขี้อาย, อาย
defEn: nervous or embarrassed about meeting and speaking to other people
example: He is not exactly the shy and retiring type.

defTh: พี่น้อง
defEn: a brother or sister
example: squabbles between siblings

defTh: ป่วย, คลื่นไส้
defEn: physically or mentally ill
example: a sick child

defTh: ด้าน, ข้าง
defEn: either of the two halves of a surface, an object or an area that is divided by an imaginary central line
example: the right side of the brain

defTh: ถอนหายใจ
defEn: an act or the sound of sighing
example: to give/heave/let out a sigh

defTh: การมองเห็น, วิว
defEn: the ability to see
example: to lose your sight (= to become blind)

defTh: สัญญาณ, ลงชื่อ
defEn: an event, an action, a fact, etc. that shows that something exists, is happening or may happen in the future
example: Looking back, I should have seen the signs.

defTh: สัญญาณ
defEn: a movement or sound that you make to give somebody information, instructions, a warning, etc.
example: a danger/warning/distress signal

defTh: ลายเซ็น
defEn: your name as you usually write it, for example at the end of a letter
example: Someone had forged her signature on the cheque.

defTh: นัยสำคัญ
defEn: the importance of something, especially when this has an effect on what happens in the future
example: a decision of major political significance

defTh: สำคัญ, มีนัยสำคัญ
defEn: large or important enough to have an effect or to be noticed
example: There are no significant differences between the two groups of students.

defTh: อย่างมีนัยสำคัญ
defEn: in a way that is large or important enough to have an effect on something or to be noticed
example: significantly higher/lower/larger/smaller

defTh: ความเงียบ, นิ่ง
defEn: a complete lack of noise or sound
example: Their footsteps echoed in the silence.

defTh: เงียบ, ไม่พูด
defEn: where there is little or no sound; making little or no sound
example: At last the traffic fell silent.

defTh: ผ้าไหม
defEn: fine soft thread produced by silkworms
example: The caterpillar spins the silk around its entire body.

defTh: โง่, ไร้สาระ
defEn: showing a lack of thought, understanding, or judgement
example: a silly idea/question/name

defTh: เงิน, สีเงิน
defEn: shiny grey-white in colour
example: a silver car

defTh: คล้าย, เหมือนกัน
defEn: like somebody/something but not exactly the same
example: We have very similar interests.

defTh: ความคล้ายคลึงกัน
defEn: the state of being similar to somebody/something but not exactly the same
example: similarity between A and B, The report highlights the similarity between the two groups.

defTh: ในทำนองเดียวกัน
defEn: in almost the same way
example: It is a little cheaper than other similarly sized cars.

defTh: ง่าย, ไม่ซับซ้อน
defEn: not complicated; easy to understand or do
example: a simple solution/explanation/question/task/example

defTh: อย่างง่ายๆ
defEn: used to emphasize how easy or basic something is
example: To order, simply click here.

defTh: จำลอง
defEn: to create particular conditions that exist in real life using computers, models, etc., usually for study or training purposes
example: Computer software can be used to simulate conditions on the seabed.

defTh: การจำลอง
defEn: a situation in which a particular set of conditions is created artificially in order to study or experience something that could exist in reality
example: a computer simulation of how the planet functions

defTh: พร้อมกัน
defEn: at the same time as something else
example: The game will be broadcast simultaneously on TV and radio.

defTh: บาป
defEn: an offence against God or against a religious or moral law
example: to commit a sin

defTh: ตั้งแต่, เพราะว่า
defEn: from a time in the past until a later past time, or until now
example: She went for a run on Monday and has not been seen since.

defTh: จริงใจ, บริสุทธิ์ใจ
defEn: showing what you really think or feel
example: a sincere apology

defTh: ร้องเพลง
defEn: to make musical sounds with your voice in the form of a song or tune
example: I just can't sing in tune!

defTh: นักร้อง, ผู้ขับร้อง
defEn: a person who sings, or whose job is singing, especially in public
example: She's a wonderful singer.

defTh: การร้องเพลง
defEn: the activity of making musical sounds with your voice
example: the beautiful singing of birds

defTh: เดี่ยว, โสด, หนึ่ง
defEn: only one
example: He sent her a single red rose.

defTh: จม, อ่าง
defEn: to go down below the surface or towards the bottom of a liquid or soft substance
example: The ship sank to the bottom of the sea.

defTh: ท่าน, ครับ, นาย
defEn: used as a polite way of addressing a man whose name you do not know, for example in a shop or restaurant
example: Good morning, sir. Can I help you?

defTh: น้องสาว, พี่สาว
defEn: a girl or woman who has the same mother and father as another person
example: She's my sister.

defTh: นั่ง, วาง
defEn: to rest your weight on your bottom with your back straight, for example on/in a chair
example: She sat and stared at the letter in front of her.

defTh: พื้นที่หรือบริเวณ (สำหรับก่อสร้าง)
defEn: a place where a building, town, etc. was, is or will be located
example: the site of a sixteenth-century abbey

defTh: ตั้งอยู่
defEn: in a particular place or position
example: My bedroom was situated on the top floor of the house.

defTh: สถานการณ์, สภาพ
defEn: all the circumstances and things that are happening at a particular time and in a particular place
example: the present economic/financial/political situation

defTh: หก, จำนวนหก
example: There are six cookies left.

defTh: สิบหก
หกสิบ
ขนาด, ไซส์
defEn: how large or small a person or thing is
example: population/sample/group/class size

defTh: ร่าง
defEn: a simple picture that is drawn quickly and does not have many details
example: The artist is making sketches for his next painting.

defTh: สกี
defEn: connected with the sport of skiing
example: a ski resort

defTh: เล่นสกี
defEn: the sport or activity of moving over snow on skis
example: He also enjoys skiing and mountain biking.

defTh: ทักษะ, ความสามารถ
defEn: the ability to do something well
example: The job requires skill and an eye for detail.

defTh: ชำนาญ, มีฝีมือ
defEn: having enough ability, experience and knowledge to be able to do something well
example: a skilled engineer/negotiator/craftsman

defTh: ผิวหนัง, เปลือก
defEn: the layer of tissue that covers the body
example: to have dark/pale skin

defTh: ข้ามไป, เว้นไป (ไม่ทำ)
defEn: to move forwards lightly and quickly making a little jump with each step
example: She skipped happily along beside me.

defTh: กระโปรง
defEn: a piece of clothing that hangs from the middle part of the body
example: a short/long/pleated/denim skirt

defTh: กะโหลกศีรษะ
defEn: the bone structure that forms the head and surrounds and protects the brain
example: a fractured skull

defTh: ท้องฟ้า, นภา
defEn: the space above the earth that you can see when you look up, where clouds and the sun, moon and stars appear
example: The sky suddenly went dark and it started to rain.

defTh: สแลม
defEn: to shut, or to make something shut, with a lot of force, making a loud noise
example: I heard the door slam behind him.

defTh: ตบ
defEn: to hit somebody/something with the flat part of your hand
example: She slapped his face hard.

defTh: เฉือน
defEn: to make a long cut with a sharp object, especially in a violent way
example: slash something, Someone had slashed the tyres on my car.

defTh: ทาส
defEn: a person who is owned by another person and is forced to work for and obey them
example: A former slave, he graduated from Clafflin University in South Carolina.

defTh: การเป็นทาส
defEn: the state of being forced to work as a slave
example: to be sold into slavery

defTh: นอนหลับ, การนอน
defEn: the natural state of rest in which your eyes are closed, your body is not active, and your mind is not conscious
example: I need to get some sleep.

defTh: ชิ้น, หั่น
defEn: a thin flat piece of bread, meat, cheese, etc. that has been cut off a larger piece; a piece of cake that has been cut from a larger cake
example: Cut the meat into thin slices.

defTh: สไลด์, เลื่อน
defEn: one page of an electronic presentation, that may contain text and images, that is usually viewed on a computer screen or projected onto a larger screen
example: Here's a slide showing target markets.

defTh: เล็กน้อย, ดูถูก
defEn: very small in degree
example: a slight increase/change/difference

defTh: เล็กน้อย, นิดหน่อย
defEn: a little
example: a slightly different version

defTh: ลื่น, พลาด, สลิป
defEn: to slide a short distance by accident so that you fall or nearly fall
example: She slipped and landed flat on her back.

defTh: คำขวัญ
defEn: a word or phrase that is easy to remember, used for example by a political party or in advertising to attract people’s attention or to suggest an idea quickly
example: an advertising slogan

defTh: ความชัน, ลาด
defEn: a surface or piece of land that slopes (= is higher at one end than the other)
example: on a slope, The town is built on a slope.

defTh: สล็อต
defEn: a long, narrow opening, into which you put or fit something
example: to put some coins in the slot

defTh: ช้า, เชื่องช้า
defEn: not moving, acting or done quickly; taking a long time; not fast
example: a slow pace/speed

defTh: อย่างช้าๆ
defEn: at a slow speed; not quickly
example: to move/walk/turn slowly

defTh: เล็ก, มีขนาดเล็ก
defEn: not large in size, number, degree, amount, etc.
example: a small town/village/community

defTh: ฉลาดหลักแหลม
defEn: looking clean and neat; well dressed in fashionable and/or formal clothes
example: I have to be smart for work.

defTh: สมาร์ทโฟน
defEn: a mobile phone that also has some of the functions of a computer, for example the facility to use apps and the internet
example: You can use your smartphone to access the internet.

defTh: ทุบ, ชน
defEn: to break something, or to be broken, violently and noisily into many pieces
example: Several windows had been smashed.

defTh: กลิ่น, ดม
defEn: the quality of something that people and animals sense through their noses
example: a sweet/pleasant smell

defTh: ยิ้ม, รอยยิ้ม
defEn: the expression that you have on your face when you are happy or you think something is funny, in which the corners of your mouth turn upwards
example: a broad/warm/bright/slight smile

defTh: ควัน, สูบ
defEn: the grey, white or black gas that is produced by something burning
example: cigarette/tobacco smoke

defTh: การสูบบุหรี่
defEn: the activity or habit of smoking cigarettes, etc.
example: No Smoking (= for example, on a notice)

defTh: เรียบ, ลื่น
defEn: completely flat and even, without any rough areas or holes
example: the smooth surface of the metal

defTh: งู, คนทรยศ
defEn: a reptile with a very long thin body and no legs. There are many types of snake, some of which are poisonous.
example: a snake coiled up in the grass

defTh: สแน็ป
defEn: to break something suddenly with a sharp noise; to be broken in this way
example: snap something, The wind had snapped the tree in two.

defTh: หิมะ, ตก
defEn: small soft white pieces (called flakes) of frozen water that fall from the sky in cold weather; this substance when it is lying on the ground
example: Snow was falling heavily.

defTh: ดังนั้น, มาก
defEn: to such a great degree
example: Don't look so angry.

defTh: ที่เรียกว่า
defEn: used to show that you do not think that the word or phrase that is being used to describe somebody/something is appropriate
example: the opinion of a so-called ‘expert’

defTh: แช่
defEn: to put something in liquid for a time so that it becomes completely wet; to become completely wet in this way
example: soak something (in something), I usually soak the beans overnight.

defTh: สบู่, ฟอก
defEn: a substance that you use with water for washing your body
example: Wash the affected area with soap and water.

defTh: ทะยาน
defEn: if the value, amount or level of something soars, it rises very quickly
example: soaring costs/prices/temperatures

defTh: ฟุตบอล
defEn: a game played by two teams of 11 players, using a round ball which players kick up and down the playing field. Teams try to kick the ball into the other team’s goal.
example: I played soccer when I was younger.

defTh: สังคม, เกี่ยวกับสังคม
defEn: connected with activities in which people meet each other for pleasure
example: She has a busy social life.

defTh: สังคมนิยม
defEn: connected with socialism
example: socialist beliefs

defTh: สังคม, หมู่ชน
defEn: people in general, living together in communities
example: She believes that the arts benefit society as a whole.

defTh: ถุงเท้า
defEn: a piece of clothing that is worn over the foot, ankle and lower part of the leg, especially inside a shoe
example: a pair of socks

defTh: นุ่ม, อ่อนโยน
defEn: changing shape easily when pressed; not stiff or hard
example: soft margarine

defTh: ซอฟต์แวร์, โปรแกรม
defEn: the programs used by a computer for doing particular jobs
example: management/editing software

defTh: ดิน, สิ่งสกปรก
defEn: the top layer of the earth in which plants, trees, etc. grow
example: instruments for measuring soil moisture

defTh: พลังงานแสงอาทิตย์
defEn: of or connected with the sun
example: solar radiation

defTh: ทหาร, นักรบ
defEn: a member of an army, especially one who is not an officer
example: They visited the graves of US soldiers killed in the First World War.

defTh: เดียว, เพียงคนเดียว
defEn: only; single
example: the sole surviving member of the family

defTh: แต่เพียงผู้เดียว, เพียงอย่างเดียวเท่านั้น
defEn: only; not involving somebody/something else
example: She was motivated solely by self-interest.

defTh: ที่ปรึกษาทางกฎหมาย
defEn: a lawyer who prepares legal documents, for example for the sale of land or buildings, advises people on legal matters, and can speak for them in some courts of law
example: Her first step was to contact a solicitor for advice.

defTh: แข็ง, มั่นคง
defEn: hard; not in the form of a liquid or gas
example: The planet Jupiter may have no solid surface at all.

defTh: ความเป็นน้ำหนึ่งใจเดียว
defEn: support by one person or group of people for another because they share feelings, opinions, aims, etc.
example: community solidarity

defTh: เดี่ยว
defEn: done by one person alone, without anyone helping them
example: his first solo flight

defTh: วิธีแก้ปัญหา
defEn: a way of solving a problem or dealing with a difficult situation
example: Attempts to find a solution have failed.

defTh: แก้ไข, แก้ปัญหา
defEn: to find a way of dealing with a problem or difficult situation
example: Attempts are being made to solve the problem of waste disposal.

defTh: บ้าง, บาง
defEn: used with uncountable nouns or plural countable nouns to mean ‘an amount of’ or ‘a number of’, when the amount or number is not given
example: There's some milk in the fridge.

defTh: ใครบางคน, บุคคลที่สำคัญ
defEn: a person who is not known or mentioned by name
example: Somebody should have told me.

defTh: อย่างใด, อย่างไรก็ตาม
defEn: in a way that is not known or certain
example: We must stop him from seeing her somehow.

defTh: บางคน, ใครคนหนึ่ง
defEn: a person who is not known or mentioned by name
example: There's someone at the door.

defTh: บางสิ่ง
defEn: a thing that is not known or mentioned by name
example: We stopped for something to eat.

defTh: บางครั้ง
defEn: at a time that you do not know exactly or has not yet been decided
example: I saw him sometime last summer.

defTh: บางครั้ง, บางที
defEn: occasionally rather than all of the time
example: Sometimes I go by car.

defTh: ค่อนข้าง, บ้าง
defEn: to some degree
example: somewhat different/similar

defTh: ที่ไหนสักแห่ง
defEn: in, at or to a place that you do not know or do not mention by name
example: I read somewhere that she refuses to do interviews.

defTh: ลูกชาย
defEn: a person’s male child
example: their four-year-old son

defTh: เพลง, บทเพลง
defEn: a short piece of music with words that you sing
example: a love/pop/rock song

defTh: เร็วๆ นี้
defEn: in a short time from now; a short time after something else has happened
example: She sold the house soon after her husband died.

defTh: ช่ำชอง
defEn: clever and complicated in the way that it works or is presented
example: highly sophisticated computer systems

defTh: เสียใจ, ขอโทษ
defEn: feeling sad and ashamed about something that has been done
example: sorry about something, We're very sorry about the damage to your car.

defTh: คัด, ชนิด
defEn: a group or type of people or things that are similar in a particular way
example: sort of somebody/something, ‘What sort of music do you like?’ ‘Oh, all sorts.’

defTh: จิตวิญญาณ, วิญญาณ
defEn: the spiritual part of a person, believed to exist after death
example: He believed his immortal soul was in peril.

defTh: เสียง, ฟังดู
defEn: sensible; that you can rely on and that will probably give good results
example: He's a person of very sound judgement.

defTh: ซุป, แกงจืด
defEn: a liquid food made by boiling meat, vegetables, etc. in water, often eaten as the first course of a meal
example: a bowl/cup of soup

defTh: แหล่งที่มา, ต้นกำเนิด
defEn: a place, person or thing that you get something from
example: renewable energy sources

defTh: ทิศใต้, ภาคใต้
defEn: in or towards the south
example: South Wales

defTh: ทางใต้, ภาคใต้
defEn: located in the south or facing south; connected with or typical of the south part of the world or a region
example: the southern slopes of the mountains

defTh: อธิปไตย
defEn: complete power to govern a country
example: The country claimed sovereignty over the island.

defTh: ช่องว่าง, อวกาศ
defEn: the area outside the earth’s atmosphere where all the other planets and stars are
example: in space, Valentina Tereshkova was the first woman in space.

defTh: สแปม
defEn: advertising material sent by email to people who have not asked for it; advertising material on the internet that is not wanted
example: to send/block spam

defTh: ช่วง
defEn: the length of time that something lasts or is able to continue
example: I worked with him over a span of six years.

defTh: สำรอง, เหลือ, ผอม
defEn: available to do what you want with rather than work
example: He's studying music in his spare time.

defTh: จุดประกาย
defEn: to cause something to start or develop, especially suddenly
example: spark something, The proposal would spark a storm of protest around the country.

defTh: พูด, กล่าว
defEn: to talk to somebody about something; to have a conversation with somebody
example: speak to somebody, The President refused to speak to reporters.

defTh: ผู้พูด, ลำโพง
defEn: a person who gives a talk or makes a speech
example: He was a guest speaker at the conference.

defTh: พิเศษ, เฉพาะ
defEn: not ordinary or usual; different from what is normal
example: The school will only allow this in special circumstances.

defTh: ที่เป็นผู้เชี่ยวชาญเฉพาะทาง
defEn: having or involving expert knowledge of a particular area of work, study or medicine
example: specialist knowledge/training/skills

defTh: เชี่ยวชาญ
defEn: to become an expert in a particular area of work, study or business; to spend more time on one area of work, etc. than on others
example: Many students prefer not to specialize too soon.

defTh: เฉพาะทาง
defEn: designed or developed for a particular purpose or area of knowledge
example: specialized equipment

defTh: สายพันธุ์
defEn: a group into which animals, plants, etc. that are able to have sex with each other and produce healthy young are divided, smaller than a genus and identified by a Latin name
example: a conservation area for endangered species

defTh: เฉพาะเจาะจง
defEn: connected with one particular thing only
example: specific needs/requirements

defTh: โดยเฉพาะเจาะจง
defEn: connected with or intended for one particular thing only
example: liquid vitamins specifically designed for children

defTh: ข้อกำหนด
defEn: a detailed description of how something is, or should be, designed or made
example: the technical specifications of the new model (= of car)

defTh: ระบุ
defEn: to state something, especially by giving an exact measurement, time, exact instructions, etc.
example: specify something, Remember to specify your size when ordering clothes.

defTh: ตัวอย่าง
defEn: a small amount of something that shows what the rest of it is like
example: Astronauts have brought back specimens of rock from the moon.

defTh: ภาพที่น่าตื่นตา, การแสดงที่โดดเด่น
defEn: two lenses in a frame that rests on the nose and ears. People wear spectacles in order to be able to see better or to protect their eyes from bright light.
example: a pair of spectacles

defTh: ตระการตา
defEn: very impressive
example: The coastal road has spectacular scenery.

defTh: ผู้ชม
defEn: a person who is watching an event, especially a sports event
example: The new football stadium will hold 75000 spectators.

defTh: สเปกตรัม
defEn: a band of coloured lights in order of their wavelengths, as seen in a rainbow and into which light may be separated
example: A spectrum is formed by a ray of light passing through a prism.

defTh: คาดเดา
defEn: to form an opinion about something without knowing all the details or facts
example: speculate (about/on/as to something), We all speculated about the reasons for her resignation.

defTh: การเก็งกำไร
defEn: the act of forming opinions about what has happened or what might happen without knowing all the facts
example: His private life is the subject of much speculation.

defTh: คำพูด, สุนทรพจน์
defEn: a formal talk that a person gives to an audience
example: Several people made speeches at the wedding.

defTh: ความเร็ว, เร่ง
defEn: the rate at which somebody/something moves or travels
example: at … speed, at high/low/full/top speed

defTh: สะกด, คาถา
defEn: a short period of time during which something lasts
example: We had a spell of warm weather in April.

defTh: การสะกดคำ
defEn: the act of forming words correctly from individual letters; the ability to do this
example: the differences between British and American spelling

defTh: ใช้, จ่าย
defEn: to give money to pay for goods, services, etc.
example: spend something, I've spent all my money already.

defTh: การใช้จ่าย
defEn: the amount of money that is spent by a government, an organization or a person
example: to increase/cut/reduce spending

defTh: ทรงกลม
defEn: a solid figure that is completely round, with every point on its surface at an equal distance from the centre
example: The Earth is not a perfect sphere.

defTh: เครื่องเทศ, รสชาติ
defEn: one of the various types of powder or seed that come from plants and are used in cooking. Spices have a strong taste and smell.
example: common spices such as ginger and cinnamon

defTh: เผ็ดร้อน
defEn: having a strong taste because spices have been added to it
example: I don't like spicy food.

defTh: แมงมุม
defEn: a small creature with eight thin legs. Many spiders spin webs to catch insects for food.
example: a poisonous spider

defTh: หก
defEn: to flow over the edge of a container by accident; to make liquid do this
example: Water had spilled out of the bucket onto the floor.

defTh: หมุน, ปั่น
defEn: a very fast turning movement
example: Only in the last 50 years have we had clocks accurate enough to measure changes in the earth's spin.

defTh: กระดูกสันหลัง
defEn: the row of small bones that are connected together down the middle of the back
example: A shiver went down my spine.

defTh: จิตวิญญาณ, กำลังใจ
defEn: the part of a person that includes their mind, feelings and character rather than their body
example: You are underestimating the power of the human spirit to overcome difficulties.

defTh: ทางจิตวิญญาณ
defEn: connected with the human spirit, rather than the body or physical things
example: a spiritual experience

defTh: ความอาฆาต, ความแค้น
defEn: a feeling of wanting to hurt or upset somebody
example: out of spite, I'm sure he only said it out of spite.

defTh: แยก, แตก
defEn: an argument or disagreement that divides a group of people or makes somebody separate from somebody else
example: Ten years after their acrimonious split, the band has reformed.

defTh: ทำให้เสีย, บูด
defEn: to change something good into something bad, unpleasant, etc.
example: Our camping trip was spoilt by bad weather.

defTh: พูด, ที่พูด
defEn: involving speaking rather than writing; expressed in speech rather than in writing
example: spoken English

defTh: โฆษก (บุรุษ), ผู้แถลงข่าว
defEn: a person who speaks for a group or an organization
example: a police spokesman

defTh: โฆษก (ไม่ระบุเพศ), ผู้แถลงข่าว
defEn: a person who speaks for a group or an organization
example: a council spokesperson

defTh: โฆษกหญิง
defEn: a woman who speaks for a group or an organization
example: a government spokeswoman

defTh: สปอนเซอร์
defEn: a person or company that pays for a radio or television programme, or for a concert or sporting event, usually in return for advertising
example: The programme is funded by a number of corporate sponsors.

defTh: การให้เงินทุน, การเป็นผู้สนับสนุน (ทางการเงิน)
defEn: financial support from a sponsor
example: a $50 million sponsorship deal

defTh: ช้อน
defEn: a tool that has a handle with a shallow bowl at the end, used for mixing, serving and eating food
example: a plastic/metal spoon

defTh: กีฬา, เล่นกีฬา
defEn: activity that you do for pleasure and that needs physical effort or skill, usually done in a special area and according to fixed rules
example: There are excellent facilities for sport and recreation.

defTh: กีฬา
defEn: connected with sports
example: a major sporting event

defTh: จุด, ตำแหน่ง, พบ
defEn: a small round area that has a different colour or feels different from the surface it is on
example: Which has spots, the leopard or the tiger?

defTh: สปอตไลท์
defEn: a light with a single, very bright beam that can be directed at a particular place or person, especially a performer on the stage
example: The room was lit by spotlights.

defTh: คู่สมรส
defEn: a husband or wife
example: Fill in your spouse’s name here.

defTh: แผ่, กระจาย
defEn: an increase in the amount or number of something that there is, or in the area that is affected by something
example: measures to halt the spread of the disease

defTh: ฤดูใบไม้ผลิ, สปริง
defEn: the season between winter and summer when plants begin to grow
example: The following spring, the three artists travelled to California.

defTh: สอดแนม
defEn: a person who tries to get secret information about another country, organization or person, especially somebody who is employed by a government or the police
example: He was denounced as a foreign spy.

defTh: ทีม
defEn: a section of a police force that deals with a particular type of crime
example: the drugs/fraud/bomb/riot squad

defTh: สี่เหลี่ยมจัตุรัส
defEn: having four straight equal sides and four angles of 90°
example: a square room

defTh: บีบ, คั้น
defEn: to press something, especially with your fingers
example: to squeeze a tube of toothpaste

defTh: แทง
defEn: to push a sharp, pointed object, especially a knife, into somebody, killing or injuring them
example: He was stabbed to death in a racist attack.

defTh: ความมั่นคง
defEn: the quality or state of being steady and not changing or being upset in any way (= the quality of being stable)
example: political/economic/social stability

defTh: มีเสถียรภาพ
defEn: to become or to make something become steady and unlikely to change; to make something stable
example: The patient's condition stabilized.

defTh: มั่นคง, เสถียร
defEn: fixed or steady; not likely to move, change or fail
example: The patient's condition is stable (= it is not getting worse).

defTh: สนามกีฬากลางแจ้ง
defEn: a large sports ground surrounded by rows of seats and usually other buildings
example: a football/sports stadium

defTh: เจ้าหน้าที่, พนักงาน
defEn: all the workers employed in an organization considered as a group
example: medical/nursing/teaching/coaching staff

defTh: เวที, ขั้น
defEn: a period or state that something/somebody passes through while developing or making progress
example: at… stage, I can't make a decision at this stage.

defTh: บันได, ขั้นบันได
defEn: a set of steps built between two floors inside a building
example: We had to carry the piano up three flights of stairs.

defTh: สัดส่วนการถือหุ้น
defEn: money that somebody invests in a company
example: a 20 per cent stake in the business

defTh: แผงลอย
defEn: a table or small shop with an open front that people sell things from, especially at a market
example: He works on a market stall in the Square.

defTh: ตราประทับ, แสตมป์
defEn: a small piece of paper with a design on it that you buy and stick on an envelope or a package before you post it
example: a 67p stamp

defTh: ท่าที
defEn: the opinions that somebody has about something and expresses publicly
example: What is the newspaper's stance on the war?

defTh: ยืน, ตั้ง, ทน
defEn: an attitude towards something or an opinion that you make clear to people
example: He has avoided taking a firm stand.

defTh: มาตรฐาน, เกณฑ์
defEn: average or normal rather than having special or unusual features
example: the standard rate of tax (= paid by everyone)

defTh: ยืน
defEn: done from a position in which you are standing rather than sitting or running
example: a standing jump/start

defTh: ดาว, ดารา
defEn: a large ball of burning gas in space that we see as a point of light in the sky at night
example: There was a big moon and hundreds of stars were shining overhead.

defTh: จ้องเขม็ง
defEn: to look at somebody/something for a long time
example: I screamed and everyone stared.

defTh: สิ้นเชิง
defEn: unpleasant; real, and impossible to avoid
example: The author paints a stark picture of life in a prison camp.

defTh: การเริ่มต้น, จุดเริ่มต้น
defEn: the point at which something begins
example: If we don't hurry, we'll miss the start.

defTh: อดอาหาร
defEn: to suffer or die because you do not have enough food to eat; to make somebody suffer or die in this way
example: The animals were left to starve to death.

defTh: รัฐ, สภาพ, กล่าว
defEn: provided or controlled by the government of a country
example: state officials/agencies

defTh: คำแถลง, ข้อความ
defEn: something that you say or write that gives information or an opinion
example: Are the following statements true or false?

defTh: สถานี, ตำแหน่ง
defEn: a place where trains stop so that passengers can get on and off; the buildings connected with this
example: the main station

defTh: สถิติ
defEn: a collection of information shown in numbers
example: Analysis of crime statistics showed high levels of violent crime within the area.

defTh: เชิงสถิติ
defEn: connected with or based on statistics
example: statistical analysis

defTh: รูปปั้น, อนุสาวรีย์
defEn: a figure of a person or an animal in stone, metal, etc., usually the same size as in real life or larger
example: a bronze/marble statue

defTh: สถานะ
defEn: the legal position of a person, group or country
example: They were granted refugee status.

defTh: อยู่, พัก, คงอยู่
defEn: a period of staying; a visit
example: I enjoyed my stay in Prague.

defTh: อย่างคงที่
defEn: gradually and in an even and regular way
example: The company's exports have been increasing steadily.

defTh: มั่นคง, คงที่
defEn: developing, growing, etc. gradually and in an even and regular way
example: We've had five years of steady economic growth.

defTh: ขโมย, ลัก
defEn: to take something from a person, shop, etc. without permission and without intending to return it or pay for it
example: I'll report you to the police if I catch you stealing again.

defTh: ไอน้ำ, อบ
defEn: the hot gas that water changes into when it boils
example: Steam rose from the boiling kettle.

defTh: เหล็กกล้า
defEn: a strong, hard metal that is made of a mixture of iron and carbon
example: the iron and steel industry

defTh: ชัน, สูงชัน, แช่
defEn: rising or falling quickly, not gradually
example: a steep hill/slope

defTh: คัดท้าย, นำทาง
defEn: to control the direction in which a boat, car, etc. moves
example: He steered the boat into the harbour.

defTh: ลำต้น
defEn: the main long, thin part of a plant above the ground from which the leaves or flowers grow; a smaller part that grows from this and supports flowers or leaves
example: long, trailing stems of ivy

defTh: ก้าว, ขั้น
defEn: one of a series of things that you do in order to achieve something
example: We are taking steps to prevent pollution.

defTh: แบบเหมารวม
defEn: a fixed idea or image that many people have of a particular type of person or thing, but which is often not true in reality and may cause hurt and offence
example: cultural/gender/racial stereotypes

defTh: ไม้, ติด, ยึด
defEn: a thin piece of wood that has fallen or been broken from a tree
example: We collected dry sticks to start a fire.

defTh: เหนียว, ติด
defEn: made of or covered in a substance that sticks to things that touch it
example: sticky fingers covered in jam

defTh: แข็ง, ทื่อ
defEn: difficult to bend or move
example: a sheet of stiff black cardboard

defTh: ยังคง, เงียบ
defEn: not moving; calm and quiet
example: A fallen tree floated in the still water.

defTh: กระตุ้น, เร่งเร้า (การทำงาน/ระบบ)
defEn: to make something develop or become more active; to encourage something
example: The exhibition has stimulated interest in her work.

defTh: สิ่งเร้า
defEn: something that helps somebody/something to develop better or more quickly
example: stimulus for something, Books provide children with ideas and a stimulus for play.

defTh: กวน, คน
defEn: to move a liquid or substance around, using a spoon or something similar, in order to mix it completely
example: stir something, She stirred her tea.

defTh: หุ้น, คลังสินค้า, สต็อก
defEn: a supply of goods that is available for sale in a shop
example: We have a fast turnover of stock.

defTh: ท้อง, กระเพาะ
defEn: the organ inside the body where food goes when you eat it
example: stomach pains/cramps

defTh: หิน, ก้อนหิน
defEn: a hard solid mineral substance that is found in the ground, often used for building
example: Most of the houses are built of stone.

defTh: หยุด, เลิก, จอด
defEn: a place where a bus or train stops regularly for passengers to get on or off
example: I get off at the next stop.

defTh: พื้นที่จัดเก็บ
defEn: the process of keeping something in a particular place until it is needed; the space where things can be kept
example: tables that fold flat for storage

defTh: ร้านค้า, เก็บ
defEn: a large shop that sells many different types of goods
example: It's available at London's three biggest stores.

defTh: พายุ, ฝนฟ้าคะนอง
defEn: very bad weather with strong winds and rain, and often thunder and lightning
example: fierce/heavy/severe/violent storms

defTh: เรื่องราว, นิทาน
defEn: a description of events and people that the writer or speaker has invented in order to entertain people
example: a tragic love story

defTh: ตรง, ซื่อตรง
defEn: without a bend or curve; going in one direction only
example: a straight road

defTh: ไม่ซับซ้อน
defEn: easy to do or to understand; not complicated
example: It's a relatively straightforward process.

defTh: ความเครียด, สายพันธุ์
defEn: pressure on a system or relationship because great demands are being placed on it
example: The transport service cannot cope with the strain of so many additional passengers.

defTh: สาระ
defEn: a single thin piece of thread, wire, hair, etc.
example: He pulled at a loose strand of wool in his sweater.

defTh: แปลก, ประหลาด
defEn: unusual or surprising, especially in a way that is difficult to understand
example: A strange thing happened this morning.

defTh: คนแปลกหน้า
defEn: a person that you do not know
example: There was a complete stranger sitting at my desk.

defTh: เชิงกลยุทธ์
defEn: done as part of a plan that is meant to achieve a particular purpose or to gain an advantage
example: strategic planning

defTh: กลยุทธ์, ยุทธศาสตร์
defEn: a plan that is intended to achieve a particular purpose
example: the government’s economic strategy

defTh: ลำธาร, ไหล
defEn: a small, narrow river
example: a mountain stream

defTh: ถนน, ทาง
defEn: a public road in a city or town that has houses and buildings on one side or both sides
example: along/down/up the street, I was just walking along the street when it happened.

defTh: ความแข็งแรง, พลัง
defEn: the quality of being physically strong
example: He pushed against the rock with all his strength.

defTh: ทำให้แข็งแกร่ง, เสริมความมั่นคง
defEn: to become more powerful or effective; to make somebody/something more powerful or effective
example: Her position in the party has strengthened in recent weeks.

defTh: ความเครียด, เน้น
defEn: pressure or worry caused by problems in somebody’s life or by having too much to do
example: emotional/mental stress

defTh: ยืด, ขยาย
defEn: an area of land or water, especially a long one
example: a particularly dangerous stretch of road

defTh: เข้มงวด, เคร่งครัด
defEn: that must be obeyed exactly
example: strict rules/regulations

defTh: อย่างเคร่งครัด
defEn: with a lot of control and rules that must be obeyed
example: She was brought up very strictly.

defTh: ตี, ประท้วง, โจมตี
defEn: a period of time when an organized group of employees of a company stops working because of an argument over pay or conditions
example: the miners'/firefighters'/teachers' strike

defTh: โดดเด่น, น่าทึ่ง
defEn: interesting and unusual enough to attract attention
example: a striking feature

defTh: เชือก, สาย
defEn: long, thin material used for tying things together, made of several threads that have been twisted together; a piece of string used to fasten or pull something or keep something in place
example: a piece/length/ball of string

defTh: แถบ, ถอด
defEn: a long narrow piece of paper, metal, cloth, etc.
example: a strip of material

defTh: มุ่งมั่น
defEn: to try very hard to achieve something
example: strive for something, We encourage all members to strive for the highest standards.

defTh: เส้นเลือดในสมอง
defEn: an act of hitting a ball, for example with a bat or racket
example: What a beautiful stroke!

defTh: แข็งแรง, เข้มแข็ง
defEn: having a lot of physical power so that you can lift heavy weights, do hard physical work, etc.
example: He's strong enough to lift a car!

defTh: อย่างแรงกล้า
defEn: in a way that shows definite and serious opinions or beliefs
example: a strongly worded protest

defTh: โครงสร้าง
defEn: connected with the way in which something is built or organized
example: Storms have caused structural damage to hundreds of homes.

defTh: โครงสร้าง, สร้าง
defEn: the way in which the parts of something are connected together, arranged or organized; a particular arrangement of parts
example: the structure of the building

defTh: ดิ้นรน, ต่อสู้
defEn: a hard fight in which people try to obtain or achieve something, especially something that somebody else does not want them to have
example: Marx wrote about the class struggle.

defTh: นักเรียน, นักศึกษา
defEn: a person who is studying at a university or college
example: a college/university student

defTh: ห้องทำงาน, สตูดิโอ
defEn: a room where radio or television programmes are recorded and broadcast from, or where music is recorded
example: a television/recording studio

defTh: เรียน, ศึกษา
defEn: the activity of learning or gaining knowledge, either from books or by examining things in the world
example: a room set aside for private study

defTh: สิ่งของ, เรื่อง
defEn: used to refer to a substance, material, group of objects, etc. when you do not know the name, when the name is not important or when it is obvious what you are talking about
example: What's all that sticky stuff on the carpet?

defTh: สะดุด
defEn: to hit your foot against something while you are walking or running and almost fall
example: The child stumbled and fell.

defTh: สตัน
defEn: to make a person or an animal unconscious for a short time, especially by hitting them on the head
example: The fall stunned me for a moment.

defTh: น่าทึ่ง
defEn: extremely attractive or impressive
example: You look absolutely stunning!

defTh: โง่, ทึ่ม, เซ่อ
defEn: showing a lack of thought or good judgement
example: a stupid mistake/question/idea

defTh: รูปแบบ, สไตล์
defEn: the particular way in which something is done
example: a wide range of musical styles

defTh: หัวข้อ, ประธาน
defEn: likely to be affected by something, especially something bad
example: At this stage these are proposals and are still subject to change.

defTh: การส่ง
defEn: the act of accepting that somebody has defeated you and that you must obey them
example: a gesture of submission

defTh: ยื่น (เอกสาร)
defEn: to give a document, proposal, etc. to somebody in authority so that they can study or consider it
example: submit something, to submit an application/a claim/a proposal

defTh: สมาชิก
defEn: a person who pays money, usually once a year, to receive regular copies of a magazine or newspaper or have access to it online
example: subscribers to ‘New Scientist’

defTh: สมัครสมาชิก
defEn: an amount of money that you pay regularly to receive a service, be a member of a club, support a charity or receive regular copies of a newspaper or magazine; the act of paying this money
example: an annual subscription

defTh: ภายหลัง
defEn: happening or coming after something else
example: subsequent generations

defTh: ต่อมา
defEn: afterwards; later; after something else has happened
example: The original interview notes were subsequently lost.

defTh: เงินอุดหนุน
defEn: money that is paid by a government or an organization to reduce the costs of services or of producing goods so that their prices can be kept low
example: agricultural subsidies

defTh: สาร, เนื้อหา, แก่น
defEn: a type of solid, liquid or gas that has particular qualities
example: a sticky substance

defTh: มากมาย, มีเนื้อหาสำคัญ
defEn: large in amount, value or importance
example: substantial sums of money

defTh: อย่างมาก, ส่วนใหญ่
defEn: very much; a lot
example: The costs have increased substantially.

defTh: แทน, สับเปลี่ยน
defEn: a person or thing that you use or have instead of the one you normally use or have
example: a meat substitute

defTh: การทดแทน
defEn: an act of using one person or thing in the place of another
example: Two substitutions were made during the game.

defTh: ละเอียดอ่อน, แยบยล
defEn: not very obvious or easy to notice
example: subtle colours/flavours/smells, etc.

defTh: ชานเมือง
defEn: an area where people live that is outside the centre of a city
example: a suburb of London

defTh: แห่งชานเมือง
defEn: in or connected with a suburb
example: suburban areas

defTh: สำเร็จ, ประสบผล
defEn: to achieve something that you have been trying to do or get; to have the result or effect that was intended
example: Our plan succeeded.

defTh: ความสำเร็จ, ชัยชนะ
defEn: the fact that you have achieved something that you want and have been trying to do or get
example: The company has achieved considerable success in this market.

defTh: สำเร็จ, ประสบผลสำเร็จ
defEn: achieving your aims or what was intended
example: The experiment was entirely successful.

defTh: อย่างสำเร็จ
defEn: in a way that achieves your aims or what was intended
example: She had already successfully completed these courses.

defTh: การสืบทอด
defEn: a number of people or things that follow each other in time or order
example: a succession of visitors

defTh: ต่อเนื่องกัน
defEn: following immediately one after the other
example: This was their fourth successive win.

defTh: ผู้สืบทอด
defEn: a person or thing that comes after somebody/something else and takes their/its place
example: Who's the likely successor to him as party leader?

defTh: เช่นนั้น, เช่นนี้
defEn: used to emphasize the great degree of something
example: This issue was of such importance that we could not afford to ignore it.

defTh: ดูด, แย่
defEn: to take liquid, air, etc. into your mouth by using the muscles of your lips
example: to suck the juice from an orange

defTh: กะทันหัน
defEn: happening or done quickly and unexpectedly
example: News of his sudden and unexpected death came as a great shock.

defTh: อย่างกะทันหัน
defEn: quickly and unexpectedly
example: I suddenly realized what I had to do.

defTh: ฟ้อง
defEn: to make a claim against a person or an organization in court about something that they have said or done to harm you
example: They threatened to sue if the work was not completed.

defTh: ทนทุกข์, เจ็บปวด
defEn: to be badly affected by a disease, pain, sad feelings, a lack of something, etc.
example: I hate to see animals suffering.

defTh: ความทุกข์, ทนทุกข์
defEn: physical or mental pain
example: Death finally brought an end to her suffering.

defTh: เพียงพอ, พอ
defEn: enough for a particular purpose; as much as you need
example: Allow sufficient time to get there.

defTh: อย่างพอเพียง
defEn: enough for a particular purpose; as much as you need
example: The following day she felt sufficiently well to go to work.

defTh: น้ำตาล
defEn: a sweet substance, often in the form of white or brown crystals, made from the juices of various plants, used in cooking or to make tea, coffee, etc. sweeter
example: Do you take sugar (= have it in your tea, coffee, etc.)?

defTh: เสนอแนะ, ชี้แนะ (ความคิด)
defEn: to put forward an idea or a plan for other people to think about
example: suggest something, I'd like to suggest a different explanation for the company's decline.

defTh: ข้อเสนอแนะ, คำแนะนำ
defEn: an idea or a plan that you mention for somebody else to think about
example: Can I make a suggestion?

defTh: การฆ่าตัวตาย
defEn: the act of killing yourself deliberately
example: to commit suicide

defTh: ชุด, เหมาะสม
defEn: a set of clothes made of the same cloth, including a jacket and trousers or a skirt
example: She was wearing a grey business suit.

defTh: เหมาะสม, เหมาะควร
defEn: right or appropriate for a particular purpose or occasion
example: a suitable candidate

defTh: ห้องสวีท
defEn: a set of rooms, especially in a hotel
example: a hotel/private/honeymoon suite

defTh: ผลรวม, ยอดรวม
defEn: an amount of money
example: You will be fined the sum of £200.

defTh: สรุป
defEn: to give a summary of something
example: This essay briefly summarizes some of our approaches.

defTh: สรุป, บทสรุป
defEn: a short statement that gives only the main points of something, not the details
example: a news summary

defTh: ฤดูร้อน
defEn: the warmest season of the year, coming between spring and autumn
example: in the summer, We're going away in the summer.

defTh: การประชุมสุดยอด
defEn: the highest point of something, especially the top of a mountain
example: We reached the summit at noon.

defTh: ดวงอาทิตย์
defEn: the star that shines in the sky during the day and gives the earth heat and light
example: The sun was shining and birds were singing.

defTh: วันอาทิตย์
defEn: the day of the week after Saturday and before Monday, thought of as either the first or the last day of the week
example: It's Sunday today, isn't it?

defTh: สุด ๆ
defEn: extremely good
example: a super meal

defTh: ยอดเยี่ยม
defEn: excellent; of very good quality
example: a superb player

defTh: เหนือกว่า, ดีกว่า
defEn: better in quality than somebody/something else; greater than somebody/something else
example: vastly superior

defTh: ซูเปอร์มาร์เก็ต
defEn: a large shop that sells food, drinks and goods used in the home. People choose what they want from the shelves and pay for it as they leave.
example: I only shop at this supermarket.

defTh: ควบคุมดูแล, ตรวจสอบ (อย่างใกล้ชิด)
defEn: to be in charge of somebody/something and make sure that everything is done correctly, safely, etc.
example: supervise (somebody/something), to supervise building work

defTh: การดูแลอย่างใกล้ชิด, การควบคุม
defEn: the work or activity involved in being in charge of somebody/something and making sure that everything is done correctly, safely, etc.
example: Very young children should not be left to play without supervision.

defTh: หัวหน้างาน
defEn: a person who supervises somebody/something
example: I have a meeting with my supervisor about my research topic.

defTh: ส่วนเสริม, ผลิตภัณฑ์เสริม
defEn: a thing that is added to something else to improve or complete it
example: vitamin/dietary supplements (= vitamins and other foods eaten in addition to what you usually eat)

defTh: จัดหา, อุปทาน
defEn: an amount of something that is provided or available to be used
example: Advances in agriculture increased the food supply.

defTh: สนับสนุน, ช่วยเหลือ
defEn: approval that you give to somebody/something because you want them to be successful
example: support for something, There is strong public support for the policy.

defTh: ผู้สนับสนุน
defEn: a person who supports a political party, an idea, etc.
example: a strong/loyal/staunch/ardent supporter

defTh: ที่ให้ความช่วยเหลือ
defEn: encouraging somebody or giving them help or sympathy
example: a supportive family

defTh: สมมติว่า
defEn: to think or believe that something is true or possible (based on the knowledge that you have)
example: Getting a visa isn't as simple as you might suppose.

defTh: คาดคะเน
defEn: according to what is generally thought or believed but not known for certain
example: The novel is supposedly based on a true story.

defTh: ปราบปราม
defEn: to put an end, often by force, to a group or an activity that is believed to threaten authority
example: The rebellion was brutally suppressed.

defTh: สุดยอด
defEn: highest in rank or position
example: the Supreme Commander of the armed forces

defTh: แน่นอน, มั่นใจ
defEn: confident that you know something or that you are right
example: ‘Is that John over there?’ ‘I'm not sure’.

defTh: อย่างมั่นใจ, เป็นแน่แท้
