defEn: used to show that you are almost certain of what you are saying and want other people to agree with you
example: Surely we should do something about it?

defTh: พื้นผิว, ผิวหน้า
defEn: the outside or top layer of something
example: We need a flat, smooth surface to play the game on.

defTh: ไฟกระชาก
defEn: a sudden increase of a strong feeling
example: She felt a sudden surge of anger.

defTh: ศัลยแพทย์
defEn: a doctor who is trained to perform surgery (= medical operations that involve cutting open a person’s body)
example: a brain/heart surgeon

defTh: การทำศัลยกรรม, การผ่าตัด
defEn: medical treatment of injuries or diseases that involves cutting open a person’s body and often removing or replacing some parts; the branch of medicine connected with this treatment
example: major/minor surgery

defTh: ที่เกี่ยวกับการผ่าตัด
defEn: used in or connected with surgery
example: surgical procedures

defTh: จำนวนที่เหลือใช้
defEn: an amount that is extra or more than you need
example: food surpluses

defTh: ประหลาดใจ, เซอร์ไพรส์
defEn: an event, a piece of news, etc. that is unexpected or that happens suddenly
example: What a nice surprise!

defTh: ประหลาดใจ, ตกใจ
defEn: feeling or showing surprise
example: a surprised look

defTh: ที่น่าประหลาดใจ
defEn: causing surprise
example: It’s not surprising (that) they lost.

defTh: ยอมแพ้
defEn: to admit that you have been defeated and want to stop fighting; to allow yourself to be caught, taken prisoner, etc.
example: The rebel soldiers were forced to surrender.

defTh: ล้อมรอบ, ห้อมล้อม
defEn: to be all around something/somebody
example: surround something/somebody, Tall trees surround the lake.

defTh: โดยรอบ, แวดล้อม
defEn: that is near or around something
example: Oxford and the surrounding area

defTh: การเฝ้าระวัง
defEn: the act of carefully watching a person suspected of a crime or a place where a crime may be committed
example: The police are keeping the suspects under constant surveillance.

defTh: สำรวจ, การสำรวจ
defEn: an investigation of the opinions, behaviour, etc. of a particular group of people, which is usually done by asking them questions
example: A recent survey showed 75 per cent of those questioned were in favour of the plan.

defTh: ความอยู่รอด
defEn: the state of continuing to live or exist, often despite difficulty or danger
example: the struggle/battle/fight for survival

defTh: รอดชีวิต, อยู่รอด
defEn: to continue to live or exist
example: She was the last surviving member of the family.

defTh: ผู้รอดชีวิต
defEn: a person who continues to live, especially despite being nearly killed or experiencing great danger or difficulty
example: the sole/only survivor of the massacre

defTh: สงสัย, ผู้ต้องสงสัย
defEn: a person who is suspected of a crime or of having done something wrong
example: a murder suspect

defTh: ระงับ, พักงาน, แขวนไว้
defEn: to hang something from something else
example: be suspended from something, A lamp was suspended from the ceiling.

defTh: การระงับ, การถูกพักงาน
defEn: the act of officially removing somebody from their job, school, team, etc. for a period of time, usually as a punishment
example: suspension from school

defTh: ความระแวง
defEn: a feeling that somebody has done something wrong, illegal or dishonest, even though you have no proof
example: They drove away slowly to avoid arousing suspicion.

defTh: น่าสงสัย, สงสัย
defEn: feeling that somebody has done something wrong, illegal or dishonest, without having any proof
example: They became suspicious of his behaviour and contacted the police.

defTh: ยั่งยืน
defEn: to provide enough of what somebody/something needs in order to live or exist
example: Which planets can sustain life?

defTh: ที่ยั่งยืน
defEn: involving the use of natural products and energy in a way that does not harm the environment
example: sustainable forest management

defTh: กลืน, นกนางแอ่น
defEn: to make food, drink, etc. go down your throat into your stomach
example: swallow (something), Always chew food well before swallowing it.

defTh: สาบาน, สบถ
defEn: to use rude or offensive language, usually because you are angry
example: She fell over and swore loudly.

defTh: เสื้อสเวตเตอร์
defEn: a piece of clothing for the upper part of the body, made of wool or cotton, with long sleeves
example: She wore jeans and a sweater.

defTh: กวาด, ชนะ
defEn: to clean a room, surface, etc. using a broom (= a type of brush on a long handle)
example: sweep (something), to sweep the floor

defTh: หวาน, น่ารัก
defEn: containing, or tasting as if it contains, a lot of sugar
example: a cup of hot sweet tea

defTh: ว่ายน้ำ, การว่าย
defEn: a period of time during which you swim
example: Let's go for a swim.

defTh: ว่ายน้ำ, การว่ายน้ำ
defEn: the sport or activity of swimming
example: Swimming is a good form of exercise.

defTh: แกว่ง, ชิงช้า
defEn: a swinging movement or rhythm
example: He took a wild swing at the ball.

defTh: สวิตช์, เปลี่ยน
defEn: a small device that you press or move up and down in order to turn a light or piece of electrical equipment on and off
example: a light switch

defTh: ดาบ
defEn: a weapon with a long metal blade (= sharp cutting part) and a handle
example: to draw/sheathe a sword (= to take it out of/put it into its cover)

defTh: สัญลักษณ์
defEn: a person, an object, an event, etc. that represents a more general quality or situation
example: The vase is decorated with religious symbols.

defTh: เป็นสัญลักษณ์
defEn: containing symbols, or being used as a symbol
example: He shook his fist in a symbolic gesture of defiance.

defTh: เห็นอกเห็นใจ
defEn: kind to somebody who is hurt or sad; showing that you understand and care about their problems
example: a sympathetic listener

defTh: ความเห็นใจ
defEn: the feeling of being sorry for somebody; showing that you understand and care about somebody’s problems
example: sympathy for somebody, to express/feel sympathy for somebody

defTh: อาการ
defEn: a change in your body or mind that shows that you are not healthy
example: Symptoms include a headache and sore throat.

defTh: ซินโดรม
defEn: a set of physical conditions that show you have a particular disease or medical problem
example: PMS or premenstrual syndrome

defTh: สังเคราะห์
defEn: the act of combining separate ideas, beliefs, styles, etc.; a mixture or combination of ideas, beliefs, styles, etc.
example: synthesis of A with B, the synthesis of art with everyday life

defTh: ระบบ, กลไก
defEn: an organized set of ideas or theories or a particular way of doing something
example: reform of the country's education system

defTh: อย่างเป็นระบบ
defEn: done according to a system or plan, in a complete, efficient or determined way
example: a systematic approach to solving the problem

defTh: เสื้อยืด
defEn: an informal shirt, usually with short sleeves (= arms) no collar or buttons, or just a few buttons at the top
example: He was wearing a faded pair of blue jeans and an old T-shirt.

defTh: โต๊ะ, ตาราง
defEn: a piece of furniture that consists of a flat top supported by legs
example: at a/the table, We sat at a round table in the corner.

defTh: ยาเม็ด, แท็บเล็ต
defEn: a small computer that is easy to carry, with a large touch screen and usually without a physical keyboard
example: The company has launched its latest 10-inch tablet.

defTh: จัดการ, รับมือ
defEn: an act of trying to take the ball from an opponent in football (soccer), hockey, etc.; an act of knocking somebody to the ground, for example in rugby or American football
example: He was booked for a late tackle on Torres.

defTh: ชั้นเชิง
defEn: the particular method you use to achieve something
example: They tried all kinds of tactics to get us to go.

defTh: เกี่ยวกับยุทธวิธี
defEn: connected with the particular method you use to achieve something
example: tactical planning

defTh: แท็ก
defEn: a small piece of paper, cloth, plastic, etc. attached to something to identify it or give information about it
example: He put name tags on all his shirts.

defTh: หาง, ท้าย
defEn: the part that sticks out at the back of the body of a bird, an animal or a fish, which the animal can move from side to side or up and down
example: The dog ran up, wagging its tail.

defTh: เอา, รับ, พา
defEn: to carry or move something from one place to another
example: take something, Remember to take your coat when you leave.

defTh: เรื่อง
defEn: a story created using the imagination, especially one that is full of action and adventure
example: a coming-of-age/morality tale

defTh: ความสามารถพิเศษ
defEn: a natural ability to do something well
example: The festival showcases the talent of young musicians.

defTh: มีพรสวรรค์, มีความสามารถพิเศษ
defEn: having a natural ability to do something well
example: a talented player/musician/artist

defTh: พูด, สนทนา
defEn: a speech or lecture on a particular subject
example: I went to several interesting talks at the conference.

defTh: สูง, ใหญ่
defEn: having a greater than average height
example: She's tall and thin.

defTh: รถถัง, แท็งก์
defEn: a large container for holding liquid or gas
example: a fuel/water/storage tank

defTh: ก๊อก, แตะ
defEn: a device for controlling the flow of water from a pipe into a bath or sink
example: bath taps

defTh: เทป, บันทึก
defEn: a long, narrow piece of material with a sticky substance on one side that is used for sticking things together
example: adhesive/sticky tape

defTh: เป้าหมาย, เป้าเล็ง
defEn: a result that you try to achieve
example: to meet/hit a target

defTh: งาน, ภารกิจ
defEn: a piece of work that somebody has to do, especially a hard or unpleasant one
example: to accomplish/perform/undertake/complete a task

defTh: รส, ชิม
defEn: the particular quality that different foods and drinks have that allows you to recognize them when you put them in your mouth
example: a sweet/salty/bitter/sour taste

defTh: ภาษี, เก็บภาษี
defEn: money that you have to pay to the government so that it can pay for public services. People pay tax according to their income and businesses pay tax according to their profits. Tax is also often paid on goods and services.
example: to pay your taxes

defTh: รถแท็กซี่
defEn: a car with a driver that you pay to take you somewhere. Taxis usually have meters that show how much money you have to pay.
example: We took a taxi to the airport.

defTh: ผู้เสียภาษี
defEn: a person who pays tax to the government, especially on the money that they earn
example: Hundreds of thousands of pounds of taxpayers' money (= money paid in taxes) have been spent on the project.

defTh: ชา, น้ำชา
defEn: the dried leaves (called tea leaves) of the tea bush
example: a packet of tea

defTh: สอน, สั่งสอน
defEn: to give lessons to students in a school, college, university, etc.; to help somebody learn something by giving information about it
example: She teaches at our local school.

defTh: ครู, อาจารย์
defEn: a person whose job is teaching, especially in a school
example: an English/a science teacher

defTh: การสอน, สั่งสอน
defEn: the work of a teacher
example: She wants to go into teaching (= make it a career).

defTh: ทีม, คณะ
defEn: a group of people who play a particular game or sport against another group of people
example: a football/basketball/soccer team

defTh: น้ำตา
defEn: a hole that has been made in something by tearing
example: This sheet has a tear in it.

defTh: เชิงเทคนิค, เทคนิค
defEn: connected with the practical use of machines, methods, etc. in science and industry
example: We offer free technical support for those buying our software.

defTh: เทคนิค, วิธี
defEn: a particular way of doing something, especially one in which you have to learn special skills
example: management techniques

defTh: เทคโนโลยี
defEn: connected with technology
example: technological advances

defTh: เทคโนโลยี, วิชาเทคโนโลยี
defEn: scientific knowledge used in practical ways in industry, for example in designing new machines
example: science and technology

defTh: ที่เกี่ยวกับวัยรุ่น
defEn: between 13 and 19 years old; connected with people of this age
example: a teenage girl/boy

defEn: a person who is between 13 and 19 years old
example: a magazine aimed at teenagers

defTh: ช่วงวัยรุ่น (อายุ 13-19 ปี)
defEn: the years of a person’s life when they are between 13 and 19 years old
example: in your teens, She began writing poetry in her teens.

defTh: เครื่องโทรศัพท์, โทรศัพท์ (รูปเต็ม)
defEn: a system for talking to somebody else over long distances, using wires or radio; a machine used for this
example: The telephone rang and Pat answered it.

defTh: โทรทัศน์, ทีวี
defEn: a piece of electrical equipment with a screen on which you can watch programmes with moving pictures and sounds
example: a widescreen/flat-screen/plasma television

defTh: บอก, เล่า, แจ้ง
defEn: to give information to somebody by speaking or writing
example: tell something to somebody, He told the news to everybody he saw.

defTh: อุณหภูมิ
defEn: the measurement in degrees of how hot or cold a thing or place is
example: high/low temperatures

defTh: วัด
defEn: a building used for religious worship, especially in religions other than Christianity
example: the Temple of Diana at Ephesus

defTh: อย่างชั่วคราว
defEn: in a way that lasts or is intended to last or be used only for a short time; in a way that is not permanent
example: We regret this service is temporarily unavailable.

defTh: ชั่วคราว, ไม่ถาวร
defEn: lasting or intended to last or be used only for a short time; not permanent
example: to hire temporary workers

defTh: ล่อ
defEn: to attract somebody or make somebody want to do or have something, even if they know it is wrong
example: tempt somebody, I was tempted by the dessert menu.

defTh: สิบ, จำนวนสิบ
example: There are only ten of these rare animals left.

defTh: ผู้เช่า
defEn: a person who pays rent for the use of a room, building, land, etc. to the person who owns it
example: They had evicted their tenants for non-payment of rent.

defTh: ดูแล, มีแนวโน้ม
defEn: to be likely to do something or to happen in a particular way because this is what often or usually happens
example: Women tend to live longer than men.

defTh: แนวโน้ม, ความโน้มเอียง
defEn: if somebody/something has a particular tendency, they are likely to behave or act in a particular way
example: to display artistic tendencies

defTh: อ่อนโยน
defEn: kind, gentle and loving
example: tender words

defTh: เทนนิส
defEn: a game in which two or four players use rackets to hit a ball backwards and forwards across a net on a specially marked court
example: to play tennis

defTh: ความตึงเครียด
defEn: a situation in which people do not trust each other, or feel unfriendly towards each other, and that may cause them to attack each other
example: There is mounting tension along the border.

defTh: เต็นท์, กระโจม
defEn: a shelter made of a large sheet of canvas, nylon, etc. that is supported by poles and ropes fixed to the ground, and is used especially for camping
example: to put up/take down a tent

defTh: วาระการดำรงตำแหน่ง
defEn: the period of time when somebody holds an important job, especially a political one; the act of holding an important job
example: his four-year tenure as president

defTh: คำศัพท์, ภาคเรียน
defEn: a word or phrase used as the name of something, especially one connected with a particular type of language
example: a technical/legal/generic term

defTh: เทอร์มินัล
defEn: that cannot be cured and will lead to death, often slowly
example: He has terminal lung cancer.

defTh: ยุติ
defEn: to end; to make something end
example: Your contract of employment terminates in December.

defTh: เงื่อนไข
defEn: the conditions that people offer, demand or accept when they make an agreement, an arrangement or a contract
example: peace terms

defTh: ภูมิประเทศ
defEn: used to refer to an area of land when you are mentioning its natural features, for example, if it is rough, flat, etc.
example: difficult/rough/mountainous terrain

defTh: เลวร้าย, น่าสะพรึงกลัว
defEn: very unpleasant; making you feel very unhappy, upset or frightened
example: a terrible experience

defTh: อย่างน่ากลัว
defEn: very
example: I'm terribly sorry—did I hurt you?

defTh: ยอดเยี่ยมมาก
defEn: excellent; wonderful
example: I feel absolutely terrific today!

defTh: ทำให้หวาดผวา
defEn: to make somebody feel extremely frightened
example: terrify somebody, Flying terrifies her.

defTh: อาณาเขต
defEn: land that is under the control of a particular country or political leader
example: enemy/disputed/foreign territory

defTh: ความหวาดกลัว
defEn: a feeling of extreme fear
example: a feeling of sheer/pure terror

defTh: การก่อการร้าย
defEn: the use of violent action in order to achieve political aims or to force a government to act
example: an act of terrorism

defTh: ผู้ก่อการร้าย
defEn: a person who takes part in terrorism
example: The terrorists are threatening to blow up the plane.

defTh: ทดสอบ, สอบ
defEn: an examination of somebody’s knowledge or ability, consisting of questions for them to answer or activities for them to perform
example: an IQ/a fitness test

defTh: เป็นพยาน
defEn: to make a statement that something happened or that something is true, especially as a witness in court
example: testify against somebody/something, She refused to testify against her husband.

defTh: คำให้การ
defEn: a thing that shows that something else exists or is true
example: This increase in exports bears testimony to the successes of industry.

defTh: การทดสอบ
defEn: the activity of testing somebody/something in order to find something out, see if it works, etc.
example: nuclear testing

defTh: ข้อความ, เนื้อหา
defEn: any form of written material
example: a computer that can process text

defTh: หนังสือเรียน
defEn: a book that teaches a particular subject and that is used especially in schools and colleges
example: a school/medical/history textbook

defTh: เนื้อสัมผัส
defEn: the way a surface, substance or piece of cloth feels when you touch it, for example how rough, smooth, hard or soft it is
example: the soft texture of velvet

defTh: กว่า, มากกว่า
defEn: used to introduce the second part of a comparison
example: I'm older than her.

defTh: กล่าวขอบคุณ
defEn: to tell somebody that you are grateful for something
example: thank somebody for something, I must write and thank Mary for the present.

defTh: โชคดีที่ (ใช้แสดงความโล่งใจ), อย่างขอบคุณ
defEn: used to show that you are pleased that something good has happened or that something bad has been avoided
example: There was a fire in the building, but thankfully no one was hurt.

defTh: ขอบคุณ (คำอุทาน), คำขอบคุณ
defEn: used to show that you are grateful to somebody for something they have done
example: ‘How are you?’ ‘Fine, thanks (= thanks for asking).’

defTh: ที่, นั้น, ว่า
defEn: to such a degree; so
example: I can't walk that far (= as far as that).

defTh: คำนำหน้านาม
defEn: used to refer to somebody/something that has already been mentioned or is easily understood
example: There were three questions. The first two were relatively easy but the third one was hard.

defTh: โรงละคร
defEn: a building or an outdoor area where plays and similar types of entertainment are performed
example: Broadway theatres

defTh: การแสดงละคร
defEn: connected with the theatre
example: a theatrical agent

defTh: ขโมย
defEn: the crime of stealing something from a person or place
example: car theft

defTh: (คำนำหน้า) ของพวกเขา
defEn: of or belonging to people, animals or things that have already been mentioned or are easily identified
example: Their parties are always fun.

defTh: (สรรพนาม) สิ่งที่เป็นของพวกเขา
defEn: of or belonging to them
example: Theirs are the children with very fair hair.

defTh: พวกเขา, พวกมัน (ใช้เป็นกรรม)
defEn: used when referring to people, animals or things as the object of a verb or preposition, or after the verb be
example: Tell them the news.

defTh: หัวข้อ, แก่น
defEn: the subject or main idea in a talk, piece of writing or work of art
example: the central/main/key/major theme

defTh: ตัวเองพวกเขา
defEn: used when people or animals performing an action are also affected by it
example: They seemed to be enjoying themselves.

defTh: แล้ว, จากนั้น
defEn: used to refer to a particular time in the past or future
example: Life was harder then because neither of us had a job.

defTh: เทววิทยา
defEn: the study of religion and beliefs
example: a degree in theology

defTh: ตามทฤษฎี
defEn: connected with the ideas and principles on which a particular subject is based, rather than with practice and experiment
example: a theoretical approach

defTh: ทฤษฎี, หลักการ
defEn: a formal set of ideas that is intended to explain why something happens or exists
example: theory of something, the theory of evolution/relativity

defTh: นักบำบัด
defEn: a specialist who treats a particular type of illness or problem, or who uses a particular type of treatment
example: a speech therapist

defTh: การบำบัด
defEn: the treatment of a physical problem or an illness
example: He is receiving therapy for cancer.

defTh: ที่นั่น, มี
defEn: used to show that something exists or happens
example: There's a restaurant around the corner.

defTh: หลังจากนั้น
defEn: after the time or event mentioned
example: She married at 17 and gave birth to her first child shortly thereafter.

defTh: ด้วยเหตุนี้
defEn: used to introduce the result of the action or situation mentioned
example: Regular exercise strengthens the heart, thereby reducing the risk of heart attack.

defTh: ดังนั้น, เพราะฉะนั้น
defEn: used to introduce the logical result of something that has just been mentioned
example: He's only 17 and therefore not eligible to vote.

defTh: วิทยานิพนธ์
defEn: a long piece of writing completed by a student as part of a university degree, based on their own research
example: Students must submit a thesis on an agreed subject within four years.

defTh: พวกเขา, พวกมัน (ใช้เป็นประธาน)
defEn: people, animals or things that have already been mentioned or are easily identified
example: ‘Where are John and Liz?’ ‘They went for a walk.’

defTh: หนา, ทึบ, ข้น
defEn: having a larger distance between opposite sides or surfaces than other similar objects or than normal
example: a thick slice of bread

defTh: ขโมย, โจร
defEn: a person who steals something from another person or place
example: a car/jewel thief

defTh: ผอม, บาง
defEn: having a smaller distance between opposite sides or surfaces than other similar objects or than normal
example: Cut the vegetables into thin strips.

defTh: สิ่ง, ของ, เรื่อง
defEn: an object whose name you do not use because you do not need to or want to, or because you do not know it
example: Can you pass me that thing over there?

defTh: คิด, พิจารณา
defEn: to have a particular idea or opinion about something/somebody; to believe something
example: think (that)…, Do you really think (that) he'll win?

defTh: การคิด, ความคิด
defEn: the process of thinking about something
example: I had to do some quick thinking.

defTh: ที่สาม
defEn: each of three equal parts of something
example: He divided the money into thirds.

defTh: กระหายน้ำ
defEn: needing or wanting to drink
example: We were hungry and thirsty.

defTh: สิบสาม
สามสิบ

defEn: to this degree; so
example: It's about this high (= as high as I am showing you with my hands).

defTh: ละเอียดถี่ถ้วน
defEn: done completely; with great attention to detail
example: a thorough knowledge of the subject

defTh: อย่างละเอียด
defEn: very much; completely
example: We thoroughly enjoyed ourselves.

defTh: ถึงแม้ว่า
defEn: used especially at the end of a sentence or clause to add a fact or an opinion that makes the previous statement less strong or less important
example: Our team lost. It was a good game though.

defTh: ความคิด, ความคิดเห็น
defEn: something that you think of or remember
example: thought of doing something, I couldn't bear the thought of waiting any longer.

defTh: กระตุ้นความคิด
defEn: making people think seriously about a particular subject or issue
example: a brilliant and thought-provoking play

defTh: รอบคอบ
defEn: quiet, because you are thinking
example: He looked thoughtful.

defTh: พัน
example: There were thousands of people there.

defTh: เส้นด้าย, หัวข้อ
defEn: a thin string of cotton, wool, silk, etc. used for sewing or making cloth
example: a needle and thread

defTh: ภัยคุกคาม
defEn: a statement in which you tell somebody that you will punish or harm them, especially if they do not do what you want
example: threat against somebody/something, to make threats against somebody

defTh: ข่มขู่, คุกคาม
defEn: to say that you will cause trouble, hurt somebody, etc. if you do not get what you want
example: threaten somebody/something, They broke my windows and threatened me.

defTh: สาม, เลขสาม
example: There are only three cookies left.

defTh: เกณฑ์
defEn: the floor or ground at the bottom of a doorway, considered as the entrance to a building or room
example: He stepped across the threshold.

defTh: ตื่นเต้น
defEn: very excited and pleased
example: ‘Are you pleased?’ ‘I'm thrilled.’

defTh: เจริญเติบโต
defEn: to become, and continue to be, successful, strong, healthy, etc.
example: New businesses thrive in this area.

defTh: ลำคอ, คอ
defEn: a passage in the neck through which food and air pass on their way into the body; the front part of the neck
example: a sore throat

defTh: ผ่าน, ทะลุ
defEn: from one end or side of something to the other
example: Put the coffee in the filter and let the water run through.

defTh: ตลอด, ทั่ว
defEn: in or into every part of something
example: They export their products to markets throughout the world.

defTh: ขว้าง, โยน
defEn: to send something from your hand through the air by moving your hand or arm quickly
example: Practise throwing and catching.

defTh: นิ้วหัวแม่มือ
defEn: the short, thick finger at the side of the hand, slightly apart from the other four
example: She still sucks her thumb when she's worried.

defTh: วันพฤหัสบดี
defEn: the day of the week after Wednesday and before Friday
example: It's Thursday today, isn't it?

defTh: ดังนั้น, เช่นนี้
defEn: in this way; like this
example: Many scholars have argued thus.

defTh: ตั๋ว, ใบสั่ง
defEn: a printed piece of paper, or a message or image received on your phone or computer, that gives you the right to travel on a particular bus, train, etc. or to go into a theatre, etc.
example: a plane/bus/train ticket

defTh: กระแสน้ำ
defEn: a regular rise and fall in the level of the sea, caused by the pull of the moon and sun; the flow of water that happens as the sea rises and falls
example: the ebb and flow of the tide

defTh: เป็นระเบียบ
defEn: arranged neatly and with everything in order
example: a tidy desk

defTh: ผูก, เน็คไท
defEn: a long, narrow piece of cloth worn around the neck, especially by men, with a knot in front
example: He was dressed impeccably in a suit and tie.

defTh: แน่น, คับ, ตึง
defEn: held or fixed in position securely; difficult to move, open or separate
example: He kept a tight grip on her arm.

defTh: ขัน
defEn: to hold or fix something more securely in position; to make something or become more difficult to move, open or separate
example: tighten something, to tighten a lid/screw/rope/knot

defTh: จนกระทั่ง, ไถ
defEn: until
example: We're open till 6 o'clock.

defTh: ไม้
defEn: trees that are grown to be used in building or for making things
example: the timber industry

defTh: เวลา, ครั้ง, ยุค
defEn: what is measured in minutes, hours, days, etc.
example: The world exists in time and space.

defTh: ทันเวลา
defEn: happening at exactly the right time
example: A nasty incident was prevented by the timely arrival of the police.

defTh: เวลา
defEn: the act of choosing when something happens; a particular point or period of time when something happens or is planned
example: The timing of the decision was a complete surprise.

defTh: ดีบุก, กระป๋อง
defEn: a metal container in which food is sold; the contents of one of these containers
example: Open the tin and drain the tuna.

defTh: เล็กจิ๋ว, เล็กมาก
defEn: very small in size or amount
example: a tiny baby

defTh: ทิป, ปลาย, เอียง
defEn: a small piece of advice about something practical
example: tip on/for doing something, handy tips for buying a computer

defTh: เหนื่อย, เมื่อยล้า
defEn: feeling that you would like to sleep or rest; needing rest
example: to be/look/feel tired

defTh: เนื้อเยื่อ
defEn: a piece of soft paper, used especially as a handkerchief
example: a box of tissues

defTh: ชื่อเรื่อง, ตำแหน่ง
defEn: the name of a book, poem, painting, piece of music, etc.
example: What's title of her new book?

defTh: ถึง, เพื่อ, ที่จะ
defEn: used to show purpose or intention
example: I set out to buy food.

defTh: ยาสูบ
defEn: the dried leaves of the tobacco plant that are used for making cigarettes, smoking in a pipe, etc.
example: tobacco smoke

defTh: วันนี้
defEn: on this day
example: I've got a piano lesson later today.

defTh: นิ้วเท้า
defEn: one of the five small parts that stick out from the foot; any similar part on the foot of an animal or bird
example: the big/little toe (= the largest/smallest toe)

defTh: ด้วยกัน
defEn: with or near to somebody/something else; with each other
example: We grew up together.

defTh: ห้องน้ำ, ส้วม
defEn: a large bowl attached to a pipe that you sit on or stand over when you get rid of waste matter from your body
example: Have you flushed the toilet?

defTh: ขันติธรรม
defEn: the quality of being willing to accept or tolerate somebody/something, especially opinions or behaviour that you may not agree with, or people who are not like you
example: She had no tolerance for jokes of any kind.

defTh: ทนต่อ
defEn: to allow somebody to do something that you do not agree with or like
example: tolerate something, Their relationship was tolerated but not encouraged.

defTh: ค่าผ่านทาง
defEn: money that you pay to use a particular road or bridge
example: motorway tolls

defTh: มะเขือเทศ
defEn: a soft fruit with a lot of juice and shiny red skin that is eaten as a vegetable either raw or cooked
example: a bacon, lettuce, and tomato sandwich

defTh: พรุ่งนี้
defEn: on or during the day after today
example: I'm off now. See you tomorrow.

defTh: ตัน, จำนวนมาก
defEn: a unit for measuring weight, in the UK 2240 pounds (long ton) and in the US 2000 pounds (short ton)
example: (informal), What have you got in this bag? It weighs a ton (= is very heavy).

defTh: น้ำเสียง, ท่าที
defEn: the quality of somebody’s voice, especially expressing a particular emotion
example: speaking in hushed/low/clipped/measured, etc. tones

defTh: ลิ้น, ภาษา
defEn: the soft part in the mouth that moves around, used for tasting, swallowing, speaking, etc.
example: He clicked his tongue to attract their attention.

defTh: คืนนี้
defEn: on or during the evening or night of today
example: Will you have dinner with me tonight?

defTh: ตัน, เมตริกตัน
defEn: a unit for measuring weight, equal to 1000 kilograms
example: a record grain harvest of 236m tonnes

defTh: เกินไป, ด้วย
defEn: used before adjectives and adverbs to say that something is more than is good, necessary, possible, etc.
example: He's far too young to go on his own.

defTh: เครื่องมือ, อุปกรณ์
defEn: an instrument such as a hammer, screwdriver, saw, etc. that you hold in your hand and use for making things, repairing things, etc.
example: garden tools

defTh: ฟัน, ซี่ฟัน
defEn: any of the hard white structures in the mouth used for biting food
example: I've just had a tooth out at the dentist's.

defTh: ด้านบน, ยอด
defEn: highest in position
example: He lives on the top floor.

defTh: หัวข้อ, ประเด็น
defEn: a subject that you talk, write or learn about
example: The main topic of conversation was Tom's new girlfriend.

defTh: การทรมาน
defEn: the act of causing somebody severe pain in order to punish them or make them say or do something
example: Many of the refugees have suffered torture.

defTh: โยน
defEn: to throw something lightly or carelessly
example: toss something + adv./prep., I tossed the book aside and got up.

defTh: ทั้งหมด, รวม
defEn: being the amount or number after everyone or everything is counted or added together
example: Their total cost was $18000.

defTh: ทั้งหมด, อย่างยิ่ง
defEn: completely
example: They come from totally different cultures.

defTh: สัมผัส, แตะ
defEn: the sense that enables you to be aware of things and what they are like when you put your hands and fingers on them
example: the sense of touch

defTh: ยาก, แข็งแรง
defEn: having or causing problems or difficulties
example: a tough childhood

defTh: เที่ยว, ทัวร์
defEn: a journey made for pleasure during which several different towns, countries, etc. are visited
example: a walking/sightseeing/bus tour

defTh: การท่องเที่ยว
defEn: the business activity connected with providing accommodation, services and entertainment for people who are visiting a place for pleasure
example: The area is heavily dependent on tourism.

defTh: นักท่องเที่ยว
defEn: a person who is travelling or visiting a place for pleasure
example: busloads of foreign tourists

defTh: ทัวร์นาเมนต์
defEn: a sports competition involving a number of teams or players who take part in different games and must leave the competition if they lose. The competition continues until there is only the winner left.
example: a golf/tennis/soccer/chess tournament

defTh: ไปทาง, สู่
defEn: in the direction of somebody/something
example: They were heading towards the German border.

defTh: ผ้าขนหนู
defEn: a piece of cloth or paper used for drying things, especially your body
example: Help yourself to a clean towel.

defTh: หอคอย, เสาสูง
defEn: a tall narrow building or part of a building, especially of a church or castle
example: a bell tower

defTh: เมือง, ชุมชน
defEn: a place with many houses, shops, etc. where people live and work. It is larger than a village but smaller than a city.
example: The nearest town is ten miles away.

defTh: พิษ
defEn: containing poison; poisonous
example: toxic chemicals/fumes/gases/substances

defTh: ของเล่น
defEn: made as a copy of a particular thing and used for playing with
example: a toy car

defTh: ร่องรอย, ตามรอย
defEn: a mark, an object or a sign that shows that somebody/something existed or was present
example: It's exciting to discover traces of earlier civilizations.

defTh: ติดตาม, ร่องรอย
defEn: rails (= metal bars) that a train moves along
example: railway/railroad tracks

defTh: การค้า, แลกเปลี่ยน
defEn: the activity of buying and selling or of exchanging goods or services between people or countries
example: international/foreign/global/world trade

defTh: เครื่องหมายการค้า
defEn: a name, symbol or design that a company uses for its products and that cannot be used by anyone else
example: ‘Big Mac’ is McDonald's best-known trademark.

defTh: การซื้อขาย
defEn: the activity of buying and selling things
example: new laws on Sunday trading (= shops being open on Sundays)

defTh: ประเพณี, จารีตที่สืบทอดกันมา
defEn: a belief, custom or way of doing something that has existed for a long time among a particular group of people; a set of these beliefs or customs
example: religious/cultural/ancient traditions

defTh: ดั้งเดิม, ตามธรรมเนียม
defEn: being part of the beliefs, customs or way of life of a particular group of people, that have not changed for a long time
example: traditional dress/music/art/culture/dance

defTh: การจราจร
defEn: the vehicles that are on a road at a particular time
example: There's always a lot of traffic at this time of day.

defTh: โศกนาฏกรรม
defEn: a very sad event or situation, especially one that involves death
example: It's a tragedy that she died so young.

defTh: น่าเศร้า
defEn: making you feel very sad, usually because somebody has died or suffered a lot
example: He was killed in a tragic accident at the age of 24.

defTh: เส้นทาง
defEn: a long line or series of marks that is left by somebody/something
example: a trail of blood

defTh: รถพ่วง
defEn: a truck, or a container with wheels, that is pulled by another vehicle
example: a car towing a trailer with a boat on it

defTh: รถไฟ, ฝึกฝน
defEn: a number of connected coaches or trucks, pulled by an engine or powered by a motor in each one, taking people and goods from one place to another
example: to get on/off a train

defTh: ผู้ฝึกสอน
defEn: a shoe that you wear for sports or as informal clothing
example: a pair of trainers

defTh: การฝึกอบรม
defEn: the process of learning the skills that you need to do a job
example: staff training

defTh: คุณลักษณะเฉพาะตัว
defEn: a particular quality in your personality
example: personality traits

defTh: ธุรกรรม
defEn: a piece of business that is done between people, especially an act of buying or selling
example: financial transactions between companies

defTh: การถอดเสียง
defEn: a written or printed copy of words that have been spoken
example: a transcript of the interview

defTh: โอน
defEn: the act of moving somebody/something from one place, group or job to another; an occasion when this happens
example: electronic data transfer

defTh: แปลง, เปลี่ยน
defEn: to change the form of something; to change in form
example: transform something/somebody (into something), The photochemical reactions transform the light into electrical impulses.

defTh: การเปลี่ยนแปลงรูปโฉม, การพลิกผัน
defEn: a complete change in somebody/something
example: The way in which we work has undergone a complete transformation in the past decade.

defTh: การเดินทางผ่าน, การเคลื่อนผ่าน
defEn: the process of being moved or carried from one place to another
example: The cost includes transit.

defTh: การเปลี่ยนผ่าน, ช่วงหัวเลี้ยวหัวต่อ
defEn: the process or a period of changing from one state or condition to another
example: transition from something to something, the transition from school to full-time work

defTh: แปล, ถ่ายทอด
defEn: to express the meaning of speech or writing in a different language
example: translate something into something, He translated the letter into English.

defTh: การแปล
defEn: the process of changing something that is written or spoken into another language
example: an error in translation

defTh: การแพร่เชื้อ
defEn: the act or process of passing something from one person, place or thing to another
example: the transmission of the disease

defTh: ส่งผ่าน (สัญญาณ, ข้อมูล)
defEn: to send an electronic signal, radio or television broadcast, etc.
example: signals transmitted from a satellite

defTh: ความโปร่งใส
defEn: the quality of something, such as a situation or an argument, that makes it easy to understand
example: a need for greater transparency in legal documents

defTh: โปร่งใส, ชัดเจน
defEn: allowing you to see through it
example: The insect's wings are almost transparent.

defTh: ขนส่ง, การขนส่ง
defEn: a system for carrying people or goods from one place to another using vehicles, roads, etc.
example: air/freight/road transport

defTh: ระบบการขนส่ง, การลำเลียง
defEn: a system for carrying people or goods from one place to another using vehicles, roads, etc.
example: public transportation (= the system of buses, trains, etc. provided for people to travel from one place to another)

defTh: กับดัก, หลุมพราง
defEn: a piece of equipment for catching animals
example: a fox with its leg in a trap

defTh: การบาดเจ็บ
defEn: a mental condition caused by severe shock, stress or fear, especially when the harmful effects last for a long time
example: the effects of trauma and stress on the body

defTh: เดินทาง, ท่องเที่ยว
defEn: the act or activity of travelling
example: air/rail/space travel

defTh: นักเดินทาง, ผู้เดินทาง
defEn: a person who is travelling or who often travels
example: She is a frequent traveller to Belgium.

defTh: สมบัติ
defEn: a collection of valuable things such as gold, silver and jewellery
example: buried treasure

defTh: เลี้ยง, ปฏิบัติ, รักษา
defEn: to behave in a particular way towards somebody/something
example: treat somebody/something with something, to treat people with respect

defTh: การรักษา, บำบัด
defEn: something that is done to cure an illness or injury, or to make somebody look and feel good
example: The drug is used in the treatment of depression.

defTh: สนธิสัญญา
defEn: a formal agreement between two or more countries
example: the Treaty of Rome

defTh: ต้นไม้
defEn: a tall plant that can live a long time. Trees have a thick central wooden trunk from which branches grow, usually with leaves on them
example: an oak/olive/apple tree

defTh: มหาศาล
defEn: very great
example: a tremendous explosion

defTh: แนวโน้ม, กระแส
defEn: a general direction in which a situation is changing or developing
example: social/economic/political/demographic trends

defTh: การทดลอง, การพิจารณา
defEn: a formal examination of evidence in court by a judge and often a jury, to decide if somebody accused of a crime is guilty or not
example: a murder/criminal trial

defTh: แห่งชนเผ่า
defEn: connected with a tribe or tribes
example: tribal art

defTh: ชนเผ่า
defEn: a social group in a traditional society consisting of people with the same language, culture, religion, etc., living in a particular area and often having one leader known as a chief
example: They were a nomadic horse-riding tribe.

defTh: ศาล
defEn: a type of court with the authority to deal with a particular problem or disagreement
example: an international war crimes tribunal

defTh: ส่วย
defEn: an act, a statement or a gift that is intended to show your love or respect, especially for a dead person
example: At her funeral her oldest friend paid tribute to her life and work.

defTh: กล, หลอกลวง, เคล็ดลับ
defEn: something that you do to make somebody believe something that is not true, or to annoy somebody as a joke
example: They had to think of a trick to get past the guards.

defTh: สิ่งกระตุ้น
defEn: the part of a gun that you press in order to fire it
example: to pull/squeeze the trigger

defTh: ล้านล้าน
ทรีโอ
defEn: a group of three people or things
example: A trio of English runners featured in the women’s 1500 metres.

defTh: การเดินทาง, สะดุด
defEn: a journey to a place and back again, especially a short one for pleasure or a particular purpose
example: Did you have a good trip?

defTh: ชัยชนะ
defEn: a great success, achievement or victory
example: one of the greatest triumphs of modern science

defTh: กองทหาร
defEn: soldiers, especially in large groups
example: They announced the withdrawal of 12000 troops from the area.

defTh: ถ้วยรางวัล
defEn: an object such as a silver cup that is given as a prize for winning a competition
example: a trophy cabinet

defTh: เขตร้อน, เกี่ยวกับเขตร้อน
defEn: coming from, found in or typical of the tropics
example: tropical fish/birds/fruit

defTh: ปัญหา, ความยุ่งยาก
defEn: a problem, worry, difficulty, etc. or a situation causing this
example: We have trouble getting staff.

defTh: ที่มีปัญหา, วิตกกังวล
defEn: worried and anxious
example: She looked into his troubled face.

defTh: กางเกงขายาว
defEn: a piece of clothing that covers the lower body and is divided into two parts to cover each leg separately
example: a pair of grey trousers

defTh: รถบรรทุก (ภาษาอังกฤษแบบอเมริกัน)
defEn: a large vehicle for carrying heavy loads by road
example: a truck driver

defTh: จริง, แท้, ถูกต้อง
defEn: connected with facts rather than things that have been invented or guessed
example: Indicate whether the following statements are true or false.

defTh: อย่างสัตย์จริง
defEn: used to emphasize that a particular statement, feeling, etc. is sincere or real
example: She truly believes that none of this is her fault.

defTh: ความเชื่อใจ, ไว้ใจ
defEn: the belief that somebody/something is good, sincere, honest, etc. and will not try to harm or trick you
example: Our partnership is based on trust.

defTh: ผู้ดูแลผลประโยชน์
defEn: a person or an organization that has control of money or property that has been put into a trust for somebody
example: The bank will act as trustees for the estate until the child is 18.

defTh: ความจริง, สัจจะ
defEn: the true facts about something, rather than the things that have been invented or guessed
example: Do you think she's telling the truth?

defTh: พยายาม, ลอง
defEn: an act of trying to do something
example: I doubt they'll be able to help but it's worth a try (= worth asking them).

defTh: สึนามิ
defEn: an extremely large wave in the sea caused, for example, by an earthquake
example: A tsunami early warning system was set up in Hawaii.

defTh: หลอด, ท่อ
defEn: a long, hollow pipe made of metal, plastic, rubber, etc., through which liquids or gases move from one place to another
example: He had to be fed through a feeding tube for several months.

defTh: วันอังคาร
defEn: the day of the week after Monday and before Wednesday
example: It's Tuesday today, isn't it?

defTh: ค่าเล่าเรียน
defEn: the act of teaching something, especially to one person or to people in small groups
example: She received private tuition in French.

defTh: ทำนอง, ปรับ
defEn: a series of musical notes that are sung or played in a particular order to form a piece of music
example: to sing/whistle a tune

defTh: อุโมงค์, ขุดอุโมงค์
defEn: a passage built underground, for example to allow a road or railway to go through a hill, under a river, etc.
example: a railway/railroad tunnel

defTh: เลี้ยว, หมุน, ผลัด
defEn: the time when somebody in a group of people should or is allowed to do something
example: When it's your turn, take another card.

defTh: ผลิตภัณฑ์
defEn: the number of people who attend a particular event
example: This year's festival attracted a record turnout.

defTh: มูลค่าการซื้อขาย
defEn: the total amount of goods or services sold by a company during a particular period of time
example: an annual turnover of $75 million

defTh: โทรทัศน์
defEn: television
example: We spent the evening watching TV.

defTh: สิบสอง
example: There are only twelve of these rare animals left.

defTh: ยี่สิบ
สองครั้ง
defEn: two times; on two occasions
example: I don't know him well; I've only met him twice.

defTh: ฝาแฝด, คู่
defEn: used to describe one of a pair of children who are twins
example: a twin brother/sister

defTh: บิด, การบิด
defEn: the action of turning something with your hand, or of turning a part of your body
example: She gave the lid another twist and it came off.

defTh: สอง, เลขสอง
example: There are only two cookies left.

defTh: ชนิด, พิมพ์
defEn: a class or group of people or things that share particular qualities or features and are part of a larger group; a kind or sort
example: a rare blood type

defTh: ตามแบบฉบับ, เป็นตัวแทน
defEn: having the usual qualities or features of a particular type of person, thing or group
example: a typical Italian cafe

defTh: โดยทั่วไป, ตามปกติ
defEn: used to say that something usually happens in the way that you are stating
example: The standard chips are typically used for databases and other business software.

defTh: ยางรถยนต์
defEn: a thick rubber ring that fits around the edge of a wheel of a car, bicycle, etc.
example: a front/rear tyre

defTh: น่าเกลียด, ขี้เหร่
defEn: unpleasant to look at
example: an ugly face

defTh: ที่สุด, สูงสุด
defEn: happening at the end of a long process
example: our ultimate goal/aim/objective/target

defTh: ในที่สุด
defEn: in the end; finally
example: A poor diet will ultimately lead to illness.

defTh: ร่ม, กันแดดกันฝน
defEn: an object with a round folding frame of long, straight pieces of metal covered with material, that you use to protect yourself from the rain or from hot sun
example: to carry/hold an umbrella

defTh: ซึ่งไม่สามารถ, ขาดความสามารถ
defEn: not having the skill, strength, time, knowledge, etc. to do something
example: a former soldier who has been unable to find work since the war ended

defTh: รับไม่ได้
defEn: so bad that you think it should not be allowed
example: Such behaviour is totally unacceptable in a civilized society.

defTh: ความไม่แน่นอน
defEn: the state of being uncertain
example: There is considerable uncertainty about the company's future.

defTh: ลุง, น้า, อา
defEn: the brother of your mother or father; the husband of your aunt or uncle
example: Uncle Ian

defTh: อึดอัด, ไม่สบาย
defEn: not letting you feel physically comfortable; unpleasant to wear, sit on, etc.
example: uncomfortable shoes

defTh: หมดสติ, ไม่รู้สึกตัว
defEn: in a state like sleep because of an injury or illness, and not able to use your senses
example: They found him lying unconscious on the floor.

defTh: ใต้, ภายใต้
defEn: below something
example: He pulled up the covers and crawled under.

defTh: ประสบ
defEn: to experience something, especially a change or something unpleasant
example: to undergo tests/trials/repairs

defTh: ระดับปริญญาตรี
defEn: a university or college student who is studying for their first degree
example: a first-year undergraduate

defTh: ใต้ดิน, ลับ
defEn: under the surface of the ground
example: an underground bunker/tunnel

defTh: อยู่ข้างใต้
defEn: important in a situation but not always easily noticed or stated clearly
example: The underlying assumption is that the amount of money available is limited.

defTh: บ่อนทำลาย
defEn: to make something, especially somebody’s confidence or authority, gradually weaker or less effective
example: Our confidence in the team has been seriously undermined by their recent defeats.

defTh: เข้าใจ, ทราบ, รู้
defEn: to know or realize the meaning of words, a language, what somebody says, etc.
example: understand (something), Can you understand French?

defTh: ความเข้าใจ, เข้าใจ
defEn: the knowledge that somebody has about a particular subject or situation
example: Students will gain a broad understanding of the workings of Parliament.

defTh: รับผิดชอบดำเนินการ
defEn: to make yourself responsible for something and start doing it
example: to undertake a task/project

defTh: ชุดชั้นใน
defEn: clothes that you wear under other clothes and next to the skin
example: I never wear underwear.

defTh: ไม่ต้องสงสัยเลย
defEn: used to emphasize that something exists or is definitely true
example: There is undoubtedly a great deal of truth in what he says.

defTh: ว่างงาน, ตกงาน
defEn: without a job although able to work
example: How long have you been unemployed?

defTh: การว่างงาน
defEn: the fact of a number of people not having a job; the number of people without a job
example: an area of high/low unemployment

defTh: ไม่คาดฝัน
defEn: if something is unexpected, it surprises you because you were not expecting it
example: Things took an unexpected turn.

defTh: ไม่ยุติธรรม
defEn: not right or fair according to a set of rules or principles; not treating people equally
example: They had been given an unfair advantage.

defTh: แฉ
defEn: to spread open or flat something that has previously been folded; to become open and flat
example: to unfold a map

defTh: โชคร้าย, เคราะห์ร้าย
defEn: having bad luck; caused by bad luck
example: He was unfortunate to lose in the final round.

defTh: โชคร้าย, น่าเสียดาย
defEn: used to say that a particular situation or fact makes you sad or disappointed, or gets you into a difficult position
example: Unfortunately, I won't be able to attend the meeting.

defTh: ไม่มีความสุข
defEn: not happy; sad
example: to feel/look/seem/sound/become unhappy

defTh: เครื่องแบบ, สม่ำเสมอ
defEn: the special set of clothes worn by all members of an organization or a group at work, or by children at school
example: The hat is part of the school uniform.

defTh: รวมเป็นหนึ่ง
defEn: to join people, things, parts of a country, etc. together so that they form a single unit
example: The new leader hopes to unify the country.

defTh: สหภาพ, การรวมกัน
defEn: an organization of workers, usually in a particular industry, that exists to protect their interests, improve conditions of work, etc.
example: I've joined the union.

defTh: เป็นเอกลักษณ์
defEn: being the only one of its kind
example: Everyone's fingerprints are unique.

defTh: หน่วย, หนึ่ง
defEn: a single thing, person or group that is complete by itself but can also form part of something larger
example: After 1946 the British Government treated the four territorial divisions as a single unit.

defTh: รวมกัน, ผนึก
defEn: to join together with other people in order to do something as a group
example: Nationalist parties united to oppose the government's plans.

defTh: เป็นหนึ่งเดียวกัน
defEn: joined together as a political unit or by shared aims
example: the United States of America

defTh: ความเป็นเอกภาพ
defEn: the state of being in agreement and working together; the state of being joined together to form one unit
example: European unity

defTh: สากล
defEn: done by or involving all the people in the world or in a particular group
example: Such problems are a universal feature of old age.

defTh: จักรวาล, สากล
defEn: the whole of space and everything in it, including the earth, the planets and the stars
example: in the universe, Could there be intelligent life elsewhere in the universe?

defTh: มหาวิทยาลัย
defEn: an institution at the highest level of education where you can study for a degree or do research
example: Is there a university in this town?

defTh: ไม่รู้จัก, ไม่ทราบ
defEn: not known or identified
example: A previously unknown group claimed responsibility for the bombing.

defTh: ถ้าไม่ใช่
defEn: used to say that something can only happen or be true in a particular situation
example: You won't get paid for time off unless you have a doctor's note.

defTh: ไม่เหมือน, ต่างจาก
defEn: different from a particular person or thing
example: Music is quite unlike any other art form.

defTh: ไม่น่าเป็นไปได้
defEn: not likely to happen; not probable
example: unlikely to do something, The project seemed unlikely to succeed.

defTh: ไม่จำเป็น
defEn: not needed; more than is needed
example: They were found guilty of causing unnecessary suffering to animals.

defTh: ไม่น่าพอใจ
defEn: not pleasant or comfortable
example: an unpleasant experience/surprise/task

defTh: เป็นประวัติการณ์
defEn: that has never happened, been done or been known before
example: The situation is unprecedented in modern times.

defTh: จนกระทั่ง, จนถึง
defEn: up to the point in time or the event mentioned
example: Let's wait until the rain stops.

defTh: ผิดปกติ, แปลก
defEn: different from what is usual or normal
example: The case is highly unusual.

defTh: เปิดตัว, เปิดเผย (สิ่งที่ถูกคลุมอยู่)
defEn: to remove a cover or curtain from a painting, statue, etc. so that it can be seen in public for the first time
example: The Queen unveiled a plaque to mark the official opening of the hospital.

defTh: ขึ้น, บน, จบ
defEn: towards or in a higher position
example: He jumped up from his chair.

defTh: ที่กำลังจะมาถึง
defEn: going to happen soon
example: the upcoming presidential election

defTh: อัปเดต
defEn: a report or broadcast that gives the most recent information about something; a new version of something containing the most recent information
example: They will send you regular updates by email.

defTh: อัพเกรด
defEn: the act of making a machine, computer system, etc. more powerful and efficient; the more powerful and efficient machine, computer system, etc.
example: instructions for installing an upgrade to the existing system

defTh: ส่งเสริม
defEn: to support something that you think is right and make sure that it continues to exist
example: We have a duty to uphold the law.

defTh: บน, เหนือ
ส่วนบน, สูงกว่า, เหนือกว่า
defEn: located above something else, especially something of the same type or the other of a pair
example: her upper lip

defTh: เสียใจ, กังวล
defEn: unhappy or disappointed because of something unpleasant that has happened
example: I understand how upset you must be feeling.

defTh: ชั้นบน
defEn: on a floor of a house or other building that is higher than the one that you are on
example: an upstairs room/window/bathroom

defTh: ขึ้นไป, สูงขึ้น
defEn: towards a higher place or position
example: Place your hands on the table with the palms facing upwards.

defTh: เมือง, ในเมือง
defEn: connected with a town or city
example: urban and rural communities

defTh: กระตุ้น, แรงผลักดัน
defEn: to advise or try hard to persuade somebody to do something
example: urge somebody to do something, If you ever get the chance to visit this place, I strongly urge you to do so.

defTh: ด่วน, เร่งด่วน
defEn: that needs to be dealt with or happen immediately
example: The police have issued an urgent appeal for information.

defTh: พวกเรา, เรา
defEn: used when the speaker or writer and another or others are the object of a verb or preposition, or after the verb be
example: She gave us a picture as a wedding present.

defTh: การใช้, วิธีการใช้งาน (ทั่วไป)
defEn: the way in which words are used in a language
example: a book on current English usage

defTh: ใช้, การใช้
defEn: the act of using something; the state of being used
example: A ban was imposed on the use of chemical weapons.

defTh: ใช้แล้ว
defEn: familiar with something because you do it or experience it often
example: used to doing something, I'm not used to eating so much at lunchtime.

defTh: เคย, เคยชิน
defEn: used to say that something happened continuously or frequently during a period in the past
example: I used to live in London.

defTh: มีประโยชน์, ใช้การได้ดี
defEn: that can help you to do or achieve what you want
example: a useful tool

defTh: ไร้ประโยชน์, ไม่มีประโยชน์
defEn: not useful; not doing or achieving what is needed or wanted
example: This pen is useless.

defTh: ผู้ใช้, ผู้ใช้งาน
defEn: a person or thing that uses something
example: road users

defTh: ตามปกติ, ที่เคยเป็นมา
defEn: that happens or is done most of the time or in most cases
example: This is the usual way of doing it.

defTh: โดยปกติ, เป็นประจำ
defEn: in the way that is usual or normal; most often
example: How long does the journey usually take?

defTh: คุณประโยชน์
defEn: a service provided for the public, for example an electricity, water or gas supply
example: a privatized electricity utility

defTh: ใช้
defEn: to use something, especially for a practical purpose
example: The Romans were the first to utilize concrete as a building material.

defTh: อย่างสิ้นเชิง
defEn: completely
example: We're so utterly different from each other.

defTh: วันหยุดพักผ่อน
defEn: a period of time spent travelling or resting away from home
example: on vacation, They're on vacation in Hawaii right now.

defTh: เครื่องดูดฝุ่น
defEn: a space that is completely empty of all substances, including all air or other gas
example: a vacuum pump (= one that creates a vacuum)

defTh: คลุมเครือ
defEn: not clear in a person’s mind
example: to have a vague impression/memory/recollection of something

defTh: ใช้ได้, ถูกต้อง
defEn: that is legally or officially acceptable
example: Do you have a valid passport?

defTh: ความถูกต้อง
defEn: the state of being legally or officially acceptable
example: The period of validity of the agreement has expired.

defTh: หุบเขา
defEn: an area of low land between hills or mountains, often with a river flowing through it; the land that a river flows through
example: in a valley, In the valley below cows were grazing peacefully.

defTh: มีค่า, ล้ำค่า
defEn: worth a lot of money
example: My home is my most valuable asset.

defTh: คุณค่า, มูลค่า
defEn: how much something is worth in money or other goods for which it can be exchanged
example: to go up/rise/increase in value

defTh: รถตู้, รถแวน
defEn: a covered vehicle with no side windows in its back half, usually smaller than a lorry, used for carrying goods or people
example: the driver of a white van

defTh: หายไป
defEn: to disappear suddenly and/or in a way that you cannot explain
example: He turned around and vanished into the house.

defTh: ตัวแปร
defEn: often changing; likely to change
example: variable temperatures

defTh: ความแปรปรวน, การเปลี่ยนแปลง
defEn: a change, especially in the amount or level of something
example: The dial records very slight variations in pressure.

defTh: หลากหลาย, แตกต่าง
defEn: of many different types
example: varied opinions

defTh: ความหลากหลาย, ชนิด
defEn: several different sorts of the same thing
example: There is a wide variety of patterns to choose from.

defTh: หลากหลาย, ต่างๆ
defEn: several different
example: various types/forms/kinds of somebody/something

defTh: แตกต่าง, ผันแปร
defEn: to be different from each other in size, shape, etc.
example: New techniques were introduced with varying degrees of success.

defTh: กว้างใหญ่, มหาศาล
defEn: extremely large in area, size, amount, etc.
example: a vast area of forest

defTh: ผัก, พืชผัก
defEn: a plant or part of a plant that is eaten as food. Potatoes, beans and onions are all vegetables.
example: The children don't eat enough fresh vegetables.

defTh: ยานพาหนะ
defEn: a thing that is used for transporting people or goods from one place to another, such as a car or lorry
example: motor vehicles (= cars, buses, lorries, etc.)

defTh: หลอดเลือดดำ
defEn: any of the tubes that carry blood from all parts of the body towards the heart
example: the jugular vein

defTh: เสี่ยง, กล้า
defEn: a business project or activity, especially one that involves taking risks
example: A disastrous business venture lost him thousands of dollars.

defTh: สถานที่จัดงาน
defEn: a place where people meet for an organized event, for example a concert, sporting event or conference
example: The band will be playing at 20 different venues on their UK tour.

defTh: วาจา
defEn: relating to words
example: The job applicant must have good verbal skills.

defTh: คำตัดสิน
defEn: an official judgement made in court or at an inquest (= an official investigation into somebody's death)
example: Has the jury reached a verdict?

defTh: ยืนยันความถูกต้อง
defEn: to check that something is true or accurate
example: verify something, We have no way of verifying his story.

defTh: กลอน
defEn: writing that is arranged in lines, often with a regular rhythm or pattern of rhyme
example: in verse, Most of the play is written in verse, but some of it is in prose.

defTh: รุ่น, ฉบับ
defEn: a form of something that is slightly different from an earlier form or from other forms of the same thing
example: version of something, the latest version of the software package

defTh: เทียบกับ
defEn: used to show that two teams or sides are against each other
example: It is France versus Brazil in the final.

defTh: แนวตั้ง, ตั้งตรง
defEn: going straight up or down from a level surface or from top to bottom in a picture, etc.
example: the vertical axis of the graph

defTh: มาก, จริงๆ
defEn: used to emphasize that you are talking about a particular thing or person and not about another
example: He might be phoning her at this very moment.

defTh: เรือ
defEn: a tube that carries blood through the body of a person or an animal, or liquid through the parts of a plant
example: to burst/rupture a blood vessel

defTh: ทหารผ่านศึก
defEn: a person who has a lot of experience in a particular area or activity
example: the veteran American actor, Clint Eastwood

defTh: โดย, ผ่าน
defEn: through a place
example: We flew home via Dubai.

defTh: ทำงานได้
defEn: that can be done; that will be successful
example: a viable option/proposition

defTh: สดใส, มีพลัง
defEn: full of life and energy
example: a vibrant city

defTh: ตำแหน่งรอง, การเป็นผู้ช่วย
defEn: criminal activities that involve sex or drugs
example: At the door were two plain-clothes detectives from the vice squad.

defTh: ชั่วร้าย
defEn: violent and cruel
example: a vicious attack

defTh: เหยื่อ, ผู้เคราะห์ร้าย
defEn: a person who has been attacked, injured or killed as the result of a crime, a disease, an accident, etc.
example: shooting/murder victims

defTh: ชัยชนะ, ความสำเร็จ
defEn: success in a game, an election, a war, etc.
example: to win a narrow victory

defTh: วีดิทัศน์, วิดีโอ
defEn: a system of recording moving pictures and sound, either using a digital method of storing data or (in the past) using videotape
example: A wedding is the perfect subject for video.

defTh: ทิวทัศน์, มอง
defEn: what you can see from a particular place or position, especially beautiful countryside
example: view of something, There were magnificent views of the surrounding countryside.

defTh: ผู้ดู
defEn: a person watching television or a video on the internet
example: The programme attracted millions of viewers.

defTh: มุมมอง
defEn: a way of thinking about a subject
example: from a… viewpoint, Try looking at things from a different viewpoint.

defTh: หมู่บ้าน, ชนบท
defEn: a very small town located in a country area
example: We visited towns and villages all over Spain.

defTh: ชาวบ้าน
defEn: a person who lives in a village
example: Some of the villagers have lived here all their lives.

defTh: ละเมิด
defEn: to go against or refuse to obey a law, an agreement, etc.
example: to violate international law

defTh: การละเมิด
defEn: the act of going against or refusing to obey a law, an agreement, etc.
example: They were in open violation of the treaty.

defTh: ความรุนแรง
defEn: violent behaviour that is intended to hurt or kill somebody
example: Police do not think this killing was a random act of violence.

defTh: รุนแรง, โหดร้าย
defEn: involving or caused by physical force that is intended to hurt or kill somebody
example: violent crime/criminals

defTh: เสมือน
defEn: made to appear to exist by the use of computer software, for example on the internet
example: a system to help programmers create virtual environments

defTh: คุณธรรม
defEn: behaviour or attitudes that show high moral standards
example: He led a life of virtue.

defTh: ไวรัส, เชื้อไวรัส
defEn: a living thing, too small to be seen without a microscope, that causes disease in people, animals and plants
example: the flu/influenza virus

defTh: วีซ่า
defEn: a stamp or mark put in your passport by officials of a foreign country that gives you permission to enter, pass through or leave their country
example: to apply for a visa

defTh: มองเห็นได้
defEn: that can be seen
example: The house is clearly visible from the beach.

defTh: วิสัยทัศน์, การมองเห็น
defEn: the ability to see; the area that you can see from a particular position
example: to have good/perfect/poor/blurred/normal vision

defTh: เยี่ยม, เยือน
defEn: an occasion or a period of time when somebody goes to see a place or person and spends time there
example: a two-day/three-day visit

defTh: ผู้มาเยือน, แขก
defEn: a person who visits a person or place
example: We've got visitors coming this weekend.

defTh: ที่เกี่ยวกับภาพ, การมองเห็น
defEn: of or connected with seeing or sight
example: the visual arts

defTh: สำคัญยิ่ง, จำเป็น
defEn: necessary or essential in order for something to succeed or exist
example: vital for somebody/something, the vitamins that are vital for health

defTh: วิตามิน
defEn: a natural substance found in food that is an essential part of what humans and animals need to help them grow and stay healthy. There are many different vitamins.
example: vitamin A/B/D/E

defTh: เสียงร้อง
defEn: connected with the voice
example: vocal music

defTh: เสียง, สิทธิ์
defEn: the sound or sounds produced through the mouth by a person speaking or singing
example: I could hear voices in the next room.

defTh: ปริมาตร, ระดับเสียง
defEn: the amount of space that an object or a substance fills; the amount of space that a container has
example: volume of something, How do you measure the volume of a gas?

defTh: โดยสมัครใจ
defEn: done willingly, not because you are forced
example: a voluntary agreement

defTh: ผู้ที่ทำด้วยความสมัครใจ
defEn: a person who does a job without being paid for it
example: Schools need volunteers to help children to read.

defTh: ลงคะแนน, โหวต
defEn: a formal choice that you make in an election or at a meeting in order to choose somebody or decide something
example: to win/lose votes

defTh: โหวต
defEn: the action of choosing somebody/something in an election or at a meeting
example: He was eliminated in the first round of voting.

defTh: คำสาบาน
defEn: to make a formal and serious promise to do something or a formal statement that is true
example: vow to do something, She vowed never to speak to him again.

defTh: ช่องโหว่
defEn: the fact of being weak and easily hurt physically or emotionally
example: the vulnerability of newborn babies to disease

defTh: เปราะบาง
defEn: weak and easily hurt physically or emotionally
example: These offices are highly vulnerable to terrorist attack.

defTh: ค่าจ้าง, ค่าแรง
defEn: a regular amount of money that you earn, usually every week or every month, for work or services
example: wage/wages of something, wages of £300 a week

defTh: รอ, คอย
defEn: an act of waiting; an amount of time waited
example: The wait seemed interminable.

defTh: บริกร, พนักงานเสิร์ฟ
defEn: a man whose job is to serve customers at their tables in a restaurant, etc.
example: I'll ask the waiter for the bill.

defTh: ตื่น, ปลุก
defEn: to stop sleeping; to make somebody stop sleeping
example: I always wake early in the summer.

defTh: เดิน, การเดิน
defEn: a journey on foot, usually for pleasure or exercise
example: Let's go for a walk.

defTh: กำแพง, ผนัง
defEn: a long, solid structure that rises straight up from the ground, made of stone, brick or concrete, that surrounds, divides or protects an area of land
example: to build a wall

defTh: เดินเตร่, เร่ร่อน
defEn: to walk slowly around or to a place, often without any particular sense of purpose or direction
example: + adv./prep., She wandered aimlessly around the streets.

defTh: ต้องการ, อยากได้
defEn: to have a desire or a wish for something/somebody
example: want somebody/something, Do you want some more tea?

defTh: สงคราม, การทำสงคราม
defEn: a situation in which two or more countries or groups of people fight against each other over a period of time
example: the Second World War

defTh: วอร์ด
defEn: a separate room or area in a hospital for people with the same type of medical condition
example: a maternity/surgical/psychiatric/children’s ward

defTh: คลังสินค้า
defEn: a building where large quantities of goods are stored, especially before they are sent to shops to be sold
example: Police are investigating a fire at a furniture warehouse.

defTh: การทำสงคราม
defEn: the activity of fighting a war, especially using particular weapons or methods
example: air/naval/guerrilla warfare

defTh: อบอุ่น
defEn: at a fairly high temperature in a way that is pleasant, rather than being hot or cold
example: warm weather/temperatures/air

defTh: ภาวะโลกร้อน
defEn: the process of making something, or of becoming, warm or warmer
example: atmospheric warming

defTh: เตือน, แจ้งเตือน
defEn: to tell somebody about something, especially something dangerous or unpleasant that is likely to happen, so that they can avoid it
example: warn somebody, I tried to warn him, but he wouldn't listen.

defTh: คำเตือน, การเตือน
defEn: a statement, an event, etc. telling somebody that something bad or unpleasant may happen in the future so that they can try to avoid it
example: I had absolutely no warning.

defTh: หมายจับ
defEn: a legal document that is signed by a judge and gives the police authority to do something
example: an arrest warrant

defTh: นักรบ
defEn: (especially in the past) a person who fights in a battle or war
example: a warrior nation (= whose people are skilled in fighting)

defTh: ล้าง, ซัก
defEn: an act of cleaning somebody/something using water and usually soap
example: These towels are ready for a wash.

defTh: การซัก
defEn: the act of cleaning something using water and usually soap
example: a gentle shampoo for frequent washing

defTh: ของเสีย, สูญเปล่า
defEn: no longer needed for a particular process and therefore thrown away
example: the disposal of waste material

defTh: ดู, นาฬิกา
defEn: a type of small clock that you wear on your wrist, or (in the past) carried in your pocket
example: She kept looking anxiously at her watch.

defTh: น้ำ, ชล
defEn: a liquid without colour, smell or taste that falls as rain, is in lakes, rivers and seas, and is used for drinking, washing, etc.
example: a glass of water

defTh: คลื่น, โบก
defEn: a raised line of water that moves across the surface of the sea, ocean, etc.
example: Huge waves were breaking on the shore.

defTh: ทาง, วิธี, หนทาง
defEn: very far; by a large amount
example: She finished the race way ahead of the other runners.

defTh: พวกเรา
defEn: I and another person or other people; I and you
example: We've moved to Atlanta.

defTh: อ่อนแอ, ไม่แข็งแรง
defEn: not physically strong
example: She is still weak after her illness.

defTh: อ่อนแอลง
defEn: to make somebody/something less strong or powerful; to become less strong or powerful
example: The team has been weakened by injury.

defTh: จุดอ่อน, ความอ่อนแอ
defEn: lack of physical strength
example: The disease causes progressive muscle weakness.

defTh: ความมั่งคั่ง, ทรัพย์สิน
defEn: a large amount of money, property, etc. that a person or country owns
example: the desire to gain wealth and power

defTh: ร่ำรวย
defEn: having a lot of money, possessions, etc.
example: a wealthy businessman/individual/family

defTh: อาวุธ, เครื่องมือ
defEn: an object such as a knife, gun, bomb, etc. that is used for fighting or attacking somebody
example: Modern nuclear weapons are much more destructive than either biological or chemical weapons.

defTh: สวมใส่, สึก
defEn: to have something on your body as a piece of clothing, a decoration, etc.
example: He was wearing a new suit.

defTh: สภาพอากาศ
defEn: the condition of the atmosphere at a particular place and time, such as the temperature, and if there is wind, rain, sun, etc.
example: cold/hot/warm/wet/dry weather

defTh: สาน
defEn: to make cloth, a carpet, a basket, etc. by crossing threads or narrow pieces of material across, over and under each other by hand or on a machine called a loom
example: weave A from B, The baskets are woven from strips of willow.

defTh: เว็บ
defEn: a system for finding information on the internet, in which documents are connected to other documents
example: to surf/browse/search the web

defTh: เว็บไซต์, เว็บ
defEn: a set of pages on the internet, where a company or an organization, or an individual person, puts information
example: For current prices please visit our website.

defTh: งานแต่งงาน
defEn: a marriage ceremony, and the meal or party that usually follows it
example: I dreamed of having a big wedding, with all my family and friends.

defTh: วันพุธ
defEn: the day of the week after Tuesday and before Thursday
example: It's Wednesday today, isn't it?

defTh: วัชพืช
defEn: a wild plant growing where it is not wanted, especially among crops or garden plants
example: The yard was overgrown with weeds.

defTh: สัปดาห์, อาทิตย์
defEn: a period of seven days, either from Monday to Sunday or from Sunday to Saturday
example: last/this/next week

defTh: สุดสัปดาห์
defEn: Saturday and Sunday
example: this/next/last weekend

defTh: รายสัปดาห์
defEn: happening, done or published once a week or every week
example: weekly meetings

defTh: ชั่ง, มีน้ำหนัก
defEn: to have a particular weight
example: How much do you weigh (= how heavy are you)?

defTh: น้ำหนัก, ความสำคัญ
defEn: how heavy somebody/something is, which can be measured in, for example, kilograms or pounds
example: in weight, It is about 76 kilos in weight.

defTh: แปลก
defEn: very strange or unusual and difficult to explain
example: I had a really weird dream last night.

defTh: ยินดีต้อนรับ
defEn: accepted or wanted somewhere
example: I'll go, then. I know when I'm not welcome.

defTh: สวัสดิการ
defEn: the general health, happiness and safety of a person, an animal or a group
example: We are concerned about the child's welfare.

defTh: ดี, บ่อน้ำ, เอาล่ะ
defEn: in good health
example: I don't feel very well.

defTh: ความเป็นอยู่ที่ดี
defEn: general health and happiness
example: emotional/physical/psychological well-being

defTh: ทิศตะวันตก
defEn: in or towards the west
example: West Africa

defTh: ตะวันตก, ฝรั่ง
defEn: located in the west or facing west
example: western Spain

defTh: เปียก, ชื้น
defEn: covered with or containing liquid, especially water
example: wet clothes/hair/grass

defTh: อะไร, สิ่งที่
defEn: used in questions to ask for particular information about somebody/something
example: What is your name?

defTh: อะไรก็ได้, ช่างเถอะ
defEn: not at all; not of any kind
example: They received no help whatever.

defTh: อะไรก็ตาม
defEn: not at all; not of any kind
example: They received no help whatsoever.

defTh: ข้าวสาลี
defEn: a plant grown for its grain that is used to produce the flour for bread, cakes, pasta, etc.; the grain of this plant
example: wheat flour

defTh: ล้อ, พวงมาลัย
defEn: one of the round objects under a car, bicycle, bus, etc. that turns when it moves
example: He braked suddenly, causing the front wheels to skid.

defTh: เมื่อ, ตอนไหน
defEn: at what time; on what occasion
example: When did you last see him?

defTh: เมื่อไรก็ตาม
defEn: at any time that; on any occasion that
example: You can ask for help whenever you need it.

defTh: ที่ไหน, ที่ซึ่ง
defEn: in or to what place or situation
example: Where do you live?

defTh: ในทางตรงกันข้าม, ในขณะที่ (เน้นความขัดแย้ง)
defEn: used to compare or contrast two facts
example: Some of the studies show positive results, whereas others do not.

defTh: โดยเหตุใด
defEn: by which; because of which
example: They have introduced a new system whereby all employees must undergo regular training.

defTh: ที่ไหนก็ตาม
defEn: in any place
example: Sit wherever you like.

defTh: หรือไม่, ไม่ว่า
defEn: used to express a doubt or choice between two possibilities
example: He seemed undecided whether to go or stay.

defTh: ซึ่ง, อันไหน
defEn: used in questions to ask somebody to be exact about one or more people or things from a limited number
example: Which is better exercise—swimming or tennis?

defTh: ขณะที่, ในขณะ
defEn: during the time that something is happening; at the same time as something else is happening
example: We must have been burgled while we were asleep.

defTh: ในระหว่างที่, ในขณะที่ (เน้นเวลา)
defEn: during the time that something is happening; at the same time as something else is happening
example: In the UK it is illegal to drive whilst holding a mobile phone.

defTh: แส้
defEn: to hit a person or an animal hard with a whip, as a punishment or to make them go faster or work harder
example: He was taken back to the jail and soundly whipped.

defTh: กระซิบ, เสียงกระซิบ
defEn: a low, quiet voice or the sound it makes
example: in a whisper, ‘I love you,’ he said in a whisper.

defTh: สีขาว, ขาว
defEn: having the colour of fresh snow or of milk
example: a crisp white shirt

defTh: ใคร, ผู้ใด
defEn: used in questions to ask about the name, identity or function of one or more people
example: Who is that woman?

defTh: ใครก็ตาม
defEn: the person or people who; any person who
example: Whoever says that is a liar.

defTh: ทั้งสิ้น
defEn: full; complete
example: Let's forget the whole thing.

defTh: โดยสมบูรณ์
defEn: completely
example: wholly inappropriate behaviour

defTh: ใคร (กรรม)
defEn: used instead of ‘who’ as the object of a verb or preposition
example: Whom did they invite?

defTh: ของใคร
defEn: used in questions to ask who something belongs to
example: Whose house is that?

defTh: ทำไม, เหตุใด
defEn: used in questions to ask the reason for or purpose of something
example: Why were you late?

defTh: กว้าง, แผ่
defEn: measuring a large distance from one side to the other
example: It's a wide, fast-flowing river.

defTh: ในวงกว้าง
defEn: by a lot of people; in or to many places
example: The term is widely used in everyday speech.

defTh: เบิก
defEn: to become wider; to make something wider
example: Her eyes widened in surprise.

defTh: แพร่หลาย
defEn: existing or happening over a large area or among many people
example: The storm caused widespread damage.

defTh: แม่หม้าย
defEn: a woman whose husband or wife has died and who has not married again
example: She gets a widow’s pension.

defTh: ความกว้าง
defEn: the measurement from one side of something to the other; how wide something is
