example: The terrace runs the full width of the house.

defTh: ภรรยา, เมีย
defEn: the woman that somebody is married to; a married woman
example: I met my wife at university.

defTh: ป่า, ดุร้าย
defEn: living or growing in natural conditions; not kept in a house or on a farm
example: wild animals/birds/flowers

defTh: สัตว์ป่า
defEn: animals, birds, insects, etc. that are wild and live in a natural environment
example: policies designed to protect wildlife

defTh: จะ, ความตั้งใจ
defEn: the ability to control your thoughts and actions in order to achieve what you want to do; a strong and determined desire to do something that you want to do
example: to have a strong will

defTh: เต็มใจ, ยินดี
defEn: not objecting to doing something; having no reason for not doing something
example: Many consumers are willing to pay more for organic food

defTh: ความเต็มใจ
defEn: the quality of being happy and ready to do something
example: Success in studying depends on a willingness to learn.

defTh: ชนะ, ได้รับ
defEn: a victory in a game, contest, etc.
example: two wins and three defeats

defTh: ลม
หน้าต่าง
defEn: an opening in the wall or roof of a building, car, etc., usually covered with glass, that allows light and air to come in and people to see out; the glass in a window
example: out of the window, She looked out of the window.

defTh: ไวน์, เหล้าองุ่น
defEn: an alcoholic drink made from the juice of grapes that has been left to ferment. There are many different kinds of wine.
example: sparkling wine

defTh: ปีก, บิน
defEn: one of the parts of the body of a bird, insect or bat that it uses for flying
example: The swan flapped its wings noisily.

defTh: ผู้ชนะ, ผู้ได้รับชัย
defEn: a person, a team, an animal, etc. that wins something
example: The lucky winner gets an all-expenses-paid trip to Sydney.

defTh: ฤดูหนาว
defEn: the coldest season of the year, between autumn and spring
example: a cold/mild/harsh winter

defTh: เช็ด
defEn: to rub something against a surface, in order to remove dirt or liquid from it; to rub a surface with a cloth, etc. in order to clean it
example: wipe something (on something), Please wipe your feet on the mat.

defTh: สายไฟ, ลวด
defEn: metal in the form of thin thread; a piece of this
example: a coil of copper wire

defTh: ภูมิปัญญา
defEn: the ability to make sensible decisions and give good advice because of the experience and knowledge that you have
example: She was known to be a woman of great wisdom.

defTh: ฉลาด, รอบรู้
defEn: able to make sensible decisions and give good advice because of the experience and knowledge that you have
example: a wise man

defTh: ปรารถนา, หวัง
defEn: used especially in a letter, email or card to say that you hope that somebody will be happy, well or successful
example: Give my good wishes to the family.

defTh: ปัญญา
defEn: the ability to say or write things that are both clever and humorous
example: to have a quick/sharp/dry/ready wit

defTh: กับ, ด้วย
defEn: in the company or presence of somebody/something
example: She lives with her parents.

defTh: ถอน, ถอนตัว
defEn: to take money out of a bank account
example: withdraw something, With this account, you can withdraw up to £300 a day.

defTh: การถอนตัว
defEn: the act of taking an amount of money out of your bank account
example: You can make withdrawals of up to $250 a day.

defTh: ภายในขอบเขต, ข้างใน (คำบุพบท)
defEn: before a particular period of time has passed; during a particular period of time
example: You should receive a reply within seven days.

defTh: ปราศจาก, ไม่มี
defEn: not having, experiencing or showing something
example: They had gone two days without food.

defTh: พยาน, เห็น
defEn: a person who sees something happen and is able to describe it to other people
example: He failed to interview a key witness.

defTh: ผู้หญิง, สตรี
defEn: an adult female human
example: a 54-year-old woman

defTh: สงสัย, มหัศจรรย์
defEn: a feeling of surprise and pleasure that you have when you see or experience something beautiful, unusual or unexpected
example: He retained a childlike sense of wonder.

defTh: วิเศษ, ยอดเยี่ยม
defEn: very good, pleasant or a lot of fun
example: This is a wonderful opportunity to invest in new markets.

defTh: ไม้, ป่า
defEn: the hard material that the trunk and branches of a tree are made of; this material when it is used to build or make things with, or as a fuel
example: He chopped some wood for the fire.

defTh: ทำด้วยไม้
defEn: made of wood
example: a wooden box/door/floor

defTh: ขนแกะ, ผ้าขนสัตว์
defEn: the soft hair that covers the body of sheep and some other animals
example: Sheep were kept for their wool and meat.

defTh: คำ, ถ้อยคำ
defEn: a single unit of language that means something and can be spoken or written
example: Do not write more than 200 words.

defTh: งาน, ทำงาน
defEn: the job that a person does especially in order to earn money
example: He started work as a security guard.

defTh: คนงาน
defEn: a person who works, especially one who does a particular kind of work
example: farm/factory/office workers

defTh: แรงงาน
defEn: all the people who work for a particular company, organization, etc.
example: The factory has a 1000-strong workforce.

defTh: ทำงาน, กำลังทำ
defEn: having a job for which you are paid
example: the working population

defTh: ออกกำลังกาย
defEn: a period of physical exercise that you do to keep fit
example: She does a 20-minute workout every morning.

defTh: ที่ทำงาน
defEn: the office, factory, etc. where people work
example: the introduction of new technology into the workplace

defTh: การประชุมเชิงปฏิบัติการ
defEn: a period of discussion and practical work on a particular subject, in which a group of people share their knowledge and experience
example: There will be the opportunity for practical theatre work in drama workshops.

defTh: โลก, สังคม
defEn: the earth, with all its countries, peoples and natural features
example: a map of the world

defTh: ทั่วโลก
defEn: affecting all parts of the world
example: an increase in worldwide sales

defTh: หนอน
defEn: a long, thin creature with a soft body and no bones or legs
example: birds looking for worms

defTh: กังวล, เป็นห่วง
defEn: thinking about unpleasant things that have happened or that might happen and therefore feeling unhappy and afraid
example: Don't look so worried!

defTh: กังวล, ห่วง
defEn: the state of worrying about something
example: The threat of losing their jobs is a constant source of worry to them.

defTh: แย่ลง
defEn: of poorer quality or lower standard; more unpleasant
example: The rooms were awful and the food was worse.

defTh: บูชา, สักการะ
defEn: the practice of showing respect for God or a god, by saying prayers, singing with others, etc.; a ceremony for this
example: an act/a place of worship

defTh: แย่ที่สุด
defEn: of the poorest quality or lowest standard; worse than any other person or thing of a similar kind
example: It was by far the worst speech he had ever made.

defTh: คุ้มค่า, มีค่า
defEn: having a value in money, etc.
example: Our house is worth about £100000.

defTh: คุ้มค่า
defEn: important, pleasant, interesting, etc.; worth spending time, money or effort on
example: It was in aid of a worthwhile cause (= a charity, etc.).

defTh: สมควร
defEn: having the qualities that deserve somebody/something
example: Very few of his ideas are worthy of further attention.

defTh: จะ, คงจะ
defEn: used in polite offers or invitations
example: Would you like a sandwich?

defTh: แผล
defEn: an injury to part of the body, especially one in which a hole is made in the skin using a weapon
example: a gunshot/stab wound

defTh: ว้าว
defEn: used to show that you are very surprised or impressed by somebody/something
example: Wow! You look terrific!

defTh: ห่อ, พัน, คลุม
defEn: to cover something completely in paper or other material, for example when you are giving it as a present
example: wrap something up, He spent the evening wrapping up the Christmas presents.

defTh: ข้อมือ
defEn: the joint between the hand and the arm
example: She's broken her wrist.

defTh: เขียน, แต่ง
defEn: to make letters or numbers on a surface, especially using a pen or a pencil
example: In some countries children don't start learning to read and write until they are six.

defTh: นักเขียน, ผู้เขียน
defEn: a person whose job is writing books, stories, articles, etc.
example: Who's your favourite writer?

defTh: การเขียน, งานเขียน
defEn: the activity of writing, in contrast to reading, speaking, etc.
example: Our son’s having problems with his reading and writing (= at school)

defTh: เขียนแล้ว
defEn: expressed in writing rather than in speech
example: Having a written record of what I've done is very valuable.

defTh: ผิด, ไม่ถูกต้อง
defEn: not right or correct
example: I got all the answers wrong.

defTh: ลาน, หลา
defEn: a piece of land next to or around your house where you can grow flowers, fruit, vegetables, etc., usually with a lawn (= an area of grass)
example: They have a gorgeous old oak tree in their front yard.

defTh: ใช่
ปี, รอบปี
defEn: the period from 1 January to 31 December, that is 365 or 366 days, divided into 12 months
example: Elections take place every year.

defTh: ตะโกน
defEn: to shout loudly, for example because you are angry, excited, frightened or in pain
example: yell (at somebody/something), He yelled at the other driver.

defTh: สีเหลือง
defEn: having the colour of lemons or butter
example: pale yellow flowers

defTh: ใช่, ครับ/ค่ะ
defEn: used to answer a question and say that something is correct or true
example: ‘Is this your car?’ ‘Yes, it is.’

defTh: เมื่อวาน, วานนี้
defEn: on the day before today
example: A company spokeswoman said yesterday that no final decision had been made yet.

defTh: ยัง, แต่, กระนั้น
defEn: used in negative sentences and questions to talk about something that has not happened but that you expect to happen
example: (British English), I haven't received a letter from him yet.

defTh: ผลผลิต (ทางการเกษตร/ลงทุน), อัตราผลตอบแทน
defEn: the total amount of crops, profits, etc. that are produced
example: a high crop yield

defTh: คุณ, เธอ, ท่าน
defEn: used as the subject or object of a verb or after a preposition to refer to the person or people being spoken or written to
example: You said you knew the way.

defTh: หนุ่ม, สาว, เด็ก
defEn: having lived or existed for only a short time; not fully developed
example: Young babies need to be wrapped up warmly.

defTh: เจ้าหนู
defEn: a young person or a child
example: The camp is for youngsters aged 8 to 14.

defTh: (คำนำหน้า) ของคุณ
defEn: of or belonging to the person or people being spoken or written to
example: I like your dress.

defTh: (สรรพนาม) สิ่งที่เป็นของคุณ
defEn: of or belonging to you
example: Is that book yours?

defTh: ตัวคุณเอง
defEn: used when the person or people being spoken to both cause and are affected by an action
example: Have you hurt yourself?

defTh: วัยหนุ่มสาว
defEn: the time of life when a person is young, especially the time before a child becomes an adult
example: in somebody's youth, He had been a talented musician in his youth.

defTh: ศูนย์, ไม่มี
example: Five, four, three, two, one, zero… We have lift-off.

defTh: เขต, บริเวณ
defEn: an area or a region with a particular feature or use
example: a war/combat/demilitarized/exclusion zone
